All of the rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed, organic toiletries and satellite TV. Each room also features a minibar with complimentary non-alcoholic beverages. The lounge under the glass roof provides a naturally-lit environment to relax in. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Hotel Joyce is located a 20-minute walk from the Montmartre area. In the opposite direction you will find Gare Saint-Lazare a 10-minute walk away, with numerous Metro lines that offer easy access around the French Capital.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description: Boasting a bar and a spa and wellness centre, Maison ELLE Paris is set in Paris, 600 metres from Arc de Triomphe and 1.4 km from Palais des Congrès de Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Maison ELLE Paris all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 23 km from Maison ELLE Paris.

name: Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert
description: Located in Paris, Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert is 1.5 km from Sacré-Coeur. The accommodation is a member of the Hostelling International Network and offers a restaurant, bar, shared lounge, evening entertainment, shared kitchen, terrace and 24-hour front desk. At the hostel each room has a wardrobe and a private shower. A continental breakfast is available daily at Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert. La Cigale Concert Hall is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Opéra Garnier is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from Auberge de Jeunesse HI Paris Yves Robert.

name: Hôtel Orphée - Orso hotel
description: This 3-star hotel is located 800 metres from the Museum of Natural History and the Jardin des Plantes. It offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, just 50 metres from Saint-Marcel Metro Station. The guest rooms at Hotel Orphée - Orso Hotels have an LCD TV with satellite channels. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private balcony. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room every morning. There is also the option to take a continental breakfast in the comfort of your room. The River Seine is 600 metres from the hotel and Austerlitz Train Station is 400 metres away. You can also use local transport to access the Lively Place de la République or the Sorbonne directly.

name: Maxim Opéra
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the luxury Galeries Lafayette department store, this 4-star hotel offers an on-site bar and free WiFi access. Cadet Metro Station is 200 metres from Hôtel Maxim Opéra and provides access to the Louvre. The rooms at Hôtel Maxim Opéra are decorated in stone-coloured tones and have an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one also features a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. A courtesy tray is at your disposal. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or in the comfort of your guestroom. Newspapers, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception are just some of the other hotel facilities. Paris’ other sights, such as the Opéra Garnier and the chic Place Vendome are a 10-minute walk from the property. If you are arriving by train, both Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are a 20-minute walk away. Grands Boulevards Metro Station is 400 metres away and gives direct access to the Eiffel Tower and Champs Elysees.

name: Hotel Sookie
description: Attractively located in Paris, HOTEL SOOKIE features a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at HOTEL SOOKIE have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a seating area. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de l'Est, Opéra Bastille and Notre Dame Cathedral. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from HOTEL SOOKIE.

name: Hotel Louison
description: Hotel Louison is located in central Paris, 500 metres from the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro (lines 4, 6, 12 and 13). Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Eco-label certified, the hotel has soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms with lift access and satellite TV. Among our eco-responsible commitments, we chose to offer a homemade breakfast buffet with local and seasonal products. Every evening, a homemade aperitif with a selection of drinks and appetizers is available free of charge in the dining room. The hotel is 800 metres from the Bon Marche and 1.3 km from Saint-Germain-des-Prés. From the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro, guests can quickly access the rest of central Paris.

name: Residhome Paris Rosa Parks
description: Located in Paris, Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is an easy drive from the Musee du Louvre and Seine. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of free Wi-Fi during their stay. Apartments are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as slippers, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchenette that is conveniently equipped with kitchenware, a dishwasher and a refrigerator. Those staying at the property can enjoy a varied breakfast, which is available each morning. Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is within walking distance of Parc de la Villette and Place de l Argonne. Eiffel Tower is just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon
description: Located in Paris and within 1.8 km of Opéra Bastille, Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.2 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon, 3.6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3.7 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel has family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a seating area. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Sainte-Chapelle is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Luxembourg Gardens is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon.

name: Le Matissia
description: Set 700 metres from Gare du Nord and less than 1 km from Gare de l'Est, LE MATISSIA in Paris offers air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near LE MATISSIA include Pigalle Metro Station, La Cigale Concert Hall and Opéra Garnier. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel
description: Located in the 2nd district of Paris, just 150 metres from Réamur-Sébastopol Metro Station, 123 Sébastopol offers a terrace, 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Place de la République is only a 10-minute walk away. With a cinema-inspired décor, all rooms are air-conditioned and has a flat-screen TV, a minibar with free soft drinks. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer. Each floor pays tribute to a specific cinema artist and each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at 123 Sébastopol and it can also be enjoyed in the comfort of your own room. Restaurants can be found within walking distance. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. Additional features include free Wi-Fi access throughout, an elevator and daily newspapers are available for free. Les Halles Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away and the Louvre Museum is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Sonder L'Edmond Parc Monceau
description: Located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc Monceau, this hotel has air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchen. Each room and suite at the L' Edmond has a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a furnished terrace. A buffet breakfast is available daily for purchase in the communal lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Villiers Metro Station is 250 metres from the hotel, providing direct access to Opera or the Pere Lachaise Cemetery. Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees is 1.9 km away, Sacre Coeur and the Montmartre district is 3.4 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel de Banville
description: This hotel is just a 15-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some rooms offer a balcony or an Eiffel Tower view. They are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A breakfast buffet with homemade pastries is served daily in the lobby area. Guests can also relax by the fireplace in the bar. Hôtel de Banville is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants at Place du Maréchal-Juin and close to the Porte Maillot Convention Centre and Espace Champerret. Porte de Champerret Metro Station is 100 metres away. Private airport transfers can be organised at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hotel Régina Opéra Grands Boulevards
description: Hôtel Regina Opéra Grands Boulevards is located in central Paris in the lively Grands Boulevards district, near theatres, concert halls. The Regina is a 10-minute walk from Canal Saint-Martin and just a 3-minute walk from Bonne Nouvelle Metro Station, which offers direct access to Place de la Concorde and the Eiffel Tower. The modern, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and feature a satellite TV, free WiFi access and soundproofing. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast offering fresh products is served each morning in the bright breakfast room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Regina offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers, as well as a laundry and a dry cleaning service. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Guests can also easily visit the Marais district and Le Louvre is a short Metro ride away.

name: Hotel du College de France
description: Located in Paris, Hotel du College de France is 210 metres from La Sorbonne University and 500 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral. This hotel offers free WiFi and a communal lounge with a TV. All rooms are heated and feature a fan, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom is fitted with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Hotel du College de France. This property is a 7-minute walk from the Pantheon and a 12-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens. Cluny-La Sorbonne Metro Station is 250 metres away.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: This classical style, 4-star hotel is located in the Saint Germain area of Paris. Hôtel De Buci offers luxuriously decorated rooms with antique furnishings in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The soundproofed guest rooms at Hôtel De Buci have a typical Parisian charm with their velvet curtains and antique wooden furniture. Each room features Cable TV and a minibar. The Hôtel De Buci serves a buffet breakfast daily in the elegant breakfast room, and the hotel also features a 24-hour bar. Guests can visit the most famous sights of Paris easily, such as the Louvre and the Luxembourg Gardens, both of which are less than 10 minutes by foot from the hotel. There is also a concierge service for guests needing travel information.

name: Hotel de l'Abbaye
description: Ideally located in the centre of Paris, Hôtel de l'Abbaye offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a hairdryer, some units at Hôtel de l'Abbaye also have a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Guests at Hôtel de l'Abbaye can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Luxembourg Gardens, Rodin Museum and Orsay Museum. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Hôtel de l'Abbaye.

name: Hôtel Belloy Saint-Germain
description: Hôtel Belloy Saint Germain is located in the historic Saint Germain district, near the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre Dame Cathedral. It offers modern air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms are accessible by a lift. The restaurant provides a buffet breakfast served in the classy dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink from the hotel’s honesty bar. This hotel’s central location allows guests to explore the nearby areas such as the lively Saint-Michel and Odeon. Metro Cluny – La Sorbonne is 270 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to famous sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Jardin des Plantes.

name: Hotel Le Chat Noir
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le Chat Noir offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to the Moulin Rouge. It is moments from Pigalle, eateries and nightlife options. The hotel has 39 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Guests are able to enjoy a book in the on-site library. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, an alarm clock and cable/satellite channels. Paris's attractions, such as Montmartre Cemetery and Place de Clichy, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Le Chat Noir. Guests can also visit Montmartre and the Musee de Montmarte.Revato

name: Hotel Tilsitt Etoile
description: The hotel is situated in quiet and typically paved Parisian street 350 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and a 5-minute walk from Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers rooms under the mansard on the sixth floor that overlook the rooftops of Paris. All of the rooms offer free high-speed WiFi internet access. At the Tilsitt Etoile,breakfast is served in the winter garden which features a patio and a fountain. Gluten free breakfast is available upon request. Guests can enjoy coffee facilities at the bar from 11:00. Place de l'Etoile is just 200 metres away leading to Place de la Concorde and Musée du Louvre. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Trema
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Trema offers accommodation in Paris, 3.9 km from Sacré-Coeur and 120 metres from Crimée Metro Station. The property is also a 4-minute walk from the Bassin de la Villette, which features 3 free outdoor pools open from mid-June to mid-September and activities such as water sports and cruises. Rooms are soundproofed, and come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Each has its own private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Place de la République is 3.6 km from Hotel Trema, while Pompidou Centre is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Charles De Gaulle Airport, 26.3 km from Hotel Trema. Les Docks de Paris Event Venue are 2.3 km away.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hotel Eiffel Capitol
description: Located on a quiet street on the left bank, this hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers modern guest rooms with free WiFi access and satellite TV. Each guest room also includes tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room, and can be taken in the guest room. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at Eiffel Capitol hotel. Dupleix Metro Station is 150 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 15 minutes away.

name: Acadia - Astotel
description: Acadia Opera is located in the 9th district of Paris, 800 metres from the famous department stores and a 10-minute walk to Opera Garnier. It offers free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour reception. The bright, modern guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and contemporary furniture. Each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar and all rooms are serviced by a lift. Hotel Acadia serves a daily buffet breakfast, which offers eggs, pastries, yogurt, hot drinks and fruit juice. It can be enjoyed in the brightly coloured dining room. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. The hotel is 200 metres from the Grand Boulevards Metro stop (lines 8 and 9), providing access to the city’s many sites. Gare de Nord train station is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Pavillon Bastille
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Gare de Lyon Train and Metro Station, this renovated 19th-century townhouse is located opposite the Bastille Opera House. Free Wi-Fi access and cable TV are provided in all rooms. The stylish guest rooms are air-conditioned and decorated in neutral tones. Each room at Le Pavillon Bastille has welcome tray with tea, coffee and Infusion. The private bathrooms all include a hairdryer. Continental and buffet breakfasts are available daily and can be taken in the Pavillon’s landscaped courtyard and in the breakfast room according the weather. Staff are available 24 hours to advise on dining options and sights in the area, and a meeting room is available, upon prior reservation. Place des Vosges with its independent art galleries and the fashion boutiques of the Marais district are 15 minutes on foot. Bastille Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel and offers many direct links to Paris sights including the Louvre and Galeries Lafayette.

name: Hotel Magda Champs Elysées
description: The Arc de Triomphe is just 190 metres from this 3-star hotel. It features a bar and offers modern guest rooms with free internet access. Palais des Congrès Convention Centre is reachable within 7 minutes from Magda Champs Elysées using public transport. All of the elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms feature a seating area and overlook the courtyard at Magda Champs Elysées. The rooms also include the use of a personal smartphone, offering unlimited calls to over 100 countries. It also has a WiFi terminal, free video streaming services and many other free apps. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar in hotel Magda Champs Elysées. With public parking available nearby, the hotel is a 6-minute walk from the famous Champs Elysées. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is 190 metres away and provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum and La Défense business area.

name: Cour des Vosges
description: The stones of the ancient kings of France have countless stories to tell. Today, they invite you to write your own. At the legendary royal square of the Place des Vosges, EVOK welcomes you into the family residence of a noble lineage of erudite scholars, collectors of art and precious moments. A birds-eye view over Square Louis XIII,surrounded by the pink brick pavilions crowned with slate roofs. The majestic arcades proudly aligned to greet the newcomers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hotel Monte Cristo
description: Featuring a bar, Hôtel Montecristo is set in Paris, 1.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. The property is around 2.5 km from Opéra Bastille and 2.8 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. All guest rooms at Hôtel Montecristo include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and an indoor pool. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Hôtel Montecristo. Louvre Museum is 3 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hôtel Atlantis Saint Germain des Prés
description: Hôtel Atlantis is set opposite the Gothic-style Saint Sulpice Church. Decorated in rich colours, the hotel’s lounge bar sits under a glass ceiling and is furnished with armchairs. A minibar, free Wi-Fi and satellite TV are provided in each room. Guest rooms have a classical French-style. Each has a private bathroom and some rooms have views of the church. Enjoy a continental breakfast in the breakfast room, while reading the newspapers provided. The Atlantis hotel has a 24-hour reception and provides luggage storage. Saint Sulpice Metro Station is just 100 metres away, providing direct access to the Montparnasse district. The Luxembourg Gardens are 300 metres away.

name: Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa
description: Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of city, Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa is set in Paris, less than 1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare. With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa features some units that feature a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and an iPad. Guests at Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Opéra Garnier, Pigalle Metro Station and La Cigale Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 24 km from Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: The Remix Hotel
description: Refurbished by the well-known designer Saar Zafrir, The ReMIX Hotel offers a bar, co-working space, 10 meeting rooms and a gym in the trendy La Villette district in Paris. The modern guest rooms are decorated with a blend of Parisian glamour and 80s rock and feature headboards with integrated USB ports, high speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with Chromecast. The marble bathrooms have a shower or a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is available from 06:30 to 10:00, and guests can enjoy a coffee in the co-working space. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The Zénith and Philharmonie de Paris concert venues are within a 10-minute walk of The ReMIX Hotel. The hotel is served by metro lines 7, 5 and 3b, as well as the RER E, and areas such as the Opéra district can be reached within 15 minutes. The hotel can also be reached via bike along the Ourcq Canal and there is a public bike station nearby.

name: Hotel Ernest
description: Conveniently set in the 10th arr. District of Paris, Hotel Ernest is set 1.3 km from Pigalle Metro Station, less than 1 km from Gare de l'Est and a 14-minute walk from La Cigale Concert Hall. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Gare du Nord. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Ernest. Opéra Garnier is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Louvre Museum is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from Hotel Ernest.

name: Hotel Riesner
description: Set in central Paris, this hotel is 350 metres from Gare de Lyon RER Station. It features a 24-hour reception with a ticket service and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi access and tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. Vending machines selling drinks and snacks are also available. The Hôtel Riesner hotel is just 400 metres from Saint-Martin Canal and the Jardin des Plantes is a 10-minute walk away. The Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris are both accessible via Gare de Lyon.

name: Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle
description: Situated in Paris and with Rodin Museum reachable within 2.4 km, Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Eiffel Tower is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Orsay Museum is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle.

name: Hôtel Beige
description: The Hôtel Beige is located in the heart of Paris between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre. Its rooms offer views over the rooftops of Paris. All of the en suite rooms at Hôtel Beige+ are soundproofed and have flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Coffee, tea and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel’s ground-floor lounge, where a daily breakfast buffet is also served. During their stay, guests can rent a portable WiFi key from the reception, available for a fee. Hôtel Beige is serviced by a lift and offers 24-hour front desk service and free luggage storage.

name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
description: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile, formerly the Hotel Concorde La Fayette, is 1.5 km from both the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées. The guest rooms each include a desk, cable TV, air conditioning and a safe. All rooms at the Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile offers views over Paris. Deluxe bath products are provided in the private bathrooms. MAYO restaurant in the lobby of the hotel offers guests a seasonal cuisine and local products. This hotel is connected to the Palais des Congrès and La Defense business district is only 5 minutes away by Metro. A concierge and a business centre are among the additional services. Porte Maillot Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Claret
description: This hotel is located 10 minutes from Gare de Lyon Train Station by foot. It offers guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access. Each room has views of the garden or the street. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer. Bastille district is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Bercy Park and the Cinémathèque Museum are both just 300 metres away. Parking is available on site for an additional charge.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Hôtel Clarisse
description: Clarisse is located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc des Expositions Exhibition Centre and 200 metres from Square Georges Brassens. This hotel was renovated in September 2018 and offers rooms with free WiFi access. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift. Breakfast is served daily in at the Clarisse’s dining room. The hotel is 350 metres from Metro Porte de Vanves, which has direct access to Invalides and Saint-Lazare. The T3 tramway stop is just opposite the hotel.

name: Hotel Des Mines
description: Hotel Des Mines is located in central Paris, 200 metres from the Jardin du Luxembourg and 1.5 km from Montparnasse Train Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi access. Each soundproofed room has simple décor and is equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are serviced by a lift and featured a safety deposit box. Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room, or in the comfort of your own room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Newspapers are featured. A 24-hour front-desk is available on site and express check-in/check-out can be provided. St-Germain des Prés and the Latin Quarter are just a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Des Mines is 300 metres from RER station Luxembourg, which leads directly to Notre Dame, Chatelet and Orly and CDG Airports.

name: Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse
description: The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse is a 5-minute walk from the Paris-Montparnasse TGV (high-speed train) station and the Air France terminal, with direct links to the Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports. Nearby is the Tour Eiffel, the Jardin du Luxembourg, the Rue de Rennes and many restaurants and shops where you can stroll at your leisure. Not far from St Germain des prés and Eiffel Tower area. The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse was fully refurbished in 2010 so you can enjoy the new design and high-end services: individual air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, soft quilts for a refreshing night's sleep. You will also enjoy the "extras": Espresso machines, iPod dock and 32-inch LED TV. The bathrooms feature: relaxing "rain" showers, handy hairdryers and anti-steam mirrors to save time. You will be welcomed by a dedicated team attentive to your needs, so you can taste Parisian life and fully enjoy your stay on the Left Bank, in a district with a multitude of great restaurants and shops. The Best Western Hotel Le Montparnasse is at your service for business trips or tourism breaks to the French capital. Nearby: the Montparnasse Tower, the Rue de Rennes, Saint Germain des Prés, Les Invalides, the Eiffel Tower, etc.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble. The hotel restaurant, La Brasserie du Louvre by Bocuse, was renovated in 2019 and is decorated in a traditional style with authentic features. The menu showcases iconic dishes by Bocuse, designed to delight locals and travellers alike. In the summer, meals are served on the terrace beneath the arches, with a view of the Louvre museum. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail and jazz evenings twice a week in The Bar, which features an authentic glass roof. The 4 facades and terrace of this hotel overlook the famous Louvre Museum, the Opéra Garnier and the Comédie Française theatre. During spring and summer, a picnic basket can be requested for an extra charge, so guests can enjoy picnicking in the Parisian gardens near the hotel. Several activities are available to guests of the hotel free of charge to allow guests to discover hidden gems of the city, including boules at the Tuileries Garden, guided tours of the neighbourhood and a tour of the Napoléon III-style apartments at the Louvre Museum. Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is situated 2 minutes from Palais Royal Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Place de la Bastille. Public parking is available nearby.

name: La Belle Ville
description: Located 4.9 km from Gare du Nord, La Belle Ville offers 4-star accommodation in Paris and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is situated 5 km from Gare de l'Est. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at La Belle Ville have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Pompidou Centre is 5.1 km from La Belle Ville, while La Cigale Concert Hall is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Citadines Trocadéro Paris
description: The Citadines Trocadéro Paris is located 500 metres away Trocadéro Metro Station, which leads directly to the Champs-Élysées and Galeries Lafayette department store. It offers fully equipped apartments and free WiFi. The studios and apartments at the Citadines Trocadéro Paris are air-conditioned and include a kitchen and a seating area equipped with a TV with satellite channels. The larger apartments also have a dishwasher. Guests at the Citadines Trocadéro Paris have access to additional services such as laundry, breakfast, an on-site car park and business centre. The property is a 15-minute walk from the Museum of Modern Art. These self-catering apartments are a 20-minute walk from the Musée du Quai Branly.

name: Hotel Litteraire Marcel Ayme, BW Premier Collection
description: Discover a literary hotel in Montmartre. With its retro 1950's decor inspired by the novels of Marcel Ayme and its location in Montmartre, a stone's throw from the legendary Moulin de la Galette and Moulin Rouge, The Hotel Litteraire Marcel Ayme, BW Premier Collection by Best Western invites you to stay in the heart of the district. artists. Benefiting from the proximity of the Redele car park and the Abbesses and Blanche metro stations, this 4 Star hotel is also served by bus lines 80, 95, 30 and 74. The Gare Saint-Lazare and the Nord train stations are 15 and 20 minutes away. The airports of Orly and Roissy at 50 and 40 minutes. All Standard and Superior rooms, as well as the studio and apartment of our hotel near the Moulin Rouge have free high-speed Internet access and air conditioning. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included. With a bath or shower, the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and welcome products. As quiet as comfortable, furnished with Queen Size or King Size beds depending on their category, some of our accommodations offer views of the Eiffel Tower. Interconnecting rooms are available for families or groups of friends. In our hotel near the Sacre-Coeur, each day begins with a generous breakfast, served as a buffet from 7:00 a.m. to 10:30 a.m. Energize with our savory dishes, scrambled eggs, cheese platters and cold cuts, and remember the vitamins with a fresh juice. You can also enjoy pastries and cereals. Hot drinks, tea, coffee and chocolate are at your disposal. Our team speaking French, English, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian and Arabic welcomes you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week in our hotel near Saint-Lazare train station.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Paix Republique
description: See hotel page In a perfect location on the edge of Le Marais district in Paris, this 3-star hotel invites you to enjoy the capitals charms. And it is at Place de la Rpublique that Cheref Mohand modestly welcomes you to his friendly and elegant hotel, The Originals City, Hotel Paix Rpublique. Set in a beautiful Parisian-style Haussmann building, the 45 comfortable and air-conditioned rooms and suites with a view of Paris are a great place to relax and rest.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel de la Tamise
description: Hôtel de La Tamise is located in Paris, just opposite the Tuileries Gardens and a few metres from the Louvre Museum. The elegantly-decorated hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a bar. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel de La Tamise have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All of the private bathroom will provide you with bathrobes, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. After a long day of sightseeing, you can sample a hot drink in the comfort of your room thanks to the electric kettle or the coffee machine. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and a laptop safe. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service and luggage storage. The hotel is 700 metres from Orsay Museum and 800 metres from Opéra Garnier. Tuileries Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides direct access to the famous Champs-Elysées.

name: La Villa Haussmann
description: Located in Paris, 1.1 km from Opéra Garnier, La Villa Haussmann boasts an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The rooms at La Villa Haussmann are equipped with a flat-screen TV and some of the rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is served daily and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Arc de Triomphe is 1.6 km from La Villa Haussmann, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.

name: Hotel Dame Des Arts
description: The Hotel Hôtel Dame des Arts is located 600 meters from Notre Dame Cathedral and Luxembourg Garden and 1 km from the Panthéon. Hotel Hôtel Dame des Arts offers standard and executive guestrooms with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and air conditioning. The rooftop bar and some rooms balconies feature views of the city’s rooftops or monument including Eiffel Tower. The hotel serves a breakfast buffet in the morning with the option of room service. Guests can relax on the garden terrace with a drink and something to eat from the hotel bar and snack bar. The hotel offers a shuttle service and major transport links can be accessed via the Ile-de-France transport system. Metro Stations Odéon and Saint-Michel are 160 meters away.

name: Off Paris Seine
description: Moored at the foot of the Austerlitz station, OFF is the first floating hotel and bar in Paris. The converted catamaran offers a lounge bar with a panoramic view over the Seine, a plunge pool and a marina. Located between the Left and Right banks, this floating hotel in Paris offers unique views throughout the day. Accommodation at this floating hotel offers views of the left or right bank of the river Seine. OFF Paris Seine rooms and suites offer a sophisticated and warm décor, and each comes equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, free WiFi and a safe. The bathrooms offer a walk-in shower and a hairdyer. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served at the lounge bar with a panoramic view over the Seine, from 6:30 until noon. Brunch is organized on Sundays with classic dishes, pastries, cheeses, fresh juices and a selection of egg recipes. Signature cocktails, a selection of wines and tapas and dishes from France based on regional produce are on the menu at the hotel bar-restaurant. Pop funk and jazz theme parties are also organised 3 days a week. Between gare d’Austerlitz and gare de Lyon, this district offers a large choice of metro and RER lines to go anywhere in Paris for your leisure and professional activities. Notre Dame Cathedral is 2 km from OFF Paris Seine, while Pompidou Centre is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 12 km from OFF Paris Seine.

name: Hôtel Les Matins de Paris & Spa
description: Situated within walking distance of Haussmann-Saint-Lazare Train Station, Hotel Les Matins De Paris provides guests with a convenient base while in Paris. It has a day spa, as well as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a swimming pool. This art deco hotel features a number of facilities, such as a coffee bar, massage services and wine tasting. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend places to visit and provide other tourist information. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as luxury toiletries, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each provide slippers, converters/voltage adaptors and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Those staying at Hotel Les Matins De Paris can unwind at the on-site bar, conveniently based for a drink. Room service is also offered at certain times. Hotel Les Matins De Paris is within walking distance of the Opera-Comique, Montmartre and the Palais Garnier. It is within walking distance of Auber Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Paris.Revato

name: Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris
description: Located a 15-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, this residence offers stylish studios and apartments with garden views. It is next to the La Motte -Piquet-Grenelle Metro stop and offers free WiFi. Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris is 4.6 km from Parc des Princes Stadium. The air-conditioned apartments and studios at the Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They each have a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Breakfast is served everyday in the breakfast room. Facilities at the Citadines Tour Eiffel include private parking, a lift and a 24-hour reception. A laundry and dry-cleaning service is also provided. Citadines Tour Eiffel Paris is a 20-minute walk from the Rodin Museum and a 15-minute walk from the Seine River. All of Paris’s attractions are easily accessible via the Metro.

name: Citadines Les Halles Paris
description: Citadines Les Halles Paris is located in Paris beside the Forum des Halles and 500 metres from the Pompidou Centre. It has air-conditioned apartments and a 24-hour reception that offers tea and coffee upon arrival. The apartments at Citadines Les Halles Paris are equipped with a telephone and flat-screen TV. Each apartment has a private bathroom with bathtub and an equipped kitchen with a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Guests can enjoy breakfast at Brasserie Maison Rouge (50 meters from the residence). There is a 24-hour fitness centre, 2 meeting rooms and a business centre with free Wi-Fi access. Additional facilities available upon request include laundry services and a booking service for events and tours. Babysitting services can also be organised for extra charges. Chatelet-les-Halles Metro Station is 200 metres from the aparthotel, providing direct access to Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly Airports. The Louvre Museum is a 10-minute walk away. Notre Dame Cathedral is 1.2 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Royal Lyon - MGallery
description: The only 5* hotel in Bellecour Square, Le Royal Lyon MGallery is located between the Rhône and Saône in the heart of the Lyon peninsula. This charming boutique hotel offers 72 rooms including 10 suites combining tradition and modernity. The restaurant "L'Institut", Côté Cuisine, Côté Bellecour and the Gourmets Cooking School are all places that invite you to discover the culinary and tableware arts.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Hannong
description: The Hannong Hotel is located in the heart of Strasbourg, just a 5-minute walk from the TGV train station, Petite France district and the Cathedral. It offers free Wi-Fi access. Guest rooms at the Hannong are air conditioned and soundproofed. They are equipped with hardwood floors, European designed furniture, satellite TV and each have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. A breakfast buffet is served every morning in the Hannong’s breakfast room. It includes hot drinks, handmade bread and French pastries, local products, jams and juices. Guests can enjoy a drink at the wine bar in the glass ceiling salon or on the large terrace. Hotel Hannong is just 100 metres from the Tramway Central Station, Place de l'Homme de Fer. Strasbourg Train Station is a 9-minute walk from the property.

name: Pullman Toulouse Centre Ramblas
description: Ideally located downtown, nr Toulouse-Matabiau station, a 10-min walk from the Capitol, the 5-star Pullman Toulouse Centre Ramblas hotel welcomes you for business, as a couple or w/ family. Relax at Le 84 Bar & sample the cuisine of South West Bistrot Ramblas. 5,382 sq ft of flexible spaces flooded w/ light are dedicated for your events (meetings/seminars/weddings), fitness room, secure private parking.accorhotels.com

name: Globe Et Cecil
description: Globe Et Cecil is a hotel located in the heart of Lyon on the Presqu’Ile, just 50 metres from Place Bellecour and its metro station, and 5 minutes' walk from Vieux Lyon. It is set within a 19th century building and free WiFi is available throughout. Each of the guest rooms is uniquely decorated and offers air conditioning, cable TV, a private bathroom with a bath or shower, and a view of the street or courtyard. Superior rooms feature a fireplace. A daily buffet breakfast is served in the breakfast lounge Chez Mouna, which includes fresh and local produce. A seating area is provided in the lobby, where drinks can also be purchased. The Museum of Fine Arts is 1 km away and Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 1.4 km from Globe Et Cecil.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre
description: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre features a restaurant serving high qualtiy local dishes, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Rouen. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe, a TV and a private bathroom. Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre offers a continental or buffet breakfast. The accommodation also provides a business centre and guests can check the newspapers at Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre. Private parking is available for a fee. Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 700 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 68 km from Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre. We're also Green Key certified—we operate in accordance with strict environmental criteria, allowing us to take care of the planet. By choosing a Green Key hotel, you're involved in promoting responsible and more sustainable tourism!

name: Hotel Roissy Lourdes
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Lourdes. Rooms are air conditioned and a wireless internet connection is provided free of charge. This traditional hotel provides a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. Hotel Roissy features 187 rooms that are filled with everything required for a comfortable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, in addition to a private en suite. Roissy Hotel features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. Every morning a buffet breakfast is prepared in the breakfast room. Hotel Roissy is ideally situated for sightseeing in Lourdes with the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Lourdes within a 10-minute walk. Pyrenees National Park is only a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Mercure Mont Saint Michel
address: Route Du Mont Saint Michel BP 8, 50170 Le Mont-Saint-Michel, Normandy
description: Unwind near one of France's greatest icons at the Mercure Mont-Saint-Michel hotel. There are nearby free shuttles to take you there, to the last village on the Couesnon river. Take the country path behind the hotel to follow the shore on foot to Mont-Saint-Michel, giving you a spectacular view without the tourist bustle. Enjoy the tranquil comfort of a bright and spacious room.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Amboise
description: Located in the hills of Amboise, this modern Novotel hotel welcomes you to a beautiful building where you can relax and discover the masterpieces of Renaissance architecture that are Amboise, Chenonceau and Chambord. A cultural and historical experience awaits. With its privileged location, the hotel offers a tranquil, friendly and convenient setting for your stay, whether it be a business trip, family vacation or romantic getaway.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Tours Centre Gare
description: Located 200 m from the railway station, Novotel Tours Centre Gare invites you to enjoy a comfortable business or leisure stay in a completely renovated venue with modern architecture. Our hotel in Tours has four meeting rooms and a fitness room. We promise special gourmet moments in our restaurant, which offers traditional French cuisine made on premise, as well as in the bar, where you can sip delicious cocktails.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Suites Reims Centre
description: Our Novotel Suites Reims Centre offers spacious suites with refrigerator, microwave and Nespresso machine. Our 30 m² space can accommodate 2 adults and 2 children, and comes with an office. Choosing our hotel means advantages to your stay. Buffet breakfast every morning and Boutique Gourmande available 24/7. Work up a sweat in the gym, relax in the terrace bar and unwind in the garden.accorhotels.com

name: Aiden by Best Western @ Clermont-Ferrand
address: 41 Avenue de la République, 63100 Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme
description: Located in the business district of Clermont-Ferrand and close to the tramway, the train station and the stadium Marcel-Michelin, our hotel offers you a 360-degree offer. The complex is composed of a 4 Star hotel the Aiden by Best Western Clermont-Ferrand with 85 guest rooms, meeting rooms, a fitness area, Le Magnetic bar and restaurant as well as a pop-up store offering products from local designers. This modern and contemporary establishment is anchored in the heart of the city of Clermont-Ferrand where authenticity, dynamism and well-being forge a unique character.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Rohan
description: Hôtel De Rohan is set in the historic centre of Strasbourg, just 150 metres from the Strasbourg Cathedral and the Rohan Palace. The hotel offers 2 furnished terraces and elegantly decorated, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The rooms are furnished in an elegant style, each with their own individual style. They come with satellite TV and modern en suite facilities. Breakfast can be enjoyed on one of the two terraces on sunny mornings. The Strasbourg Historical Museum is 90 metres from the hotel and the Sainte-Madeleine Church is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Crowne Plaza Lyon - Cite Internationale
address: 22 Quai Charles de Gaulle, 69006 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Welcome to the Crowne Plaza Lyon-Cité Internationale! Book an unforgettable stay in an ideally located area, 20 minutes from St Exupery airport and 10 minutes from Part-Dieu station and the city centre. You can discover numerous museums, the old town or the famous Place Bellecour. Our hotel offers quick access to public transport. Need to park your car? Take advantage of the secure P2 car park, which is fee-based. On site, choose between a pleasure moment at the Casino, the Cinema or the Contemporary Art Museum and a relax time in the famous Tête d'Or Park in front of the hotel. Also enjoy concert at the Amphithéâtre Salle 3000, next to the hotel. The numerous restaurants and bars in the pedestrian street will satisfy all your wishes. Our rooms will seduce you: large and bright, with a view on the park or on the Rhône river. You will be charmed by their tasteful decoration as well as by the numerous free services (WiFi, Chromecast, mini-bar, top-of-the-range bedding, bathrobe.) For business, we have five fully flexible meeting spaces. Our restaurant and bar can also be privatised, and can accommodate up to 150 people.Finally, take advantage of our Fitness Center and its numerous facilities. Our restaurant and bar, with their peaceful terrace, offer you a warm atmosphere and a homemade dishes. Our team offers tailor-made packages, co-working, staycation, day-use, long stay, family offer.Enjoy Lyon'good life!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Grand Hotel La Cloche Dijon MGallery
description: In the heart of the city center and close to the shopping streets, Dijon's historic Grand Hotel La Cloche invites guests to experience its 88 rooms, which includes 5 suites and apartments, a landscaped garden, Les Jardins by La Cloche bistro-style restaurant, its chic and modern Bar by La Cloche and Spa by La Cloche, which is beneath the old stone vaults.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Du Dragon
description: Hotel Du Dragon in Strasbourg is housed in a 17th century building, surrounding a peaceful patio garden. It is a 5-minute walk to the Cathedral and Porte de l'Hôpital Tram Stop and a 2-minute walk from the Petite France district. Rooms are modern, comfortable and fully equipped with flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, telephone and en suite bathroom. Some rooms overlook the the patio, the Cathedral or Saint Thomas Church. Friendly staff can offer personalised advice on things to do in the area as well as shops, restaurants and nightlife. There are guided tours available from reception including a vineyard tour. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the Hotel Du Dragon and room service is available 24 hours a day. The A35 motorway is a 2-km drive away and 600 metres from the New Civil Hospital. Paid private parking is available at the property.

name: Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG
description: The Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG is located in our airport platform. The Aiden by Best Western Paris Roissy CDG with the concept Free mind completely renovated gives you the opportunity to stay in a hotel with a specific philosophical and artistical atmosphere. Morning and evening shuttle services connect the hotel to and from the airport. The establishment can also be reached by train, arriving at the Roissy TGV and RER B station, or by car via the motorway network and the A1. The hotel also has two closed and secure car parks, one outside and the other underground, with electric vehicle charging stations in the basement. Our 120 hotel rooms offer four different room categories called Ecrivains, Liberte, Esthetique and Musique. The difference between the rooms lies in the size of the bedding, the brands of hospitality products and the interior fittings. For more comfort, 14 adjoining rooms which ideal for stays for a family with children or with friends. Some rooms have a view of the park behind the hotel or of the green terrace, a cocooning oasis. All are equipped with a flat screen TV, reversible air conditioning, a hairdryer, a safe, a mini-bar, a kettle and an ironing board. The bathrooms have a shower or a bath depending on the version selected. The breakfast is BIO & VEGAN inspired with a rigorous choice of local suppliers and products. The main hot and cold drinks will accompany sweet or savory dishes, to satisfy the most demanding palates. available 24-hours and ultra-dynamic, the team wants to be attentive, caring and always smiling with all customers. True polyglots, the members of the reception are able to advise and guide visitors on everything related to hotel services, visits to Paris or restaurants. The languages spoken are varied (French, English, Spanish, Indian, Romanian, Polish, Comorian, Bengali) in order to facilitate communication.bestwestern.com

name: Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth
address: 66 Rue De La Grotte, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day on the slopes, you can enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a sauna. This Belle Époque hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and bike storage. You'll be on the slopes in no time with the ski shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Belfry Spa by Ligne St Barth in Lourdes, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 15-minute walk of Basilica of Our Lady of the Rosary and Lourdes Wax Museum. This 5-star hotel is 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Basilica of the Immaculate Conception and 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Massabielle Grotto. Dining For lunch or dinner, stop by Hotel Belfry, a restaurant that specializes in Italian cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: EUR 150 per accommodation, per stay A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.60 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 35 for adults and EUR 25 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 50 per vehicle (maximum occupancy 6) Covered self parking fee: EUR 20 per day (in/out privileges) Pet fee: EUR 50 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 19.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 4:00 PM Checkin end at 5:30 AM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, ANCV Chèques-vacances, and cash Safety features at this property include a smoke detector Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property This property’s indoor pool is reserved for adults only 10 AM-6 PM. This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for lunch Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Property follows sanitization practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global) Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hôtel Gutenberg
description: Ideally situated in the city centre of Strasbourg, opposite the cathedral and next to the historic district of La Petite France, the Hotel Gutenberg has free Wi-Fi access in public areas. Hotel Gutenberg offers uniquely decorated and soundproofed rooms which are equipped with air-conditioning, cable on a flat-screen TV and a courtesy tray. The hotel’s facilities are 24-hour reception and a buffet breakfast. Paid parking is available in a location nearby. Stroll along the river and marvel at 15th-century Gothic architecture of the world’s 4th tallest cathedral, or discover the charm of the city’s inhabitants and its unique Franco-German culture.

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse
description: The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT. The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk. In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones. Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square. The American buffet breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM. The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks. Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel. The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM. Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river. This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: Oceania L'Univers Tours
description: Situated in Tours, 300 metres from Vinci International Congress Center, Oceania L'Univers Tours features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a spa and wellness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a bistro-style restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Oceania L'Univers Tours guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. A business centre and vending machines with drinks and snacks are available on site at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Oceania L'Univers Tours include Basilica of Saint Martin, Hotel Goüin Museum and Les Halles de Tours Market. The nearest airport is Tours Val de Loire Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Kyriad Prestige Clermont-Ferrand
address: 25 Avenue de La Liberation, 63000 Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme
description: Only 5 minutes' drive from the city centre, Kyriad Prestige Hotel Clermont-Ferrand offers en suite rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access. Guests also have access to the hotel’s sauna and fitness centre. The Bar Lounge serves breakfast and collation. It propose Brunch time all Sunday. There is a bar at the Kyriad hotel and room service is available. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility, and a laundry room is at your disposal. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property. The hotel staff can help with booking tickets for shows and events. Fax and photocopy services are available in the lobby.

name: Continental Hotel
description: Set in a 19th century historical mansion on a pedestrian street in the heart of Reims, this elegant hotel is 250 metres from Reims Train Station and a 9-minute walk from Reims Champagne Congrès. It offers free WiFi, a lounge bar and a business centre. The Continental Hotel proposes modern air conditioned guest rooms with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Meals can be enjoyed in the restaurant which offers views of the city. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in our restaurant or in the comfort of your guest room. Reims Cathedral and the Palace of Tau are just 1 km from the hotel, while the Museum of Fine Arts is 700 metres away. The hotel is 29 km from Epernay and 4 km from Reims Exhibition Centre, while the A26 motorway is 7 km from the property.

name: Holiday Inn Express Paris - CDG Airport
description: Either you stay for leisure or business our 3 star hotel is the place to enjoy your stay at Paris CDG Airport. We are pleased to welcome you anytime as we have a 24/7 front desk. Only few steps from the international terminals with the free CDG Val shuttle, as well as the high speed train station and the railway station to go to Paris center. We are also close to the Villepinte Exhibition Center and Le Bourget. Our private, secure and paying car park allows you to take advantage of the attractions such as Parc Asterix, Disneyland Paris or Chantilly Castle. Our quiet and confortable rooms offer you a wonderful sleep following by a lovely breakfast! Did you know? Breakfast is always complimentary with Holiday Inn Express brand. As a hotel night goes with a diner time, our restaurant is open every evening from 06:30 pm to 10:00 pm. A free Wi-Fi is available to be in touch with your friends and family! The Instant Bar has a selection of drinks and also a food corner which is available 24/7. We are looking forward to greeting you soon!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sofitel Lyon Bellecour
description: Sofitel Lyon Bellecour is in a prime location in downtown Lyon. Culture lovers are only minutes from Fourvière Basilica, the Traboules, Opéra de Lyon, or the famous Confluence Museum. Restaurants and stores also line the streets of the culinary capital. At our 5* hotel, you can enjoy a personalized service and view of Lyon's rooftops in one of our 164 rooms or in one of our restaurants on the 8th floor.accorhotels.com

name: Maisons du Monde Hotel & Suites - Nantes
address: 2 Bis Rue De Santeuil, 44000 Nantes, Loire-Atlantique
description: Located in Nantes city centre, Maisons du Monde Hotel & Suites - Nantes is next to local bus and tramway stops and 2 km from the TGV train station. It offers soundproofed rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms at the Maisons du Monde Hotel & Suites - Nantes are serviced by a lift and equipped with a work desk, ironing facilities and a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served daily. Maisons du Monde Hotel & Suites - Nantes also provides free international newspapers and has a 24-hour reception. Maisons du Monde Hotel & Suites - Nantes is just a short walk from the city’s main attractions, including the Cathedral Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul and the Chateau des Ducs de Bretagne.

name: Hôtel Le Roosevelt
address: 48 Rue De Seze, 69006 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Hôtel Le Roosevelt offers accommodation with a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi in Lyon. The nearest metro station is located a 5-minute walk away. The property provides secure private parking, subject to availability. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and a safe. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and offers free toiletries. A hot and cold buffet breakfast is served daily and includes pastries, bread, cereal, cheese, cold meats, fruit juices and hot drinks. There is also a bar and the hotel has a partnership with a local gym. Place Bellecour and Saint-Jean-Baptiste Cathedral are both within 2.5 km of the property while Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is 21 minutes away on foot.

name: Hotel Konti by HappyCulture
description: Set in an 18th-century building in central Bordeaux, this modern hotel is located just 130 metres from Place des Grands Hommes and 450 metres from Grand Theâtre de Bordeaux. Free high-speed Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property. The soundproofed, air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and facilities for making hot drinks. A hairdryer is included in the private bathrooms. Fresh drinks for children and adults are offered and a coffee machine, allowing guests to prepare organic coffee, is at disposal in the hotel's lobby. The famous department store, Galeries Lafayette, is a 5-minute walk from this hotel. Quinconces tram stop is 600 metres away, providing access to Saint-Jean Train Station.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
address: 320 Avenue Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), (Gps address: 256 Av Perouse), 13100 Aix-en-Provence, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located in the heart of the city, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is a 5-star haven for business and leisure travel. Unwind amid beautifully appointed rooms and suites with contemporary amenities and distinctive décor, inspired by the symbols of Provence. Savor distinctive cuisine from our talented chefs, who creates a gourmet rendezvous in the restaurant Atmosph'R, the lounge bar l'Avant Scène and our seasonal garden terrace restaurant and bar le "Palm's", just facing the outdoor heated pool. Celebrate and create any kind of events with 800 square metres of sophisticated meeting rooms, sun-kissed terraces with the last technology. Explore some of the most compelling attractions in France, energize in our fitness center and refresh in our sparkling pool. After a full day of business or sightseeing, find your balance with a massage, beauty treatment or wellness therapy at our spa. Designed as a genuine art gallery, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel is the perfect home base for your visit to France.Marriott

name: La Cour des Consuls Hotel & Spa Toulouse-MGallery
description: In Old Toulouse, this 5-star hotel's rooms/suites, in a charming 18th-century family home, provide an intimate, cosy setting. Thomas Vonderscher, Michelin-star chef, created the gourmet Le Cénacle's menu. The Club offers champagne-based cocktails, and the Executive Lounge and library invite you to linger in surprising ways. Elegant meeting spaces, a spa and gym complement this luxury wellness bracket.accorhotels.com

name: Chateau de Challanges
description: Château de Challanges is a renovated 19th century country house set in 7 hectares of forest. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, just 2 minutes from the A6 leading to the south of France. The guest rooms and suites at Château de Challanges are elegant in style and offer high ceilings. Some have a private balcony and some are decorated in an original style according to their historical name. Breakfast is served in the bright breakfast room or on the terrace overlooking the grounds. Guests may have a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include bicycle rental and Beaune is a 15-minute ride away. The chateau also has a conference room with a stucco ceiling, free Wi-Fi access and private parking on site.

name: Novotel Toulouse Centre Wilson
address: 15 Place Du President Thomas Wilson, 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: In the heart of Toulouse, the hotel welcomes you in a listed historic building. With 3 meeting rooms and 1 event room, enjoy its architecture, contemporary decor and its 2 huge Eiffel-style glass windows under which you can enjoy breakfast and the lounge bar menu. Relax in our fitness area with its sauna and hammam and in our partner brasserie Le Capoul, which its terrace on Place Wilson.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Mercure Lyon Centre - Gare Part-Dieu
address: 50 rue de la Villette, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Located 3 minutes from Lyon Part Dieu train station, our 4-star hotel offers you a comfortable stay in the heart of the business district. The hotel's 108 spacious and air-conditioned rooms each have a private bathroom, LCD TV, tea and coffee-making facil ities and free WIFI. The Mercure Lyon Centre Part Dieu hotel also has a wine bar where you can relax. An underground car park (subject to charge) is available for easy city parking, and a shuttle service to the airport can be arranged on request.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Beaux Arts
address: 73-75, Rue Du President Edouard Herriot, 69002 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Located in central Lyon, in a 19th century building, this Mercure hotel is a 8-minute walk from Lyon old town and a 5-minute walk from Bellecour Square. The hotel offers air-conditioned, art deco style rooms with free WiFi. Guest rooms at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each room has an en suite bathroom with a bathtub or walk-in shower, and all rooms are serviced by a lift. Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. There is also an express breakfast consisting of a hot drink, fresh juice, bread, a pastry and jam available at the bar. The reception desk at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts is staffed 24 hours a day.
