Additional facilities available at the hotel include free newspapers, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Many shops and restaurants are located nearby. Bellecour Metro Station is located 300 metres from the hotel. Public parking is available 200 metres away for an extra charge.

name: Hostellerie Le Marechal
address: 4-6 Place Des 6 Montagnes Noires, 68000 Colmar, Haut-Rhin
description: Constructed in 1565 on the city’s original fortified walls, this 4-star hotel is located in the picturesque quarter of Colmar known as Little Venice. Hostellerie Le Maréchal is set on the canal and is 700 meters from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains. Guestrooms and suites are air-conditioned and decorated with brocades and antique furniture. Most rooms overlook the canal, and all are en suite with free WiFi internet access. The restaurant, A l’Echevin, serves traditional and regional gourmet cuisine using regional produce. In the summer months, guests are invited to eat on the terrace by the river. The reception desk at Hostellerie Le Maréchal is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area. The hotel is located 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station and public parking can be found in the surrounding area.

name: Mercure Dijon Centre Clemenceau
address: 22, Boulevard De La Marne, 21000 Dijon, Bourgogne
description: For a business meeting or to explore Dijon, the Mercure Centre Clemenceau hotel is a charming stay. Local features everywhere in the mustard-yellow and blackcurrant décor, & the local produce and wines in the restaurant & bar. Relax in the Zen garden with shady terrace and heated pool! 3 equipped seminar rooms & undercover car park. Located in the business district, with quick access to public transport.accorhotels.com

name: The Atrium Hotel & Conference Centre Paris CDG Airport, by Penta
address: 351 Avenue Du Bois De La Pie, 95912 Roissy-en-France, Val-d'Oise
description: For 30 years, The Atrium has defined the landscape near Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport. Sitting at its heart is a vast, sun-filled atrium that never fails to awe guests. Conveniently located near the capitals airport, its also a short distance from Paris Nord Villepinte, the countrys largest exhibition park. It features 388 spacious rooms (including 13 suites), extensive meeting and banqueting facilities, a fitness centre, tennis courts, as well as a locally renowned restaurant and bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rockypop Grenoble Hotel
description: Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk. AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: La Tour Grégoire
address: 10 Rue Grégoire De Tours, 63000 Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme
description: No description found

name: Best Western Premier Hotel de la Paix
description: The Best Western Premier® Hotel de la Paix is located in the heart of Reims, in an exceptional setting, a stone's throw from the Cathedral, the Conference Centre, and shops. Our establishment, which combines modernity and cultural heritage, possesses soundproof and air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The hotel also features a bar with a private terrace and an indoor swimming pool and the onsite Restaurant Cafe De La Paix which offers seafood & fish specialties as well as menus that vary according to the season. Parking arrangements must be made prior to arrival. Extra fee will apply.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Le Marquis de La Baume
description: In the heart of the historic center of Roman Nimes, the Best Western Le Marquis de La Baume is nestled in a former town house dating from the 17th Century. With its romantic patio, its historic staircase and antique ceilings, the Best Western Le Marquis de La Baume is the ideal starting point for visiting Nimes and the Gard. This 4 Star hotel is actually very close to the many sites and listed monuments of the city that have witnessed 2000 years of history.bestwestern.com

name: Big Sky Hotel
address: 59 Route De Vers Le Nant, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Set in an alpine garden at the foot of the Bossons Glacier, Wanderlust Motels Chamonix offers a heated indoor pool, a hot tub. A public shuttle service can take you to the centre of Chamonix, which is 4.5 km away. Free parking is available. The air-conditioned guest rooms at the Wanderlust Motels Chamonix are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms offer a mountain view. Buffet breakfast is provided. The hotel has 24-hour reception and additional facilities include ski storage and a children’s play area with board games. Chamonix Golf Club is a 15-minute drive away. The Wandercoffee is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The offer is also available in click & collect on our Web App. Let yourself be carried away by the pop and folk atmosphere of the common areas before meeting at the Wandercoffee to enjoy a delicious chocolate muffin accompanied by a coffee. Every evening, the idea of being tempted by the homemade dish of the day or by one of our delicious mountain specialties brings smiles to the whole tribe.

name: Hotel l'Arbre Voyageur, BW Premier Collection
description: The 4 Star luxury Hotel l'Arbre Voyageur, BW Premier Collection® is the new address downtown. Ideally located in the heart of Lille, it is less than 300 meters from the Grand Place and 500 meters from Lille Flandres and Lille Europe stations or the metro. In this new jewel of 48 rooms including 3 Suites, this former Consulate Lille is an invitation to travel, with its luxurious rooms and its unique decoration. We cultivate the difference, and every room is unique. With two restaurants and a bakery with a gift shop, we will welcome you around our patio with a florist and a wine cellar too. Aware of the many environmental issues, everything has been created here for comfort and sustainable development. Fully air-conditioned and equipped with high speed Wi-Fi, and through our solar panels, we minimize our carbon footprint. We have the desire to create a place of encounter and exchange, where responsible enjoy every day experiences is a currency. Cultivate the difference, for unforgettable moments of life. We rely on the talent of our teams to rhyme enthusiasm with professionalism and care with generosity; share the best addresses, it is our job and we do it with passion for your pleasure.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson
description: Offering 54 rooms, the Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson is close to the banks of the Rhone, between Place Bellecour and the Part Dieu business district. Entirely renovated, with non-smoking rooms and the latest in modern decor. The Best Western Hotel du Pont Wilson features broadband Wi-Fi Internet, LCD television, mini bar, safe, feather bed and air conditioning. The bathrooms have a bathtub and hair dryer. We have seven Junior Suites, with maximum comfort, and an unspoiled view over the Rhone and Fourviere Hill. We are a luxury hotel for tourism and business. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: La Folie Douce Hotels Chamonix
description: La Folie Douce Hotel Chamonix is located opposite the Savoy Ski Lift in in Chamonix-Mont-Blanc, a 2-minute walk from the centre of Chamonix. All rooms at the property offer a view of Mont-Blanc, Le Brévent or Les Aguilles and the property has an outdoor heated pool, a wellness centre with a sauna, a hammam, massages, beauty treatments and a yoga and fitness rooms. The property's main restaurant serves breakfast and lunch, and also proposes a dinner show every day except Sunday. During the winter guests can enjoy Savoyarde specialities in the Le Mayen restaurant, and bistro plates in La Fruitière. Snacks including pizzas are available at the La Piazza restaurant and guests can have hot drinks, wine and cocktails overlooking Mont-Blanc in the Janssen Bar. DJ sets and other entertainment are proposed in the evening, and live bands play during the winter. A ski rental shop is available on site, as well as two shops selling sports equipment and souvenirs. The property has a large garden with several terraces providing views of the mountains. There is a children's activity park and children's entertainment is available according to the season. A free shuttle service to other ski areas in Chamonix is available during school holidays, and a free public shuttle service is available 100 metre from the hotel throughout the year. Les Praz - La Flégère Ski Lift is 2.3 km from La Folie Douce Hotels Chamonix - Access, while The Step Into the Void is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 83 km from the property.

name: Hotel C2
address: 48 Rue Roux De Brignoles, 13006 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Featuring a grand piano, HOTEL C2, located in the Pierre Puget courtyard in Marseille, is a 19th-century private mansion converted into a hotel. It features the original marble and parquet floors, columns, bas-relief sculptures, frescoes and bronze banisters, whilst offering a minimalist, contemporary twist. It opened in April 2014. The light and airy guest rooms are spacious with designer furnishings and have a private bathroom. A bar and meeting room. The hotel's specially-chartered boat leaves from the Vieux Port, and is available with the beach package. Each month the hotel also hosts art and photographic exhibitions and performances.

name: Hotel d'Europe
description: Hotel d’Europe is set in a 16th-century building in the heart of Avignon, just a 5-minute walk from both the Palais des Papes and Avignon Bridge. It provides elegant guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an on-site gastronomic restaurant. Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel offers a valet service, beauty treatments and massages at an extra charge. Both a continental and English breakfast is served daily in the form of a hot and cold buffet. The on-site Michelin 1-star restaurant, La Vieille Fontaine, is open from Tuesday to Saturday and serves contemporary regional cuisine.

name: Le Jeu de Paume
description: This hotel is located in the hamlet of Le Lavancher, a ten minute drive from Chamonix town center, between the breath-taking Aiguilles de Chamonix and the Argentière valley, this fantastic setting is guaranteed to amaze anyone with an interest in the nature surrounding the Mont Blanc mountain range. It features an indoor swimming pool, a hammam, a sauna and an indoor hot tub, as well as a outdoor hot tub only during summer season. The guest rooms at the Hôtel Le Jeu De Paume have free Wi-Fi internet access and views of the Vallée d'Argentière, the Aiguilles de Chamonix or the Aiguilles Rouge. The larger rooms are equipped with balneotherapy baths. Guests can enjoy refined cuisine at the Jeu De Paume’s restaurant, Le Rosebud. Breakfast is available at the property. There is also a cocktail bar with a pool table, chess, and small lounges to make you feel at home. Free private parking is also provided and Chamonix Golf Club is 3.6 km away.

name: Heliopic Hotel & Spa
address: 50 Place de l'Aiguille du Midi, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Set in Chamonix-Mont-Blanc, Hôtel L'Heliopic Sweet and Spa features a 500-m2 Spa, ice cave, indoor swimming pool, Two Hammams and sauna. Guests can buy ski passes, rent ski equipment from the on-site shop and enjoy direct access to the L’Aiguille du Midi Cable Car. Children up to 13 years old are allowed to visit the spa accompanied by an adult every day from 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Offering free WiFi and a balcony with mountain views, the guest rooms come with an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, bathtub and slippers and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every morning, breakfast at Hôtel L'Heliopic Sweet and Spa can be enjoyed in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests can sample local gastronomic cuisine at the restaurant Akashon, awarded with a Michelin Bib Gourmand. They can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the terrace. Beauty treatments can be arranged at an extra cost and guests can also relax by the fireplace in the relaxation area. Chamonix Train Station is a 10-minute walk away and free public bus services can transport guests to the slopes. The nearest ski lifts are 1 km away at Le Brevent.

name: La Résidence - Arles
description: La Résidence Arles Centre offers self-catering accommodation in Arles' historical centre, 150 metres from the Rhone River and 450 metres from Reattu Museum. The property is set in a building dating from the 17th century and offers free WiFi access. Accessed via a staircase, all apartments feature a seating area and a flat-screen TV. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. The bathroom has a bath, shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are included. Guests can enjoy the art gallery set at the property’s entry hall and stairs. Arles Train Station is 1.5 km away and Nîmes-Alès-Camargue-Cévennes Airport is 25 km away.

name: Le Choiseul
description: Located in Amboise on the banks of the river, Hôtel Le Choiseul is composed of 3 18th-century residences. Rooms have a view over the gardens or the Loire River and free Wi-Fi access. Guests at the Hôtel Le Choiseul can benefit from access to an outdoor swimming pool. This is open from 01 May to 30 September. At the hotel restaurant, overlooking the river or the gardens, guests can enjoy gourmet regional cuisine. The hotel wine cellar holds many fine wines, especially from the Loire region.

name: Renaissance Bordeaux Hotel
description: Wander in Bordeaux trendy district “The Old Docks”, fall under the spell of this intriguing industrial and maritime neighborhood, embrace an artistic immersion at the Renaissance Bordeaux Hotel. Steps from the Garonne and top city’s attractions such as the “Cité du Vin” and the “Bassins des Lumières”, discover unique spots that perfectly reflect the vibrant culture of our city just around the corner. With only 5 tram stops away, ensure you are never far from the best of the historical epicenter. After exploring Bordeaux, retreat to one of our 149 stylish rooms with oversized windows. Lose yourself with a city-view swim at our indoor stunning pool on one of the highest rooftops of Bordeaux. Stay up, contemplate the sunset while sipping a distinctive cocktail and treat yourself with authentic italian cuisine at Gina Restaurant & Bar. Whether you are a neighbor from down the street or visiting Bordeaux for work or leisure, we look forward to making your hotel stay, one-of-a-kind.Marriott

name: Domaine d'Auriac
description: Featuring an seasonal outdoor pool, a terrace and a Michelin-starred restaurant, Domaine d’Auriac is located in Carcassonne. Free WiFi is available. Each room at the Domaine has a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, free toiletries and slippers. Some rooms also have a seating area and a dressing room. The Auriac has a gastronomic restaurant with a Michelin star, and a bistro with a traditional menu. Guests are invited to relax in the bar and there is a floral garden with a terrace. Guests have access to the Domaine d’Auriac’s bicycle and car rental services. At the 24-hour reception, there is tourist information and a currency exchange service. Free private parking is available on site and the A61/E80 motorway is just 5 km away.

name: Boa Hotel - Bw Signature Collection - Lille Centre Gares
description: Be welcome at the Boa Hotel, BW Signature Collection! Your time is precious: Close to Lille-Flandres station (two minutes on foot), five minutes from the Euralille commercial and business center, the Boa Hotel, BW Signature Collection is located in the heart of the city, with rapid access to museums, the Old Lille district, high-quality shops, Lille Casino and the full range of the city's cultural facilities. Your comfort is our responsibility: in a 4-star setting, you will discover a refined and welcoming architecture and décor which reconcile modern features with design considerations and technological innovations. Every feature (soundproofing, air-conditioning, etc.) has been conceived with your well-being in mind. Your wellness is our objective: all rooms feature queen-size beds, 40 inch LED TV and king-size showers. You will also enjoy free WiFi Internet access, tea & coffee facilities by Nespresso, Occitane amenities, etc. Your relaxation is our priority: committed to your comfort and well-being, we pay particular attention to the quality of our services. 24-hour reception, room service, breakfast/buffet. Discover our Occitane complementary products, enjoy the hotel bar or make use of our 'business corner'. We also have parking spaces on request, subject to availability. We wait for you, let take us care of you! Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Château de Perreux, The Originals Collection
description: See hotel page In the Indre-et-Loire department, in Nazelles-Negron, near Amboise, Olivier Fructus welcomes you to his hotel Chteau de Perreux, The Originals Collection. This 19th century castle, nestled in a 4-hectare park, is home to 11 elegant and comfortable rooms and suites. With its swimming pool, huge park and fixed price menu, this hotel is an invitation to disconnect, relax and enjoy the art of living in the Loire Valley.iHotelier/iStay

name: Les Manoirs de Tourgéville
address: 13 Chemin De L'Orgueil, Tourgéville, 14800 Deauville, Normandy
description: This comfortable hotel in Tourgeville offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as a private cinema and a swimming pool. It also features meeting rooms, a sauna and a 24-hour reception. Les Manoirs de Tourgeville offers a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. Decorated to a high standard, the 4-star rooms feature mini bars and flat-screen TVs. They all have a desk, an in-room safe and heating. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Les Manoirs de Tourgeville provides disabled parking and is a short car ride from Deauville-La Touques Racecourse. Saint-Arnoult and Deauville are also just a brief drive from the property.Revato

name: Golden Tulip Bordeaux - Euratlantique
address: 13 Rue Des Gamins - Bordeaux, 33800 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Saint Jean Station District district of Bordeaux, Golden Tulip Bordeaux Euratlantique is 1.8 km from Saint-Michel Basilica. Among the various facilities of this property are a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. With a private bathroom, rooms at Golden Tulip Bordeaux Euratlantique also offer a city view. At the accommodation, every room comes with a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. The in-house restaurant specialises in French and Grill/bbq cuisine. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Golden Tulip Bordeaux Euratlantique. Stone Bridge is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Great Bell Bordeaux is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: Hotel Eliseo
description: This stylish hotel is situated in the heart of Lourdes, just 75 metres from the Sanctuaries. Hotel Eliseo features a panoramic rooftop terrace with views of the Chateau-Fort and the Pyrennees. The spacious rooms are decorated in a contemporary style and come with a king size bed, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Some rooms also have a minibar. The brightly furnished restaurant serves a varied menu of regional delicacies accompanied by local wines. After a day’s sightseeing, guests can relax with a drink at the Eliseo bar or admire the views from the terrace. The on-site tourist office provides information on excursions. Play golf in Lourdes, visit the beaches at Biarritz and go hiking in Le Pic du Jer. There is also a boutique selling souvenirs. Conveniently located, Hotel Eliseo is only 15 minutes from Lourdes/Tarbes airport and 10 minutes from the SNCF central station. Private parking is available onsite. Our rooms were renovated in 2023.

name: Les Loges Annecy Vieille Ville
description: Les Loges Annecy Vieille Ville offers 5-star, self-catering apartments set in the heart of Annecy’s historical district just 200 metres from Annecy lake, near shops, restaurants and bars. It has free Wi-Fi. Each apartment features a Turkish bath, a wine cabinet, a fireplace, a Nespresso coffee machine and a welcome platter with local produce. You can relax in the André Renault electric bed with the tablet computer, which can be connected to the Bose hi-fi sytem. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers. The property offers a wide range of services including a ticket service, a tour desk, packed lunches and a concierge. It is non-smoking throughout and has facilities for disabled guests as well as a lift. A continental breakfast is provided. Les Loges is 200 m from Annecy Castle and 100 m from the Annecy Castle Museum. The Palais de l'Ile, Saint Francis Church and Annecy Train Station are all 300 m away. The nearest airport is at Geneva, 49 km away.

name: Mercure Marseille Canebiere Vieux Port
description: Ideally situated on the famous Avenue de la Canebière, the Haussmann-style Mercure Marseille Canebière Hotel will open its doors in June 2019! Five minutes from the old port and close to Marseille Saint Charles Train Station and the World Trade Center, th e hotel has 90 rooms including 3 suites with Provencal accents, a meeting room, a fitness centre and a coworking area. A Marseille brewery awakens your taste buds with fresh and local produce all year round.accorhotels.com

name: Nemea Appart Hôtel Résidence So Cloud
description: No description found

name: Hotel Central Park
address: 4 Avenue Jean Guiton, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost. At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom. In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants. There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property. Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Standing Hotel Suites by Actisource
description: Located in Roissy-en-France and with Aéroville Shopping Centre reachable within 1.1 km, Standing Hotel Suites by Actisource provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. Selected rooms come with a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge. At Standing Hotel Suites each room has a seating area. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Standing Hotel Suites by Actisource include Roissy-en-France Town Hall, Air France Industries KLM Engineering & Maintenance and Volvo Trucks France. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle, 4 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service

name: Abbaye De Maizieres
description: The Abbaye de Maizieres is a 12th-century former Cistercian Abbey, located in the heart of the historical centre of Beaune. The hotel offers free WiFi internet access. Each of the guest rooms is traditionally decorated with antique furniture and equipped with a private bathroom. The rooms are accessed from a spiral staircase in the tower. A daily breakfast is served in the vaulted stone cellar. Abbaye de Maizieres is just a few steps from the Notre-Dame Basilica and 350 metres from the Hospices de Beaune. The hotel can arrange wine tours of the nearby Cote de Beaune vineyards.

name: Hôtel Les Trois Couronnes
address: 2 Rue Des Trois Couronnes, 11000 Carcassonne, Aude
description: In the Bastide Saint Louis historic district, near Pont Vieux, the Tribe Carcassonne Hotel invites you to discover this unique & elegant Medieval City. At Tribe, no detail has been overlooked, from the comfort of our rooms to the sophisticated design of our living & coworking spaces. Have a drink at our coffee shop or indulge in a signature dish or rooftop cocktail w/ stunning views of the Medieval City.accorhotels.com

name: Millennium Hotel Paris Charles De Gaulle
description: Featuring an indoor swimming pool with views of the garden, this 4-star hotel is located 1.5 km from Roissy Airport. It offers a free airport shuttle service. The elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All rooms include tea and coffee making facilities and a radio. Each room has a private bathroom and some include bathrobes. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Jules Verne bar and there is also an Irish pub that is open until 01:00. A continental or buffet-style breakfast is served every morning. With public parking on site and at an additional cost, the hotel is accessible via the A1 motorway. Château de Chantilly is 38 km away.

name: Hôtel Cour du Corbeau Strasbourg - MGallery
description: In the heart of Strasbourg, a stone's throw from the Cathedral, the Cour du Corbeau hotel, a member of the MGallery collection, combines history and modernity. In a setting that dates back to 1528, this 4-star hotel elegantly combines the charm of yestery ear with a more modern feel, giving its 63 rooms a unique identity. Guests are invited to step back in time and follow in the footsteps of Marshall Turenne (1647) or travel incognito like the Prussian King Frederick the Great in 1740accorhotels.com

name: La Maison Bord'eaux
address: 113 Rue Du Docteur Albert Barraud, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: La Maison Bord'eaux is a boutique hotel located in central Bordeaux. Just a 10-minute walk from the Quinconces tramway stop, it offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Each spacious guest room at the Bord’eaux has a private bathroom with bathrobes, which includes free toiletries. Rooms are also equipped with satellite TV and tea and coffee making facilities. A continental breakfast is available every morning, served in the Avant-Garde dining room, or on the grounds during the summer. Guests can enjoy regional wines in the Maison Bord’eaux. La Maison Bord’eaux organises tours of the city and the vineyards of Saint-Emilion and Médoc. Tours in English, German or Spanish are also available. The Grand Théâtre is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Lykke Hotel Chamonix
description: Lykke Hotel Chamonix "ex Mercure" is located at the foot of Mont Blanc, in the heart of Chamonix and offers contemporary accommodation and a 24-hour reception. The gondola lift to the Aiguille du Midi mountains is a 5-minute walk away. Free WiFi is provided throughout and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel's ski shop. The rooms are located in 2 different buildings separated by a street. All the rooms at Lykke Hotel Chamonix have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some of the rooms have a balcony and offer Mont Blanc views. Enjoy traditional dishes of the Savoie region at La Cordée, the hotel's restaurant. In summer, you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc from its panoramic terrace or have a drink at the bar Le 4810. The surrounding area offers plenty of leisure and sportive activities all year round. Private parking is provided.

name: Maison des Ambassadeurs
address: 43, Rue du Minage, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service. Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries. In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool. La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Citadines Confluent Nantes
description: Citadines Confluent Nantes has a sauna and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Nantes, 3.1 km from Le Lieu Unique, 3.2 km from Castle of the Dukes of Brittany and 3.7 km from Printing Museum. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Citadines Confluent Nantes offers 4-star accommodation with an indoor pool. Guests can swim in the plunge pool or use the business centre that offers printing, copying and fax services. Botanical Garden of Nantes is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Nantes Natural History Museum is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nantes Atlantique Airport, 7 km from Citadines Confluent Nantes.

name: Le Grand Hotel Tours
address: 9, Place Du General Leclerc, 37310 Tours, Indre-et-Loire
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Tours. It provides free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Tours Railway Station. This modern hotel offers a range of facilities, including a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Le Grand Hotel Tours features 105 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with cable/satellite channels, a telephone and a hair dryer. Tours's attractions, including Museum of Fine Arts of Tours and Rue Nationale, are within easy walking distance of Le Grand Hotel. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: Mercure Caen Centre Port De Plaisance
address: 1 Rue De Courtonne, Cs 43086, 14018 Caen, Normandy
description: In the heart of the historic town centre, Mercure Caen Centre Port de Plaisance offers modern, functional rooms in a welcoming atmosphere. The ideal partner for your professional events, with afterwork functions and 17 conference rooms, our hotel in Caen also invites you to recharge in the fitness area. Savour your favourite drink at Le Between, our lounge bar. The next morning, enjoy the delicious options available at our breakfast buffet - made in-house using regional ingredients.accorhotels.com

name: Villas Foch
address: 25 Cours du Maréchal Foch, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Set in Bordeaux and with CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain reachable within 200 metres, Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Guests staying at Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux have access to the on-site spa and wellness centre which includes a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Esplanade des Quinconces, Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux and Place de la Bourse. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 11 km from Villas Foch Boutique Hotel & Spa Bordeaux.

name: Kyriad - Tours Centre
description: Located in the center of Tours, the Kyriad Hotel Tours Centre offers quick and easy access to the Vinci congress center and the Tours Centre train station. There is an underground parking available on site for guests to use for an additional fee. The Vallée du Cher Stadium is 3.9 km away. Kyriad Tours Centre has double, twin and triple rooms all with air conditioning and baths. Two rooms have wheelchair access. The rooms also provide a TV with Canal+ or CanalSat channels and free WiFi access. The hotel has a lift. Please note that for reservations of more than 10 rooms there is a 50% prepayment upon booking and for free cancellation it is on D-30. You can relax with a refreshing drink in the hotel's bar. Restaurants, theatres, cinema, night clubs, swimming pool and ice rink are all nearby. Free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port
description: Overlooking the Old Port, Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is located in the heart of Marseille. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The soundproofed rooms at Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have port and sea views. Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is just a few steps from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station. Boulevard La Canebière is 400 metres away, where public transport is available to all of Marseille's famous sites.

name: Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport Whether you are traveling with family or for business, you will enjoy your experience in this modern hotel with its ideal location and warm welcome. The Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport is located in Roissy-en-France, a charming flowery village with its three parks and sports course. With a free shuttle, you will reach Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport in just 10 minutes. You won't want to leave our hotel with its cozy bar, or its bright rooms with a contemporary and chic atmosphere. Leave your car in our secure parking lot during your plane trip with our "Park, Stay and Go" package. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. You can also plan your events for up to 350 people in our meeting spaces, fully lit by daylight and equipped with the latest technology. Also benefit from our fitness room then relax in our sauna Enjoy your family breakfast buffet with our “Kids Eat Free” offer. Our restaurant will seduce you with its local products and seasonal cuisine, but also with its patio and its pretty green terrace suitable for all seasons.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Oceania Montpellier
description: Hôtel Oceania Le Métropole is located a 20-minute drive from the airport and a 4-minute walk from Place de la Comédie and the Montpellier Train Station. A swimming pool and a shaded terrace feature in the garden. All of the 4-star rooms have a refined decoration and have a flat-screen TV. Some of the rooms also have a seating area and coffee and tea facilities. The marble bathrooms are fitted with a walk-in shower and they include a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available. The restaurant, La Closerie, serves traditional and regional cuisine from Monday to Friday. The hotel’s bar, Le Club, is open daily and room service is available. A business centre with computers, printers and free WiFi connection is also available for guests throughout the hotel. A limited number of paid parking spaces are available.

name: Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port
address: Quai Louis Prunier, 17000 La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime
description: The Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port is a renovated hotel that is ideal for work and leisure trips. To help you relax, our hotel in La Rochelle has a pool with a large terrace, a bar and panoramic restaurant, Gaée, which has a view of the old port and La Rochelle's towers. Guests can enjoy a tasty breakfast and innovative menu that showcases regional maritime dishes combined with fresh and local products.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel de Sèze
description: Hôtel de Sèze is located a 5-minute walk from the Grand Théâtre in Bordeaux city centre and features air-conditioned rooms with an LCD TV, a restaurant and a spa centre, which guests can access upon reservation. Cocktails are served at the lounge bar. A safe, minibar and a private bathroom are available in all of the Hôtel de Sèze's rooms. The suite also includes a Nespresso machine. A buffet or continental breakfast is served every morning. Le Comptoir, the hotel’s restaurant, proposes French, traditional dishes. Guests can enjoy the hotel's private 11-acre golf course, located a 15-minute drive away, for which a shuttle service is available. Saint-Catherine Street is a 5-minute walk away, while the Meeting Centre and the lake are a 10-minute drive away. Bordeaux Mérignac Airport is 10 km away and the train station is 4 km from Hôtel de Seze.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache
address: 12 Cours de Verdun Rambaud, 69002 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: The 4-star Mercure Lyon Centre Château Perrache is located in the Presqu'île in downtown Lyon, with historic Lyon and Perrache train station close by along with great city views. Soak up the spirit of art nouveau in this 1906 historic listed building. Park securely in the private car park (reservation required), then slip into a different world in our bar and restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel & Spa Vatel
description: Located a 10-minute drive from Nimes city centre and 15 kilometres from the Nimes-Arles-Camargue Airport, this 4-star resort offers free access to the Vatel’s Spa and fitness centre, where facilities include an indoor heated pool and hot tub. Rooms at the Hotel & Spa Vatel have free internet access and a private bathroom. During the Feria Festival, there is a shuttle service leading to Nîmes city centre and Arena departing every 30 minutes from the hotel. This hotel is attached to Vatel, Graduate School of Business & Management. Free private parking is provided and the hotel is just a 5-minute drive from the E15/A9 motorway.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Saxe Lafayette
address: 29 rue de Bonnel, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: In the heart of Lyon, the 4-star Mercure Lyon Saxe Lafayette is a 10-minute walk from La Part-Dieu business quarter. Guests can mix work and pleasure with Lyonnais cuisine in our restaurant's new urban chic setting. We also have modular spaces for meetings. You will love our spacious rooms, and unwinding in the fitness center and heated indoor pool. There is a private garage with valet parking on arrival.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Montpellier
description: Welcome to Courtyard Montpellier, an inviting Montpellier hotel located directly next to city hall which is designed by a famous architect Jean Nouvel. As the most exciting hotel Montpellier has to offer, we are just steps from lively downtown shops and restaurants. The historical center, convention center, Fabre Museum and all other local city attractions of Montpellier are just a few tramway stops away. At Courtyard Montpellier, we know how to treat travelers and that you want more convenience on the road. Now, you can relax and work on your terms with our newly designed lobby space. Enjoy succulent Mediterranean food at Oleo Pazzo Mediterranean Bistro in a relaxed and contemporary atmosphere. As one of the most innovative hotels in Montpellier, our public areas are equipped with Wi-Fi, relaxing media pods, large HD TVs, and our new GoBoard with all the sports, weather, news, local information and more to keep you up-to-date.Marriott

name: Grand Hotel 'Château de Sully' - Piscine et Spa
address: Route de Port en Bessin, 14400 Bayeux, Normandy
description: Offering a restaurant, Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa, is a 17th century property located in Bayeux, a 5-minute drive from Bayeux city centre. The property is 11 km from Omaha Beach. Guests can enjoy a spa with a sauna and hot tub for free. Massage treatments also can be requested at an extra cost. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar, as well as a safe and a telephone with free international calls. They all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bathrobes and slippers are provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy Chef Nicolas Fages’ cuisine in the gourmet restaurant, served for dinner from Wednesday to Sunday, and for lunch and dinner on a Sunday. Closed on Monday et Tuesday Guests can enjoy the heated indoor pool, open all the year Bayeux Train Station is a 12-minute drive from Grand Hôtel "Château de Sully" - Piscine & Spa. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Mercure Tours Nord
description: Mercure Tours Nord offers you spacious rooms and six versatile, fully equipped meeting rooms in a handsome building. With a focus on relaxation, our hotel in Tours invites you to make the most of the heated swimming pool and the sunny terrace, where you can enjoy the quintessential Touraine dishes of our restaurant. Be sure to sample the local products served at the breakfast buffet. Later in the day, give in to the tempting Loire Valley vintages on our bar's wine list.accorhotels.com

name: Le Pavillon de Rouen
address: 140 Rue Des Portes De Francqueville Rn 14, 76520 Rouen, Normandy
description: Situated in Franqueville-Saint-Pierre, 8.1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Le Pavillon de Rouen features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are room service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Le Pavillon de Rouen. You can play darts at this 3-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking. Voltaire Station, Rouen is 8.3 km from the accommodation, while Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen is 9.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 84 km from Le Pavillon de Rouen.

name: Grand Hôtel Gallia & Londres Spa Nuxe
address: 26 Av Bernadette Soubirous - Bp83, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Dating from 1894, theGrand Hôtel Gallia & Londres Spa NUXE & Nuxe Spa is situated at the entrance to the sanctuaries, in the heart of Lourdes, and features Louis XVI-style décor elements and a private park. Most rooms have a balcony and free Wi-Fi is provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and each includes a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Each room also has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily, and the hotel also includes a restaurant offering traditional French cuisine. A bar is also available on site. Private parking is available on site. At an extra cost, guests can enjoy the wellness area, which offers a sauna and a hot tub.

name: La Maison des Armateurs
description: Set in the historical centre of Saint-Malo, this 4-star hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the cathedral and 120 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers free Wi-Fi access, an on-site bar, and daily newspapers are available. The rooms at La Maison des Armateurs have a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each one is air-conditioned and also includes a wardrobe and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries. In the hotel’s breakfast room, a continental and American-style breakfast is offered every morning. You can also request for breakfast to be served to the comfort of your guest room. A 24-hour reception with luggage storage is just one of the other facilities in this hotel. Shuttle service to and from Mont Saint Michel can be arranged at an extra cost. Pleurtuit Airport is 13 km from the property and Saint-Malo Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Château de Bellefontaine
description: Located 800 metres from central Bayeux and its cathedral, this 18th-century mansion offers guest rooms and a traditional restaurant open for dinner upon reservation. The park has a tennis court and a pond, and is planted with 200-year-old trees. Each room is individually decorated and feature a minibar, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some rooms have a seating area. Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at the Château de Bellefontaine. A continental breakfast can also be delivered to your room at a reduced rate. After breakfast, you can use the computer with internet access in the lounge, which also features a fireplace. Bayeux Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and free public parking is available on site.

name: Le Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: 3 Rue Lafaurie De Monbadon, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Located at the heart of Bordeaux’s historic centre, Le Boutique Hotel is an 18th-century town house surrounding a lush, green courtyard. It offers a 140 m² terrace shaded by a 100-year-old chestnut tree, a Rooftop, a 2.5x7m half indoor swimming pool, a sauna and hammam. The air-conditioned rooms and apartments at Le Boutique Hotel feature an LCD satellite TV, and a Nespresso coffee machine. A continental breakfast is served every morning. On sunny days, guests can enjoy a drink from the wine bar on the terrace while using the Wi-Fi access. Place Gambetta is 1 minute walk from the hotel and Quai Louis XVIII is 850 metres away. Guests benefit from a reduction at the public parking situated 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Mercure Reims Parc Des Expositions
description: With works by Reims artists in its living spaces, the Mercure Reims Parc des Expositions offers a sense of well-being on arrival. Our Reims hotel can accommodate your meetings or private receptions with 6 lounges as well as access to a swimming pool and garden. Try our L'ArTdoise Brasserie Maison bar and restaurant with terrace, and discover regional specialties and our famous sparkling wines!accorhotels.com

name: Paul & Pia - Welcome Home Hotel
address: 1 Rue De La Gare, 68000 Colmar, Haut-Rhin
description: This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away. All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom. There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception. Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away. The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Hotel Indigo Bordeaux Centre Chartrons
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Bordeaux Centre Chartrons, a recently renovated treasure nestled in the heart of the Chartrons district. Designed by Stella Cadente, our boutique hotel gleams with its transformation, every detail recalls the ambiance of a seaside guesthouse within a sophisticated hotel setting. Our rooms and suites are inspired by the enchanting Bassin d’Arcachon, its iconic Dune du Pilat, and its renowned oyster huts. Conveniently situated in close proximity to the Cité du Vin, the Bassin Des Lumières, the Jardin Public and the grand Place Des Quinconces, our boutique hotel embodies the authentic, bohemian spirit of the Chartrons district. For business events, we have fully equipped meeting rooms, and fitness enthusiasts can enjoy access to our complimentary gym. The pièce de resistance: our rooftop restaurant, Le Tchanqué, offers an exceptional panorama of Bordeaux and its breathtaking sunsets. Relish delicious, high-quality local fare, exquisite seafood and delectable sharing platters, all perfectly complemented by our signature wines and cocktails. An entirely novel experience to (re)discover without delay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Pullman La Pléiade Montpellier Centre
description: Based in the historic center, the Pullman La Pléiade Montpellier Centre hotel is close to Place de la Comédie, Polygone mall, the Corum Convention Center, Zénith and the Arena. The hotel offers top-of-the-range service for business and leisure guests, with direct access to parking. From June to September, guests can enjoy the rooftop pool and panoramic restaurant. There is also a new spa and indoor pool.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Premier Why Hotel
description: Perfectly located in the heart of Lille, this newly opened contemporary design hotel offers en suite comfortable accommodation, with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception in a unique distinctive building. All of the rooms at the Best Western Premier Why Hotel have an elegant, original decor and wooden floors. Each room features a desk, an iPod® docking station and a flat-screen television with cable channels. A mini-bar and a Nespresso® coffee machine are also provided for your convenience. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room. Guests can also lunch at the hotel's restaurant, or enjoy a refreshment from the beautiful bar. Parking is available at cost. Rooms for guests with reduced mobility are also available. The Best Western Premier Why Hotel has a fully equipped boardroom, available for meetings and receptions. Conveniently located 200 meters from Rihour Metro Station (Line 1) and a 15 minute walk from Lille Europe Eurostar Train Station, Lille's most fashionable shops and restaurants are on its doorstep. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Splendid Hotel
description: With its Art Deco façade, Splendid Hotel Annecy Handwritten Collection takes you back to the 1930s. Facing Lake Annecy, discover our modern, comfortable rooms. Some rooms offer a balcony and a view of the canal and surrounding mountains. Our bar is open all day and provides a warm and cozy atmosphere to share moments with others or work. Also enjoy our breakfast providing a selection of the best products.accorhotels.com

name: Ermitage De Corton
address: Route De Dijon D974 Chorey, 21200 Beaune, Bourgogne
description: The Ermitage de Corton is located in the Chorey-les-Beaune countryside and features an outdoor swimming pool. Guest rooms at the Ermitage de Corton are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can enjoy regional cuisine prepared with seasonal produce, at the Ermitage’s restaurant. There is also a bistro which opens onto a panoramic terrace. The Ermitage de Corton is located on the border between the famous Côte de Beaune and Côte de Nuits and guests can explore the nearby vineyards. Free private parking is available on site and it is secured during the night.

name: Urban Style de l'Europe
description: Urban Style de l'Europe is located in the historic heart of Rouen, just 450 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral and a 10 minute walk from the Rouen-Orléans Train Station. Guest rooms are uniquely decorated and equipped with a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi internet access. The hotel bar offers a wide variety of whiskies and calvados. You can enjoy a glass of wine and snack food on site. Room service is also available upon request. Guests have reduced fares at the public car park located nearby.

name: Aparthotel Adagio access Montpellier Centre
address: 40 Avenue Du Petit Train, 34000 Montpellier, Hérault
description: Located south-east of the city, the Adagio Access Montpellier Centre is a 20-min walk from the historic center and 15 mins from Saint Roch station. The aparthotel has 102 new apartments, fully furnished and air-conditioned, with an equipped kitchen, for up to 4. For your convenience there's also a laundry, luggage storage and an underground paid car park. 24-hr reception teams are on hand to welcome you.accorhotels.com

name: Odalys City Montpellier Les Occitanes
address: 20 Rue de la République, 34000 Montpellier, Hérault
description: The establishment: Located in Montpellier in the Languedoc-Roussillon region, Appart'hôtel Les Occitanes is just 10 km from the Mediterranean Sea, in the heart of a multi-faceted city that combines history and modernity. Walk the medieval streets and discover the mansions, the architectural treasures of yesteryear or stroll on the banks of the Lez, at the foot of the new constructions of renowned architects. Located 300m from the historic center, this apart-hotel welcomes you in two 5-storey buildings overlooking a patio and offers high quality accommodation and very well equipped, offering you an ideal place in the city center for a successful holiday. You will find many services: free wifi access, laundry, breakfast service, bicycle storage; At the foot of the residence, you will also find a multitude of shops, boutiques, restaurants and cinemas as well as all the tram lines that serve the city and the villages of its agglomeration. Nearby you can discover local traditions and festivities, practice golf, cycle tourism and water sports or sample the many wines from this wine region. & Nbsp;   Housing: Suite of about 40m² for 2 to 4 people composed of a bedroom with 1 double bed or 2 single beds, a living room with sofa bed for 2 people, a kitchen area, a bathroom with shower or bath, sink and toilet. Equipment: The suite has a kitchen area equipped with vitro-ceramic hob, fridge, microwave / grill, dishwasher as well as all necessary cooking utensils. The accommodation also has air conditioning, a TV with Canal + / Canal + Sport / Canal + Cinema and access to free wifi. Details: Access to the city center: 300m Access Beach: 10km Wifi access: free Pets allowed: 10 € / day - To be paid on site - One room per apartment They should not be left alone in the absence of their masters who are civilly responsible and must be kept on a leash. With current vaccination booklet and tattoo. Dogs of 1st and 2nd categories are forbidden. Deposit (in supplement): 250 € / housing or 500 € for stays of more than 30 nights - in residential formula only - To be paid on site - It will be returned at the end of the stay after deduction of any costs of refurbishment locations and / or value of missing or damaged equipment. Air conditioning: included Laundry: 4 € (washing) - 2 € (drying) Bed linen: included Towels: (1 large + 1 small and bath mat): 7 € Beds made on arrival: included in hotel package only Bike storage room: included Final cleaning: from 60 € (medium stay 5 to 28 nights) Close to shops: 20m Breakfast service: (buffet): 12 € / adult - 7 € / child (4-12 years) -Free for children -4 years Prestige service: (stay 5 to 7 nights): from 12 € (daily cleaning, recouche) or from 40 € (full weekly cleaning) Tourist tax (surcharge): To be paid on site according to the tariff in force TV: included (Canal +, Canal + Sport, Canal + Cinema) Tourist Residences Baby kit: included (high chair on request)VRBO

name: Novotel Metz Centre
description: Unwind during your stay at Novotel Metz Centre. From standard rooms to suites, the hotel provides an elegant and comfortable setting. It has 10 fully equipped meeting rooms for successful seminars. Guest can also enjoy a gourmet experience on the restaurant terrace. Explore Metz and its charming shopping streets. The hotel is ideally located in downtown Metz, close to the station and tourist attractions.accorhotels.com

name: Boutique Hotel Cezanne
description: This boutique design hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms. If features a terrace and a lounge. The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town. At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif. There is also a meeting room. Breakfast can be taken until 11:00 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savoury dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection. It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather. The property is 200 metres from the Cours Mirabeau and 300 metres from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station. Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 12 km from the hotel. The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town. Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.

name: Greet Hotel Lyon Confluence
address: 26 Cours De Verdun-Perrache, 69002 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Near Perrache train station on Lyon's Presqu'île near Bellecour, greet hotel Lyon Confluence welcomes you 24/7! Discover our eco-responsible and committed hotel on your business/leisure stays. Enjoy the comfort of our colorful, lively rooms decorated with upcycled objects. Join us at Mademoiselle Simone restaurant to share a drink, meal or live jazz concert! We offer healthy, local and seasonal cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: C Suites
address: 152 Rue Claude Nicolas Ledoux, 30900 Nimes, Gard
description: Offering an outdoor pool, C Suites is a urban resort located in Nîmes just 3 km from the Arenas. This fully renovated hotel is set in a 1-hectare tree-filled park, a tennis court, and a boules court. C Suites rooms all offer free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with international channels as well as a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Guests can enjoy the C Unik wine and tapas bar, situated close to the swimming pool. A large selection of wines and cigars are available. At C Suites you will find a 24-hour front desk and free parking. Conveniently located 1.5 km from the Motorway exit, the hotel is 1.5 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 5.7 km from Nimes Vacquerolles Golf Course. Within 40 km, guests can also visit, Pont du Gard, Avignon, Arles and Aigues-Mortes.

name: Ibis Styles Nimes Gare Centre
description: Located opposite the train station in Nimes, this hotel offers low-cost rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and reception is open 24 hours a day. Decorated in a contemporary style, the air-conditioned guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and radio. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. You can enjoy a drink from the bar, which is open all day, at the ibis Styles Nimes Centre Gare. Additional facilities include newspapers and luggage storage. The Arena of Nîmes, its historical centre and Nimes Cathedral are situated a 10-minute walk away.

name: greet Hotel Colmar
description: Completely renovated, eco-friendly and locally involved, Greet Hotel Colmar is your pied-à-terre. 5 mins from the historic center & Little Venice. For business, as a couple, with family or friends, opt for our 62 rooms decorated with unusual, thrifted and upcycled objects. More than a hotel, it's a friendly place for a moment of relaxation in the bar or restaurant over fresh local products.accorhotels.com

name: La Maison Vieille
description: No description found

name: Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa
address: 144 Rue Abbé de l'Epée, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Situated in Bordeaux, 1.1 km from CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain, Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving French cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Guests at Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Esplanade des Quinconces, Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux and Saint-André Cathedral. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 10 km from Le Palais Gallien Hôtel & Spa.

name: Privilège Hôtel & Apparts Eurociel Centre Comédie
address: 1 Avenue Du Pont Juvenal, 34000 Montpellier, Hérault
description: Privilège Hôtel & Apparts Eurociel Centre Comédie is a 3-star hotel offering rooms, apartments and suites located just 350 metres from Place de la Comédie. You can ask the staff at the 24-hour reception about the historical town centre, which is 200 metres away. Paid private parking is available in the underground car park or the secure outdoor car park and a free WiFi connection is available throughout the property. The rooms at Privilège Hôtel & Apparts Eurociel Centre Comédie are decorated in a contemporary style and include an LCD TV with international channels. An electric kettle and coffee pods for the espresso machine are also provided and all rooms are non-smoking. Fully equipped apartments and suites are also offered and are located in a building opposite the hotel. You can enjoy breakfast buffet-style in the dining room. Lunch and dinner can be bought from the 24-hour vending machine, which offers light meals, sandwiches and drinks. The hotel lounge has a large screen TV with Canal + and BeIn Sport channels. You can access a sun terrace, with both shady and sunny areas on the 3rd floor of the hotel. Polygone Shopping Centre and Montpellier Train Station are 200 metres away. The Du Guesclin Tram Stop is just in front of the hotel.

name: La Caserne Chanzy Hotel & Spa, Autograph Collection
description: Choosing to stay at La Caserne Chanzy is choosing a unique experience. Why? Because this hotel offers an unparalleled look at Champagne, both the region and the drink. Legends, curiosities, life underground. a chance to experience the story of Reims through different eyes found only in the margins of official histories. What's more, there's the location, a former fire station, a picturesque piece of local heritage whose spirit can still be felt in the walls. This building is the beating heart of a town where everything happens. An address which brings everyone together. The sense of immersion is immediate, sophisticated, cultural, and culinary in a land of fantasy, the art of living, and memory. Finally, it is a unique point of view looking at one of the world's most beautiful cathedrals. Located just in front, it is perfect for private reflection at a moment's notice, a pleasure for the eyes. A hotel where everything is a surprise to be discovered from the walls to the furniture, from the menu to the spa.Marriott

name: Palladia Hotel
address: 271 Avenue De Grande Bretagne, 31300 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: This luxury hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa centre. It is located 5 kilometres from central Toulouse, near Blagnac International Airport. Toulouse Stadium is also 5 km away. Rooms at the Hotel Palladia are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. The Hotel Palladia’s restaurant serves refined cuisine and guests can enjoy a selection of cocktails in the lounge. Guests can enjoy a meal in the restaurant or on the terrace, which overlooks the pool. The Palladia provides a free shuttle service to and from Blagnac International Airport from 09:00 to 18:00 and it is subject to availability. Guests can also use tram line 2 from the hotel which services directly Blagnac International Airport. The Metro Station can be accessed by a 10-minute tram ride from Purpan to Arènes tram stop. Free parking is also available.

name: Citadines Presqu'île Lyon
description: Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located in the centre of Lyon, between the Rhône and Saône Rivers in the heart of the Presqu'île district. It offers fully equipped studios and apartments with free WiFi access. Each apartment and studio at Citadines Presqu'île Lyon has a safety deposit box, ironing facilities and satellite TV. The kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, dishwasher and toaster. Bed linen and towels are provided. Some units have air conditioning. For an additional cost, a buffet breakfast is available daily in the breakfast room. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day. There is a launderette on site offering a dry-cleaning service at a supplement. Citadines Presqu'île Lyon is located 450 metres from Cordeliers Bourse Metro Station. Vieux Lyon is a 6-minute walk away, while Place Bellecour is 500 metres from the property. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is a 13-minute drive away. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge and is subject to availability.

name: Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat
description: Set on a 600 m² park in Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat is 500 metres from the medieval heart of the city. It offers free WiFi, rooms serviced by a lift and a 2-Michelin star restaurant with a terrace. Guests can enjoy a swimming pool located 850 metres away at Hotel Pont Levis - Franck Putelat. The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a modern-style décor, a balcony or terrace and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in the comfort of the guests’ rooms. Gastronomic cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant, which offers a modern-style décor. Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat is 8 km from Carcassonne Airport and 3 km from the main train station. The Canal du Midi is 2 km away and free private parking is available on site.

name: ibis Styles Lyon Centre - Gare Part-Dieu
address: 54 Rue de la Villette, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Our hotel is located in the center of Lyon's business district and a stone's throw from the historic heart of the city. Ideal for a business or leisure stay. Our rooms are all soundproofed and air-conditioned with a contemporary atmosphere, perfect for a stay alone or with family.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture
address: 775, rue Jean René Guillibert Gauthier de la Lauzière, 13591 Aix-en-Provence, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is located a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, next to an 18-hole golf course. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and has free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or private terrace. The hotel restaurant is open from Sunday evening to Friday midday. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar from 10am to 10pm. Buffet Breakfast is available. There are 3 meeting rooms available to organise meetings, workshops or cocktails. Guests have access to the garden and terrace. Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is just 17.4 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 6.7 km away from Marseille TGV Train Station. Free parking is available on site.

name: Chateau d'Audrieu
description: Gaiety and elegance are the two words which automatically spring to mind to describe this magnificent 18th-century chateau, a listed building set amongst exquisite French gardens and parkland. Ever since becoming a hotel in 1976, Audrieu is a fine example of good taste and the symbol of the French art of living. Period fireplaces and furniture give a personal touch to this ancestral home. Stay in one of its suites and rooms, some of them with original wainscoting, and enjoy a combination of luxury, space and comfort. Treat yourself to superb, innovative cuisine in the gastronomic restaurant. For your utmost pleasure, the hotel also boasts a design bar serving light dishes as well as salted or sweet "croques en bouche" to go with your drink, served inside or on the terrace. Unwind in the hotel's charming gardens or take a dip in the heated outdoor swimming pool. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Holiday Inn Reims Centre, An IHG Hotel
description: Family-friendly hotel in central Reims with cathedral views, an Italian restaurant and rooftop bar Holiday Inn® Reims - City Centre hotel is a 10-minute walk from Reims Train Station and a 45-minute drive from Châlons Vatry Airport (XCR). The recently renovated hotel is located in the historic city centre, close to shops, restaurants and cafés. You can walk to the 13th-century Reims Cathedral, the coronation site of France’s ancient kings. The famous Champagne cellars of Veuve Clicquot-Ponsardin and Taittinger, and the idyllic Parc de Champagne, are a short drive away. The hotel has two meeting rooms with space for up to 20 delegates. Reims Congress Centre is a five-minute walk away, and key businesses, like Forbo Sarlino and Neoma Business School, are less than 10 minutes away by car. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel - Private indoor parking for a fee - A rooftop terrace with charming city views Bright rooms (3 accessible hotel rooms) offer a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a pillow menu to help ensure a good night's sleep.Kids stay and eat free. A full buffet breakfast is served in the rooftop Il Duomo restaurant, where you can also enjoy mouthwatering Italian cuisine in the evening. End your day with a glass of Champagne in the adjacent rooftop bar, while admiring the cathedral and city views.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: InterContinental Bordeaux - Le Grand Hotel
address: 2-5 Place de la Comédie, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Nostalgic French decor and UNESCO World Heritage architecture set the scene for your stay at InterContinental Bordeaux – Le Grand Hotel. We have 13 elegant meeting rooms, Le Bordeaux restaurant, a bar, a rooftop and a gourmet restaurant inspired by Gordon Ramsay. You can also relax in the indoor swimming pool or book a massage in the Guerlain Spa.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: L'Hermitage Gantois Autograph Collection
description: The best hotel in North of France. L Hermitage Gantois Autograph Collection is the perfect mix between ancient architecture and modern design was established in 15th century monument. Situated between the Town Hall and Beaux Art Museum, 5 mn to Zenith Arena and Grand Palais Exhibition Center. Less than 90mn from Bruges, Brussels, Paris, London. Unique in Lille, gardens and heated swimming pool offer a premium atmosphere with high service level. Stay with us for your honeymoon, family deal or business trip. The rooms around inside gardens offer a relaxing ambiance. Some offer special features like a fire place and French ceiling or original tiles. Each room has its own personality for a romantic experience. The Flemish Brasserie, Estaminet Gantois, temporarily closed on sunday, and the restaurant le H temporarily closed, are the best choice in town for diner. The Spa with a heated swimming pool is luxurious cocoon for Carita, Decleor and Themae massage. Bar L Hermitage a vibrant Piano Bar under a gigMarriott

name: Ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité
description: The ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité hotel is located 328 yards (300 m) from the medieval city of Carcassonne and close to the Canal du Midi, both UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Ideally located for discovering the town and Cathar Country, including Château Comtal and its ramparts, Théâtre de la Cité and the Aude and Narbonnaise gates. Close to the lower town, Dôme convention center, train station and highways, the hotel offers a bar/restaurant, solarium swimming pool, fitness room and secure private car parkaccorhotels.com

name: Best Western Plus Le Moderne
description: Caen is a historic town in the heart of Normandy dairy country, near the coast, with many points of interest including medieval remains, abbeys, castles, the Peace Memorial Museum, Normandy landing beaches, delicious local cuisine and fresh seafood. The Best Western Plus® Le Moderne is in the city center and is open all year round. You will receive a warmed and personalized welcome while enjoying a pleasant stay in quiet surroundings. The spacious, individually decorated rooms are soundproofed and fully-equipped with satellite television, mini-bar and direct-dial telephones.bestwestern.com

name: Ibis Styles Colmar Nord
address: 49 Avenue de la Foire Aux Vins, 68000 Colmar, Haut-Rhin
description: Breakfast and unlimited WIFI included in all ibis Styles Colmar Nord hotel prices. Our hotel provides 68 fully refurbished, stylish rooms and lies at the foot of the Vosges Mountains, in the heart of this wine-growing region on the Strasbourg Basel road l ink, 10 minutes from the town center and Little Venice (La Petite Venise). Park for free in our car park and enjoy your stay, relaxing by the pool or in the restaurant. Our establishment is the perfect base for your business or leisure trip in Alsace.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Montpellier - Corum
description: Elevate your stay at Crowne Plaza® Montpellier - Corum. Conveniently located at Montpellier's most prominent venue,  Corum Montpellier, our hotel provides the perfect place for business and leisure travellers. Explore Montpellier attractions near our hotel, such as Place de la Comedie, Opera Comedie, and Cathedral St-Pierre . Discover fun things to do at the Historical Centre, Faculty of Medicine , Arc De Triomphe , and the Fabre Museum. Relax and stay productive in our modern rooms with plush bedding, your own workspace, and high-end  amenities. Plan your meetings in our flexible event space, enjoy casual dining at Maxens or savour a drink by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Astoria Vatican, Lourdes (Inter-Hotel)
address: 95 Rue De La Grotte, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: See hotel page Just 300 m from the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Lourdes, The Originals City, Hotel Astoria Vatican, Lourdes was fully renovated in 2011. Franois Destandau welcomes you into an authentic dcor steeped in history, supported by his attentive team. This 3 star hotel offers comfortable rooms, spacious lounges, a decorated patio with a terrace, a dining room, bar, seminar room and a private, pay-to-use car park.iHotelier/iStay

name: Arl Hotel
description: Located in Arles, 2 km from Arles Amphitheatre, Arl HOTEL provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 40 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Arl HOTEL. Avignon Central Station is 41 km from the accommodation, while Papal Palace is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 25 km from Arl HOTEL.

name: ibis Styles Beaune Centre
description: This hotel is in Beaune city centre and 800 metres from the train station. It offers free Wi-Fi, a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. There is also a terrace in the property. All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Styles Beaune Centre feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and ironing facilities. They also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. Guests are invited to enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at ibis Styles Beaune Centre. A bar is available on the property. This hotel is a 9-minute drive from Beaune Levernois Golf Course and 5.4 km from Pommard. Chalon-sur-Saône is 30 km away. The A6 motorway is 2 km away. Parking available.

name: Mercure Toulouse Centre Saint-Georges
address: Rue Saint Jerome, (For Gps 1 Rue Paul Mériel), 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: The Mercure Toulouse Centre Saint Georges invites you live like a local. In the heart of the pink city, restaurants, shops, museums and transport are just a few steps away. The trendy hotel has 10 meeting rooms, spacious family rooms and apartments. During your stay come enjoy our cocktails at the Bar Le Mahogany Club; when the days get warmer, head to our shady terrace for drinks by the swimming lane.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Mas de Boudan
address: 351 Chemin Bas Du Mas De Boudan, 30000 Nimes, Gard
description: Situated 3 km from Nimes’ Arena, the Mas de Boudan is a boutique hotel that features two restaurants, Bistr'Au and Restaurant Gastronomique, which has a Michelin star. This air-conditioned hotel offers free WiFi throughout. The non-smoking rooms have a flat screen TV, an iPod dock, a safe, a minibar, a coffee machine and an electric kettle. The private bathrooms are equipped with a shower and come with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. All rooms have a garden view. Mas de Boudan offers a shared garden and terrace area. There is an on-site shop selling homemade and local produce. You will also find a massage service, a laundry service and business facilities at the hotel. The property is a 9-minute drive from Nimes Train Station, 52 km from Montpellier-Mediterranee Airport and 100 km from Marseille Provence Airport. Free parking is available at Mas de Boudan.

name: Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa
description: This chalet sits below the famous ski area of the Grands Montets and at the starting point for a range of hiking trails. Its spacious rooms (some with mezzanines for families) have a view of Mont-Blanc or the Glacier of Argentière. The chalet-style rooms and suites offer bright and cosy living spaces. They all have a balcony, individual heating, TV and private bathrooms with bath and shower. Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa provides plenty of after-ski facilities including an indoor swimming pool, outdoor hot-tub, sauna, fitness room and steam room. Massages are also available upon request. In winter warm up in the bar with a drink next to the fireplace, or play a game of billiards. In summer, guests can enjoy the large terrace with sunbeds facing Mont Blanc.
