Wi-Fi internet access is available in the public areas of Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa and free parking is available on site. Throughout the year, ski lockers, shoe-dryers and multi-passes are available at the hotel.

name: Mercure Metz Centre
description: With its contemporary décor inspired by Pierre de Jaumont, Mercure Metz Centre invites you to stay very close to the city center. For tourists and business travellers, our hotel has 4 meeting rooms. To relax, sample local wines in our bar and discover our chef's menu which changes with the seasons, either in our quiet restaurant Emile & Lola or as you enjoy the sun on the terrace which opens in summer.accorhotels.com

name: Manoir Du Parc - Adults Only
address: 8 Avenue Léonard de Vinci, 37400 Amboise, Indre-et-Loire
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 4 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private pools. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-out and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Manoir Du Parc - Adults Only in Amboise, you'll be a 1-minute walk from Loire Valley and 9 minutes by foot from St. Denis Church. This bed & breakfast is 12.2 mi (19.7 km) from Château de Chenonceau and 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Clos Lucé Castle. Dining To-go breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. name: Villa Florentine
address: 25-27 Montée Saint Barthelemy, 69005 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Villa Florentine is located in the heart of Old Lyon with panoramic views of the city. This former convent offers elegant guest rooms, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi throughout. Each air-conditioned guest room at Villa Florentine has an elegant decor and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with Canal + and beIn Sports channels and a minibar and some rooms have a seating area. All rooms have a modern, en suite bathroom with a bathtub or shower and some rooms offer views of Old Lyon. Guests can have breakfast prepared with fresh and local produce in Villa Florentine’s breakfast room or in their room, on the terrace with views of the city or in the bar upon request. Les Terrasses de Lyon, Villa Florentine's gastronomic restaurant, features an outdoor terrace and serves traditional French cuisine and regional specialties. Additional facilities available include a fitness centre with sauna, steam room, a cardio training room and a small beauty treatment area. Guests also have access to a heated swimming pool and hot tub. For guests with cars, private parking is possible on site for a supplement. The hotel is located 4.5 km from Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station. Place Bellecour is 1.2 km away.

name: Hotel de la Cite Carcassonne - MGallery Collection
address: Place Auguste Pierre Pont, 11000 Carcassonne, Aude
description: The 5-star Hotel de la Cité is a jewel in the MGallery collection, a magical 19th-century neo-Gothic masterpiece in medieval Carcassonne. There are 46 rooms and 13 suites, an outdoor pool and a shaded park. This is a hotel where hospitality goes hand in hand with exclusive gourmet cuisine by our chef Jérôme Ryon in the Barbacane restaurant, along with superb views from the terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Astrid
address: 5 Place de la Merlasse, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: Located just 50 metres from the Sanctuary of Lourdes, Hotel Astrid offers a terrace, 24-hour reception, restaurant and bar. Saint-Pie X Basilica is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning at the Hotel Astrid and it can also be served in the guest room. There is a restaurant on site and guests can enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional features include a TV lounge, library, free Wi-Fi access and private & public parking on site at an extra cost upon availability. The train station is only 2 km away and Tarbes-Lourdes Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description: In the Center of the old town of Aix en Provence at 5 minutes by foot of the main street. Performance of the modern style and irreproachable equipment. You can park your car in the parking "Therm'Park", located 50 meters from the hotel with whom we have a special rate of 15 per 24 hours (adjusted directly at the hotel reception).iHotelier/iStay

name: Mama Shelter Lyon
description: Mama Shelter is not just rooms and restaurants, it's a living and meeting space, an urban oasis that's beautiful, lively and modern but also hip, sexy and sociable. Grab a sofa and share a platter, relax over a drink, and get a great night's sleep. Mama takes care of everything!accorhotels.com

name: Hebe Hotel
description: New hotel - Opening May 2021. Hébé Hotel is located in the centre of Annecy, a 10-minute walk from the lake. The hotel rooms each include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each day. Annecy offers an array of bars and restaurants. The closest can be found just 300 metres from the hotel. The property is located just 250 metres from the train station and bus station. Local sites of interest may include the town hall, St Maurice Church, and Saint-Pierre Cathedral.

name: Campanile Tours Nord - Forum Melies
address: 5 Impasse 207 Rue De La Presle, 37100 Tours, Indre-et-Loire
description: Located in Tours, 4.4 km from Vinci International Congress Center, Campanile Tours Nord provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.5 km from Tours Train Station. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Hotel Goüin Museum is 4.5 km from Campanile Tours Nord, while Basilica of Saint Martin is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Tours Val de Loire Airport, 1 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel West End Promenade
description: The stylish beach front hotel is ideally located on the Promenade des Anglais, 500 metres from the Vieux-Nice district and 2.5 km from the Acropolis Congress Centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with satellite TV, some overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Free WiFi is also available throughout the property. Guests can choose from soundproofed rooms and suites, all equipped with a minibar and a spacious bathroom with bathtub. Some have a balcony. The West End’s restaurant, Le Siecle, serves traditional Mediterranean cuisine. During the summer, breakfast and lunch buffets are served in La Palmeraie, and both restaurants have sea views. Guests can also enjoy breakfast in the comfort of their room, at an extra cost. Access to the private beach opposite the hotel is available at an additional cost. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 7 km away.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
address: 33 Avenue du Petit Port, 74000 Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy. The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost. Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: La Residence Du Vieux Port
description: La Résidence Du Vieux Port is set right on the banks of the Old Port in central Marseille. It offers modern rooms and suites with panoramic views of the city. Free WiFi access is available. The stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. There is a kettle in all rooms with tea and coffee provided. Some have wide bay windows and a terrace offering views of the Old Port. Le Relais 50, the adjoining restaurant, serves Mediterranean specialities and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar. La Résidence Du Vieux Port is just 200 metres from La Canebière and the Vieux Port Metro Station, which can take guests to Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available on site at an additional fee.

name: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes
description: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes is situated a 5-minute walk from the cafes and fountains that line the Cours Mirabeau. It offers guest rooms and self-catering accommodation with 24-hour reception and an outdoor swimming pool during summer. Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, including BeIN Sport, are provided in the accommodation, which also has seating area. All of the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes have a private bathroom. The fully equipped kitchenette in the apartment includes a dishwasher, microwave and a small dining area. Les Floridianes also serves a buffet breakfast in the dining room which opens onto the terrace surrounding the pool. Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence. The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away. Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

name: Grand Hotel du Luxembourg
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 27 guestrooms featuring espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Grand Hôtel du Luxembourg, you'll be centrally located in Bayeux, just a 5-minute walk from Baron Gerard Museum of Art and History and 5 minutes by foot from Cathedrale Notre-Dame Bayeux. This 4-star hotel is 11.4 mi (18.3 km) from Omaha Beach and 14.3 mi (23.1 km) from Normandy American Cemetery and Memorial. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.70 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Le Manoir Saint Thomas
description: This manor is located near the Château d'Amboise. It offers a large outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and sun beds, and a free bottle of Liqueur de Fraises. The large rooms and suites are air-conditioned and feature a traditional decoration. Each has satellite TV, a minibar and a telephone, and the bathrooms are complete with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Free Wi-Fi access is available on site. The Saint Thomas is 30 minutes by from Tours and 45 minutes from Blois. Free private parking is provided at Le Manoir Saint Thomas, making it easy to discover the Loire Valley by car.

name: Mercure Toulouse Centre Compans Hotel
address: Boulevard Lascrosses 8 Esplanade Compans Caffarelli, 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: With 20 fully equipped conference rooms, an amphitheatre that can seat up to 200 people, and a 200 m² patio under a glass roof, Mercure Toulouse Centre Compans is an unparalleled venue for your professional events. For a getaway to discover the 'Pink City', our hotel offers you comfortable guest rooms in a leafy setting and a charming terrace where you can enjoy our tapas, small plates and regional wines.accorhotels.com

name: B&b Clos Devalpierre
description: No description found

name: Hotel San Carlu Citadelle
description: After 2 years of total renovation, the Hotel San Carlu Citadelle Ajaccio is open again! We will be pleased to welcome you in our new skybar and restaurant on the top of the hotel with an amazing view on the sea. The Hotel San Carlu Citadelle Ajaccio is located in the heart of Ajaccio's old quarter, next to a 15th-century fortress and 50 metres from the Saint François beach. It overlooks the Mediterranean Sea and offers free WiFi access. The property offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with fully equipped bathrooms and satellite TV. Some offer a breathtaking view of the sea and the fortress. A breakfast made with fresh regional produce is served every morning. The friendly and attentive staff at the Hotel will be happy to help you organise your stay in Ajaccio 24 hours a day.

name: ibis Bordeaux Centre Bastide
address: 16 Allee Serr, Zac Coeur De Bastide, 33100 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: In the heart of the Bastide district, the ibis Bordeaux Centre Bastide hotel is run by an attentive team. We welcome you with a smile and offer modern and comfortable rooms. Guests can enjoy an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast with sweet and savory flavors between 6.30am and 10am. If you're feeling peckish, we offer light snacks 24 hours a day to eat in your room or in the restaurant area.accorhotels.com

name: Le Hüb - Grenoble
address: 25 Avenue du Doyen Louis Weil, 38000 Grenoble, Isère
description: With WTC Grenoble reachable in 300 metres, Le Hüb - Grenoble provides accommodation, a restaurant, a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. Le Hüb - Grenoble features a terrace. AlpExpo is 5 km from the accommodation, while Alps Stadium is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 44 km from Le Hüb - Grenoble.

name: Hotel Crystal
address: 86 Place Drouet D Erlon, 51100 Reims, Marne
description: Located in central Reims, Hôtel Crystal is 1 km from the city’s famous cathedral. It features rooms with views of the inner courtyard garden where guests can relax. Reims Train Station is just 200 metres away. Rooms at Hôtel Crystal have tiled or carpeted floors and feature a minibar. Each room also has a TV with satellite and cable channels including Canal+, Bein Sports and BBC. The en suite bathrooms are complete with amenities and a bath or shower. Le Crystal serves breakfast on the patio, in the garden and can bring it to the comfort of your room, at a surcharge. Breakfast is free for children under 5 years old and at a reduced cost for children between 5 and 10 years old. Guests may also enjoy a drink from the bar and benefit from a 24-hour reception or Wi-Fi access. Business facilities are also available, 200 metres away. Jardin de la Patte-d’Oie and Reims Champagne Congrès are located 750 metres from the hotel. Hôtel Crystal is easily accessed from the A34 which is a 5-minute drive away. "You can park your car in the underground car park near the hotel. The name is Erlon. It costs 16 € per day."

name: Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire Hotel & Spa
description: Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style. The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools. The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a minibar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A kettle is available in the rooms. A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products. A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast. Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout. The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness centre. The hotel is situated 10 km from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 6 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence. There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Le Hameau Albert 1er
description: This hotel is located in Chamonix Mont-Blanc and provides a free shuttle service to the ski slopes. It offers indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and wellness centre and free Wi-Fi. The property is divided into 2 buildings, L'Albert 1er and La Ferme. Each cosy room at Le Hameau Albert 1er has a private bathroom, satellite TV and includes bathrobes and slippers. The hotels has a gastronomic restaurant which serves traditional cuisine and a restaurant serving traditional Savoyard specialties. The hotel also offers a wine cellar and a bar. The wellness centre includes a hammam, hot tub, sauna and various massage and body treatments. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Chamonix SNCF train station and free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Pont Levis - Franck Putelat
description: Just 50 metres from the main entrance of the medieval city of Carcassonne, this modern hotel features a view of the city's ramparts and the surrounding countryside. Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and a 2-hectare private garden. Rooms have a combination of classic and contemporary décor and feature a flat screen TV with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. Rooms are equipped with an electric kettle. Each has an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower, a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries. A gourmet French buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Several restaurants are located 50 metres away and additional restaurants and grocery shops can be found 2 km away in the centre of Carcassone. Cathar castles are located as close as 20 km from the property and Toulouse is a 50-minute drive away. Motorway A61 is 5 km away and Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away. A taxi stand and a bus stop are located in front of the building. Private parking is available.

name: La Tour Rose
address: 22 Rue du Bœuf, 69005 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Lyon, MiHotel Tour Rose offers continental breakfast and free WiFi. The property is set less than 1 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon, 1.9 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 5 km from Part-Dieu Train Station. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms also offer a terrace and others also have garden views. All guest rooms in MiHotel Tour Rose are fitted with free toiletries and an iPod docking station. The reception at the accommodation can provide tips on the area. Popular points of interest near MiHotel Tour Rose include Fourviere Roman Theatre, Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourviere and Musée Miniature et Cinéma. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 31 km from the hotel.

name: L'Impérial Palace
address: Allée de l'Impérial, Annecy, Franceee de L' Imperial 39, Annecy, Haute-Savoie
description: Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided. Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room. The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast. The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre. Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Moxy Bordeaux
description: Hey you! Looking to experience Bordeaux in a playful and alternative way? Moxy Bordeaux is the spot to be then! Grab your friends, a lover or even your pet, there’s a drink waiting for you with your room key and someone at the bar that might be your new BFF…Have fun in our lively living room and microforest terrace beside the historic silos buzzing with the good vibes of our free-spirited guests, or just walk around the corner to venture our beautiful district with its top Bordeaux' attractions!Got the munchies? From our tasty nachos, our yummy Burguers and our appetizing chicken wings, we have everything to satisfy your all-day and late-night dining desires. And do it all while staying connected in our tech-savvy 'plug and meet' gathering area with free speedy wifi and USB ports. So let your moxy shine and PLAY ON #atthemoxy.Marriott

name: Park Inn Nice Airport
description: Located in Nice, 1.9 km from Plage Landsberg, Radisson Hotel Nice Airport provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from Plage des Flots Bleus. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available daily at Radisson Hotel Nice Airport. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Radisson Hotel Nice Airport will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nice, like hiking, skiing and cycling. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Plage Cousteau is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Allianz Riviera Stadium is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, a few steps from Radisson Hotel Nice Airport.

name: Novotel Annecy Centre
description: The Novotel Annecy Centre is a prime spot for your stay between city and nature. In downtown Annecy, a 5-min walk from the lake and old town, the team is waiting for you in a warm and modern setting. Ideal after a day's work, a family vacation, a weekend with friends or a getaway for two. Our restaurant, The Craic, is open every day. Our chef provides gourmet and healthy cuisine using regional products.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Comedie Saint-Roch
address: 6 Et 8, Rue Jules Ferry, 34000 Montpellier, Hérault
description: Welcome to the Best Western Plus® Hotel Comedie Saint-Roch! A completely refurbished hotel with an excellent location in the heart of the historical center and with a great accessibility in front of the Saint Roch international train station, light rails and bus stops. Your stay will be the beginning of a journey marked by tranquility in a cozy and warm setting. Our know-how and technology are at your service: 24/7 front desk, air conditioning, Smart TV, free Internet WiFi, luggage room and a lounge bar. Our team will be delighted to welcome you in one of our 69 rooms equipped with a Nespresso machine, safe, mini fridge, high quality bedding and soft duvet to ensure a restorative sleep. From the hotel you can easily go to fairs and events at the congress center The Corum, the Park & Suite Arena and the Exhibition park of Montpellier. Come and discover Montpellier, city of art and culture!bestwestern.com

name: Hotel le Windsor Grande Plage Biarritz
description: Fully renovated in 2021, the environmentally-friendly Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is located on the beachfront, in the heart of Biarritz. It offers modern accommodation with sea views and free Wi-Fi access. A room service as well as a conciergerie service are provided. It has soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. Each elegantly designed room has an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and views of the sea, the town or the courtyard. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site. A public car park is available 50 metres from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Centre.

name: ibis Styles Avignon Sud
address: 2968 Avenue De L Amandier, 84000 Avignon, Vaucluse
description: South of Avignon, near A7 and A9 motorway exits and the Cap Sud, Fontcouverte, Mistral 7, Agroparc and the Parc des Expositions commercial areas. Spacious, air-conditioned bedrooms, all comforts. Breakfast and WiFi included. Pool, shaded terrace, garden, petanque, table tennis, fitness, billiards, pinball, table football, bar and restaurant La Boucherie, the meat specialist. Undercover free car park.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Alliance Lourdes
description: This hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with views of the Pyrenees, flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi internet access. It is located less than 10 minutes from the sanctuary Notre Dame de Lourdes. Each room is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bar serves a variety of drinks and cocktails and has a large-screen TV that displays French and foreign channels. The Hotel Alliance also provides free parking and is near the town centre.

name: Hotel Paris Neuilly
description: Set between Place de l'Etoile and La Défense business centre, 50 metres from Pont de Neuilly Metro Station, this hotel offers air-conditioned and soundproofed accommodations with flat-screen satellite TV. Guests can choose from modern style rooms and suites, all equipped with a minibar, a work desk and free Wi-Fi. The private bathroom features a bathtub and a hairdryer. The Paris Neuilly offers full buffet breakfast every morning, either served on the patio or in the guest rooms on request. Guests are also welcome at the patio’s bar for a drink. The reception is open 24-hour and provides express check-in and check-out. Luggage storage is available as well as laundry service. Nearby transportations include Charles de Gaulle and Porte Maillot RER Stations, leading directly to Notre-Dame Cathedral, the Eiffel Tower, Versailles and Disneyland.

name: Hotel de Bourgtheroulde Autograph Collection
address: 15 Place de la Pucelle, 76000 Rouen, Normandy
description: The Hotel de Bourgtheroulde and Spa is a 15th century listed historic property in the heart of the ancient capital of Normandy, Rouen, home of the Vikings in France, fiefdom of William the conqueror, Henry II Plantagenet, Richard the Lion Heart and the site of the burning of Joan of Arc.This boutique hotel features a 700sqm Spa and houses an indoor 18/9m swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, gym and 8 treatment rooms.A fine dining restaurant, a bar in the atrium or the historic courtyard complete the experience.5 function rooms for up to 300, extensive public areas, a perfect location in the city center, 5mn walk from the railway station, the Cathedral, Museum and all places of interest in the historic area Rouen is one hour from Paris on the way to Dday beaches and Mont St Michel, on the main motorway from the Chunnel to the south of France and at the heart of the Impressionists favourite sites.Monet and Pissaro painted extensively in Rouen and around.Marriott

name: Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
description: Rooms Stay in one of 33 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bayeux? This hotel has 377 square feet (35 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Hôtel de Brunville, you'll be centrally located in Bayeux, just a 4-minute walk from Baron Gerard Museum of Art and History and 5 minutes by foot from Cathedrale Notre-Dame Bayeux. This hotel is 11.4 mi (18.4 km) from Omaha Beach and 14.4 mi (23.1 km) from Normandy American Cemetery and Memorial. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Hôtel de Brunville, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.10 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 15 for adults and EUR 7 for children Secured self parking fee: EUR 16 per night (in/out privileges) Pet fee: EUR 15 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in fee: EUR 30 (subject to availability) Late check-out fee: EUR 30 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: ibis Toulouse Gare Matabiau
description: Right by the Canal du Midi, opposite the SNCF train station and a 20-minute drive from the airport, the ibis Toulouse Gare Matabiau is ideal for discovering the Pink City. In the heart of Toulouse, the hotel was renovated in 2017 and has 71 rooms with AC and soundproofing, including 3 reduced mobility rooms. Free WiFi. Enjoy our snack bar and Le Victoria restaurant. Public parking at the train station.accorhotels.com

name: Ibis Styles Paris Roissy-Cdg
description: The 3-star ibis Styles Paris Roissy-CDG hotel is open 24 hours and ideal for business or leisure stays, near Roissy-Charles-de-Gaulle (CDG) airport and the Villepinte exhibition center. Offer includes breakfast and unlimited WIFI. The hotel has a cozy bar, restaurant, free private parking and a paid shuttle Monday to Sunday.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Deauville Plage
description: The Novotel Deauville Plage welcomes you a stone's throw from the beach. From family rooms to suites with a sea view, our modular accommodation caters to all needs. Enjoy our panoramic restaurant with its own terrace. There is another terrace located on the ground floor where you can share a drink or an assortment of sushi from the bar. Three meeting rooms are available for hosting your seminars.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Chateau De La Tour
address: 10 Avenue Font de Veyre, 06150 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 33 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Chateau De La Tour in Cannes, you'll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Cannes Harbour and Promenade de la Croisette. This 4-star hotel is 1.9 mi (3 km) from Palace of Festivals and Conferences and 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Sophia Antipolis. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between November 1 and April 1. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.95 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 17 for adults and EUR 9 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 130 per vehicle (roundtrip, maximum occupancy 1) Secured self parking fee: EUR 20 per day Pet fee: EUR 10 per pet, per day Service animals are exempt from fees Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 10.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
