name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Gare Part Dieu
address: 31 rue Maurice Flandin, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: Renovation in progress. Please, take note of the potential presence of noise during your visit to our establishment. Located opposite Lyon’s Part-Dieu Train Station, Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. A buffet restaurant and bar are available for meals and drinks. Guest rooms at the Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu are modern and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. They each offer a courtesy tray with tea and coffee making facilities and biscuits. Campanile Lyon Centre serves a continental breakfast. The restaurant offers traditional French and regional cuisine for lunch and dinner. Reception is open 24 hours a day. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in Centre Part-Dieu’s reading room with free newspapers. Lyon Centre Part-Dieu is conveniently located just 800 metres from the Gare Part-Dieu-Vivier Merle Metro Station. Old Lyon is 3.5 km away. Rhône-Express airport shuttle stops close to the hotel.

name: Hôtel Philippe le Bon
description: Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne. Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches. In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily. Naturopathic massage treatments are available at the hotel, for a surcharge. Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops. Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon, Les Collectionneurs.

name: Odalys City Toulouse Colombélie
address: 76, Rue De La Colombette, 31000 Toulouse, Haute-Garonne
description: Located in Toulouse, just 1 km from the famous Place du Capitole, Odalys City Toulouse Colombélie offers self-catering accommodation.Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. All apartments include a TV. There is a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a refrigerator. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. In the morning, a continental breakfast in the form on a buffet is available. For guests who wish to explore the local sites on public transport, the Jean-Jaurès Metro Stop is just 700 metres away. Toulouse Expo is 4 km away. The Gare Matabiau Train Station is a 12-minute walk from the property and Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is located 10 km away.

name: Hôtel de l'Amphithéâtre
description: Located in the pedestrian area of Nîmes historical city centre, Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre consists of 2 mansions dating from the 17th and 18th centuries. It is just steps from the Roman Amphitheatre and the temple Maison Carrée. The rooms are individually and elegantly decorated and all offer a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms offer a view of the Place du Marché, with a fountain representing the town's symbols of a palm-tree and a crocodile. Guests can find restaurants, cafés and shops within walking distance of the hotel. Nîmes Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel d'Aragon
description: Situated in the heart of Montpellier, the Hotel d'Aragon proposes an elegant backdrop and a privileged location from which to discover the artistic, cultural and historical heritage of the city. The personalised rooms at the Hotel d'Aragon are spacious, soundproofed and fitted with flat-screen TVs, free internet access, a telephone and jet showers. The delicious breakfast is served daily in the glass-roofed veranda, which becomes a cosy lounge bathed in natural light after breakfast. Professional staff offer attentive service and can arrange sea excursions in the hotel’s private speedboat. The Hotel d'Aragon benefits from a privileged location 500 metres from the TGV train station, near the Place de la Comédie, the Opera and the Corum Conference Centre.

name: Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu
address: 37 Rue De Bonnel, 69003 Lyon, Lyon Metropolis
description: The Best Western Crequi Lyon Part-Dieu is a comfortable, quiet, recently built hotel overlooking a beautiful garden. It is located in the heart of the Lyon Part Dieu business and shopping area. We are close to the historical old town, museums, opera, cinema, theater and restaurants. The Best Western Crequi Lyon Part Dieu rooms are totally air-conditioned and soundproofed. Other room features include alarm clock, cable television, safety deposit box, work desk and radio. Our friendly staff awaits your arrival at the Best Western Crequi Lyon Part-Dieu.bestwestern.com

name: ibis Carcassonne Est La Cité
description: Close to the medieval city of Carcassonne, the ibis Carcassonne Est La Cité hotel was completely renovated in 2019. It has a restaurant, bar, free secure car park and a heated outdoor swimming pool. All guests benefit from free WiFi in the bedrooms and common areas. With its comfortable beds and quiet location, close to downtown Carcassonne, it is the ideal place for business or leisure stays.accorhotels.com

name: Campanile Reims Centre - Cathedrale
description: Located in central Reims, a 10-minute walk from Reims Champagne Exhibition Centre, this Campanile provides en suite rooms with free WiFi. It is 3.3 km from Reims Train Station and private parking is available on site, upon reservation and at an extra charge. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite and international channels. Each room has an electric kettle and a private bathroom with a shower. The hotel provides a daily buffet breakfast in the air-conditioned dining room. There is also a restaurant and a bar with an outdoor terrace for meals throughout the day. It offers a 24-hour reception and 2 meeting rooms. Reims Cathedral is 1 km away and Verzenay's lighthouse is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Lion D'or Et Restaurant La Table Du Lion
description: This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters. It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room. All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar. The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service. Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request.

name: Hotel Verlaine
description: Hotel Verlaine offers accommodation in Cannes. This property is situated 1 km from attractions such as Palais des Festivals de Cannes, Les Princes Casino, and La Croisette and has a garden with aromatic mediterranean plants. Guests also have access to free WiFi. All rooms in the hotel are soundproofed and equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Some rooms have a view of the hotel's private garden from a private balcony. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property or served in the room. The hotel has a lounge bar where guests can relax, as well as one little meeting room and a landscaped garden. A spa with a hot tub, a fitness room and massages can be found a 5-minute walk away. A massage service is also available on site on request. La Croisette and Cannes beaches are 500 metres from Hotel Verlaine. Nice Airport is 25 km away. Secured parking spaces are subject to availability. An electric vehicle charging station is also available at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Kyriad Dijon - Gare
address: 7 - 9 Rue Docteur Albert Rémy, Dijon, Bourgogne
description: The Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare is 120 metres from Dijon Train Station and offers an indoor swimming pool and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Each air-conditioned bedroom has a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV. All the rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include a fitness centre and a sauna upon reservation. The hotel reception is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. There are 2 TV lounges on the ground floor and a computer with internet access is available for guests' use. The hotel has a bar and large groups can be catered for on request, 24 hours a day. A hot buffet breakfast is available daily. The hotel is 7 km from Dijon Bourgogne Airport. A close garage parking is available at an additional cost. The Palais des Congrès is a 7-minute tram ride away and both the university campus and the Toison d'Or shopping centre are less than 20 minutes from the property.

name: Chalet Hôtel Le Prieuré & Spa
address: 149 Allée du Recteur Payot, 74400 Chamonix, Haute-Savoie
description: Located a 6-minute walk from the Aiguille du Midi ski lift in Chamonix, Le Prieuré offers accommodation with ski equipment hire on site. It has south-facing rooms, some of them facing Mont Blanc. All the rooms at Le Prieuré have a typical chalet-style decor and feature flat-screen satellite TV and a bathtub. You can relax on your balcony and enjoy a view of Mont Blanc or Aiguille Verte. The buffet breakfast is served in one of the 2 onsite restaurants, Le Rotissier, which overlooks Mont Blanc. Le Prieuré also provides a bar with a piano and a fireplace. This property is just 150 metres from the bus stop that leads to the Brevent Cable Car. From here guests can access the Flégères slopes, Les Grands Montets slopes and les Houches slopes.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
address: Le Caserne, Bp 18, Le Mont-Saint-Michel, Normandy
description: Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel. The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has en suite facilities. The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel. A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Hotel Saint Sauveur
description: Hôtel Saint Sauveur provides 3-star accommodation next to the entrance of the shrines. It has a restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi and there is also a tea room and ice cream parlour. Each Saint Sauveur room is equipped with air-conditioning, a private bathroom and satellite TV. Saint Sauveur’s restaurant serves traditional French and International cuisine. Guests are invited to have a drink in the bar, which features a glass roof. Hôtel Saint Sauveur has a souvenir shop that sells religious objects as well as clothing. A 35-minute drive away, guests can enjoy Hautacam, Cauterets and Luz-Ardiden ski stations. Col du Tourmalet is 47 km away.

name: Hotel Marsiho by HappyCulture
description: Located in the centre of Marseille, Hôtel Marsiho by HappyCulture - ex Best Western Marseille offers 51 rooms with modern décor and free WiFi. With a 24-hour reception, it is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Port of Marseille. All the soundproofed rooms feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each also includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Each morning, the property offers a buffet breakfast to be enjoyed on site. Guests can enjoy a mobile charging station and a Nespresso coffee machine in the public area. La Canebière is just 350 metres from the hotel and Saint-Charles Train Station is 800 metres away.

name: Brit Hotel Reims La Neuvillette
address: Rue Bertrand Russel - Actipole Neuvillette, 51100 Reims, Marne
description: Brit Hotel Reims La Neuvillette is located 5 km from the Notre-Dame Cathedral and Reims Train Station. It offers soundproofed accommodation with free WiFi access and satellite TV. The rooms feature a private bathroom with a shower. A breakfast buffet is served daily at Brit Hotel Reims La Neuvillette. Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar and lounge area. Brit Hotel Reims La Neuvillette is easily accessible by the A4 motorway and provides free private parking. It is an hour’s drive from Disneyland Resort Paris and a 10-minute drive from Reims Convention Centre.

name: Hotel Cristal & Spa
description: Cristal Hôtel & Spa is located 200 metres from Boulevard de la Croisette and from the beaches. It offers 64 air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available. The modern rooms at Cristal Hôtel & Spa are soundproofed and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and they all have wooden flooring. Bathrobes and slippers are included. A buffet breakfast is available in the morning. A wellness floor was added to the top floor of the hotel in July 2019. Guests benefit from free access to the indoor and outdoor pool with a massage jet and to the spa which features hammam, sauna and sun deck. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk. Cannes’s main shopping street, Rue d’Antibes, is 60 metres from Cristal Hôtel & Spa. Cannes Train Station and Palais des Festivals de Cannes are a 10-minute walk away. Guests have access to on-site private parking for an additional cost.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description: Novotel Grenoble Centre is a modern, contemporary-styled hotel with spacious rooms and mountain views. For relaxation, there is a fitness room and a video games area for children. For conferences we have 4 meeting rooms and a private paid garage (height 6.2'). If you're feeling peckish, the Gourmet Bar is open daily with regional fare and healthy cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: Campanile Beaune
description: This property is in an ideal situation, 2 km from Beaune's centre, 3 km from the train station, 40 km from DUON LONGVIC airport and directly accessible from the A6 Highway. With 60 comfortable and well-equipped rooms, the Campanile Beaune Hotel has everything to help you relax, move freely and work efficiently if you travel for business. Courtesy tray with kettle, tea, coffee and biscuits refilled daily in your room.

name: Best Western Beausejour
address: 16 Avenue De La Gare, 65100 Lourdes, Hautes-Pyrénées
description: This Lourdes hotel offers superior service in a breathtaking setting in the Hautes-Pyrenees region of France. The Best Western Beausejour is located in Lourdes, France surrounded by picturesque views of the Pyrenees Mountains. This Lourdes hotel is conveniently located near area attractions and religious sites including Grottes de Betharram, Pic du Midi and the Sanctuary of Our Lady Lourdes. Hotel guests will also appreciate the hotel's proximity to the village which offers a variety of shopping and dining options. Each well-appointed, newly decorated room at the tranquil Best Western Beausejour features dataports, cable satellite TV, hairdryer and bathrobe. Rooms with balconies overlooking the Pyrenees Mountains are available. Other hotel amenities include heated outdoor swimming pool, free private guest parking and gift shop. For added comfort and convenience, this Lourdes hotel offers on-site dining and lounge options. A friendly and knowledgeable staff is ready to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay while visiting the Pyrenees region of France. Make an online reservation today and save at the Best Western Beausejour. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Villa Victoria
description: Located in Nice City Centre, this period building features a 600 m² floral garden. The hotel offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi access, and a view of the city or the garden. A minibar, satellite TV and tea and coffee making facilities are standard in each guest room. A hairdryer is included in the private bathrooms. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and can be taken on the terrace in the garden. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at hotel Villa Victoria. Within a 10-minute walk from Villa Victoria, guests can find the famous Promenade des Anglais, Nice-Ville Train Station, Nice Old Town, the casino and the Mediterranean Sea. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and needs to be booked in advance.

name: Hotel Beau Rivage
address: 24 Rue Saint Francois De Paule, 06300 Nice
description: Beau Rivage is located in the lively old town of Nice. The property is just 50 metres from the Promenade des Anglais and the beach. The famous Flower Market on Cours Saleya is a 5-minute walk away. The property offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Beau Rivage offers 114 air-conditioned guest rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have modern en suite bathrooms and are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Restaurant Les Galets. Upon request guests can have breakfast served in their rooms. Guests of the Beau Rivage can have a drink or a light meal in the hotel’s lounge bar or relax on the hotel's patio. The hotel’s private beach, Plage du Beau Rivage, offers sun beds, a restaurant and evening entertainment. Activities offered on the beach include waterskiing and wakeboarding. The beach restaurant offers drinks and snacks served on the terrace overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Nice Ville Train Station is 1.2 km away and Massena Tram Stop is only 250 metres away. Just a 5-minute walk from the property guests will find the bus stop that provides direct access to Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, located 7 km away.

name: Privilège Appart Hotel Saint-Exupéry
description: No description found

name: Mercure Paris Roissy Cdg
description: Mercure Paris Roissy Charles de Gaulle immerses you in a quintessentially Parisian decor - with nods to Montmartre, the Citroën 2CV, Haussmannian boulevards and works by local artists. Our hotel in Roissy-en-France offers 5 meeting rooms and a large car park. During your downtime, relax on the terrace or play a game of billiards, table tennis, Wii or pinball. Savour products from the local market at breakfast, and taste the selection of wines in Before Paris - our restaurant and in-house brewery.accorhotels.com

name: Mama Shelter Toulouse
description: Mama has moved to the Pink City! In the heart of Toulouse, close to Place Wilson, Pierre Goudouli and Jean-Jaurès station, Mama Shelter is a delightful addition! Boasting 120 comfortable, connecting rooms, a 42-seat cinema (CinéMama), a courtyard terrace with a fireplace restaurant and Argentinian grill, delicious cocktails, meeting rooms and rooftop with a pizza oven. Get ready for Mama to spoil you!accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Angelic
description: Hotel Angelic-Myriam is located just 150 metres from the sacred pilgrimage site Sanctuaire Notre Dame de Lourdes. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access throughout the entire hotel. Guest rooms at Angelic-Myriam are equipped with a private bathroom and satellite TV. They also have lift access. Traditional and local French cuisine is served in the Angelic-Myriam’s restaurant. The bar is perfect for an aperitif or coffee. Hotel Angelic-Myriam has a private elevator which provides access to the Domaine de la Grotte. Tarbes-Lourdes Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Burdigala by Inwood Hotels
description: Welcome to the Burdigala Hotel, a 5-star Lifestyle hotel of the Inwood Hotels collection. Situated at 115 rue Georges Bonnac in the Mériadeck district of Bordeaux, our unique establishment opens its doors to you in a welcoming atmosphere where the Art of Sharing is celebrated. Designed as a true living space, our hotel offers a variety of areas, including a Game Room, Cinema, Shop… For a gastronomic experience, you'll find the Madame B restaurant and bar in the hotel, where chef Grégory Vingadassalon and his team prepare delicious dishes inspired by the cuisine of yesteryear. To enhance your experience, just across from the hotel is the Atelier du Burdigala, a true creative hub ready to host all your meetings! The hotel is located less than a 5-minute walk from the Mériadeck business district. Bordeaux Saint Jean Train Station is 4 km away, while Bordeaux Airport is 10 km from the hotel.

name: Firstname Bordeaux
description: Situated in Bordeaux, 700 metres from Saint-André Cathedral, FirstName Bordeaux by Hyatt features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 1.1 km from Museum of Aquitaine, and within 500 metres of the city centre. At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. FirstName Bordeaux by Hyatt offers some units with city views, and all rooms include a kettle. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near FirstName Bordeaux by Hyatt include Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux, Esplanade des Quinconces and CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Mercure Bordeaux Gare Atlantic
address: 69 Rue Eugene Le Roy, 33800 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Mercure Bordeaux Gare Atlantic is located in the heart of the completely renovated and transformed Saint John district between old Bordeaux and the Paludate business district. Come experience our 4-star hotel inspired by historic bourgeois homes with our refined rooms and suites, our Saint Jean real Bistrot where authenticity is the key and our lounge and meeting space, perfect for all of your gatherings.accorhotels.com

name: Chambres À Bord'o
description: No description found

name: Hôtel de Tourny
description: Set in an 18th-century mansion, Hôtel de Tourny - Boutique Hôtel Bordeaux Centre is located in the heart of Bordeaux historic district. After visiting the city, guests can relax in the patio of this stylish hotel boasting a cosy atmosphere and offering a concierge service. Featuring light grey tones and a design décor, Hôtel de Tourny - Boutique Hôtel Bordeaux Centre elegant rooms are air-conditioned. They all have a flat-screen TV with international channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes and high end free toiletries. Meals can be enjoyed in one of the various restaurants located in the surrounding streets. A continental breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s dining room. Hôtel de Tourny - Boutique Hôtel Bordeaux Centre’s location makes it an excellent base to visit Bordeaux with Quinconces Esplanade, Grand Theatre - Opera National de Bordeaux and CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain within 500 metres. Hôtel de Tourny - Boutique Hôtel Bordeaux Centre is 15 km from Bordeaux Merignac Airport and just 4 km from Saint-Jean Train Station.

name: Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac
description: Set in Bordeaux, 3 km from Wine and Trade Museum, Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.1 km from Matmut Atlantique Stadium. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms also offer a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Guests at Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac can enjoy a continental breakfast. Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk. Bordeaux Expo is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Chaban Delmas Bridge is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac.

name: Mondrian Bordeaux Les Carmes
description: Mondrian Bordeaux Les Carmes is opening in the heart of the Chartrons district. The chic, Philippe Starck-designed hotel is housed in the former Calvet wine cellars. The superb terrace overlooks the pool, spa and contemporary bar restaurant. The 97 rooms/suites are intimate, warm and cozy, reminders of the cosmopolitan dimension of a place at the crossroads of global cultures.accorhotels.com

name: Les Chambres au Coeur de Bordeaux
description: No description found

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Bordeaux
description: Set in Bordeaux, within 700 metres of La Cite du Vin and Chaban Delmas Bridge, Radisson Blu Hotel Bordeaux features accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Featuring a bar, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The hotel provides a French restaurant. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Rooms include a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel Bordeaux have a lake view. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. The reception can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. Mer Marine Bordeaux museum is 1 km from Radisson Blu Hotel Bordeaux, while Esplanade des Quinconces is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bordeaux Centre
description: Welcome to Hilton Garden Inn Bordeaux Centre, set in the heart of Bordeaux. We’re ideally located near Bordeaux train station, so you can get around the city with ease by train or tram. We’re located just three tram stops from the iconic Place de la Bourse. Opéra National, Cité du Vin and Bordeaux Métropole Aréna are all just 10 minutes away by tram, while the Palais des Congrès is reachable within 20 minutes. Enjoy delicious lunch options in our unique restaurant and café store, Babette. Work out in our fully equipped fitness room or relax in the comfort of your guest room. We offer two conference rooms, a boardroom and a ballroom, all offering the benefit of natural light, for your next Bordeaux meeting or event. Our hotel boasts stunning riverside views and offers private parking.Hilton

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Bordeaux Lac
address: Rue Du Grand Barail, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Between its varied gastronomy, its dense heritage, its quays and many atypical neighborhoods, Bordeaux will seduce you and will make you want to come back. By staying in one of the rooms at the Sure Hotel by Best Western Bordeaux Lac, you are guaranteed to have an exceptional stay, while being close to the main sites. The Parc des Expositions, the Palais des Congrès and the centre of Bordeaux are just a stone’s throw away from our 3 Star hotel, which will make travelling easier. Do not hesitate and choose the room that will meet your expectations whether it is a tourist or business stay.bestwestern.com

name: Residhotel Galerie Tatry
description: Galerie Tatry offers self-catering apartments a 10-minute tram ride from the centre of Bordeaux. New Bordeaux Stadium is 4 km away. The apartments at Galerie Tatry are air-conditioned, depending on the season, and have a modern décor. They each feature a kitchenette with a microwave and fridge and a seating area with satellite TV. Bedroom and bathroom linens are provided. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the residence’s contemporary dining room. Additional services available at Galerie Tatry include free newspapers and luggage storage. Line C Tram Stop Grand Parc is located opposite the residence, from there guests just have a street to cross to access the residence. Bordeaux’s Palais des Congrès is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Novotel Bordeaux Centre
address: 45 cours du Marechal Juin, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Novotel Bordeaux Centre is the perfect hotel for exploring Bordeaux and its surroundings with family and friends. You'll be charmed by the soothing and modern decor in our newly renovated spaces. Make the most of your visit with a session in our fitness center or a tasty and relaxing treat on the terrace of our restaurant, "Les Décantés". Before you go, why not have a game of pinball or foosball?accorhotels.com

name: Volubilis Luxury Guest House
description: No description found

name: Campanile Bordeaux Nord - Le Lac
address: Centre Hotelier Le Lac, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Campanile Bordeaux Nord - Le Lac is located a 15-minute drive from the city centre, 350 metres from Line C Parc des Expositions tram stop, and 800 metres from New Bordeaux Stadium. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi access. All of the rooms have tea and coffee making facilities and cable TV. Campanile Bordeaux Nord - Le Lac offers contemporary French cooking in a warm atmosphere. Choose from buffets, children's menus and à la carte selections. A breakfast buffet is served daily. The hotel is situated close to the vineyards, St Emilion, Blaye la Citadelle and Unesco world heritage sites. Bordeaux Exhibition Centre is 1 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Villa Victor Louis
description: No description found

name: Eklo Bordeaux Centre Bastide
address: 10 Rue de la Gare d'Orléans, 33100 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Boasting a bar and a shared lounge, Eklo Bordeaux Centre Bastide is situated in Bordeaux, 3.1 km from Chaban Delmas Bridge and 3.6 km from Stone Bridge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel rooms have a desk and a private bathroom. Eklo Bordeaux Centre Bastide offers a sun terrace. Saint-Michel Basilica is 3.7 km from the accommodation, while Great Bell Bordeaux is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 21 km from Eklo Bordeaux Centre Bastide.

name: L'Apparthôtel Particulier Bordeaux
description: No description found

name: Appart-Hôtel Mer & Golf City Bordeaux Lac
description: Located within 2.9 km of La Cite du Vin in Bordeaux, Appart-Hôtel Mer & Golf City Bordeaux Lac provides accommodation with free WiFi and a seating area. A Tram C stop is available 100 metres away and drives you to the Exhibition center, historical center and train station. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. A shopping center and restaurants can be found across the street. Guests can enjoy the fitness room. Wine and Trade Museum is 3.1 km from Hotel Mer & Golf City Bordeaux, while Matmut Atlantique Stadium is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Appart Hôtel Mer & Golf City Bordeaux - Bassins à Flot
description: No description found

name: Teneo Apparthotel Talence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Central Hostel
description: Well situated in Bordeaux, Central Hostel Bordeaux Centre offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around less than 1 km from Saint-Michel Basilica, a 13-minute walk from Stone Bridge and 600 metres from Place de la Bourse. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a concierge service. The units feature bed linen. Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near Central Hostel Bordeaux Centre include Museum of Aquitaine, Great Bell Bordeaux and Saint-André Cathedral. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Vatel Bordeaux
description: Located in Bordeaux, 400 metres from Bordeaux Wines Museum, Hotel Vatel boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants. Every room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Some units include views of the Garonne or city. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Chaban Delmas Bridge is 1 km from Hotel Vatel, while CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain is 1.2 km away. Mérignac Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Mercure Bordeaux Lac
address: Rue Du Grand Barail, Quartier Du Lac, Bordeaux, 33, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Combine business with pleasure at the Mercure Bordeaux Lac Hotel. Here on business? The Palais des Congrès and Exhibition Center are just a 10-minute walk, and there are 3 on-site rooms for your meetings. Unwind in our pool and secret garden terrace. Request a room if you want to enjoy this cool, leafy setting. For family-filled weekends, we have spacious rooms and suites that sleep up to 4 peopleaccorhotels.com

name: Mercure Bordeaux Centre Ville
description: For a weekend of discovery as a couple or for a business trip, Mercure Bordeaux Centre-Ville is the top spot in the heart of our beautiful wine region. Our business guests will enjoy 700m2 of modern and well-equipped spaces for seminars and banquets for up to 250 people. Our rooms offer travel and relaxation with the Miroir d'eau! For foodies, head to Sans Pression to discover our beers + local produce.accorhotels.com

name: Pullman Bordeaux Lac
address: 1 Avenue Jean Gabriel Domergue, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Pullman Bordeaux Lac is an elegant hotel close to the lake, next to vineyards, near the Convention Center and the Barriere Theatre Casino, and 15 mins by tram to the city center. The hotel has a private car park, bar, restaurant, outdoor pool, fitness room and business area with 6,500 ft² of private rooms. All rooms have air conditioning, free WIFI, TV, desk and courtesy tray.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean
description: The fully refurbished Novotel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean is near the Tauzia tram stop, 450m from the train station and the Place de la Bourse. It's ideal for your business or family trips, with meeting rooms and a friendly laid-back bar overlooking the restaurant's lovely patio. The rooms are very comfortable, with an understated elegance, and some have a terrace with patio view.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Cardinal Bordeaux Centre
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Bordeaux City-Centre district of Bordeaux, Hôtel Cardinal is 100 metres from Saint-André Cathedral. The property is an 12-minute walk from Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux. All suites at the hotel come with a TV, a kitchen and a seating area. With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, guidance is available at the reception. A continental breakfast, including homemade pastries prepared by the hotel's pastry chef, can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room, at an extra cost. Place de la Bourse is 900 metres from Hôtel Cardinal, while Esplanade des Quinconces is 900 metres from the property. Mérignac Airport is 10 km away.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Bordeaux Gambetta
description: Located right in the city center, aparthotel Adagio Gambetta offers 111 bright, fully-equipped apartments, accommodating up to 4 people depending on the type chosen. Enjoy cooking in our ergonomic kitchens, and share unforgettable moments with loved ones. Work peacefully on the spacious table and benefit from free WiFi. From the ApartHotel, easily discover Bordeaux. Reception desk open 24 hours a day.accorhotels.com

name: Ibis Styles Bordeaux Meriadeck
description: Welcome to ibis Styles Bordeaux Mériadeck, for business trips, conferences and leisure stays! It's a family designer space in downtown Bordeaux, very close to the Chaban Delmas stadium and Mériadeck ice rink. We offer breakfast with freshly squeezed orange juice and rooms with free WIFI and Chromecast TV.accorhotels.com

name: Les pénates bordelaises - maison d'hôtes
description: No description found

name: Ténéo Apparthotel Bordeaux Maritime
description: Offering free WiFi and a terrace, Ténéo Apparthotel Bordeaux Maritime is located in Bordeaux. Chaban Delmas Bridge is 800 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site at a surcharge. The accommodation features a flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also offered. Towels are provided. In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available. Bordeaux Wines Museum is 300 metres from Ténéo Apparthotel Bordeaux Maritime, while CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Ibis Bordeaux Lac
address: Rue du Petit Barail, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: The ibis Bordeaux Lac hotel is close to the city center and attractions, with large, comfortable bedrooms and everything you need for a business or leisure stay. The hotel offers quality amenities, two meeting rooms, a 24/7 bar and a Courtepaille restaurant with a terrace overlooking the lake, open every day from 11.30am to 11pm. Car park also available.accorhotels.com

name: Résidence Sweetly Saint Augustin
address: 107 Rue de la Pelouse de Douet, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Located in the city center, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all in Bordeaux. Chaban-Delmas Stadium is an easy 14-minute walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers covered onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 4-minute drive to Rue Sainte-Catherine. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Bordeaux by hopping on a metro at either Saint Augustin Tram Station or Hopital Pellegrin Tram Station, both just 5 minutes away by foot. Relax in the garden or sip a drink on the deck or patio of this apartment. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the WiFi. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchenette, complete with a stovetop and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. And thanks to the washer and dryer, you'll even be able to travel light. Other amenities include bed sheets, an ironing board, and heating.VRBO

name: Le Provençal
address: Rue du Petit Barail, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Hôtel Le Provençal is just a 5-minute walk away from the Bordeaux Congress Centre, Bordeaux Exhibition Centre and Matmut Atlantique Stadium. It offers free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and an on-site restaurant. The rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Each room is equipped with free WiFi, air-conditioning and a TV with cable channels. Guests may enjoy a breakfast buffet with homemade pastries every morning, and until 11:00 on Saturdays and Sundays. The hotel restaurant is open for lunch and dinner by reservation, offering a buffet and à la carte dining options. A 2-minute walk from Parc des Expositions Line C tram stop, the Hôtel Le Provençal is 6 km away from the Bordeaux city centre. A casino, bowling alley and a large shopping centre are located 800 metres away.

name: Mercure Bordeaux Chateau Chartrons
description: In historic Les Chartrons, the hotel has been completely renovated. Ideal for a family stay or business seminar. Amenities for your comfort: restaurant with terrace, fitness area, family rooms, large meeting rooms, garden: everything you need to work and recharge your batteries.accorhotels.com

name: ibis Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint-Jean Euratlantique
description: We're next to Saint-Jean station, 10 minutes downtown by tram, with direct links to Bordeaux airport. The ibis Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint-Jean Euratlantique is popular with business guests, and just 20 minutes from the Palais des Congrès. Work online from our hotel, tour the Cité du Vin, marvel at the Bassins des Lumières displays, or take a gourmet break at the Marché des Capucins: Bordeaux has it all!accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Bayonne Etche Ona - Bordeaux
description: Our hotel is in the Golden Triangle of Bordeaux, made of two beautiful houses of the XVIIIth century, the Bayonne and the Etche-Ona began an important comprehensive renovation program that was 11 months long. Today we are sincerely delighted to invite you to discover a new story told with elegance, harmony and detail. The Bayonne located 4 rue Martignac welcomes you in an atmosphere Art Deco 1925-1930. The Etche-Ona located 11 rue Mautrec (at 40 meters far away) offer cabinet de curiosity – travel souvenirs atmosphere. Rooms and suites, just like the public areas offer exclusive services top of the range where comfort and latest technology go hand in hand. All the decoration, furniture, lighting, choice of materials, designs…have been done by us and for us. The color palettes are soft and shimmering through fine fabrics, the walls are punctuated with different wall patterns extremely elegant. Bathrooms are made in Corian (marble) and welcome you in a unique and exclusive setting. Our lounges of reception-bar welcome you for relaxation, but also to organize your working appointments. Wi-Fi is offered. In rooms: soundproofing, air conditioning, 40-inch TV with international channels, radio, alarm clock, telephone, mini-bar, coffee and tea facilities offer, professional Nespresso® in all of our rooms, personal safe, Wi-Fi offer, office stationery, deluxe bedding and duvet very comfortable made with vegetable/plant fiber, two sizes of pillow, totally obscuring curtains, bath or rain shower, cosmetic mirror, hair dryer, clothes line, handkerchief, NUXE® toiletries without paraben in essential oils. Bathrobe in suite, slippers in deluxe and suite. Services: Breakfast buffet or served in room, bar, meeting room, room service, laundry and pressing service, 24-hour reception desk, complimentary newspapers, business corner, shoe-shine machine, rooms for guests with limited mobility.bestwestern.com

name: Mama Shelter Bordeaux
description: More than just rooms or restaurants, Mama Shelter is a place for living and meeting, a true urban refuge that is beautiful, modern and full of spirit but also folksy, inviting and sexy. Make yourself comfortable on one of our sofas to sample our sharing p latters, have a drink, relax and sleep like a baby. Mama will take care of everything!accorhotels.com

name: Loft Zen Bordeaux
address: 2 Bis Cite De La Touratte, 33100 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: No description found

name: Casa Blanca B&B
address: 39 Rue de la Course, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Casa Blanca B&B is located in Bordeaux, less than 1 km from Wine and Trade Museum and provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, as well as access to a terrace. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. A bicycle rental service is available at Casa Blanca, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Esplanade des Quinconces, CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain and Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux. The nearest airport is Mérignac, 15 km from Casa Blanca B&B, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Regina Bordeaux Gare Saint-Jean
description: Situated under a 10-minute stroll from Tauzia Tram Station, Citotel Le Regina provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Bordeaux. This historic hotel is an ideal choice for discovering the local vineyards as it is located in Bordeaux Wine Regions. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of Citotel Le Regina, including a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and meeting facilities. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The hotel has 39 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a variety of essential amenities to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. A satisfying breakfast is served each morning at Citotel Le Regina, and there are numerous cafés and eateries close by. The hotel is an ideal place to explore the Jardin Botanique, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It is moments from Saint-Jean Tram Station, which allows for easy access in and around Bordeaux.Revato

name: Novotel Bordeaux Lac
address: Avenue Jean Gabriel Domergue, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: The NOVOTEL Bordeaux Lac offers you a chance to unwind. Enjoy the terrace, the lake view and the heated pool, just minutes from the historic center of Bordeaux. Try our restaurant menu's homemade cuisine made from local produce. Keep the family entertained with our children's area. For business travelers, our hotel is close to the city's business hubs, and has 11 meeting rooms and a coworking space.accorhotels.com

name: All Suites Appart Hotel Bordeaux Marne
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a refrigerator and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux
address: 151 Cours de la Marne, 33800 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Bordeaux. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux provides certain rooms that include a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Hotel La Zoologie & Spa Bordeaux include Saint-Michel Basilica, Great Bell Bordeaux and Stone Bridge. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Bordeaux Rodesse
description: Located not far from Mériadeck district and Town Hall, Aparthotel Adagio Access Bordeaux Rodesse has 44 apartments (studios and 2 rooms) w/ kitchenettes, and double beds or twins subject to availability (not guaranteed in advance). There's an outdoor swimming pool open in season (shared as condominium) and private car park (for fee). Buses and trams close to residence make it easier to get around Bordeaux.accorhotels.com

name: La Petite Annick
description: No description found

name: Residhome Bordeaux
description: Located in the Bassins a Flot district in Bordeaux, 50 metres from Chaban Delmas Bridge, Residhome Bordeaux features free WiFi access and paid private parking. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fully organic breakfast is served every morning with fresh juices, seasonal fruits, breads, pastries, muesli and cereals, cheese and ham. A breakfast-to-go box is also available for an extra charge. Food allergies and intolerances can also be accommodated. The property works with eco-friendly suppliers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The City of Wine Museum is 400 metres from Residhome Bordeaux, while CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 12 km from the property.

name: Jost Hôtel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean
description: JOST Hôtel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bordeaux. This 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Stone Bridge. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. At JOST Hôtel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean, each room is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or American options. Saint-Michel Basilica is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Great Bell Bordeaux is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 15 km from JOST Hôtel Bordeaux Centre Gare Saint Jean.

name: La Halte Montaigne
description: Located in Bordeaux, B&B La Halte Montaigne offers B&B accommodation, just 400 metres from Bordeaux St-Jean Train Station. You can relax on the furnished veranda or in the living room, and there is also a small garden. All of the air-conditioned rooms at B&B La Halte Montaigne have a contemporary and warm decor. Each room features a desk, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Breakfast is included and served daily on the veranda. You will also have access to a shared kitchen equipped with a fridge, hotplates and a coffee machine. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The centre of Bordeaux is 4 km from the B&B and Gare Saint-Jean Tramway Stop is 300 metres away.

name: Patio De L'Intendance
description: Set in a 18th-century building in central Bordeaux, Patio De L'Intendance offers B&B accommodation 100 metres from Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux. It provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access and has a wooden-decked patio. This house offers 2 exclusive guest rooms or a loft, which are individually themed. Offering views of the church or the patio, they have wooden floorboards.Guests can also relax in the property's shared patio or lounge. A continental breakfast is provided every morning in the dining room. A supermarket can be found within 200 metres from the property and the B&B is located in the city centre with bars and restaurants. A common kitchen is at guests' disposal. Only 3.3 km from Bordeaux Saint-Jean railway station, the residence is 300 metres from a fitness center with a Turkish bath and sauna. Bordeaux Mérignac airport is 13.1 km away.

name: Les Séraphines Bed N Business
description: Located in Bordeaux, 1.2 km from Saint-André Cathedral and 600 metres from the centre, Les Séraphines - Bed & Breakfast provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and shower. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Les Séraphines - Bed & Breakfast provides a daily maid service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Museum of Aquitaine, Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux and Esplanade des Quinconces. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 9 km from Les Séraphines - Bed & Breakfast.

name: Omira - Nuits D'exception & Spa
address: 4 Rue de la Tour de Gassies, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: OMIRA provides rooms in Bordeaux near Stone Bridge and Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux. Located in the Bordeaux City-Centre district, the property provides guests with access to a hot tub. The property is 800 metres from Museum of Aquitaine, and within 1.1 km of the city centre. A continental breakfast is available daily at the love hotel. Popular points of interest near OMIRA include Great Bell Bordeaux, Place de la Bourse and Saint-André Cathedral. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Ibis Bordeaux Centre Meriadeck
address: 35, Cours du Marechal Juin, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Our ibis Bordeaux Centre Mériadeck hotel has been designed to be perfect for a pleasant business stay or simply to explore the area. Benefit from our coworking spaces with free broadband WiFi or our personalized seminar reception. After work, enjoy comfort on our rooftop with breathtaking views, tailor-made catering, a petanque court and the option of a ride around the city on one of our electric bikes.accorhotels.com

name: Love Loft
description: Set in Bordeaux, Love Loft offers accommodation 2 km from Museum of Aquitaine and 1.8 km from Saint-André Cathedral. Complimentary WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath, bathrobes and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Great Bell Bordeaux is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Saint-Michel Basilica is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 9 km from Love Loft.

name: Tang Home-Bordeaux Hyper Centre
description: TANG Home-Bordeaux Hyper Centre provides accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Bordeaux, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux, Esplanade des Quinconces and CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 10 km from TANG Home-Bordeaux Hyper Centre.

name: Yndo Hotel
address: 108 rue Abbe de l'Epee, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: A luxury hotel set in a 19th-century private mansion in the heart of Bordeaux's historic centre, Yndo Hôtel features a fragrance garden and a shaded terrace, where guests can enjoy a chic yet restful stay. Yndo Hôtel boasts individually decorated rooms with designer furniture. They are air-conditioned and include a balcony and a seating area, as well as a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi, an iPod dock and a coffee machine. Elegant en suite bathrooms come with free toiletries. Breakfasts and meals are composed of a selection of regional and seasonal produce from the market. Yndo Hôtel also offers a 24-hour room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property's location, next to Gambetta Square and Cours de l’Intendance, makes it a perfect base to discover the city of Bordeaux, with Saint-André Cathedral and the City Hall located a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: Aliénor
address: 47 Rue de la Benauge, 33100 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Aliénor is a guest house located in Bordeaux in the Aquitaine Region, 500 metres from Stone Bridge. Each room at this guest house is air conditioned and features a TV. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a shared kitchen at the property. The guest house also offers bike hire and car hire. Saint-Michel Basilica is 1 km from Aliénor, while Place de la Bourse is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mérignac Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Les Chambres d'Art
description: Les Chambres d'Art is a B&B set in a house built in 1900, in the heart of Bordeaux. Free Wi-Fi access is available and there is an art exhibition on site. Other facilities include a garden with terrace and outdoor furniture. Each room is invidivially and stylishly decorated. They feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and some rooms have a balcony. Breakfast consists of cheese, ham, bread and pastries There is a traditional restaurant 50 metres from Les Chambres d'Art and a supermarket 500 metres away. Bordeaux Saint-Jean Train Station and the Grand Théatre is 1 km from the B&B, while Saint-Emilion is 42 km away. The docks can be seen 200 metres away.

name: Koko & Baobab
description: Koko & Baobab features inner courtyard views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Bordeaux, 300 metres from Saint-Michel Basilica. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and walk-in shower. A microwave and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Koko & Baobab include Stone Bridge, Great Bell Bordeaux and Museum of Aquitaine. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Chambre Privée À Bordeaux Pellegrin
description: No description found

name: Ibis Budget Bordeaux Centre Mériadeck
address: 37 Cours DU Marechal Juin, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: The ibis budget Bordeaux Centre Mériadeck is ideally located for an unforgettable Bordeaux immersion. Park your vehicle in our undercover car park to start your getaway on foot, by tram or by bike. Be charmed by the famous Rue Sainte Catherine, the Grand Théâtre and the Miroir d'eau. To finish in style, enjoy the sunset on our rooftop Le B35 and book your table at the Bistrot de Mériadeck.accorhotels.com

name: My Clean House
address: 77 Bis Rue Abbé de l Épée, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Featuring a shared lounge and free WiFi, My Clean House is located in the centre of Bordeaux, close to Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux, Saint-André Cathedral and Esplanade des Quinconces. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain, Place de la Bourse and Museum of Aquitaine. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 9 km from My Clean House.

name: La Cabane Bordeaux St Augustin
description: Charming wooden cabin with swimming pool, pergola and terrace. The cabin is equipped with a kitchenette, a bathroom, a toilet, a dressing room, a television, a bed 2 person, a console table, a mini fridge, a coffee maker, a kettle, a microwave, crockery, tea, condiments. Parasol, garden furniture, garden chairs, plancha camping gas, are at your disposal. Sheets and towels provided. Hair dryer, shampoo, shower gel. A haven of peace, just 15 minutes from the center of Bordeaux by bus or tram, and a 30-minute walk. Breakfasts without supplement. You will go through our house, to access the cabin located at the bottom of our garden. The pool in front of the cabin will be reserved during your stay. We will remain at your disposal, and will always be present during your stay. We will ask you to come back before 1 am during your evenings at night. Bus 1 (Airport / Station) 5 minutes walk. Tram A 10 minutes walk. Shops at 5 minutes walk (restaurants, bakery, cheese, cellar, early, catering, market Wednesdays and Sundays.)VRBO

name: Hypercentre Smart Flat
address: 69 Rue Abbe de l'Épée, 33000 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Located in the centre of Bordeaux, Hypercentre Smart Flat provides accommodation with city views, just 700 metres from Saint-André Cathedral and 1.1 km from Museum of Aquitaine. This bed and breakfast is 1.5 km from Great Bell Bordeaux and 1.1 km from Place de la Bourse. This bed and breakfast is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux, Esplanade des Quinconces and CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 9 km from Hypercentre Smart Flat.

name: Chambre Aliénor d'Aquitaine
description: Set in Bordeaux, 800 metres from Wine and Trade Museum and 1.4 km from Chaban Delmas Bridge, Chambre Aliénor d'Aquitaine offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is situated 1.5 km from La Cite du Vin and features a shared kitchen. The kitchen has an oven, a microwave and a toaster, as well as coffee machine and kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. CAPC Musee d'Art Contemporain is 1.8 km from Chambre Aliénor d'Aquitaine, while Place de la Bourse is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Duplex Saint Jean - Superbordeaux
address: 27 Rue Saint-Vincent de Paul, 33800 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: Located in Bordeaux, this welcoming apartment brings it all within your reach. Marche des Capucins is an easy 13-minute walk away or make quick work of the 1-minute drive to Rue Sainte-Catherine. If you're looking to expand your horizons and see other nearby locales, you can catch a train at either Bordeaux St-Jean Station or Bordeaux (ZFQ-Saint-Jean SNCF Train Station), both within a 5-minute walk of your stay. As you settle into this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a dining area and air conditioning. No need to pay for a restaurant every night, when you've got an oven, a microwave and cookware on hand.Expedia

name: Maison Fernand B&B
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include premium bedding, towels, multilingual staff, and weekly housekeeping.Expedia

name: Suite '1900'
description: A short distance from sailing, scuba diving, and more, this smoke-free houseboat lets you experience it all. The City of Wine is within an easy 8-minute walk and Cap Sciences is also a quick 12-minute walk away, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Bordeaux by hopping on a metro at either Rue Achard Tram Station, a short 7-minute walk away, or Bassins A Flot Tram Station, 11 minutes away. Relax in the garden (enjoy the outdoor furniture!) or sip a drink on the deck or patio of this 377-sq-ft houseboat. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, a dining area, and air conditioning. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there is a laundromat nearby so you can pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Appartement 'Voyage Autour Du Monde'
description: Close to sailing, windsurfing, and more, this smoke-free houseboat brings it all within reach. There's convenient onsite parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 7-minute walk to The City of Wine or the 11-minute walk to Cap Sciences. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Bordeaux by hopping on a metro at either Rue Achard Tram Station, a short 7-minute walk away, or Bassins A Flot Tram Station, 10 minutes away. After you return to this 377-sq-ft houseboat, unwind in the garden or sip a drink on the deck or patio, and don't forget about the outdoor furniture. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, a dining area, and air conditioning. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there is a laundromat nearby so you can pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Massena Nice
description: Real Boutique Hotel in Nice with a character and its famous Belle Epoque facade of the early century, the Best Western Plus Hotel Massena Nice welcomes you in a friendly atmosphere. 4 Star hotel with all the comforts in the heart of Nice, the Best Western Plus Hotel Massena Nice is the perfect place to stay in Nice for all shopping enthusiasts. All the fashion and luxury within walking distance from the hotel: Galeries Lafayette, Louis Vuitton, Hermes, Dior, etc. On the services side, the hotel has a private garage with valet service, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, room service in partnership with Brasseries Gioffredo, and more. Many restaurants are also close to the hotel. Recent renovations have been made to provide a better quality of services. The 110 rooms and suites of the Best Western Plus Hotel Massena Nice, fully equipped with new high-end luxury bedding, invite the client to relax between two different activities in the capital city of the French Riviera. On the business side, the hotel has a conference room for up to 45 people. And for Incentives up to 150 delegates for reward travel.bestwestern.com

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Nice
description: Featuring a private beach and free Wi-Fi, Radisson Blu Hotel Nice is situated in Nice and offers modern accommodation. It features panoramic sea views and 4-star rooms. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of Hotel Radisson Blu Nice, including express check-in/check-out, free shuttle service and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. It also has a gym with a swimming pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu are air-conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, an in-room safe and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Hotel, guests can dine at Calade rooftop restaurant and relax with a drink at Lobby Bar 223. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Radisson Nice provides on-site parking for guests with a car. Promenade des Anglais is a short drive away.Revato

name: Novotel Suites Nice Airport
description: 5 mins from the Mediterranean and NICE airport, recharge your batteries at Novotel Suites Nice Airport. Family stays, holidays for 2 or business trips: the 4-star hotel welcomes you to comfortable suites, convertible to work spaces for business meetings. Enjoy a gourmet break in our boutique in a friendly setting or in your room. Relax by the pool or stroll Promenade des Anglais.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas
description: 4star property opened in 2021 near Nice International Airport The Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas enjoys a strategic location in Nice close to Nice International Airport, one tramway stop to the hotel (free of charge). It can also drop you off to the historic city center in 15 minutes, so you can enjoy visiting museums, Belle Epoque buildings, or relaxing at the beach on the famous Promenade des Anglais. The magnificent 129 rooms and suites in pearly and blue tones will meet all your needs for space and comfort, in a carefully decorated setting, made with very high end materials. If you are travelling by car, you will appreciate the secure underground public parking (at extra cost). The Crowne Plaza Nice Grand Arenas is the perfect starting point to explore the region, its sand and pebble seasides, its famous hilltop villages, the mountains of the Mercantour Valley. Monte-Carlo and Cannes are less than 30 minutes drive, Saint Tropez less than one hour. If you prefer experience the hotel, you will be delighted with a cocktail signature or a inventive meal at the bistronomic BALM restaurant, on its quiet shaded terrace, or you will charge your batteries in the topfloor fitness center with sauna. Definitely a world-class hotel!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Holiday Inn Nice
description: Sophisticated hotel in central Nice with free WiFi and a trendy trattoria Holiday Inn Nice hotel is located in the heart of the city close to the train station and just a seven minute walk from the beach. There is a handy bus stop route 38 next to the hotel, and Jean Médecin tram stop (T1) is just a short walk from the front door. Gambetta.France Bus Station is within walking distance, and it is a 15-minute drive to Nice Cote d'Azur Airport (NCE). The tramway works are over! You can now catch the tram T2 at the airport and join the hotel directly in 20 minutes and for 1.50 euros only The hotel has 3 naturally lit meeting rooms and the Palais des Congres et des Expositions convention centre is a 10 minute drive away. Take in the Mediterranean view as you stroll along the elegant Promenade des Anglais spend a leisurely afternoon on the beach or explore the city s luxury boutiques. Art lovers can marvel at the famous paintings in the Musee Matisse and Musee Marc Chagall or explore the exciting contemporary art scene at Musee d art Moderne et d art Contemporain. In this hotel you can enjoy Free WiFi A 24 hour Business Centre A mini gym Elegantly styled rooms and suites offer pillow menus for a good night s sleep. Sip a chilled aperitif on the terrace and enjoy Italian cuisine paired with fine Italian wines at the trattoria Miamici. Traveling with family? You'll be happy to know that kids stay and eat freeIHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Apollinaire Nice
description: Ideally located in the center of Nice, a few steps from Avenue Jean Medecin and close to Old Nice, its alleys and the Promenade des Anglais, the Hotel Apollinaire Nice welcomes you with its 95 fully renovated rooms and suites. All rooms are equipped with reversible air conditioning, bathroom with shower or bath, hairdryer, minibar, safe, coffee machine, wardrobe with wardrobe and shelves, free Wi-Fi, 43-inch flat screen TV with Chromecast, plugs USB/USB-C. On the ground floor, guests will have access to the bar and patio, allowing them to rest in peace before setting out to explore Nice, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The breakfast room is also on the ground floor with two buffets (hot/cold, drinks/pastries) and an outdoor terrace allowing you to enjoy the rays of the morning sun. A fitness area and a well-being area (with a hammam, experience shower and rest area) will also be available to customers in a building overlooking the patio.bestwestern.com

name: Westminster Hotel & Spa Nice
description: Situated in the heart of Nice, on the Promenade des Anglais, Westminster Hotel & Spa features a spa and seafront terrace. The hotel is decorated in a Belle Epoque style and offers both a bar and luxury lounge areas. High-speed wired internet access and free WiFi are provided. There is also a fitness centre that guests can use free of charge. Guest rooms offer contemporary décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free access to satellite channels and videos on demand. There is also a desk, a telephone with a direct line and voice mail, and an electronic lock and a safe. The air conditioning and heating systems are individually regulated in each room. Private bathrooms are marble or design concept and are equipped with a bath or shower, hairdryer and welcome products. A minibar is available and is at an extra charge. Restaurant Le Duc serves Mediterranean specialties which can be enjoyed on the hotel’s terrace, overlooking the Promenade des Anglais and the sea. A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken in the guestroom or on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink in Bar Le W, which also offers a terrace. Seven meeting and reception rooms are available at Hôtel Westminster. The SPA 27 offers a 400 m² a relaxation area with a sauna, steam bath, hot tub and counter-current swimming pool. There are 3 beauty treatment rooms, and guests can enjoy herbal tea or a fresh drink. The hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and only 14 minutes' walk from Nice-Ville train station.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Nice - Grand Arenas, An IHG Hotel
description: New hotel near Nice International Airport The brand new Holiday Inn Express Nice - Grand Arenas, first opened in February 2021, is designed for any discerning traveler. Its 131 modern and comfortable rooms, in soft colored tones and perfectly equipped with the latest technologies will make you feel great, with no frills but everything you need. If you are travelling by car, you will appreciate the secured underground parking. The Holiday Inn Express Nice Grand - Arenas is the perfect starting point to explore the region, its sand and pebble seasides, its museums & famous hilltop villages, its mountains of the Mercantour Valley, Monaco, Cannes. Definitively the best value for money.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Goldstar Suites Nice
description: No description found

name: Hôtel du Petit Palais
description: Located in Nice, Hotel Le Petit Palais welcomes you in a green and elegant historic district. Le Petit Palais features 25 air-conditioned rooms with a refined decor. Each is fitted with modern equipment and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms rooms offer views of the sea or of Nice Old Town. The hotel is 10 minutes' walk from the Chagall Museum and close to the Matisse Museum and the Roman archaeological site. During your stay, enjoy the many attractions of Nice. You can go to the beach and shop in the city centre.

name: Hotel La Villa Nice Victor Hugo
description: Ideally located on Victor Hugo Boulevard, Hotel La Villa Nice Victor Hugo is right in the centre of Nice, a 15-minute walk from Vieux Nice District. It offers contemporary guest rooms decorated in white and grey tones, elegant lounges and a bar, which opens 24 hours a day. Near the sea, the pedestrian and shopping areas, the old town, the restaurants and cafés, the hotel enjoys a perfect location for both business and leisure travellers. Hotel La Villa Nice Victor Hugo offers free WiFi and is within walking distance from the Promenade des Anglais. Public parking is available nearby. Nice Train Station is a 10-minute walk away, while Nice-Côte-d'Azur Airport is located 8 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Nice Cosy Hotel
description: Refined designs in a unique position in the center of Nice, the Best Western Plus® Nicy Cosy Hotel will offer you quality services, a personalized welcome in an ambient scented environment which completes an unforgettable guest experience. This charming hotel is located two minutes walk from the train station, the cruise departures and the tramway, The Avenue Jean Medecin with its mall and a variety of restaurant is just around the corner. This ideal location allows guests to quickly access all the landmarks of the city, such as the famous "Promenade des Anglais" and beaches, The Old Town and the famous "Cours Saleya", the casinos or the convention center and by train the sights of the Riviera (Cannes, Monte Carlo, Antibes, the Italian Riviera.). Our warm welcome and the quality of our services will ensure your well-being in one of our 41 modern and comfortable rooms which will ensure the success of your stay, for business or pleasure. At your disposal: two seminar rooms, a business center and a monitored and closed car park with negotiated rates. The Best Western Plus® Nicy Cosy Hotel is an ideal place to enjoy the pleasures of the Cote d'Azur as well as the many entertainments it offers.bestwestern.com

name: Sheraton Nice Airport
description: The superb location of the Sheraton Nice Airport hotel makes it the natural hub between the airport, Nice city center and the beach. Enjoy your stay in our fully soundproofed designer rooms and suites offering all the modern comforts. Let yourself be tempted by the originality of our restaurant menu and appreciate the quiet tranquility of its garden. Enjoy a moment of relaxation and calm beside the rooftop pool whilst having a snack and a cocktail, or whilst gazing out across the unique and amazingly serene view of the airfield with the Mediterranean Sea sparkling in the background. Complete your day with a great workout at our fitness center followed by some evening bites at our Club Lounge. The Sheraton Nice Airport offers 7 state-of-the-art meeting rooms to host your conference, wedding or social events with easy, convenient and quick connections direct to Nice city center just a few minutes away. Sheraton Nice Airport, your perfect combination for business and leisure.Marriott

name: B&B HOTEL Nice Aéroport Arenas
description: No description found

name: Hotel Saint Gothard
description: Hotel Saint Gothard is located in central Nice, a 10-minute drive from Nice-Côte d'Azur Airport. It offers modern guest rooms, and free WiFi access throughout the property. Each of the soundproofed rooms at the Saint Gothard features a private bathroom and air conditioning. All rooms are equipped with a television and an alarm clock. A continental breakfast is served every morning, and there are vending machines at reception. Hotel Saint Gothard is situated only 800 metres from the famous Promenade des Anglais and the beach. There is public parking available nearby, and the hotel is located just 650 metres from Nice Train Station.

name: Okko Hotels Nice Aéroport
description: OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Nice. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a business centre and free WiFi. The hotel has a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Plage de la Lanterne is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Plage du Carras is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 2 km from OKKO Hotels Nice Aéroport.

name: Hôtel Vacances Bleues Le Royal
description: Hôtel Le Royal Promenade des Anglais is located on the famous Promenade des Anglais. Nice Airport is just 5.2 km away, while Nice Old Town is only a 2-minute drive. The property is set in a historic building and offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace bar overlooking the sea. Each classically decorated and spacious room is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet is served daily and the restaurant at Hôtel Le Royal Promenade des Anglais serves traditional and regional French cuisine. Meals can be enjoyed on one of the hotel's terraces. Free WiFi, discounted taxi rates, tickets and excursions are proposed at the 24-hour reception.

name: Palm Hotel Nice
description: Palm Hôtel Nice is located in Nice, in the Nice City Centre district. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a rum bar. The property is 400 metres from Avenue Jean Medecin. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The rooms will provide guests with a private bathroom. Some rooms have a large terraces. Place Massena is 500 m from Palm Hôtel Nice.

name: Kyriad Nice - Stade
description: Kyriad Nice - Stade is situated in Nice Saint Isidore, 11.5 km from the Promenade des Anglais and 10 minutes' walk from Allianz Riviera Stadium.
