Free WiFi is available and Saint-Laurent-du-Var is 9 km away. Guestrooms at Kyriad Nice - Stade are decorated in a contemporary style and have a private bathroom and satellite TV. Every morning a breakfast buffet is served. The restaurant offers a traditional menu and there is a terrace area. The hotel reception is open 24/7 and provides newspapers. Activities and sights nearby include water sports, horse-riding and golf. The hotel is 4 minutes' drive from a commercial centre and a 13-room cinema complex and 7 minutes' drive from Palais Nikaia Concert Hall. Kyriad hotel is just 6.2 km from Nice airport and "Train des Pignes" Train Station is 450 metres away, which provides direct access to Nice city centre. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice
description: Located in Nice's City Centre, Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice is a 4-star hotel just 600 metres from the Promenade des Anglais. The seasonal rooftop swimming pool and hot tub offer panoramic mountain and city views. The spa features a hammam and guests also have free access to the fitness centre and the sauna. The air-conditioned, non-smoking guest rooms and suites are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms include free WiFi access. Most rooms feature a balcony and some have a spa bath. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks in the bar. A buffet breakfast is also served every morning. With private parking on site for an additional charge, the hotel is just 7 km from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. Casino Ruhl is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Le Grimaldi by Happyculture
description: Located in the heart of Nice, Le Grimaldi is a 15-minute walk from Cours Saleya Flower Market and 450 metres from the beach and the Promenade des Anglais. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Each room is individually decorated and equipped with satellite TV and private bathroom. A fresh continental breakfast buffet is available daily and can be enjoyed onsite. In the afternoon Nespresso coffee and tea are available or you can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. The lively area offers many restaurants and shops. Le Grimaldi is 750 metres from the Nice-Ville Train Station and a 15-minute walk to Vieux Nice. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 7 km away. Public parking is available just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Paganini
description: Situated in the centre of Nice, Hotel Paganini is a 3-star hotel, located just 1 km from the Russian Orthodox Cathedral and the Promenade du Paillon. For guests who enjoy art the MAMAC is only 1.6 km from the property. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms at Hotel Paganini have air conditioning and a desk. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property. Speaking Arabic, English, French and Italian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Allianz Riviera Stadium is 12 km from Hotel Paganini, while Massena Square is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Great and light private room in the heart of Nice
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a detached shared bathroom, as well as laundry facilities and towels. Other amenities include a dining area, a desk, luggage storage, and guidebooks and/or recommendations.Expedia

name: Maison Durante
description: Maison Durante is situated in the centre of Nice, Maison Durante offers 3-star accommodation close to Plage Lido and Plage du Ruhl. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Maison Durante every room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Maison Durante offers a sun terrace. Speaking English, French, Italian and Dutch, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Plage Sporting, Avenue Jean Medecin and Russian Orthodox Cathedral. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur, 9 km from Maison Durante and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Monaco is accessible by train within 20 minutes. There is also a bus stop just 150 metres from the property with a direct line to Nice Côte d'Azur Airport. Nice-Ville Train Station is just 170 metres from the hotel. Promenade des Anglais is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Campanile Nice Airport
description: Located on the Promenade des Anglais, this low-cost hotel is opposite Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. It has a 24-hour reception, 3 fully equipped meeting rooms and rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Each air conditioned guest room is equipped with a courtesy tray, an LCD TV and a telephone. All of the modern rooms have a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at hotel Campanile. The hotel restaurant is open 7/7 and serves a buffet for lunch and dinner and à la carte food. Food and drinks are available all day long at the restaurant and snacks can also be bought on site. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Children menus are also available. Campanile Nice Aéroport is just 5.5 km from Nice City Centre, and a bus stop is just 50 metres away.

name: Hotel Boreal
description: This 3-star hotel is situated in the heart of Nice, in a pedestrian area just in front of Nice Etoile shopping center. The Promenade des Anglais and the beach are a 10-minute walk away. Featuring free WiFi, all rooms at the Hotel Boréal Nice offer a flat-screen TV with satellite and international channels. Each has a view of the street or the inner courtyard and a private bathroom.The lobby features exposed stone and arches. Breakfast including hot and cold drinks, pastries and savory options can be served in the Provencal-style breakfast room or on the terrace. In the evening, the lounge bar or the terrace provide a nice spot to relax and try one of the drinks on offer. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. The old town and its flower market are a 12-minute walk away. Nice Cote d’Azur airport can be reached by car in 10 minutes or the train station is 800 metres away. There is a tram station in front of the hotel.

name: Hôtel Monsigny
description: Set in the Gare de Provence, Nord district, in the centre of Nice, Hôtel Monsigny features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a restaurant, a sun terrace and city views. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Every room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and all are equipped with a marble bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel is a 7-minute walk from Nice-Ville Train Station. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: The Jay Hotel by HappyCulture
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel Journel Saint-Laurent-du-Var
description: A prime location in the city center of Saint-Laurent-du-Var the Best Western Hotel Journel Saint-Laurent-du-Var, opening in February 2018, is ideally situated, with easy access to the city center with its own car park. Its privileged location, next to a future pedestrian area, allows you to serenely enjoy the many shops, bars and restaurants of the area. Its terrace, which celebrates Mediterranean plants, is a haven of greenery where you will feel far from the city while staying in the heart of its animation and close to its road, rail and air access. Our hotel is an ideal location for a business trip, shopping or a few days’ vacation in Saint-Laurent-du-Var. Comfort and elegance: your new 3 Star address on the French Riviera. Our Art Deco hotel offers 3 Star services at competitive rates. It welcomes you in full equipped rooms and offers a wide range of services including a reception desk with concierge service, bar, green courtyard, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, pay parking with direct access to the hotel, etc. Whether for a professional solo trip, a getaway for two or a family stay, the 38 rooms and studios of the Best Western Hotel Journel Saint-Laurent-du-Var can meet all your desires. Very comfortable, they invite you to relax after a day of work, beach, shopping or sightseeing under the sun of the Cote d'Azur.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel les Cigales
description: Located just 300 metres from the Promenade des Anglais and featuring a shaded terrace, Hôtel les Cigales is set in a renovated period building in Nice’s city centre. Free WiFi is provided. The air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathrooms come with a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. All of the rooms have a Provencal décor and are accessible by a lift. At Hôtel les Cigales, guests can enjoy a continental breakfast served every morning in the bright dining room. Nice-Ville Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Casinos are 600 metres away. Tramway station "Alsace Lorraine" is located 500 meters away. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Villa Mon Rêve
description: No description found

name: Esatitude Hotel
description: The Esatitude is located 200 metres from Virgile Barel Tramway station, which provides access to central Nice. It offers rooms and suites, each with a private furnished terrace and free Wi-Fi. Guest rooms at Hotel Esatitude are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They have contemporary décor and a private bathroom. The Esatitude’s restaurant, Le 03, is open weekdays for lunch and serves traditional cuisine and regional dishes. Guests can enjoy their meal on the outdoor terrace. The Esatitude Hotel provides a 24-hour reception where staff can offer local tourist information. It is just a short walk from the Cimiez neighbourhood, which includes the Henri Matisse Museum and the Cemenelum Ruins.

name: Hotel Du Centre, Un Hotel Ammi
description: Located next to Jean-Médecin, the main shopping street in Nice, Hôtel Du Centre, un hôtel AMMI is just a 5-minute walk from Nice-Ville Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from both the Promenade des Anglais and the beach. The guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV, telephone, refrigerator and wardrobe. All rooms have a private bathroom including a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. A healthy breakfast is served every morning in our café, the "Hug Café". You can enjoy it inside,on the nice terrace outside, or in the room. In the café you can take lunch, too The hotel is located in front of Notre-Dame Basilica and is a 10-minute walk from Place Massena. Paid public parking is available 100 metres away, which as a guest can be enjoyed at a discounted rate.

name: Anantara Plaza Nice Hotel
description: The Anantara Plaza Nice Hotel is situated in the heart of upmarket Nice. Due to the hotel’s location, you’ll find it easy to spend your days exploring the beautiful Place Masséna and the world-famous Promenade des Anglais. Luxury shops are right at the hotel’s doorstep and you can even walk to hundreds of bars and restaurants in less than two minutes. The hotel’s 151 rooms and suites have all been newly-redesigned and decorated in a contemporary style. In your room, you’ll experience luxury and uniqueness as part of a cozy and warm design. Most of the rooms come with either a garden or a sea view and the majority have either a balcony or a terrace.There’s a panoramic restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating areas, as well as a vast bar for relaxing drinks. A 24-hour room service option is also available if you prefer to quietly unwind in the room.NH Hoteles

name: Novotel Nice Centre Vieux-Nice
address: 8-10 Esplanade Du Parvis De L'Europe, 06300 Nice
description: Novotel Nice Centre Vieux Nice guarantees relaxing moments on your business/family stay on the French Riviera thanks to its rooftop with pool and 360° view of the old town, the sea and the hills. Enjoy our chef's Niçoise flavors on the garden terrace and a glass under the moonlight! With 5 sunlit meeting rooms, our hotel in Nice also offers fiber to stay connected. A question? Our top team will help!accorhotels.com

name: Villa Saint Exupery Beach Hostel
description: Villa Saint Exupéry Beach Hostel is in central Nice, just 200 metres from Nice's Old Town and the beaches. Free facilities available include WiFi access, a fitness centre, lockers, luggage storage. This hostel offers air-conditioned private rooms and dormitories for all ages with private bathrooms. Meals are available in the restaurant for an additional charge. The hostel also offers a bar, where guests can enjoy happy hour from 18:00. Many bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk. Guests also have access to a TV lounge with home cinema features and there is a 24-hour reception. There is secure key access to the hostel 24/7. Additional facilities include currency exchange. Staff can provide local tourist and travel information and a free walking tour of the Old Town. Galeries Lafayette department store is situated opposite the hostel. The property is 100 metres from Place Massena Tram Stop and 1 km from Nice-Ville Train Station. Nice Airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Hôtel Esprit d'Azur
description: This hotel is set in central Nice, just 50 metres from Acropolis Exhibition Centre and a 5-minute walk from the Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms with Wi-Fi access and an on-site bar. Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels are included in all of the rooms. Each room is fitted with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet-style breakfast, including fresh juice and ground coffee, is served every morning in the breakfast area at Hotel Esprit d’Azur. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service. The Promenade des Anglais is 2 km from the hotel and Nice-Ville Train Station is 2.1 km away. Nice Côte d’Azur Airport is a 14-minute drive away.

name: Servotel Saint-Vincent
description: Located in Nice Saint Isidore, the Servotel Saint-Vincent features an outdoor pool with a furnished sun terrace. The hotel is 12 km from Promenade des Anglais and the beaches of Saint-Laurent-du-Var. Allianz Riviera Football Stadium is 750 metres away. Palais Nikaia Concert Hall is a 5-minute drive from the property. Servotel Saint-Vincent offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with modern décor and a balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar with 1 free soft drink, and a private bathroom. It is recommended that guests have a car while staying at the hotel. A buffet breakfast and innovative cuisine inspired by the regional specialities are prepared at the Le Joseph restaurant. Meals are served in the classy dining area or on the covered terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Groceries, bars and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk and the hotel is located a 3-minute drive from a commercial centre and a 13-room cinema complex. The hotel is close to the A8 motorway and 10 minutes from Nice Airport, located on the roads leading into Southern Alps ski stations and Mercantour National Park. The "Train des Pignes" Train Station is 500 metres away and goes to Nice city centre. the ST ISIDORE streetcar stop is 200m from the hotel, connecting the airport and the center of Nice Free WiFi access is provided and free private parking is available on site. The restaurant is closed from Friday evening until Sunday evening included and bank holiday, subject to an exceptional opening. Our bathing property "Le Temps d'unété" is located on the Promenade des Anglais 12km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Villa Victorine
description: Hotel Villa Victorine is a family-run hotel located in Nice, just 2 km from Nice Côte d’Azur Airport and within 150 metres from the beach, The Promenade des Anglais and Ferber Park. The hotel offers free WiFi internet access, a garden and a shaded terrace, and is a 10-minute drive from Allianz Riviera Stadium, Polygon Riviera and Nikaia Concert Hall. The air-conditioned guest rooms at Hotel Villa Victorine include satellite TV, a work desk and a wardrobe. They each feature a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. A buffet breakfast with pastries, eggs, fruit and cheese is prepared daily, and can be enjoyed on the terrace on sunny mornings. Evening meals can be served upon prior reservation. Shops and restaurants are found within 1 km of the property. Saint-Augustin Train Station is 1 km away, and bus stops Emile Roux and Californie are within a 2-minute walk of the property. Nice’s Old Town is 5 km away and Cathedral and Phoenix Park is 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Le Negresco
description: Hotel Le Negresco, overlooks the beach and the Promenade des Anglais in Nice. Free Wifi access is provided and there is an on-site fitness centre. Each room and suite is decorated individually with period furniture and features air conditioning. Rooms are also equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A fresh buffet breakfast is served each morning in La Rotonde restaurant. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed in the British-style bar, and gourmet meals are served at the Michelin star Le Chantecler restaurant. Hotel Le Negresco's guests can benefit from access to a private beach area, at an extra cost. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nice’s Old Town and Nice-Ville Train Station. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is just 5 km from the hotel. A private limousine shuttle service is available for guests for a surcharge upon request. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Le Saint Paul
description: Overlooking the sea in Nice, just 30 metres from the beach, Hotel Le Saint Paul features a large garden and an adjoining chapel. It is 50 metres from Nice Port, which has ferries going directly to Corsica. Nice's Old Town is 2 km away. Free WiFi is offered. The rooms at Hotel Le Saint Paul feature views of the courtyard or the sea. Decorated in neutral tones, each room has a flat-screen TV with TNT channels. The Deluxe Rooms have an electric kettle. The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace, which boasts panoramic sea views. There is also an on-site restaurant, which serves a range of Mediterranean-style dishes. Free private parking is locked at night for additional safety. Monaco is 18 km away and the Italian markets in Ventimiglia are just a 30-minute drive away.

name: Nice Home - Studios Lido
description: Nice Home offers air-conditioned accommodation in behind the Negresco Hotel in Nice, a 1-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais and the nearest beach. Free WiFi is provided in each studio. All studios include a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, fitted with a microwave and fridge. A stovetop and Nespresso coffee machine are also available. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in every unit. Bed linen and towels are included in the price. Allianz Riviera Stadium is 5 km from Nice Home, while Nice Old Town is a 15-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 6.5 km from the property.

name: Hotel Oasis
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Nice. It is ideally positioned for guests wanting to discover the area's attractions. This cosy hotel features a range of amenities, such as a safe, a garden and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Rooms at Hotel Oasis Nice provide a flat-screen television, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Centre Ville-Gare, which is within a five-minute walk of the hotel. Hôtel Oasis serves breakfast each morning, and guests are welcome to relax with a drink in the lounge bar. A choice of dining options are also found in the area. Hôtel Oasis is close to Nice-Ville Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Nice and its surrounding areas. The local neighbourhood is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Résidence Akantha
address: 2 -ème étage porte face a l ascenseur 16 Rue Halévy, 06000 Nice
description: Résidence Akantha features accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Nice, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a stovetop. Some units have a seating area and/or a terrace. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Plage du Ruhl, Plage du Centenaire and Plage Lido. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 10 km from Résidence Akantha.

name: Windsor Hotel
description: This hotel is set in a 19th-century building in central Nice and features a tropical garden with a swimming pool. The hotel’s fitness and wellness centre offers a hammam, a sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has been uniquely designed and decorated by an artist. Rooms are equipped with free WiFi, a satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. The larger rooms have a balcony or a spa bath. Hotel Windsor offers a menu of traditional meals made from organic ingredients. In the morning a buffet breakfast is served in the dining area or in the garden. Guests can enjoy a drink at the lounge bar, and during the winter are able to relax near the fireplace. Hotel Windsor is 500 metres from the beach and the Promenade des Anglais, and 950 metres from the Old Town of Nice. Gare de Nice-Ville Train Station is 800 metres away. Limited parking spaces are available upon request and for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Locarno
description: Just 80 metres from the Promenade des Anglais, Locarno is a 20-minute walk from the centre of Nice’s historic quarter. It offers 24-hour reception with free WiFi available throughout. The air-conditioned rooms have a TV and telephone and are soundproofed. Each room has a private bathroom with bathtub or shower. Some of the rooms have individual balconies. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel's dining room or a continental breakfast can be served directly to guests’ rooms. Locarno is only a 15-minute walk from the Nice SNCF Train and Bus Station. Monaco is 23 km away.

name: Le Riviera Collection, BW Signature Collection
description: The Le Riviera Collection, BW Signature Collection, will open in June 2021. Full renovation has been conducted in the hotel & we are delighted to introduce our new Boutique Hotel in Nice city center. With its perfect location in a quiet & peaceful area, the hotel will offer guests an ideal situation to enjoy Nice & its different points of interest. The authentic Art Deco style of the hotel brings a strong & elegant identity which makes it unique & magnificent. We look forward to welcoming our guests again, for short and long stays. See you soon in sunny & Bella Nice!bestwestern.com

name: Villa la Tour
description: Offering a restaurant and free WiFi throughout, Hotel Villa La Tour is located in Nice’s Old Town. Housed in a former convent dating back from the 18th century, this hotel is 600 metres from Promenade des Anglais and the beach, and a 2-minute walk from Cathedrale Vieille Ville Tram Stop. Each room is individually decorated and features a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Some of them have a balcony and others offer city views. The en-suite bathrooms come with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The Junior Suite offers a separate seating area with a sofa, opening onto the bedroom. A daily breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace or in the dining room. The property's restaurant "VLT" offers home-made meals, and guests can choose to book the half-board option. There is also an on-site bar and additional restaurants and bars can be found in the surroundings. Hotel Villa La Tour offers a shared lounge and meeting facilities. The hotel is 1.5 km from Nice-Ville Train Station and 500 metres from Cours Saleya. Monaco is a 30-minute drive away and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 10 km away. The property is a 7-minute walk from the port and 1.5 km from the ferry departure to Corsica.

name: Hotel du Pin Nice Port
address: 6 Rue Emmanuel Philibert, Place Du Pin, 06300 Nice
description: This hotel sits in central Nice, just 350 metres from the ferry port and a 20-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais. Its rooms are air-conditioned with free Wi-Fi access. The guest rooms at the Hotel du Pin Nice Port are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Each is serviced by a lift. The Hotel du Pin Nice Port has a 24-hour reception, which is hosted by a multilingual team. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning. In the heart of the Provence-Alpes-Côte-d'Azur region, the Hotel du Pin Nice Port is just a 10-minute drive from Villefranche-sur-Mer and 9 km from Saint-Jean Cap-Ferrat. Antibes is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Best Western Lakmi Nice
description: The Best Western Lakmi Nice is a charming 3-star hotel in the heart of Nice. It welcomes you all year round to one of the most beautiful regions in France, the French Riviera. This elegant hotel with its façade 'Belle epoque', lies near the main attractions, tourist sites, business centres and public transport network in Nice. All the rooms are soundproofed, equipped with air-conditioning, TV LCD, WIFI, telephone and privat bathroom with hairdryer. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: L'Abeille Boutique Apartments
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Nice Excelsior
description: This boutique hotel is located in the heart of the musician’s quarter of Nice, 950 metres from the famous Promenade des Anglais. Nice Excelsior Centre Ville offers a 24-hour reception, free WiFi and a quiet garden with summer bar. Guests can also enjoy the cosy reception area with a large selection of travel books. A breakfast of fresh products and hot or cold drinks can be served to the guest rooms or in the breakfast lounge as a buffet. The decor of each room is inspired by travel and the French Riviera, with travel trunks, drawings and rich colours. Each room features a flat-screen TV with multilingual channels, air conditioning, and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Nice-Ville Train Station is 150 metres from the hotel and the central shopping street, Avenue Jean Médecin, is a 3-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel La Fiancée du Pirate
address: 8, boulevard de la Corne d'Or, 06230 Villefranche-sur-Mer, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located between Nice and Monaco, Hotel La Fiancée du Pirate overlooks the Villefranche Sur Mer bay and is opposite Saint Jean Cap Ferrat peninsula. It offers a panoramic sea view. Rooms are comfortable, with queen or king-size beds. Some rooms enjoy a sea view while others have a terrace or garden. A buffet breakfast is served daily on the terrace facing the sea. Guests can relax by the hotel swimming pool where sun lounges and towels are offered. The Hôtel La Fiancée du Pirate is an ideal base for exploring the nearby coastal towns of the French Riviera including Eze, St Paul de Vence, Nice, Antibes and Juan les Pins.

name: Residhome Nice Promenade
description: No description found

name: ibis Nice Aéroport Promenade des Anglais
description: The ibis Nice Aéroport Promenade hotel is ideally located on the Promenade des Anglais, 0.6 miles (1 km) from Nice Côte d'Azur International Airport and 656 yards (600 m) from the beaches of the Baie des Anges. The hotel boasts a strategic location at the crossroads of the major road and rail routes serving the main attractions on the Côte d'Azur, from Cannes to Monaco.accorhotels.com

name: Aparthotel Ammi Vieux Nice
description: Aparthotel AMMI Vieux Nice has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Nice, 600 metres from Plage Ponchettes, 600 metres from Plage Castel and 700 metres from Plage Opera. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Aparthotel AMMI Vieux Nice include Plage Lido, Plage Blue Beach and Bains Militaires Beach. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Nice
address: 59 Promenade des Anglais, Entrée Rue Honorée Sauvan, 06000 Nice
description: Slow your pace and feel the dazzling vibe of the French Riviera at the AC Hotel Nice. Our 4-Star family-friendly hotel is ideally located a few steps away from the iconic Promenade des Anglais, the beautiful beaches, the city’s old town and most famous attractions. Elegance, sophistication and convivial spirit will guarantee a memorable guest experience. At the AC Hotel Nice, you will unwind in our modern rooms with sleek furnishings, specially crafted for maximum comfort and function. Discover the incredible 600 square meter rooftop, entirely landscaped, with its pool perched on the 8th floor, offering amazing views of Nice! On the horizon, the turquoise water of the “Grande Bleue” glistens. From sunrise to sunset, laze in the shade of an umbrella, enjoy exquisitely prepared tapas for a relaxing lunch in the sun, or raise a toast with a Sparkling Sangria. During the hot hours of the day, there’s nothing better than diving into the refreshing pool, with a fresh lemonade waiting at your table!Marriott

name: Villa Angelus
description: Situated in Nice, within 500 metres of Plage Fabron and 500 metres of Plage Lenval, Villa Angelus features accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 800 metres from Plage Magnan, 2.4 km from Plage Blue Beach and 2.7 km from Plage Lido. The rooms are fitted with a terrace with garden views. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchen fitted with a stovetop. At the guest house rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Villa Angelus offers a solarium. Russian Orthodox Cathedral is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Nice-Ville Train Station is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 8 km from Villa Angelus.

name: Le Panoramic Boutique Hotel
description: Le Panoramic Boutique Hôtel is situated in Nice, a 10-minute drive from the Promenade des Anglais. This 19th-century villa offers en-suite guestrooms with free Wifi access. The rooms have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Most rooms have a view on the city or the sea, and a terrace or a balcony. The hotel features a panoramic restaurant overlooking the city and the sea that serves modern French cuisine. Dinners are prepared with local fresh produce from the market. Dinner reservations must be made in advance. Continental and American breakfasts are served everyday Saint-Jean-d'Angely Université tram stop is a 20-minute walk away down the hill from Le Panoramic Boutique Hôtel. 2 bus stops can be found within a 2-minute walk of the hotel. It is a 5-minute drive from Nice-Riquier train station, Acropolis congress centre, and Nice harbour. Private parking is available 400 metres away from the hotel upon reservation, and public parking is possible nearby.

name: Hotel de France
description: Renovated in 2019, Hôtel de France, un hôtel AMMI is situated in the heart of Nice in the Carré d'Or district, 100 metres from the Promenade des Anglais, just 2 minutes' walk from the prestigious Negresco hotel and 1 km from Place Massena. Free WiFi is available throughout. The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a mini fridge, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, flat-screen TV, soundproofing and private bathroom with shower. Breakfast is available for an extra charge and can be enjoyed on the terrace or in the lounge. Nice-Ville Train Station is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 20 minutes away by shuttle bus. Public parking with discounted rates is available 100 metres away.

name: Ibis Nice Centre Gare
description: The ibis Nice Centre Gare hotel is a stone's throw from the train station, 3.1 miles (5 km) from the airport and 330 yards (300 m) from Avenue Jean Médecin. The ibis Nice Centre Gare hotel offers 199 contemporary rooms with air conditioning, 7 of which ar e suitable for people with reduced mobility. The hotel also has an ibis Kitchen Pasta restaurant, a terrace, an outdoor pool, a bar, a 24-hour snack service, and free WIFI Internet access. There is a public paying car park adjacent to the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Brice Garden
description: The Best Western Plus Brice Garden welcomes you right in the heart of the city of Nice. Thanks to its perfect location, you will easily find every attraction within walking distance. Just a few meters from the famous 'Promenade des Anglais', the beaches and the pedestrian streets lined with shops and restaurants. It is also close to the Place Massena, Vieux Nice which is the Old Town and the Nice-Ville Railway Station. The hotel features 59 spacious and comfortable rooms all with air-conditioning, mini-bar, personal safe and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms also have large private balconies where you can relax and enjoy the sunshine of the Cote d'Azur in a unique atmosphere. Whether you are in Nice on business or for leisure, you will appreciate the tranquility of the hotel with its private garden and fountain and its elegant bar where you can relax between visits in the capital of the Cote d'Azur.bestwestern.com

name: Chambre cocooning avec s.de bain prive
address: Les Iris 3 Ter Rue Berlioz, 06000 Nice
description: Located in the city center, this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom property brings all of Nice within your reach. Fans of nature and the outdoors will love being 7 minutes by foot from Blue Beach and 6 minutes by car from Florida Beach. Your feet will make short work of the 5-minute walk to Promenade des Anglais or the 13-minute walk to Place Massena. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Nice by hopping on a metro at either Jean Medecin Tramway Station, a short 13-minute walk away, or Thiers Tramway Station, 13 minutes away. While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including WiFi and a TV, as well as heating and an ironing board. Other amenities include towels, soap, toilet paper, and a hair dryer.VRBO

name: Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Mediterranee
description: Set on the Promenade des Anglais, Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée is an art-deco style hotel featuring an on-site casino, an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Baie des Anges. Free WiFi, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms and suites. Most have a furnished terrace with views of the sea or of the town. Regional cuisine and Mediterranean dishes are served in the hotel's restaurant, Le 3e. You can enjoy drinks in the Lounge Bar Le 3e at Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée. The fitness centre at the Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée has cardio-training gym equipment. Nice Train Station is a 5-minute walk, while Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is just 6 km away. This hotel is eco-certified by Green Globe.

name: Ajoupa Aparthotel Ammi Massena
description: This aparthotel is situated in in Nice, 200 metres from Place Masséna, and only a 3-minute walk from the beach and the famous Promenade des Anglais. The non-smoking studios and apartments are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They have windows, a fully equipped kitchenette, TV and a private bathroom. Guests have WiFi access in the studio free of charge. Bed linen, towels and weekly cleaning are included. A Breakfast buffet is available every morning. Just 500 metres from the property, guests will find the tramway 2 that runs to the airport. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nice Ville Train Station and the nearest tramway stop is just 100 metres away. The old town is a 5-minute walk from Ajoupa. The nearest public car park is located 100 metres from the property.

name: Hôtel Le G
description: Located in the heart of Nice by Garibaldi Square, Hôtel Le G (ex Le Genève) is located just 500 metres from the Port, Palais des Congrès, Nice's Old Town and the Acropolis Exhibition Centre. Free WiFi is available throughout. The air-conditioned rooms feature modern decoration, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The hotel's restaurant serves breakfast 7 days a week and lunch and dinner 6 days a week. It also provides snacks. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the hotel’s surroundings and on Place Garibaldi. From Garibaldi Tram Station 170 metres away, guests have good connections to the whole town. They can also drive 30 km to visit Monaco. Nice Ville Train Station is 1.9 km away and Nice Côte-d’Azur Airport is 10 km away, directly accessible on tram in 35 minutes.

name: Villa Kilauea B&B
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 4 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring espresso makers and LCD televisions. Your memory foam bed comes with premium bedding. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless Internet access and a picnic area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, multilingual staff, and a library. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Villa Kilauea B&B in Nice, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Promenade des Anglais and Archet Hospital. This bed & breakfast is 4.8 mi (7.7 km) from Allianz Riviera and 6.9 mi (11.2 km) from Place Massena. Dining A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 10 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 5.36 per person, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 5:00 PM Checkin end at 7:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 7 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets allowed Maximum number of pets per room 1 Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions Pets allowed (no fees) General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available No elevators Property is cleaned with disinfectant Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the property Contactless food service / room service is available Food service has been amended for enhanced safety Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Helvetique
address: 47 rue de l'Hôtel des Postes, 06000 Nice
description: This hotel is located in the centre of Nice, just 700 metres from the Promenade des Anglais and the beach. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms and free Wi-Fi internet access. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is featured in each of the guest rooms. All rooms at Hotel Helvétique include work desks and en suite bathrooms with hairdryers and toiletries. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel provides ironing facilities and beach towels free of charge. The Place Masséna is situated just 350 metres from the hotel and the Nice-Ville Train Station is 1.2 km away. The Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is reached by car in 15 minutes.

name: Breakfast at Sophy's
description: Located in the centre of Nice, just 300 metres from Plage Sporting and 300 metres from Plage Blue Beach, Breakfast at Sophy's provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. Housed in a building dating from 1920, the bed and breakfast is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as skiing and cycling. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Plage Lido, Avenue Jean Medecin and Russian Orthodox Cathedral. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 9 km from Breakfast at Sophy's.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Nice Centre
address: 22 Boulevard du General Louis Delfino, 06300 Nice
description: 15 minutes' walk from the beach and close to downtown, the Adagio Nice Centre is the ideal base for your stay on the Côte d'Azur. It has 135 fully furnished and air-conditioned apartments with equipped kitchen for up to 6 people, and 7 adapted PRM 4-person apartments. Help yourself to the gym during your stay! The aparthotel also has private parking (at extra charge).accorhotels.com

name: Appart'City Classic Nice Acropolis
description: Located in Nice, Appart'City Classic Nice Acropolis is a residence just 15 minutes' walk from the Old Town and 20 minutes' walk from Promenade des Anglais. Underground parking is available on site upon reservation. Accessed by a lift, the studios and apartments feature free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchenette with hot plates, a microwave and an electric kettle. Guests can enjoy Appart'City’s buffet breakfast for an additional charge. Breakfast is composed of various breads, including gluten-free bread, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. The residence is a 7-minute drive from the A8 motorway and Nice Acropolis Convention Centre is a 5-minute walk away. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Hotel Cresp
address: 8 Rue Saint François de Paule, 06300 Nice
description: Set in a pedestrian street in the old town, this air-conditioned hotel is located in a 19th-century building, just 100 metres from the Promenade des Anglais. An LCD TV is provided in the guest rooms. Decorated with wooden furnishings, the rooms include a telephone and a bathroom with free toiletries. The kitchenettes have a stove and a fridge, and some of the rooms offer a balcony or a sea view. Some rooms have a private balcony opening onto the courtyard, some others have direct access to a communal terrace with sea view. The rooms are located on the third floor and they can be accessed by an elevator. Nice-Ville Train Station is 1.6 km from Hotel Cresp and public parking is available nearby at an extra cost. Nice Airport is just 6 km away.

name: Résidence Lamartine
description: Résidence Lamartine provides accommodation with free WiFi in Nice city centre, a 5-minute walk away from Nice-Ville Train Station and Jean Médecin Tram Stop. The residence features a TV lounge, and a garden. It is located a 10-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais and the beach. Each of the studios and apartments have been renovated in 2017 and feature a dining area, a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathrooms come with either a bathtub or a walk-in shower and a hairdryer. All rooms are soundproofed. The kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, a hob and a refrigerator. Towels are changed every 3 days. Full cleaning service is provided every 3 days. A number of restaurants and cafes can be found within a 5-minute walk from Résidence Lamartine. Laundry service available for an extra charge. Nice-Côte d’Azur Airport is 7.5 km away from the residence. Private parking is available nearby for 23€/24h.

name: Aparthotel Adagio access Nice Acropolis
description: The Aparthotel Adagio Access Nice Acropolis is located a short walk from the city center and the Acropolis business district. Its 121 air-conditioned, furnished apartments, range from studios to 2-room apartments and are fitted with a kitchen. The Aparthotel also ha s a seasonal rooftop pool. Why not explore Nice, with its full calendar of events, fine architecture and the Promenade des Anglais?accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Saint Georges
description: This hotel is located in central Nice, a 10-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais and the beach and 500 metres from Gare de Nice-Ville SNCF Train station. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms. Each stylish room at the Hotel Saint Georges features views of the garden, free Wi-Fi, satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift. A continental breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. Guests can enjoy a relaxing afternoon drinks in the lounge or in the Hotel Saint Georges’s garden. Surrounded by boutiques and only a 10-minute walk from the old town, which is also accessible by tram with Jean Médecin Tram Stop just 140 metres from the hotel. Notre-Dame de Nice is 200 metres from the Saint Georges.

name: Hotel Danemark
description: Located only 300 metres from the famous Promenade des Anglais and 1.8 km from Nice's Old Town, Hotel Danemark features a garden and a furnished terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a desk. Most rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath or shower. Some rooms have direct terrace access. A continental breakfast including croissants and fresh bread is served at the property, which can be enjoyed outside on the terrace, weather permitting. Activities that can be enjoyed nearby include hiking, cycling and water sports. The Nice Fine Arts Museum is only 20 meters away and Parc Phoenix is 4.1 km from the property. Nice Sophia Antipolis University - Campus Trotabas is a 15-minute walk away. Different buses can be found within a 5-minute walk, offering direct access to Nice-Ville Train Station, Nice Old Town, and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, which is 5.4 km away. Masséna Square is 20 minutes' walk away. Private parking is available on site for a surcharge.

name: Les Pieds dans l'Eau
description: Les Pieds dans l'Eau is an accommodation set in Nice, 600 metres from the beach, 5 km from MAMAC and 7 km from Allianz Riviera Stadium. It is situated 3.7 km from Russian Orthodox Cathedral. It provides free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. The homestay comes with a satellite flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Massena Square and Albert 1st Gardens are 5 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 2.9 km from the property.

name: Room Riviera 4 Aéroport Wifi Climatisation Partagé
address: 54 Boulevard René Cassin, Nice, France, Nice, 06200 Nice
description: Situated in Nice, 1.2 km from Plage du Carras and 1.4 km from Plage Aubry Lecomte, Room Riviera 4 Aéroport Wifi Climatisation Partagé offers air conditioning. The accommodation is 1.1 km from the Plage de la Lanterne and features free WiFithroughout the property. The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. Russian Orthodox Cathedral is 5.5 km from the apartment, while Nice-Ville Train Station is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 1 km from Room Riviera 4 Aéroport Wifi Climatisation Partagé.

name: Chambre privée dans un appartement
address: Bâtiment A 3ème étage 34 Avenue Georges Clemenceau, 06000 Nice
description: Located in the centre of Nice, less than 1 km from Plage Sporting, Chambre privée dans un appartement provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is around 500 metres from Nice-Ville Train Station, 1.6 km from MAMAC and 4.1 km from Cimiez Monastery. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Plage Blue Beach. At the guest house, each room includes a balcony with a city view. At Chambre privée dans un appartement each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plage Lido, Russian Orthodox Cathedral and Avenue Jean Medecin. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 9 km from Chambre privée dans un appartement.

name: Nemea Appart'hôtel Nice Riviera
description: Situated 1.1 km from Plage de la Lanterne, Nemea Appart'hôtel Nice Riviera features accommodation with a rooftop pool, an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna, hot tub and fitness room. Plage du Carras is 1.2 km from Nemea Appart'hôtel Nice Riviera, while Plage Aubry Lecomte is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, a few steps from the accommodation.

name: Ibis Budget Nice Palais Nikaïa
description: On the outskirts of Nice, ibis budget Nice Palais Nikaïa is located in the "zone éco-vallée" 2km from Allianz Riviera and the airport, 4km from downtown, 100m from Palais Nikaïa and the Boulodrome. The economy hotel is rated 2 stars and offers comfort accommodation at the best price with accessible triple, double and twin rooms, free WiFi. Non-smoking. All-you-can-eat buffet breakfast at a great price!accorhotels.com

name: Aparthotel Adagio access Nice Magnan
description: The Aparthotel Adagio Access Nice Magnan enjoys a prime location near the Promenade des Anglais, Baie des Anges and is a must for any type of stay in Nice. A few steps from shopping and restaurants, it offers 61 fully equipped studios and two-room apartments. All have AC and offer a nice living area. The Aparthotel has a undercover car park and an outdoor swimming pool (open from June to mid-September).accorhotels.com

name: ibis Styles Nice Cap 3000
description: Revamped 3* hotel with modern shopping and beach design. Outside Nice and near Autoroute 49, the hotel faces the Cap 3000 Mall, is close to the beach and 10 minutes from the airport. Free parking and garage, airport shuttle, pool, terrace, bar with ready meals, children's area. Perfect for business, leisure, shopping, with connected spaces and nearby activities.accorhotels.com

name: Le Méridien Nice
description: Discover a modern design hotel in Nice and unlock the timeless elegance of the South of France. Offering a chic French Riviera beachfront hotel setting, Le Meridien Nice is the ideal place to unwind, indulge and relax in the alluring Cote d Azur. Located at the iconic, No 1. Promenade des Anglais, just steps away from Nice Old Town, this family friendly hotel invites guests to take in everything the destination has to offer. Be captivated by exhilarating views of the Mediterranean Sea from a selection of the 318 luxury guest rooms, including 15 suites. Reimagined to evoke the glamorous 1960s, each curated space reflects regional and cosmopolitan flair. Delight in local flavours and creative cocktails at Latitude Bar. Head to the rooftop with its panoramic Baie des Anges views, experience elevated dining at La Terrasse or awaken the senses with a dip in the outdoor heated pool.Marriott

name: Hotel Apogia Nice
description: Offering soundproofed, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV, Rooms at Hotel Port Lympia Nice have modern en suite facilities with free toiletries as well as an electric kettle with tea. Mood lighting and a glass desk highlight the contemporary decor. The hotel bar is a pleasant place to relax with a cocktail in the evening. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room (NO RESTAURANT). Private parking on site. The reception is open 24/7. Rooms at Hotel Port Lympia Nice have modern en suite facilities with free toiletries as well as an electric kettle with tea. Hotel Port Lympia Nice is a 7-minute walk from Place Garibaldi and a 5-minute walk from the Acropolis Palais des Congrès. It is just 15 minutes to Nice International Airport by taxi.

name: Hostel Lyonnais
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Nice, Hostel Lyonnais features free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.3 km from Plage Blue Beach, 300 metres from Avenue Jean Medecin and 1.3 km from Russian Orthodox Cathedral. Some units at the property have a balcony with a city view. Selected rooms also boast a kitchenette with a fridge and a stovetop. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Plage du Ruhl, Plage du Centenaire and Plage Lido. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 10 km from Hostel Lyonnais.

name: Parme Etape
description: Set in Nice, 2.8 km from Plage Landsberg, PARME ETAPE features a fitness centre and views of the city. The property is around 2.8 km from Plage des Flots Bleus, 2.8 km from Plage Cousteau and 3.8 km from Allianz Riviera Stadium. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Russian Orthodox Cathedral is 6.9 km from PARME ETAPE, while Nice-Ville Train Station is 7.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Nice
description: The NH Nice hotel provides guests with convenient access to historic Nice and the stylish French Riviera. Old town Nice is only a 15-minute walk away, while business travelers can reach the Acropolis conference center in just 2 minutes. The tram connects guests to the city center and the famous pebble beaches. NH Nice has 152 contemporary rooms with beautiful hardwood floors. Each room has free Wi-Fi, which is also available throughout the hotel. There are superior rooms and junior suites with coffee and tea making facilities. Breakfast will be a great start to your day, with a wide variety of cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries, served along with hot and cold beverages. Dinner can be enjoyed inside at L'Oliveraie or on our rooftop terrace, where can you take in the panoramic views of the city whilst tucking into the French Niçoise cuisine. The rooftop also has a bar, where you can sip on an expertly crafted cocktail, or take a dip and sunbathe at the outdoor pool. Here, we also hold regular barbeques on warm sunny days. To stay fit during your trip, head to the free gym. There are 3 meeting rooms accommodating up to 80 people and our friendly staff can arrange catering and tech support.NH Hoteles

name: Aparthotel Ammi Nice Lafayette
address: 32 Rue De L'Hôtel Des Postes, 06000 Nice
description: Offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Lafayette is located in Nice, 100 metres from Jean Médecin pedestrian street, 250 metres from Promenade du Paillon Park and 500 metres from Nice Old Town. Free WiFi access is available. All air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, tea/coffee making facilities, a safety deposit box and a desk. Some rooms also have a balcony. The private bathroom has a bathtub or shower, toilet and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at an extra charge. A variety of restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the immediate area. Luggage storage is available on site. The hotel’s tour desk can advise guests on local attractions. Nice-Ville Train Station is 1.2 km away and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Boscolo Nice Hôtel & Spa
description: Located in central Nice, this Belle Époque-style hotel features an indoor swimming pool. Guests have free access to the 500m² spa and fitness centre. It also has a billiards hall and is situated under a 10-minute walk from Promenade des Anglais. The hotel is non-smoking throughout. The spacious guest rooms are decorated in shades of white and gold and include air conditioning. They each offer a minibar, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace or, with an extra cost, in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel offers a panoramic rooftop terrace with a heated swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar. The Old Town is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and Nice Train Station is 700 metres away. Boscolo Exedra Nice provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo Nice
description: Hotel Victor Hugo Nice is located on the ground-floor of a 20th-century house with marble staircase, just a 5-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais and the beach, as well as a 10-minute walk from shops and Nice's Old Town. It offers 7 rooms and suites with a private bathroom and a kitchenette. Guests can choose between rooms and studio, all equipped with air-conditioning, a flat screen TV and a clock radio. Rooms feature a balcony and the private bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily and many restaurants are located in the area. Hotel Victor Hugo also provides daily newspapers and free WiFi access. The Victor Hugo is just 750 metres from Nice-Ville Station and 5.9 km from Nice-Côte d’Azur Airport.

name: La Maïoun Guesthouse
description: Offering a terrace and views of the garden, La Maïoun Guesthouse is situated in Nice in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 500 metres from the beach. Each dormitory room offers bunk beds with privacy curtains, a reading light, electrical outlets and a locker. There is access to a shared bathroom and toilet. The mixed dormitory includes a seating area where you can relax. A double room with access to a private external bathroom and shared toilet is also available. Free coffee and tea are provided in the shared living room. Guests have shared access to the kettle, microwave, toaster and refrigerator. The old city is 200 meters from the guesthouse, while the beach is only 5 minutes walking. From the airport it takes 30 minutes by tram (stop at Durandy station and then it's 5 minutes walking) La Maïoun is located in an old protestant temple dating from 1856 (no elevator)

name: Aparthotel Adagio Nice Promenade des Anglais
description: The Adagio Nice Promenade des Anglais offers 73 studios and 2-room apartments, all of which are fully-furnished and have a kitchen and free WIFI. Some apartments have a private terrace with sea views. The Aparthotel is in a perfect location on the legendary Promenade des Anglais, opposite the beaches of the Bay of Angels and 15 minutes' walk from the market in old Nice. Shuttles are available on request from the airport, the train station and the city center.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Aston La Scala
description: Located in the centre of Nice overlooking the Promenade du Paillon, Hotel Aston La Scala features a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool, a bar and panoramic views. It is a 5-minute walk from the Promenade des Anglais, the beach and the Old Town and just 200 metres from the Place Massena. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room features personalised and contemporary decor. They are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony, minibar or views of the Promenade du Paillon and the Old Town. A buffet breakfast and regional cuisine is served at L’Horloge restaurant downstairs or on the terrace in the summer months. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Seven Blue Bar with views of the Mediterranean coastline. Nice-Ville Train Station is an 18-minute walk away and Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 7 km away.

name: Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57
description: Boasting a restaurant, a bar, and a shared lounge, Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57 features accommodation in Nice with free WiFi and sea views. Housed in a building dating from 1980, the boat is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, snorkelling and windsurfing. This 2-bedroom boat will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, a balcony, a seating area and a CD player. Towels and bed linen are offered. Guests at the boat can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast. Speaking German, English, French and Italian, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Guests at Yacht Priape Nice - San can enjoy cycling and fishing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plage Rauba Capeu, Plage Castel and Plage Ponchettes. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur, 7 km from Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aba Luxury B E B Nice
description: ABA LUXURY B E B Nice is located in Nice City Centre, is 800 metres from MAMAC. Located around 6 km from Allianz Riviera Stadium, on Massena Square, the bed and breakfast offers free WiFi. The property is 300 metres from Promenade du Paillon. All guest rooms in ABA LUXURY B E B Nice are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, while certain rooms at ABA LUXURY B E B Nice also have a seating area. At ABA LUXURY B E B Nice all rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests at ABA LUXURY B E B Nice can enjoy a continental or an Italian breakfast. Albert 1st Gardens is 300 metres from ABA LUXURY B E B Nice, while Nice Opéra is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 6 km from ABA LUXURY B E B Nice.

name: Hôtel La Pérouse Nice Baie des Anges - Recently fully renovated
description: The Hotel La Pérouse Nice has completed a full refurbishment program in 2023 and will be brand-new for your 2023 stays. This luxury, 4-star boutique hotel is located high above the Promenade des Anglais nestled into the Colline du Château. It is 250 metres from both Cours Saleya and the harbour, and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace with sea views. A minibar, free Wi-Fi access and wired internet are provided in each air-conditioned room. Some rooms feature a private balcony where guests can enjoy views of the sea and have breakfast. All of the rooms have an Italian marble bathroom and an elegant Mediterranean décor. Enjoy Provencal cuisine on the terrace, in the shade of the lemon trees. A buffet breakfast, including hot and cold dishes, local and organic products is prepared every morning at Hôtel La Pérouse. The 24-hour reception offers a concierge services and a valet service is available from 07:00 to 23:00. Guests can exercise in the on-site fitness centre before enjoying a session in the sauna, hot tub or solarium. Nice Opera House is just an 8-minute walk from the hotel and Nice-Ville Train Station is 2.3 km away. The famous Flower Market and Old Town are a few steps away, while Nice Airport is 7 km away.

name: Nicelidays - Le Berlioz - city central - 7min from beaches
description: Well located in the centre of Nice, Nicelidays - Le Berlioz - city central - 7min from beaches provides free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Popular points of interest nearby include Avenue Jean Medecin, Nice-Ville Train Station and MAMAC. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Plage Sporting. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel each room comes with a private bathroom and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Nicelidays - Le Berlioz - city central - 7min from beaches include Plage Blue Beach, Plage Lido and Russian Orthodox Cathedral. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: New Hotel of Marseille
description: New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port is a design hotel located opposite Pharo Congress Centre, just a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port. It offers a gourmet restaurant and an outdoor pool with a furnished terrace. The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival. Superior rooms and suites have a balcony overlooking the city and also boast a Nespresso coffee machine free of charge. New Hotel of Marseille’s restaurant, serves Provencal cuisine and buffet breakfast that guests can enjoy on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a variety of wines and cocktails in the bar. Room service is available from 12:00 to 23:00 daily. Saint-Charles Train Station is 2.5 km from New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port and Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away. Guests receive preferential rates at a nearby car park.

name: Grand Hotel Beauvau Marseille Vieux Port - MGallery
description: Located in the heart of the Old Port, the Grand Hotel Beauvau invites you to a sunny, exclusive Marseille stopover. In a contemporary ambience, the historic hotel of Marseille has retained its timeless spirit in the style of George Sand and Frédéric Chopin who stayed there. The Grand Hotel Beauvau offers all the facilities for business meetings or to enjoy a relaxing Mediterranean feel.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Marseille - Le Dôme
description: No description found

name: Kyriad Marseille Palais des Congres - Velodrome
description: Located in 1 km from the Orange Velodrome in South Marseille, the Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome has air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, Canal+ and satellite TV. The restaurant on site serves a buffet breakfast and traditional French cuisine for lunch and dinner. Guests can relax in the evenings in the hotel’s spacious bar. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities. Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome is 3 km from Marsaille's Vieux Port and 2km from the nearest beach. A car park is available at the hotel.

name: ibis Marseille Centre Gare Saint-Charles
description: Only 55 yards from the TGV station, the ibis Marseille Centre Gare Saint-Charles has comfortable, quiet and air-conditioned rooms for your business or leisure stays. The hotel's exceptional location in downtown Marseille means you can reach the city center on foot in 10 minutes. Direct access to the airport by train or shuttle, and station parking at a special rate. Welcome to downtown Marseille!accorhotels.com

name: Residhome Marseille
description: Residhome Marseille is situated in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille, 2.7 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.8 km from Plage de Maldorme. Free WiFi is available. Public paid parking is also available nearby. The aparthotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Batterie des Lions is 2.8 km from Residhome Marseille, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, An IHG Hotel
description: The epitome of luxury, the InterContinental Marseille-Hotel Dieu is located in Marseille’s historic Panier district. You can enjoy a pastis aperitif on the terrace with views of Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica before dining on Mediterranean dishes in the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. Work out in the fitness room, swim in the indoor pool, or unwind with a treatment in the chic SPA by Clarins. Five minutes’ walk away, boats line the quay of the Vieux-Port, in the heart of the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Residhotel Vieux Port
description: Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included. A continental breakfast is available daily in the dining room. The reception is open every day from 07:30 to 12:30 and from 14:00 to 22:30. Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière. Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Appart'city Marseille Centre Prado
description: Appart'City Confort Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome, just 200 metres from Périer Metro Station, which leads directly to the centre of Marseille, The European and Mediterranean Civilisations Museum (MuCEM), and the old port. Palais des Congrès and the Vélodrome Stadium are next to the property. The accommodation is contemporary in style and has an LCD TV. Each room, suite and studio also have a private bathroom and free toiletries. The buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room. Additional facilities at this property include free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. There is the possibility to use the computers for free in the entertainment room, as well as the Nespresso Corner. The property is ideally located just 4 metro stops from Saint-Charles Train Station. Parking is available for an extra cost.

name: Novotel Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome
description: Novotel Marseille Centre Prado Vélodrome welcomes you to its modern, spacious and comfortable rooms, some of which have a little terrace with views of Notre Dame basilica. An ideal partner for hosting your business events, our hotel in Marseille has four versatile and renovated meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 250 people. In your downtime, indulge in a platter of delicious seasonal products from our bar-restaurant, or relax in the cosy lounge area of the hotel lobby.accorhotels.com

name: Toyoko Inn Marseille Saint Charles
address: 25 Avenue du Général Leclerc, 13003 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance. The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath. Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

name: Citadines Castellane Marseille
description: This Citadines offers self-catered apartments in Marseille, a 3-minute drive from the A50 motorway, 5-minutes’ walk from Castellane Metro and 2 km from the Velodrome Stadium. Each apartment has an equipped kitchen and free internet. Breakfast is available in the mornings and can be enjoyed on the terrace. Guests can visit the Prado beaches, situated a 10-minute drive from the Citadines Apart'hotel Marseille Castellane. Each of the Citadines’ apartments also has a comfortable seating area and a TV. Each kitchen is equipped with a microwave, fridge and electric hobs.

name: Hôtel Edmond Rostand
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Marseille. It is surrounded by a variety of well-known shops and is minutes on foot from Marseille Tramway Station. This cosy hotel provides luggage storage, an express check-in and check-out feature and a laundry service. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Hotel Edmond Rostand features 15 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Each provides a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hotel Edmond Rostand offers a variety of in-house dining options, which include a traditional restaurant and a bar. A generous buffet breakfast is on offer each morning. A wide choice of dining options can also be found in close proximity to the property. Hotel Edmond Rostand is close to Marseille's well-known attractions, with the Musee Cantini just a 10-minute stroll away. Guests can also visit La Canebiere, Old Port of Marseille and the Opera de Marseille.Revato

name: Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed
description: Less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station in Marseille, Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed provides accommodation with access to an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is less than 1 km from Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Styles Marseille Centre Prado Castellane
description: This hotel offers contemporary rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning. It is 1 km from the Velodrome Stadium and 2 km from Saint-Charles Station. All of the rooms at the ibis Styles Marseille Castellane are also equipped with a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a shower and a hairdryer. ibis Styles Marseille Castellane provides daily breakfast served on a tray, included in the room rate, and free Wi-Fi access. The front desk is open 24 hours. Many activities are possible in the area, including windsurfing, fishing and cycling. ibis Styles Marseille Castellane is 1.9 km from the Old Port, 1.5 km from La Canebière and 20.3 km from Marseille Airport.

name: Le Ryad Boutique Hotel
address: 16 Rue Senac De Meilhan, 13001 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Le Ryad is located in the heart of Marseille, just 50 metres from La Canebiere and 1 km from the Old Port. It offers Moroccan-style rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. With a courtyard and an oriental garden, Le Ryad offers a range of uniquely decorated rooms, accessed through a staircase. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom. There is a tea salon open daily that serves mint tea, fruit juices and Moroccan pastries. There are 2 breakfast options, a simple one and another one including fresh orange juice, fresh fruit salad, Moroccan crepe, yogurt, croissants, bread, butter, honey, jam and hot beverage. Le Ryad is 300 metres from the Reformés Canebiere Metro Station, and 850 metres from the Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available 100 metres from the property.

name: Hôtel Maison Saint Louis - Vieux Port
description: Hôtel Maison Saint Louis - Vieux Port was fully renovated in 2019 and is located in central Marseille, 400 metres from the Old Port. Set in a semi-pedestrian street in the district of Noailles, the Hôtel Maison Saint Louis - Vieux Port has a 24-hour reception and free WiFi access. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms with a flat-screen TV, work desk and telephone. Every room has a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The front rooms feature a balcony overlooking the Cours Saint-Louis and the ones located in the back of the hotel offer views of courtyards and roof tops. Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast in the hotel restaurant "Le Petit Saint Louis", which is also open for lunches and dinners. There is also a bar. Guests can visit Opéra de Marseille and La Canebière, located within 500 metres of the property.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marseille Vieux Port
address: 38-40 Quai De Rive Neuve, 13007 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Marseille. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is a short walk from Vieux Port Metro Station. Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port has a gym with a swimming pool. For an easy and effortless arrival and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in feature. The rooms are air conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a laptop safe. A buffet breakfast and dinner is served every day in Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port's restaurant. Marseille's attractions, such as Abbey of St. Victor, the Opera de Marseille and La Canebiere, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Guests can also visit Old Port of Marseille and the Marseille History Museum.Revato

name: Liberté
address: 7 Boulevard de la Liberté, 13001 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Liberté is a Bed & Breakfast in an apartment situated in Marseille, 1 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 1.4 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. This bed and breakfast features free WiFi. Guests have access to a shared living room with a piano. Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 1.7 km from Liberté, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 2 km away. Paid public parking is available near the apartment. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Liberté.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Marseille Prado Velodrome
description: Connect to the city centre in a refreshing new way at AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome. Our location allows us to provide incomparable access to several of the area's most popular attractions, including Orange Vélodrome, Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre and the beach. Once you've worked up an appetite, stop by Oh Massalia, our on-site restaurant, for a delicious Mediterranean-inspired lunch or dinner. Additionally, we provide a full breakfast buffet in the mornings, as well as quick snacks and beverages from our market.
