Cap your night off in our relaxing rooms, outfitted with pillowtop mattresses, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, soundproof windows and flat-panel TVs. Don't forget to bring a furry friend, as our hotel welcomes them with open arms. Business travelers will love our adaptable meeting space, featuring creative catering options and room for up to 20 colleagues. No matter where you need to go in the city, you'll find yourself nearby at AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome.Marriott

name: Ibis Marseille Centre Euroméditerranée
address: 25 Boulevard de Dunkerque Des Docks, 13002 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: In the heart of a modern, dynamic district, close to the Mucem and the Old Port, enjoy the ibis Marseille Centre Euroméd hotel's warm welcome. Unwind in one of our modern, comfortable bedrooms with high-speed internet and enjoy a full buffet breakfast, our friendly restaurant and bar area with a lounge terrace. Ideal for all your business stays or a family weekend in the Phocaean city's unique setting.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille - Saint Charles
description: A city centre hotel opposite Marseille Saint Charles station, with free Wi-Fi, private parking and breakfast included. Holiday Inn Express® Marseille – Saint Charles hotel is only 15 minutes’ walk from the Vieux-Port. Facing Marseille’s main transport hub, the hotel offers easy access to metro and bus services, as well as local and TGV trains. Marseille Provence Airport (MRS) is a 25-minute drive away, accessible by public shuttle. The hotel is also within easy reach of port cruise ship terminals. Two metro stops away, the business district in La Joliette is home to key local companies such as Société Générale and BNP Paribas. Nearby, the gleaming Les Terrasses du Port shopping centre overlooks the waterfront, a short walk from the iconic MuCEM history museum at the port entrance. At this hotel you can enjoy a continental Express Start Breakfast buffet included in the room rate, Free Wi-Fi throughout, private parking for a fee, a Business Centre with 2 computers and a printer, modern, air-conditioned rooms – some with views of the sea or Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica, offer a choice of pillows to help you sleep. Our bar Le Mistral is the place to relax, and on sunny days you can enjoy a glass of wine at a terrace table. You can host up to 35 people in the hotel’s 2 naturally lit meeting rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hôtel Maison Montgrand Marseille Vieux Port
description: Ideally located in the centre of Marseille, Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving French cuisine. The accommodation provides room service, and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, some units at Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Arabic, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near Hôtel Maison Montgrand - Vieux Port include Saint-Ferreol Street, Vieux Port Metro station and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Residhotel Le Grand Prado
address: Allée Turcat Méry, 7 Square Des Frères Ambrogiani, 13008 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Residhotel Le Grand Prado is in central Marseille, 100 metres from Perier Metro Station. This residence offers furnished apartments and studios with a kitchenette. All of the air-conditioned apartments and studios at Le Grand Prado feature a flat-screen TV. Each has a private bathroom with a bathtub. Most also have a furnished, private balcony. Meals can be prepared in the kitchenette, which offers a microwave, fridge, hot-plates and a coffee maker. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast in the lunch room where WiFi is also accessible. The Old Port is 2 km away and guests can walk to Stade Vélodrome in 20 minutes.

name: Apparthotel La Girafe
address: Allée de la Colombe, 13821 La Penne-sur-Huveaune, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est is set in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, 11 km from Marseille and 15 km from the Calanques National Park. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free secure private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is individually decorated and features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms include a private bathroom. You will find a laundry room at the property. Cassis is 8 km from Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est, while Toulon is 38 km away. Marseille Sallette Golf club is a 3 km drive away. The Villasospa Spa is located 350m away. Marseille Provence Airport is 29 km from the property.

name: Campanile Marseille Saint Antoine
description: This property is located a 10-minute drive from Marseille's Vieux Port, 1 km from l'Hôpital Nord and a 7-minute drive from Grand Littoral shopping centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a garden terrace. Each room at the Campanile Marseille Saint Antoine is equipped with an LCD TV, cable channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Rooms also have a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet of pastries and cold meat is served daily and the Campanile Marseille Saint Antoine Restaurant offers contemporary, French cuisine. You can also sample the starter and dessert buffet. Free newspapers and free private parking are also available at this hotel.

name: Novotel Marseille Vieux Port
description: Get away from it all at the Novotel Marseille Vieux-Port hotel situated in the heart of Marseilles. Relax in the hotel's comfortable rooms during a family vacation, a romantic weekend or a business trip. The six meeting rooms can accommodate your conferen ces, then you can relax in the outdoor pool or the whirlpool bath. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere and contemporary decor of the restaurant overlooking the Old Port and discover the calanques of Marseilles. Enjoy the Mediterranean way of life at Novotelaccorhotels.com

name: Kyriad Marseille Blancarde - Timone
description: Kyriad Marseille Blancarde - Timone offers accommodation in Marseille. It features a swimming pool, a fitness centre and a bar. The property is 4 km from the Old Port of Marseille. Free WiFi is included. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Velodrome Stadium is 4 km from Kyriad Marseille Blancarde - Timone, while Palais du Pharo is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 28 km from Kyriad Marseille Blancarde - Timone.

name: Citadines Prado Chanot Marseille
description: This hotel is located next to Marseille’s Parc Chanot Exhibition Centre, 1 km from the Vélodrome Football Stadium. It offers self-catering accommodation with a private garden and free Wi-Fi. The studios and apartments at Apart’hotel Marseille Prado Chanot feature air conditioning, an equipped kitchenette with microwave and dishwasher, and satellite TV. Some rooms have a balcony with garden view. Citadines Apart’hotel Marseille provides a daily continental breakfast, served in a buffet style. Laundry facilities are also available. The Périer and Rond Point du Prado metro stations are both within 700 metres of the Citadines Apart’hotel Marseille Prado Chanot.

name: Residhome Marseille Saint-Charles
description: Located in Marseille, Residhome Marseille Saint-Charles is a residence just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Charles Train Station, a 12-minute walk from the Old Port and 5 metro stops away from the Palais des Congrès et des Expositions de Marseille. It offers a 24-hour front desk, air conditioning and self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. Studios and apartments at Residhome Marseille Saint-Charles are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathtub. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the dining room. Each accommodation type has a kitchen equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a dishwasher. Residhome Marseille Saint-Charles is a 15-minute walk from the Opera and Marseille’s Cathedral is 1 km away. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Les Cigalons
description: Rooms Stay in one of 35 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. This hotel also features concierge services, wedding services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Marseille (10th Arrondissement), Hotel Les Cigalons is within a 5-minute drive of Timone Hospital and Velodrome Stadium. This hotel is 2.6 mi (4.3 km) from Parc Chanot Convention and Exhibition Center and 5.4 mi (8.7 km) from Grand Port Maritime de Marseille. Dining Satisfy your appetite with French cuisine at Les Cigalons, a family restaurant which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: La Villa Blanche
address: 30 Chemin Des Grottes Loubière, 13013 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: No description found

name: Château Beaupin Chambres et Suites By Les Collectionneurs
description: Château Beaupin chambres et suites is located in Marseille, near the beach. This listed building dates from 19th century. The hotel features a swimming pool, bar-restaurant and certain rooms have a private gardens, see view or balcony. Free WiFi is available. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, air condition, coffee making facilitities and a hairdryer. Bed linen, towels, pool towels and toiletries are provided. The area is popular for its beaches, hiking along the coastline, windsurfing, diving and golf. Free open parking is available onsite and is monitored by video surveillance. The Old Port is a 15-minute drive away. Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km away. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

name: Un Mas en Ville
description: This B&B is set in a three-storey Provençal farmhouse and features en suite accommodations with a country décor, an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub. Notre-Dame du Mont Metro Station is 220 metres away and Velodrome Stadium is 3 km from the property. With antique furniture, each room at Un Mas en Ville includes a private bathroom with bathrobe, hairdryer and shower. Free WiFi is provided throughout. Homemade jams, honey, traditional gingerbread, brioches and pastries are served in the organic breakfast. A common kitchen is at guests’ disposal if they want to reheat their meals bought outside or delivered. The Opéra is a 10-minute walk away and Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 2 km away. Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.6 km away and the A7 Motorway access is a 6-minute drive from Un Mas en Ville. Public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Residence Calypso
description: No description found

name: Hôtel des Moulins
address: Route Enco-de-Botte, 3 Traverse Des Charmettes, 13190 Allauch, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located in Allauch, in a 1600-m² domain on the heights of the district of Enco-de-Botte and opposite the hills of Pagnol, the hotel welcomes you in a lovely countryside setting. The Hôtel des Moulins offers 9 rooms located on the 1st floor of the main building and 4 rooms located in the outbuilding in the garden. The outbuilding is accessible by the terrace and covered car park. Traditional-style cuisine is available if you reserve in advance. Hôtel des Moulins presents a peaceful backdrop to your Provence holidays and benefits from a privileged location from which to discover Marseille, Cassis and its rocky inlets, and some of the most famous tourist sites of the Provence region.

name: Hôtel Les Volets Rouges - Cassis
address: Route de la Gineste, 13260 Cassis, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Offering a sun terrace and views of the garden, HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS is an eco-friendly hotel set in Cassis. Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site. The guest rooms feature a garden view, a wardrobe and a shower. Marseille is 13 km from HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS, while Vélodrome Stadium is 15 km away. Aix-en-Provence is 33 km away and Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km from the property.

name: Azur
description: Azur Hotel Marseille offers a traditional setting while in Marseille. It is conveniently located in the city centre. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Azur, including an express check-in and check-out feature, a coffee bar and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. Hôtel Azur provides 18 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. A desk and a telephone are also included. Azur Hotel Marseille's neighbourhood is known for its nightlife and guests will be spoilt for choice when it comes to dining and bar options. The hotel also serves breakfast each day. The area surrounding Azur is popular for its shopping. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Saint-Charles Railway Station and Marseille Tramway Station, which allows easy access in and around Marseille.Revato

name: Le Drip's
description: Located in Marseille, 1.8 km from Plage de la Vieille Chapelle, Le Drip's provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers room service and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, all units at Le Drip's have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Plage de la Pointe Rouge is 1.9 km from Le Drip's, while Bonneveine is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel le Corbusier
description: Located within a 20-minute walk of Parc Borély, Hotel le Corbusier is 4 km from the centre of Marseille. This hotel is located inside La Cité Radieuse historical monument designed by Le Corbusier and still has its original features. The beach is less than a 10-minute drive away. Free WiFi is available in the rooms. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer. Extras in the rooms include free toiletries. A variety of dishes, as well as breakfast, are offered in the on-site, gastronomic restaurant. Groceries and restaurants are also within walking distance. Additional features at the hotel include a tennis court and a garden and terrace. Velodrome Stadium is 900 metres away. WiFi is available for a surcharge and free parking is available on site.

name: Le Concorde Complexe 16 Pers 3 Appartements Terrasse Clim
description: No description found

name: Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed
description: Situated just 500 metres from Les Terrasses du Port shopping centre in Marseille, Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed boasts sea views as well as free access to a fitness area, indoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the La Table restaurant. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. The suites have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Access to the upper floors and rooms is secure and by magnetic access card only. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also boasts a food truck, a body care bar and tandem bicycles. Velodrome Stadium is 5 km from Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed. Gare Maritime is 1 km from the property while the nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km away. Public parking is available nearby and guests can buy a parking package at the reception.

name: Novotel Suites Marseille Centre Euromed
description: Stay in the heart of the new business district at Novotel Suites Marseille Centre Euromed. From the large suites, choose a pied-à-terre with balcony and sea views (subject to availability). Each suite has a shower, bathtub, minibar, Nespresso machine and microwave. Unlimited WiFi. Boutique Gourmande.accorhotels.com

name: Urban Loft Marseille
description: Located in Marseille, URBAN LOFT Marseille features accommodation within 1.1 km of Saint-Ferreol Street. Complimentary WiFi is offered. Each unit has a kitchen, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Palais du Pharo. Marseille Provence Airport is 20 km away. There are no additional costs if the customer does the cleaning on departure. He has the possibility, if he wishes, of not doing the cleaning and of choosing the paid cleaning service on his departure. But this service is not mandatory.

name: Résidence Carpe Diem
description: Providing city views, a garden and free WiFi, Résidence Carpe Diem is located in Marseille, 1.7 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 3 km from La Timone Metro Station. Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering garden views, a cable flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Joliette Metro Station is 3.3 km from Résidence Carpe Diem, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Sofitel Marseille Vieux-Port
description: The iconic 5* Sofitel Marseille Vieux Port is the must-visit hotel in this city of the ancient Greeks. The luxury hotel's decor is inspired by Marseille's history. The terraces of the Le Carré Bistromanie brasserie, Les Trois Forts gourmet restaurant and Dantes Skylounge bar offer the finest views of the Old Port. Let yourself drift away with the ultimate relaxation of the Sofitel Spa. Nearby beach.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Marseille Centre Bompard La Corniche
address: 2 Rue Des Flots Bleus, 13007 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Mercure Marseille Centre Bompard La Corniche is a boutique 4-star hotel with a pool located on the Kennedy Corniche starting from the Old Port along the bay of Marseille. A veritable oasis of calm in a green setting, this vast bourgeois mansion and wooded parkland is nestled a few minutes from the center of Marseille. A dream base for sightseeing and business trips and seminars in a quiet area.accorhotels.com

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille Prado Parc des Expositions
description: Situated in Marseille, 3 km from Plage du Prado Nord, B&B HOTEL Marseille Prado Parc des Expositions features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, DVD player, and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At B&B HOTEL Marseille Prado Parc des Expositions rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near B&B HOTEL Marseille Prado Parc des Expositions include Castellane Metro Station, Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre and Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Mama Shelter Marseille
address: 64 Rue De La Loubiere, 13006 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: More than just rooms or restaurants, Mama Shelter is a place for living and meeting, a true urban refuge that is beautiful, modern and full of spirit but also folksy, inviting and sexy. Make yourself comfortable on one of our sofas to sample our sharing p latters, have a drink, relax and sleep like a baby. Mama will take care of everything!accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Le Mistral
description: Located just 50 metres from Point Rouge Beach, this hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Stade Vélodrome football stadium. It offers free newspapers and free Wi-Fi, just 20-minutes from the city centre. An LCD TV and a work desk feature in the individually-decorated rooms at Hôtel Le Mistral. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private bathroom with complementary toiletries. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the colourful breakfast room or in the comfort of guest rooms. Le Mistral also has a bar where guests can relax after a day of sightseeing. Free public parking is available near the hotel and Vieille Chapelle Bus Stop is directly opposite the property. Guests can also use the taxi rank next to Mistral to access Marseille’s facilities and sights.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel La Joliette
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel La Joliette offers you all the charm of a boutique hotel of 64 rooms, a very contemporary decoration in a spirit passenger ship and the best services of a 4 star hotel. Free internet Wi-Fi, Air-conditioned, mini-bar, safe, ipod docking station, bar, buffet breakfast, health center. Near the Port of Marseille, the hotel is ideally situated in the heart of the quite new district Euromediterranee. With the tram and the subway within 50 meters, old harbor and tourist places are accessible in a few minutes.bestwestern.com

name: Loft Vieux Port
address: 27 Cours Honoré d'Estienne d'Orves, 13001 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Marseille, LOFT VIEUX PORT provides accommodation with free WiFi 1.8 km from Plage des Catalans. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Palais du Pharo, Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica, and Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom, rooms at the hotel also feature a city view. Guest rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at LOFT VIEUX PORT will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like fishing. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Saint-Ferreol Street, Vieux Port Metro station and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from LOFT VIEUX PORT.

name: Meininger Marseille Centre La Joliette
description: Located in Marseille and with Joliette Metro Station reachable within 400 metres, MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette provides a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is set 1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 2.4 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.4 km from Palais du Pharo. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Kyriad Direct Marseille Est - La Valentine
address: 'Actiparc Ii' Chemin De Saint Lambert, Lieu-Dit 'La Bastidonne', 13821 La Penne-sur-Huveaune, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine is located in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, between Marseille and Aubagne. It is easily accessible by the A50 motorway. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Guest rooms at Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine are equipped with a private bathroom and cable TV. A full breakfast buffet of pastries and cold meat is served daily. You can also try the contemporary French cuisine of the starter and dessert buffet in the restaurant. The Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine provides free private parking. Marseille city centre is just a 15-minute drive away while Circuit Paul Ricard is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: La Calanq'Aise
description: Set 4.7 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, La Calanq'Aise offers a garden, and accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. A outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at La Calanq'Aise. Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 4.9 km from the accommodation, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 31 km from La Calanq'Aise.

description: Set in Marseille, within 8 km of La Timone Metro Station and 9.3 km of Vieux Port Metro station, LA BASTIDE DES CULS-ROUSSET offers accommodation with an infinity pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The accommodation features a spa facilities, walking tours and family rooms. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a patio and others also have pool views. At LA BASTIDE DES CULS-ROUSSET the rooms come with bed linen and towels. An à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Castellane Metro Station is 9.4 km from LA BASTIDE DES CULS-ROUSSET, while Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from the guest house.

name: Appartement En Sous Sol De Villa Avec Accès Jardin Et Piscine
description: Located in Marseille, within 2.4 km of Bonneveine and 2.5 km of Plage de la Vieille Chapelle, APPARTEMENT EN SOUS SOL DE VILLA avec accès jardin et piscine provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Borely. All units are equipped with air conditioning, an oven, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a desk. The rooms include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen. The guest house offers a picnic area. Orange Velodrome Stadium is 2.6 km from APPARTEMENT EN SOUS SOL DE VILLA avec accès jardin et piscine, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Le panier centre historique de marseille
description: Le panier centre historique de Marseille offers accommodation in Marseille, 1.1 km from Palais du Pharo. The apartment is 3.9 km from Velodrome Stadium. Private parking is available on site. There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with an oven and a microwave. A flat-screen TV is available. Le panier centre historique de Marseille features free WiFi throughout the property. Quartier du Panier is 200 metres from Le panier centre historique de Marseille, while La Major Cathedral is 200 metres away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: Villa Valflor chambres d'hôtes et appartements
description: Set in a 19th-century country house, this air-conditioned B&B offers a Moroccan-style patio in the garden. La Pointe Rouge Beach is 100 metres away and free Wi-Fi access is provided. A flat-screen TV features in the individually decorated guest rooms and the apartment. Some of the rooms offer views of the garden or the sea, and the en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is prepared every morning at Villa Valflor chambres d'hôtes et appartements. The apartment’s kitchenette also includes a washing machine, dishwasher and microwave. Located 6 km from the centre of Marseille, this bed and breakfast is a 10-minute walk from Parc Borely Golf Club. Free private parking is available on site and a shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: ibis Marseille Bonneveine Calanques Plages
description: No description found

name: Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes
description: Located in Marseille, Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes provides accommodation with free WiFi, city views, and access to beauty services. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with garden views. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. La Timone Metro Station is 2.4 km from Le Transvaal-Maison d'Hôtes, while Vieux Port Metro station is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine Porte d'Aubagne
description: With a stay at B&B Hotel Marseille La Valentine Porte d'Aubagne in Marseille (11th Arrondissement), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Chateau de la Buzine and Centre Commercial Valentine. Featured amenities include express check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Marseille? This hotel features 538 square feet (50 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Les chambres de la releve
description: No description found

name: ibis Marseille Timone
address: 107 Boulevard Sakakini, La Timone, 13005 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: The whole team at the refurbished ibis Timone hotel are keen to say hi. We're ideally located at the exit of the A50, and 10 minutes from the Dôme, Chanot Park and the Vélodrôme stadium. The metro for downtown Marseille is 150 yards away. We have 89 air-conditioned rooms, a private covered car park, restaurant, two conference meeting rooms, terrace and a 24-hour bar.accorhotels.com

name: Twenty Business Flats Marseille Timone
description: Twenty Business Flats Marseille Timone is located in the Baille-La Timone district of Marseille, 500 metres from La Timone Metro Station and 2 km from Castellane Metro Station. Free WiFi is provided and private parking is available on site. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower while the kitchenette features a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace. Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 3 km from Twenty Business Flats Marseille Timone, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Collection Marseille
description: With a fantastic location, in the heart of Marseille’s bustling business district and a few steps from some of the city’s best shopping areas, the NH Collection Marseille is perfect for business travellers and families alike. Close to the hotel you’ll find the must-see attractions such as the picturesque old port, the city’s old town and the famous MUCEM museum. If you would like to go shopping, Rue de la République, with its Haussmann-style buildings, is one of the city’s best shopping streets. Alternatively, you can head to one of the nearby shopping centes: "Lles Terrasses du Port" or "Docks Village". The neighborhood is also well connected to both the city and the airport, with a number of transport options including motorways, trains and local metro and tram lines available. The NH Collection Marseille provides 176 rooms decorated to reflect the elegant and charming style of the hotel. Each room has seating areas, free high-speed Wifi and wide-screen TVs. Guests can enjoy delicious choices from the breakfast buffet including hot and cold meals, local delicacies and fresh juices, coffee and tea. The hotel's restaurant offers excellent local and international dishes and a selection of the best cheeses and wines. If you’re visiting for business, there are four fully-equipped meeting rooms plus space in the lobby and winter gardens for more informal meetings.NH Hoteles

name: Little house with a large roof garden in the city center
description: Set in Marseille and with Castellane Metro Station reachable within 1.5 km, Little house with a large roof garden in the city center offers a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 1.8 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 3.6 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station and 3.7 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 3.9 km from the guest house and Joliette Metro Station is 4 km away. All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Little house with a large roof garden in the city center also have a garden view. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Little house with a large roof garden in the city center include La Timone Metro Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the guest house.

name: Hotel Bellevue Marseille
description: Located on Marseille Vieux Port, Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is an eco-friendly hotel offering views of the Notre-Dame de la Garde, Saint Jean Fort and Pharo Garden. Set in a typical Marseillaise building, it has a cocktail bar and an wrought-iron central staircase dating from 1900. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at the Hotel Belle-Vue is also equipped with air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV, and most have large windows with views of the port. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub. Ironing facilities are available. A continental breakfast is provided daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine from the south of France. La Caravelle cocktail bar has a balcony where guests can enjoy a drink. The 24-hour reception offers local tourist information and newspapers are available every morning. Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is just 250 metres from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro station, which provides direct access to the Saint Charles Train Station.

name: Maison d'artistes - Pavillon Southway
description: Set in Marseille, Maison d'artistes - Pavillon Southway offers mountain views and free WiFi, 2.2 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium and 2.4 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. All units come with a terrace with city views, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. Guests at Maison d'artistes - Pavillon Southway can enjoy walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden. Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Castellane Metro Station is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 28 km from Maison d'artistes - Pavillon Southway.

name: Hostel Vertigo Vieux Port
address: 38 Rue Fort Notre Dame, 13007 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Located in central Marseille, Hostel Vertigo Vieux-Port is just 200 metres from the Vieux Port. Guests have access via a staircase to a quadruple room or a bed in a dormitory. Air conditioning is featured. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Hostel Vertigo Vieux-Port provides a daily breakfast and a shared kitchen with a stovetop, microwave, toaster and kettle. Guests can relax on the outdoor patio or in the lounge area, which has Mediterranean décor. Multilingual staff at Hostel Vertigo Vieux-Port can offer tourist information at the 24-hour reception. The hostel is close to local restaurants and the Cantini Museum. Hostel Vertigo Vieux-Port is a 5-minute walk from the Municipal Opera. The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro station is just 600 metres away, and provides direct access to the Saint Charles TGV Train Station. Q-Park Estienne d'Orves Car Park is just 220 metres away.

name: La Maison Mickael
description: Set in Marseille, 400 metres from Plage du Prado Nord, La Maison Mickael offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. Located around 600 metres from Plage du Prado Sud, the hotel with free WiFi is also 2.5 km away from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Petit Roucas Blanc Beach. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Selected rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge and a stovetop. The units at La Maison Mickael feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Orange Velodrome Stadium is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 27 km from La Maison Mickael.

name: Le Clos du Jas
address: 15 traverse du Jas de Serre, 13013 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Le Clos du Jas is located in Marseille and offers a flowered garden with a terrace and outdoor seating area. Its hillside location provides views of the city. The rooms at Le Clos du Jas are decorated in a contemporary style and include a private entrance. A seating area, a flat-screen TV and facilities for making tea and coffee are provided. You can enjoy homemade marmalade, fresh pastries and orange juice for breakfast every morning. Packed lunches are available if you reserve in advance. Free Wi-Fi access and free private parking are just some of the other facilities available at this property. The beach and Notre Dame De La Garde are 13 km away, while hiking trails surround the B&B.

name: Marseille bleue
description: Located 10 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, 10 km from Joliette Metro Station and 10 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Marseille bleue provides accommodation situated in Marseille. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast comes with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 11 km from the bed and breakfast, while Vieux Port Metro station is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 15 km from Marseille bleue.

name: greet Hotel Marseille Centre Saint Charles
description: Near the Old Port and Marseille's iconic districts, discover our renovated, environmentally responsible and locally committed greet hotel. A short walk from Marseille-Saint-Charles station, the hotel is ideal for work or leisure stays. Enjoy air-conditioned rooms decorated with upcycled items, as well as our friendly bar and restaurant area that will satisfy lovers of fresh, healthy and local products!accorhotels.com

name: Magnifique loveroom

description: Magnifique loveroom, a property with a garden, is located in Marseille, 11 km from Castellane Metro Station, 12 km from Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre, as well as 12 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 11 km from La Timone Metro Station, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast comes with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Orange Velodrome Stadium is 12 km from Magnifique loveroom, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 32 km from the accommodation.

name: Le cabanon de Manon - Marseille
description: Well situated in the La Corniche district of Marseille, Le cabanon de Manon - Marseille is located less than 1 km from Plage de Maldorme, a 12-minute walk from Batterie des Lions and 1.8 km from Palais du Pharo. The property is around 1.4 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica, 2.6 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 2.7 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is set 800 metres from Fausse Monnaie. At the guest house, each room comes with a terrace. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Le cabanon de Manon - Marseille also have free WiFi. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Castellane Metro Station is 3.5 km from Le cabanon de Manon - Marseille, while Joliette Metro Station is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the guest house.

name: 'Les Antilles ' Héhergement chez l'habitant
description: Situated in Marseille, "Les Antilles " Héhergement chez l'habitant offers beachfront accommodation 300 metres from Plage de la Pointe Rouge and features various facilities, such as a garden and a tennis court. The property is around 600 metres from Plage de la Vieille Chapelle, 1.1 km from Bonneveine and 4 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bath, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Guest rooms have a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. The area is popular for horse riding and hiking, and bike hire is available at the guest house. Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 4.2 km from "Les Antilles " Héhergement chez l'habitant, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from the accommodation.

name: Appart hôtel Maison Montgrand-Vieux Port
description: Appart hôtel Maison Montgrand-Vieux Port features accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenware. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city or quiet street views. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Popular points of interest near Appart hôtel Maison Montgrand-Vieux Port include Saint-Ferreol Street, Vieux Port Metro station and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Chambre 2 places avec salle de bain
address: 84 Avenue de Frais Vallon villa 7, 13013 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: No description found

name: Le Petit Nid Des Chutes Lavies
description: Situated in Marseille, 3.3 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, LE PETIT NID DES CHUTES LAVIES features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a terrace. Located around 3.9 km from Joliette Metro Station, the guest house with free WiFi is also 4.1 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.3 km from La Timone Metro Station. At the guest house, rooms come with a wardrobe. Rooms include a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At LE PETIT NID DES CHUTES LAVIES each room includes bed linen and towels. Vieux Port Metro station is 4.3 km from the accommodation, while Saint-Ferreol Street is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from LE PETIT NID DES CHUTES LAVIES.

name: Large south facing terrace with stunning views over bay of Marseille
address: 44 Chemin de la Nerthe, 13016 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Prestigious Port of Estaque (painted by Cézanne, Derain, Braque;), typical Marseille district, calm and endearing. Tourist areas: pedestrian paths, numerous shops and restaurants. Access to downtown (less than half an hour) by bus, train or shuttle boat (to the Old Port from May to October). Large bedroom (possibility of 2 more people, sleeping on sofa bed) Troubleshooting corner kitchen (fridge, microwave, coffee maker, stove, kettle, toaster) Upright piano in the room. House near the railroadVRBO

name: Comfort Suites Marseille Prado
description: This Adagio Marseille Prado Plage features 94 apartments and is close to the business district of Prado and 100 m from beaches. The accommodation ranges from 2 person studios to 1 bedroom apartments for 4 or 5 people, all airconditioned and with terraceo r balcony. Ideally located between the seaside and the centre of town, the hotel is just a few minutes from the convention centre and offers undercover parking. Unwind in our outdoor swimming pool available during the warmer months.accorhotels.com

name: Résidence Meublée Services
description: Résidence Meublée Services is located in the centre of Marseille, just a 15-minute walk from the Old Port. Guests can visit the Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica 1.5 km away. The self-catering accommodations at Résidence Meublée Services are simply decorated with linoleum floors. The accommodations offer a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests can prepare homemade meals in the fully equipped kitchen and a supermarket is just 20 metres away. Bars and restaurants can also be found 20 metres away. The Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 2 km away and the Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Guests can hike in the Calanques just 10 km away or take the ferry to Frioul Island from the Old Port.

name: B&B Casa Ortega
address: 46 Rue Des Petites Maries, 13001 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Situated in Marseille, B&B Casa Ortega offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as water sports facilities. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Windsurfing can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near B&B Casa Ortega include Vieux Port Metro station, Joliette Metro Station and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Lou Bastido
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a garden, as well as an airport shuttle and multilingual staff. Other amenities include weekly housekeeping, luggage storage, and access to a safety deposit box.Expedia

name: Suite privée du balcon du vieux port Marseille
description: Located in Marseille, 1.3 km from Plage des Catalans and 400 metres from the centre, Suite privée du balcon du vieux port Marseille provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Suite privée du balcon du vieux port Marseille provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palais du Pharo, Saint-Ferreol Street and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from Suite privée du balcon du vieux port Marseille.

name: Campo Dell'Oro
address: Plage du Ricanto BP 60996, 20090 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Hôtel Campo Dell'oro is located in the heart of Ajaccio’s gulf, just 600 metres from Ricanto Beach. It is set in a large park of palm trees and offers an outdoor pool. The contemporary and spacious rooms are all air conditioned and feature an LCD TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the restaurant, open each day for lunch and dinner, offers a variety of dishes which can be enjoyed on the terrace. Guests can also have a drink at the bar and enjoy the flower garden surrounding the hotel. Ajaccio city centre is 4 km away. Napoleon Bonaparte Airport is a 3 km drive away and private parking is free on site.

name: ibis Styles Ajaccio Napoleon
description: The ibis Styles Ajaccio Napoléon is a place where creativity, style, hospitality and a taste for sharing meet. Discover the hotel's "Histo'Art" story as told by its team, while taking in the warm and contemporary setting. Enjoy the hotel rooftop with a panoramic view of downtown Ajaccio. The hotel has a full range of services that includes a breakfast buffet and secure parking, all with an original twist.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Demeure Les Mouettes
description: Ideally located in the gulf of Ajaccio, with direct access to a small beach, Hôtel-Demeure Les Mouettes is a charming 19th-century house. Stay in one of the hotel's large rooms, some with terraces providing superb views of the gulf. For your convenience, rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and mini fridges. Take a refreshing dip in the hotel's private pool or in the clear blue waters of the Mediterranean sea before resting in the shade of palm trees. Local cold meats and cheeses are available throughout the day for those wishing to enjoy some of the best local flavours without leaving the hotel's sunny terrace.

name: Best Western Plus Ajaccio Amiraute
description: The Best Western Plus® Ajaccio Amiraute is ideally located close to the Congress Center, the harbour, the city center, and the airport. With its exceptional view over the sea, this property, will offer you all of the best, three star services: solarium terrace, heated swimming-pool (from March until November), private covered garage, Wi-Fi access, conference hall, business corner, office, restaurant, front desk and snacks 24 hours. We invite you to visit Ajaccio, Bonaparte House, Imperial Chapel, Fesch Museum, the wonderful Gulf of Ajaccio, with more than 20 kilometers of white fine sand, and Filitosa, Piana, Scandola, Bonifacio and Porto-Vecchio.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Albion
address: 15 Avenue du Général Leclerc, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Ajaccio - Hôtel Albion is located in Ajaccio, on the west coast of Corsica. It is just a 5-minute walk from the city centre and the beach. It offers air-condtioned accommodation renovated in March 2016 and with free WiFi access. Each room at Adonis Ajaccio - Hôtel Albion is equipped with a direct telephone and satellite TV. Some rooms also have view of the sea. The air-conditioned studios have a sofa bed, a dining area, a bath room with shower. no more baths at the property and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge, a stovetop, a microwave oven, a sink and crockery. All studios also feature a TV and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the Albion’s flowered garden. Breakfast can also be enjoyed in the lounge or in the guest rooms. Ajaccio - Hôtel Albion is serviced by a lift and provides a 24-hour reception and a bar.

name: Hotel du Golfe
description: Hôtel Du Golfe is situated in the heart of Ajaccio, by the central market square. It is separated from the sea by a lovely floral garden and offers sea views. All rooms at the Hotel du Golfe are air conditioned, soundproofed and include flat-screen satellite TV. They provide free WiFi access. There is also an internet point available at reception, which is open 24 hours a day. An express breakfast comprising hot drinks, pastries and orange juice is available upon request. Continental breakfasts are available with an extra charge. After a busy day exploring Ajaccio you can relax on the large outdoor terrace at the Hotel du Golfe. - Public parking is available opposite the hotel (100m) for an extra cost: 1.60€/hour and a fixed price of 2.00€ from 5 PM to 8 AM (July and August 3.00€ from 00h to 8 AM) Upon request, we can schedule your transfer by taxi for an extra cost.

name: Résidence Easy Lodge
address: Lieu-dit Strette Bodiccione 1 Rue des Magnolias, 20090 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Résidence Easy Lodge has city views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Ajaccio, 2.4 km from Lazaret Beach. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Port des Cannes is 2.8 km from Résidence Easy Lodge, while Campo Dell'Oro Train Station is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Sun Beach Hôtel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 86 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Ajaccio, Sun Beach Hôtel is by the sea, within a 5-minute drive of Southern Corsica Beaches and Trottel Beach. This hotel is 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Barbicagja and 1.5 mi (2.5 km) from Jardins du Casone. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between October 22 and March 30. name: Creste E Mare
address: Residence Creste e Mare, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Creste E Mare features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Ajaccio, 200 metres from Pasci Pecura Beach. Each unit comes with a terrace offering sea views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with bath and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. Crètes Beach is less than 1 km from the aparthotel, while Beau Rivage Beach is a 13-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 9 km from Creste E Mare.

name: Hôtel Le Week end
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace, Hôtel Le Week end is situated in Ajaccio in the Corsica Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. You will find a coffee machine in the rooms. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. Hôtel Le Week end features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find concierge service at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Sanguinaires Islands is 3.4 km from Hôtel Le Week end, while Parata Tower is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 13 km from Hôtel Le Week end.

name: Hôtel Cala di Sole
address: 1, Route Des Sanguinaires Ajaccio, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: The Cala di Sole is located on the seafront in a calm area. It offers views of the Gulf of Ajaccio, a private beach and a swimming pool. Private parking with video surveillance is free on site. Cala di Sole has air-conditioned guest rooms. They include en suite facilities, a TV and a sea view. Some have a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available. A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can have breakfast served in their room for a supplement. Snacks are also available on request. Free parking for cars and motorcycles is provided, and the area offers activities such as diving and jet-skiing. Near the Cala di Sole, guests can enjoy the Sanguinaires Islands and Napoleon’s birth place. During low season, from the 1st of November to the 31st of December, special policies are applied during the stay as self check-in and cleaning.

name: Hôtel Dolce Vita
address: 51 Route Des Iles Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: This pet-friendly hotel is located in Ajaccio and features a private beach. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a diving centre and an outdoor pool. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and a private terrace. They all have an in-room closet, heating and an in-room safe. The hotel's restaurant serves local, European and Mediterranean cuisine and overlooks the water. Room service is also available during certain times. Guests can hire a jet ski and visit the surrounding area from the shoreline. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Ajaccio.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Ajaccio Bay
description: Just 100 metres from Agosta Beach, this hotel features a spa with hammam and hot tub, a terrace and a garden with a heated, outdoor pool with a poolside bar. It proposes air-conditioned rooms and car rental. Free Wi-Fi is available in each en suite room. All rooms feature extras long beds, a balcony and ironing facilities. Breakfast is provided in the form of a buffet each morning. For other meals you can try regional food in the restaurant while enjoying views of Ajaccio Bay. Afterwards you can relax in the hotel bar. Located 5 km from Porticcio and its beach, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa is 19 km from Ajaccio town centre. Services include a laundry, business centre and organisation of excursions.

name: Palm Beach Hotel
address: Route Des Iles Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Palm Beach features direct access to the private beach and a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the ocean "Mediterranean Sea'. This 4-star hotel offers rooms with sea views and is just 5 km from Ajaccio city centre. An LCD TV with satellite channels features in the rooms and suites at Palm Beach. All accommodation is air-conditioned and some have a separate living area. Breakfast can be served to all rooms. The continental breakfast is also served on the terrace. Guests can also relax in the bar and browse the free Wi-Fi. Free public parking is available on site and the Sanguinaires Islands are 7 km away. Guests may also choose to drive to Ajaccio Harbour, which is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Fesch & Spa
description: Hôtel Fesch & spa is situated in the centre of Ajaccio, just a 5-minute walk from the ferry port and 500 metres from the beach. It offers guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The guest rooms at the Fesch are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and mini-bars. Each is air conditioned and has a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a generous buffet breakfast every morning, either in the dining room, on the outdoor terrace, or in the guest rooms. Additional facilities include a 24-hour front desk and a lift. Set on Corsica’s Mediterranean Coast, Hôtel Fesch & spa is just a few steps from the Marechal Foch Central Square, and is in close proximity to Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte’s house.

name: Holiday Inn Express Ajaccio
description: The Holiday Inn Express Ajaccio is strategically located near the economic centers of Mezzavia and Baleone, the Napoleon Bonaparte International Airport (10 minutes by car), as well as the ferry terminal located at the Maritime Station (10 minutes by car). It is also close to the historical center, the Tino Rossi and Charles Ornano ports and the beaches of Ajaccio. The 71 modern, comfortable, bright and warm rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV will make you feel at home, without frills but with everything you need. A cozy bar and a fitness room complete our facilities for your relaxation. Whether for a business trip or for leisure, succumb to the typical Ajaccio atmosphere by appreciating its culture, its seaside, its heritage, its Corsican gastronomy, its colorful facades and its famous museums. everything that makes Ajaccio a city prized by many travelers in search of authenticity, nature and change of scenery. For your meetings, the hotel also has two lounges with natural light and all the equipment necessary for the success of your event. A secured and paying parking is at your disposal in the hotel. Whether you're on holiday in the Greater Ajaccio area or simply departing on a tour of Corsica, you'll have a memorable stay at the Holiday Inn Express Ajaccio.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo
description: The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is a 4-star hotel located in Ajaccio’s old-town, 300 metres from the beach. This Corsican mansion offers air-conditioned guest rooms with LCD satellite TV and free internet. The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is 100 metres from the Ajaccio Cathedral and the Casa Buonaparte. Guests can enjoy tours of the old town and visits to its museums and galleries. The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is a 1.5 km drive from Ajacco ferry port and 6 km from Campo dell'Oro Airport.

name: Hôtel Le Bastia
description: This comfortable hotel in Bastia offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. It is ideally positioned for those wanting to discover the area's attractions. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a safe and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and tea and coffee making facilities. They all have heating, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Guests can sit down to breakfast every morning at Adonis Hotel Le Bastia. The hotel is close to Bastia Train Station, making it easy for guests to discover Bastia and its surrounding areas. Guests can also visit Bastia Cathedral.Revato

name: Hotel Des Roches
description: Located in Sartène, one of Corsica's oldest towns, Hotel Des Roches is the perfect base from which to discover the breathtaking landscapes of the isle. In summer, guests can relax on the terrace and enjoy views of the countryside. Each room at the Roches is air conditioned and has a private bathroom. Special rooms are available to the mobility impaired. The hotel has also built its reputation on its panoramic restaurant serving some of the best local recipes made from the freshest ingredients. Enjoy your meal while admiring the Valinco gulf. Whether a sport enthusiast or a nature lover, make sure you stop at the Hotel des Roches for a cosy stay under the sun. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is possible in the onsite car park, which is monitored by security cameras.

name: Hotel Restaurant & Spa L'Ostella
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 52 guestrooms featuring espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bastia? This hotel has facilities measuring 3660 square feet (340 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hôtel Spa Restaurant l'Ostella in Bastia, you'll be in the business district, within a 5-minute drive of L'Arinella Beach and Citadel. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Bastia Vieux Port Marina and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Church of St-Jean-Baptiste. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Bastia, a bar/lounge which specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee.
