name: Hotel Balanea
address: 6 Rue Clemenceau Port De Plaisance, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This hotel is built in a tourist port in Calvi, just 50 metres from the beach, restaurants and shops. It is located on a pedestrianised street and offers unique views across Corsica's gulf and the mountains. All modern soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Balanea feature a TV with Canal +, and luxury bathrooms with wood finish and a large bathtub. Some rooms have a balcony with sea views. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Balanea has a 24-hour front desk and an elevator that can take guests to their rooms. Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the hotel.

name: Hotel Port Toga
address: Rond Point DE Toga, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Hotel Port Toga is located in Bastia, just a 2-minute walk from Port de Toga. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, desk and security deposit box. The private bathrooms have either a bath or shower. The suites also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available every morning serving locally sourced produce. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Saint-Florent is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Poretta Airport, 21 km from Hotel Port Toga.

name: Cors'Hotel
address: Rn 193 - Rond Point Biguglia, 20620 Biguglia, Corsica
description: This hotel is located between Bastia city centre and Bastia Airport. Just 5 km from the beach, it offers a 2000m² garden, an outdoor swimming pool and a petanque court. The rooms at Cors'Hotel are decorated in neutral tones and have views of the garden or swimming pool. Each one is air-conditioned and also has free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room or on the terrace. You can also sample Corsican or Mediterranean-style cuisine in the restaurant before relaxing in the onsite bar. Free access to the tennis court, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage are some of the other facilities on offer. Bastia is just 8 km from the hotel and Biguglia Lake is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Des Gouverneurs
address: 3 Bis Rue Des Turquines, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Featuring an indoor pool and panoramic sea views from the terrace, Hôtel Des Gouverneurs is a seafront property in the pedestrianised citadel area of Bastia, just 90 metres from Bastia Museum, 2 minutes' walk from the Old Port and 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. Guests can relax in the bar. There is free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle, and a private bathroom, hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites have a seating area and a sea view. A buffet or continental breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Des Gouverneurs. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including snorkeling and windsurfing. Paid public parking can be found within 200 metres of the property. L’Île-Rousse is 70 km from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs, while Saint-Florent is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, a 30-minute drive from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs.

name: Hôtel U Frascone
address: Lieu Dit La Croix, 20231 Venaco, Corsica
description: The Hotel U Frascone is located in the village Venaco, halfway between Ajaccio and Bastia. The hotel is in the heart of the Corsican Mountains and offers en-suite facilities and satellite TV. The hotel’s bar offers a panoramic view of the valley and guests will find a restaurant just 700 metres away. Free Wi-Fi access is also available in the bar. Guests at Hotel U Frascone can easily visit the Musee de la Corse and enjoy local leisure activities such as fishing and horseback riding. Tennis courts are just 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Chez Walter
description: Chez Walter has rooms with views of its Mediterranean garden and is a 10-minute drive from Marana beaches. It has an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court, and the restaurant serves local produce on its terrace. Free Wi-Fi access and a TV with satellite channels are available in each air-conditioned, bright room. Guest rooms include a minibar, an en suite bathroom and a private entrance. A continental breakfast can be taken in the room. Guests can sample specialities grown in the region or locally caught fish in the restaurant with views over the garden and swimming pool. Chez Walter is in between the tourist train stations of Borgo and Lucciana, both 18 minutes' walking distance. The hotel is 15 km from Bastia and 4 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport. Chez Walter is in between the tourist train stations of Borgo and Lucciana, both 18 minutes' walking distance. -> Chez Walter is near the train station of Casamozza both 5 minutes walking distance.

name: Best Western Montecristo
description: The Best Western Montecristo is ideally located only 900 meters from the harbor, the city center, shops, restaurants, pubs and events, and the typically Mediterranean area of the old harbor. Enjoy a visit to the historic monuments of the city or sensational shopping and tourist attractions. Our three-Star hotel offers 71 spacious bedrooms, all with air-conditioning, cable television and free Wi-Fi access. A buffet breakfast is available for a nominal fee. The hotel has been entirely renovated in 2010 with a new look and more comfortable rooms. In the lobby, you will find a 70 square meters meeting room and a business corner. The snack bar is open 24/7 and parking is available onsite. Dogs allowed with restriction and supplement (Please contact the hotel before finalizing your booking). Our attentive and multilingual staff takes pride in providing personalized service for our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Premier Santa Maria
address: Route du Port BP 107, 20220 L'Île-Rousse, Corsica
description: The Best Western Premier Santa Maria is ideally situated opposite the red islands of Ile Rousse, right on the water's edge, with direct access to its own private beach. We are the ideal place for a dream holiday, with comfort of a 3-Star hotel, offering terraces and rooms with a sea view. Best Western Premier Santa Maria definitely has the best of both worlds with its beachside location and close access to the activities and amenities Ile Rousse has to offer. Our hotel provides an extensive breakfast buffet. All rooms are air-conditioned, with a balcony or patio and equipped to a good standard with satellite television, telephone, en-suite bathrooms (bath or shower), hairdryer, mini-bar, safe, and Wi-Fi access on garden/park car side on the ground floor, standard room on the first floor park car side or on the ground floor garden side, and many rooms are on sea side (ground floor or first and second floor). Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Pietracap
address: 20 Route de San Martino, 20200 San-Martino-di-Lota, Corsica
description: This hotel is located in Pietranera, a small town with a pebble beach, 3 km from Bastia. Set within a garden with an olive grove, the hotel faces Elba Island and offers modern rooms and free parking. Rooms at Pietracap offer large windows that lead onto a private balcony with views of the sea or the 1-hectare park. Each is air-conditioned and has an LCD TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy French pastries and homemade jams in the breakfast room every morning. On sunny days, the terrace provides a nice spot to relax and admire the orange and olive trees. Additional facilities include Wi-Fi and a lounge where a local artist’s work is displayed. Bastia ferry port is a 10-minute drive away and provides access to Toulon, Marseille and Nice.

name: Hotel Stella Marina
description: Located in Serriera, 500 metres from Bussaglia Beach, Hotel Stella Marina provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and a tour desk. Each room comes with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. At Hotel Stella Marina each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 63 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Central Bastia
description: Featuring a shared lounge, terrace and views of city, Hotel Central Bastia is located in Bastia, 1.5 km from Saint Joseph Beach. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. At Hotel Central Bastia every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Minelli Beach is 1.7 km from Hotel Central Bastia, while Bastia Port is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Costa Salina
description: Located in Porto Vecchio with a panoramic view of the sea, Hotel Costa Salina offers an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub and a sun terrace. With a view of either the sea or the Mediterranean garden or the salt marshes and the pool, the air-conditioned rooms have a balcony or a patio. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar at Hotel Costa Salina. Each modern room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a toilet. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. A buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room with views of the swimming pool. At the Costa Salina, a continental breakfast can be taken on your private balcony. From April 20th to 15 September, guests can enjoy a drink in the poolside bar and a meal at the restaurant, which serves meals featuring local produce. Hammam and massages are available upon prior request. With free private parking on site, the hotel is 23 km from Figari-Sud Corse Airport. The historic centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Premium Les Terrasses d'Arsella
address: route de porto vecchiaccio, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Hotel Arena restaurant le Refuge
address: Vallee De La Restonica, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Arena Le Refuge offers accommodation 2 km from the centre of Corte. The hotel has a terrace and views of the river, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A shared lounge and a garden are also available at the property. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including horse riding and fishing. Hotel Arena Le Refuge is 88 km from both Calvi and Ota Porto. Calvi-Sainte-Catherine Airport is 87 km from the property. A free and secure motorcycle parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Les Voyageurs
description: Set in the heart of Bastia, Hôtel Les Voyageurs, Bastia offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and bar. It is a 5-minute walk from the Port, where ferries to Italy leave daily and Arinella Beach is an 8-minute drive away. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a TV with cable channels, a minibar and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have views of the courtyard. A buffet breakfast is available at the hotel and guests can enjoy a drink in the on-site bar. Restaurants, cafés and bars are within walking distance thanks to its central location. Guests are offered a welcoming drink after 18:00 on their arrival date. Saint-Nicolas Square is 250 metres away and Bastia Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available in the entire property and private parking for cars and motorbikes is possible on site, upon reservation.

name: Hotel Castel Brando
description: In the picturesque, seafront village of Erbalunga is the Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa. This authentic 19th century private house sits in its own grounds and offers charming accommodation. The family-owned Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa presents a peaceful backdrop to your Corsican holidays. The rooms are all en suite and propose bright and spacious living spaces. The Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa offers a range of teas, homemade cakes and delicacies. You can enjoy those in the library lounge or, in the summertime, on the shady patio or park planted with 100-year old palm trees and lime trees. Guests can also enjoy some Mediterranean food at the Les Américains restaurant on-site.

name: Les Alizés Résidence & Spa
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Padolo
description: Offering a garden with a heated outdoor pool and a bar, Hôtel Padolo is located in the south of Corsica, in the town of Bonifacio. A hot tub is available at an extra charge. The property features free WiFi access and free on-site parking for guests arriving by car. The private bathrooms come with a shower and free toiletries. A continental buffet breakfast including hot drinks, homemade jam and homemade bread is available every morning for an extra charge. Guests can also purchase snacks onsite. Hôtel Padolo is an 8-minute drive from Bonifacio Port and 4 km from the King Aragon Steps. For guests who enjoy golf, the Sperone Golf Course is an 18-minute drive away. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is situated just 17 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Mercure Bastia Biguglia
description: The hotel is located in Biguglia, between Bastia-Poretta Airport and Bastia city center. Easy access to the hotel via the expressway linking the airport to the city center. The hotel offers 83 rooms, a restaurant, a bar, meeting rooms and a spa with fitne ss room.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Restaurant le Bellevue
description: Hotel Bellevue is located in the seaside town of Propriano, on the south-west coast of Corsica. It offers accommodation equipped with free WiFi and satellite TV. All rooms at Hotel Bellevue include air conditioning, heating, double glazing as well as a bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and/or views of the sea Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Bellevue’s brasserie and creperie. It features a covered terrace, which overlooks the Propriano Marina and beach. The Bellevue Hotel provides a 24-hour reception, and staff can offer local tourist information. It is an ideal base to explore the Golfe du Valinco and the nearby thermal villages of Baracci and Caldane.

name: Hotel Villa Joséphine
description: Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in LʼÎle-Rousse. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and local cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around LʼÎle-Rousse, like hiking. Popular points of interest near Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine include Napoleon Beach, Nautique Beach and Caruchettu Beach. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Lilium Maris
description: This peaceful Corsican hotel is located right on Tizzano Beach in Sartène. It features spacious rooms with private entrances, each equipped with a terrace or balcony and teak furniture. The air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hôtel Lilium Maris come with TVs with satellite channels and mini-bars. Some also offer sea or mountain views. Guests can dine in the restaurant that serves traditional French cuisine then enjoy an evening drink in the hotel bar, or relax on the outdoor terrace, overlooking the sea. A continental breakfast is served daily. Additional facilities at the Lilium Maris hotel include free Wi-Fi access in its common areas and free private parking.

name: Chambre d`hotes Caseddu Di Poggiale
description: No description found

name: Sud Hotel
address: 490 Avenue De La Libération, 20600 Bastia, Corsica
description: The Sud Hotel is located 2 km from the center of the port city of Bastia and less than 300 meters from the east coast of Corsica. It offers a vegetable patch/Mediterranean garden on its rooftop terrace where you can quietly enjoy a drink in this green oasis. Wi-Fi is free. Arinella beach is a ten minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms are simply decorated and each has a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is fitted to all rooms. Breakfast is locally sourced (artisanal and homemade) and is served every morning from 6.30am. It can be enjoyed on the shaded terrace. The restaurant is open every evening in high season and serves Mediterranean specialities. Menus are seasonal and buffet options are offered. This establishment is respectful of the environment through various measures aimed at reducing the environmental impact (selective sorting, water saving, LED bulbs, etc.) There is ample free parking for cars and a garage for motorbikes at an additional cost. Bastia-Poretta airport is 20 minutes away by car.

name: Hôtel Maora Village
description: No description found

name: Hotel Madame Mere
address: Route de Bastia, BP 56, 20217 Saint-Florent, Corsica
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the beach, Hotel Madame Mere offers an outdoor swimming pool, a local restaurant and a bar which serves cocktails. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Madame Mere offer a view of the mountains or the sea. It includes a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is provided. A continental breakfast is provided every morning. After breakfast, you can rest by the pool, on the furnished terrace. Saint-Florent’s Harbour is 1 km away. Activities nearby are hiking, paragliding and sailing. It is situated 35 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport and 25 km from the city of Bastia. WiFi is available in public areas (only) and is free of charge.

name: Lodge De Charme A Cheda
description: Surrounded by a large garden, A Cheda is located at the entrance of Bonifacio. From April to October, guests can make use of the heated outdoor pool and hot tub. Other spa facilities include a sauna and body treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has elegantly and individual decor with exposed beams and stone walls. They are equipped with a terrace overlooking the garden, flat-screen TV with DVD player and free WiFi. A Cheda’s restaurant offers gourmet Mediterranean cuisine made with local products and organic ingredients. Meals can be served in the chic dining area or beside the pool. A cookery workshop with the hotel's chef is available on site. For families with small children, a baby kit can be provided. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the outdoor terrace. Guided tours and boat trips can be organised. The hotel is a 7-minute drive from the Sperone golf course and a 15-minute drive from Figari Sud Airport.

name: Résidence Hôtelière A Trama
address: Route de Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Situated in Bonifacio, 2.4 km from Bonifacio Port, Résidence hôtelière A TRAMA features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 8.3 km from Former Chapel of the Trinity, 29 km from Porto Vecchio Port and 36 km from The Lion of Roccapina. Guests can use the hot tub, or enjoy garden views. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a hot tub and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. All units will provide guests with a microwave. King Aragon Steps is 3.9 km from Résidence hôtelière A TRAMA, while Sperone Golf Course is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Torremare
address: 2, Route du bord de mer Miomo Santa Maria Di Lota, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Torremare is a charming seaside hotel in the village of Miomo near Bastia. The rooms have views of the sea and Torra di Miomu. Each Torremare room has an en suite bathroom and some rooms have a balcony. Guests are invited to relax on the hotel’s terrace overlooking the sea. Torremare’s restaurant serves seasonal cuisine and offers a variety of local specialties. Local wines serve as the perfect complement to the regional dishes. Torremare is steps from the beach and Torra di Miomu, a Genoese tower that is one of the Official Historical Monuments of France. The hotel is conveniently located just 5 km outside of Bastia, famous for its wines and 27 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport. Guests have access to free private parking.

name: Hôtel U Livanti Ecolabel
address: Route de Belvedere Campomoro, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Bartaccia Hotel
address: 12 Quartier Bartaccia - Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Facing Valinco Gulf, Hotel Bartaccia is located in a 3-hectare flowered park in Propriano. It features a seasonal hot tub and 2 swimming pools, one of them heated. The modern guest rooms offer a private terrace or balcony with views of the garden or sea. Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels, mini-fridge and safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom that is fitted with a walk-in shower. Shops and activities can be found in Propriano and Hotel Bartaccia's staff can provide guests with advice on where to go. The beach of fine sand and the turquoise waters of the Mediterranean Sea are situated just 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant La Corniche
description: Situated at the entrance of Cap corse, Hôtel de la Corniche is in the village of San-Martino-di-Lota. The property features an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site restaurant features a terrace with far-reaching views of the valley and sea. Free WiFi is available. The guest rooms at Hôtel de la Corniche all have a flat-screen TV. Each room includes a private bathroom with bath and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a terrace and sea views. A buffet breakfast is available every morning and can be taken on the terrace. Local Corsican dishes are served in the restaurant. Additional local restaurants can be found in the village, a 2-minute walk away. Hôtel de la Corniche is 8 km from Bastia Port. Miomo Beach is a 15-minute drive away and Patrimonio vineyard is 40 minutes by car. Free private parking is provided.

name: Hotel Genovese
address: Quartier De La Citadelle Haute Ville, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located on the southern coast of Corsica in Bonifacio, Hotel Spa Genovese has a cliff top position with panoramic views. It has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and lounge chairs. Guests can dine in the onsite restaurant, and in the summer meals are served on the poolside. WiFi is available throughout the property. Renovated in 2018, rooms are situated in the Genovese’s main property, while the suites are in a separate port-side building. Each guest room has a modern décor with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Breakfast is served daily at Hotel Spa Genovese. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and specialises in Mediterranean fish and pasta dishes. Hotel Spa Genovese provides a 24-hour reception, where guided boat tours can be arranged. It offers free private parking, 20 km from the Figari-Sud Corse Airport.

name: ibis Styles Porto Vecchio
address: Lieu dit Poretta du Lavonieddu, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Discover southern Corsica at our ibis Styles hotel in the port town of Porto-Vecchio. Unwind on the heavenly beaches of Palombaggia and Santa Giulia, explore breathtaking hiking trails or discover the marina and Genoese citadel of Porto-Vecchio. At the hotel, you can enjoy our fitness center and rooftop pool with superb sea views, an all-you-can-eat breakfast with local flavors and a modern hut-style bar.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Centre Nautique
address: Quai Nord, Port de Plaisance, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located in Bonifacio, 1.3 km from Arinella Beach, Hotel Centre Nautique provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Centre Nautique each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast. Bonifacio Port is 100 metres from Hotel Centre Nautique, while Former Chapel of the Trinity is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Golden Tulip Porto Vecchio
description: Located in Porto-Vecchio, 1.3 km from Cala Verde Beach, Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Every room comes with a balcony with views of the sea. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Continental and American breakfast options are available daily at Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Marina di Fiori Beach is 2.4 km from Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio, while Crique de la Marina di Fiori is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Club Marina Viva
description: Located in Porticcio, Hotel Club Marina Viva is 16 km from Ajaccio in Corsica. It faces a 7-kilometre long beach and offers a swimming pool with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available in public areas. The rooms at Club Marina feature French doors leading onto a private balcony or terrace. Each has an LCD TV and a private bathroom with a shower and a toilet. Mediterranean cuisine is served in the restaurant and a second restaurant serves summer barbeque cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink in U Paradisu bar. Other facilities at Marina Viva include 3 tennis courts. Car rental is also available and free parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Punta e Mare
description: Hotel Punta e Mare is situated in Cargèse, 26 km from Ajaccio and 49 km from Calvi. Free private parking is available on site. Hotel Punta e Mare features free WiFi throughout the property. A flat-screen TV is offered. Corte is 49 km from Hotel Punta e Mare, while Porto Ota is 17 km from the property. Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport is 29 km away.

name: Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu
description: Located in Moriani-Plage with direct access to the sea, the recently renovated Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu offers a restaurant and terrace, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. With a 3-hectare park, this 3-star hotel offers rooms with air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. All rooms include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The property provides concierge and luggage storage services. Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu serves a buffet breakfast as well as dinner and lunch. You can play table tennis and tennis on site, as well as rent bicycles. The nearest airport is Bastia-Poretta Airport, 22 km away.

name: Hotel Résidence du Pont de l'Oso
description: Located in Porto-Vecchio in the Corsica region, Résidence du pont de l'Oso provides accommodation with free private parking. Some units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a coffee machine, as well as a kitchen. Barbecue facilities are included and guests can also relax in the garden, beside the infinity pool, or on the sun terrace. Porto Vecchio Port is 13 km from the aparthotel, while Bonifacio Port is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 32 km from Résidence du pont de l'Oso.

name: Hotel Residence Lido Marana
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Domaine de Piscia
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Castell'Verde
address: Baie de Santa Giulia CS 20101, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Surrounded by a garden and located 300 metres from Santa Giulia Bay, Hôtel Castell'Verde offers an outdoor heated pool, tennis court and a restaurant with panoramic views of the sea. Each air-conditioned room has a simple décor and a terrace with sea or garden views. They are equipped with flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The restaurant offers a buffet breakfast that is served on the terrace, from here guests can enjoy the panoramic views. Other services provided at the Hôtel Castell'Verde are free private parking and 24-front desk with free Wi-Fi access. Guests are also invited to relax in the pine tree garden. Activities in the nearby area include canoeing, snorkelling and hiking. Castell'Verde is 6 km from Porto-Vecchio City Centre and 19 km from Bonifacio.

name: Résidence Sophia
description: No description found

name: Hotel Kasano
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Sampiero Corso
address: 21 Route DE LA Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Located in Propriano, Hôtel Sampiero Corso offers self-catering apartments and suites. This Apart-Hotel features a restaurant, a private beach area, a bar and a terrace where guests can relax and enjoy the panoramic sea views. Free WiFi is provided throughout and there is free on-site parking. Each apartment has views of the sea and includes a dining area, a kitchenette, a seating area and a TV as well as a private bathroom. The rooms have a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a flat-screen TV. There is also a restaurant with sea view and a bar on the beach. Propriano port is a 15-minute walk from the property. Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport is 64 km away.

name: Le Royal Hôtel Restaurant
description: The hotel LE ROYAL is a family-run establishment located in the heart of the citadel of BONIFACIO. You will have the possibility to park your vehicle free of charge ( 300 m ). Its location will allow you to enjoy the many circuits offered by the city ( (the stairs of the Roy d'Aragon, the marine cemetery, the coastal paths… ). The marina is a 5 minute walk away, you can enjoy several activities as well as visiting the caves and LAVEZZI islands.The hotel has free Wi-Fi. The 14 rooms are equipped with air conditioning, double glazing, private bathroom/ shower with free toiletries. The property offers an outdoor terrace and a veranda where you can enjoy breakfast or discover the restaurant’s specialities. A few kilometres away you will find our most beautiful beaches (Sant' Amanza, Paraguan, Tonnara; Rondinara ) as well as the beaches of the Sperone Golf Course.

name: Calvi Hôtel
address: Avenue Christophe Colomb BP18, Calvi, Corsica
description: Calvi Hôtel is set in a pine forest in northern Corsica, 50 metres from Calvi Beach and 800 metres from Calvi Port. The property features free WiFi at the reception and desks where guests can use their laptops. Each guest room is equipped with a TV, minibar, air conditioning and balcony. Some rooms have a living room and sea views. All of the rooms have a neutral décor and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. At Calvi Hôtel guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served every morning in the breakfast room. Free private parking and a car rental service are available on site. Calvi - Sainte-Catherine Airport is just 5.5 km from the property.

name: Campo di Fiori, Maisons de Charme
address: Route De Pietra Maggiore, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Located 600 metres from Calvi centre, Campo di Fiori, Maisons de Charme provides rooms, villas and studios decorated in an elegant and traditional style and set in a 3000 m2 garden. Guests can relax at the bar, around the barbecue area or in their air-conditioned accommodation. Most accommodation types feature a private terrace and include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All have an equipped kitchenette with a Nespresso coffee machine. A brunch including pasta salad, Corsican jams and French pastries is available at a surcharge and upon request. Guests can also request a typical breakfast and grocers can be found within 200 metres. Other facilities are available such as laundry service, free WiFi access in all areas and a free private car park. The property is located 300 metres from the beach and 600 metres from the harbour.

name: Hotel Capo Rosso
description: Hôtel Capo Rosso is located in Piana, just 8 km from the beach and 11 km from Porto. It offers a heated outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with panoramic views of Scandola Gulf. The rooms at Hôtel Capo Rosso feature a private balcony or terrace with sea views. Each one is air conditioned and has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with bathrobes and slippers. There are over 60 products available for breakfast including Corsican specialities and homemade cakes. You can also choose to have a drink on the terrace before sampling regional cuisine in the restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access and free private parking are just some of the other facilities available at this hotel. The 24-hour reception can tell you about the Calanche de Piana.

name: Le Ruone
address: Chemin de Petra Nera, 20111 Calcatoggio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: La Caravelle
description: Situated on Bonifacio harbour, Hotel la Caravelle features a mediterranean style restaurant with terrasse on the harbor. It is just 20 km from Figari Sud airport. All of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel la Caravelle have views of the port or the courtyard. Each offers an LCD TV. Their private bathrooms come with amenities and the suites and superior rooms have slippers and bath robes. For your information, the harbor view rooms are noisier during the summer season, an outdoor bar with musical entertainment is located nearby. The breakfast is served in the restaurant. The lounge bar and terrace provides a nice spot to relax with a drink and browse the free WiFi. Just a 10-minute walk from the town centre, the hotel is ideally located for exploring southern Corsica’s biggest town. Free parking and a closed bike garage are available on site.

name: Holzer II
description: Hotel Holzer II is located at the entrance of Porto Vecchio, in the south of Corsica near the beaches. It offers air-conditioning and soundproofed guest rooms. All of the rooms have cable TV and free WiFi internet access. Some rooms provide a small fridge and a courtesy tray. Holzer II also has a conference room. Many bars and restaurants can be found in the lively centre of Porto Vecchio. In addition to the garage for bicycles, a limited amount of paid private parking spaces are available on site.

name: Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar
address: San Ciprianu Boulevard Napoléon, 20137 Lecci, Corsica
description: Facing the beachfront, Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar offers 4-star accommodation in Porto-Vecchio and features a terrace, restaurant and bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a hammam and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto-Vecchio, like cycling. Saint Cyprien is 200 metres from the hotel, while Tour Beach is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 31 km from Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar.

name: Dominique Colonna
address: Vallée de la Restonica - BP83, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Dominique Colonna is located in Corte. The property features a bar, and a terrace with river views where guests can enjoy a continental breakfast upon reservation. Free WiFi access is available throughout. The rooms are soundproofed and come with air conditioning, a private terrace, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The bathrooms have a bath or shower and come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box. At Dominique Colonna you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a sundeck where you can relax. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. Free parking is possible on site. The hotel is 55 km from Bastia Porreta Airport and 78 km from Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport.

name: Résidence Roc e Mare
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a crib.Expedia

name: A Santa Trinita
description: Situated in Bonifacio, a 5-minute walk from Former Chapel of the Trinity, A Santa Trinita is set amongst 4 hectares and features barbecue facilities, a garden and a terrace, as well as free WiFi. The property is set 4.1 km from Bonifacio Port and 13 km from Lavezzi Islands. The property offers chalets and villas. All units come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units come with a kitchen including an oven, dishwasher and washing machine. The bathroom is fitted with a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided. An outdoor pool is also featured. You can play table tennis at A Santa Trinita. Donkeys, hens and ducks live near the property. King Aragon Steps is 3.6 km from the accommodation. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 10 km away.

name: l'Escale Cote Sud
description: L'Escale Côté Sud has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in LʼÎle-Rousse. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At L'Escale Côté Sud rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near L'Escale Côté Sud include Napoleon Beach, Nautique Beach and Digue Beach. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Moby Dick
address: Plage de Santa Giulia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located on a sandy beach with parasols and deckchairs, Hôtel Moby Dick offers classy rooms with sea or lake view and a restaurant with panoramic views of the sea. Each air-conditioned room has a private furnished terrace and is equipped with free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The restaurant prepares a buffet breakfast and traditional Corsican cuisine. Meals are served in the dining room or on the panoramic terrace and lush garden. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Other services provided at the Hôtel Moby Dick are free private parking and 24-front desk. Moby Dick is 7.4 km from Porto-Vecchio City Centre and 19.3 km from Bonifacio.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Filosorma
description: Le Filosorma is located just outside the Corsican town of Galéria a few steps from the beach. Each room has a private balcony with sea views, a TV and a private bathroom. The Filosorma’s restaurant serves regional specialties and fish caught locally. Guests can enjoy meals and drinks on the hotel terrace. Guests of the Hotel Restaurant Le Filosorma can enjoy hiking and mountain biking in the surrounding countryside. Numerous water sports are at the nearby Corsican beaches.

name: Le Vieux Moulin
description: Set in Centuri, 39 km from Santa Giulia Church, Hotel-Restaurant Le Vieux Moulin offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. Guests can enjoy Seafood and local dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms include a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, some units at Hotel-Restaurant Le Vieux Moulin also have a garden view. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Nonza Tower is 39 km from Hotel-Restaurant Le Vieux Moulin, while Bastia Port is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta, 70 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Monte d'Oro
description: Set on the GR20 hiking route, this hotel offers a lounge where you can sit by the fireplace and relax with a drink from the bar. It is a 30-minute drive from Cascade du Voile de la Mariée Waterfall. Free WiFi access is available in certain rooms and in public areas. The rooms at Hotel Monte d'Oro feature views of the surrounding countryside. Each one is decorated in an individual style and also provides an en suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served on the terrace or under the ivy canopy in the restaurant. Home-made dishes are also offered throughout the day, which are prepared using old family recipes and organic ingredients where possible. Free internet access is available in public areas and free private parking is available on site. Corté is a 30-minute drive from the hotel, or you may also choose to walk the 10 minutes to the Agnone River.

name: Hotel Castel d'Orcino
address: Baie de la Liscia, 20111 Calcatoggio, Corsica
description: Hotel Castel d’Orcino is set on the southern Corsican coast, overlooking the Mediterranean sea, 800 metres from Calcatoggio beach. It provides peaceful accommodation with 2 swimming pools. The spacious guest rooms feature air conditioning, free Wi-Fi internet access and a patio or balcony. Castel d’Orcino offers a daily buffet breakfast which can be served in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Free private parking is available for guests exploring the surrounding countryside and national parks by car. The town of Ajaccio, with its port and rail connections, is 20 km away. Campo dell’Oro Airport is • 25 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Hr
description: Located in Corte, Hotel HR offers accommodation in a students residence a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 350 metres from Corte Train Station. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds and a garden with outdoor furniture, where guests can enjoy a picnic. Free WiFi is available in the rooms and in the public areas. The studios and apartments feature a kitchenette and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a toilet. The Eco Double Rooms offer a wardrobe and a shower. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room or in the garden, weather permitting. Guests can enjoy a weight room, a self-service laundry room and a drinks vending machine. Private parking is also available on site. Hotel has renovated his outside features during the winter!

name: Hotel Les Hauts de Porto-Vecchio
address: Hameau de la Trinité de Porto Vecchio, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hôtel le Subrini
address: Place de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Subrini offers a seasonal outdoor pool a 4-minute walk away in another property. It is located on the west coast of Corsica, 500 metres from the beach and has views of Porto Genoese Tower. Each air-conditioned guest room has a sea view and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and free Wi-Fi access. All of the modern rooms have a spacious bathroom including a hairdryer. Guests of Hôtel le Subrini benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. Free private parking is available on site at Hôtel le Subrini and there is a garage for motorbikes. The harbour is 300 metres away and boat trips can be arranged.

name: Hotel Corsica
description: Hotel Corsica offers panoramic view of Calvi bay, set in the Corsican hills. It has an outdoor heated pool, sunbathing terrace Each of the Hotel Corsica’s air-conditioned guest rooms has a private bathroom with amenities, satellite TV and a private balcony. Free WiFi is available. For no extra fee, guests of Hotel Corsica can relax in the spa area which includes a hammam, a sauna, a hot tub and a fitness room. For a fee, massages and other treatments using Corsican products can be booked. A full buffet breakfast is available in the mornings and lunch can be enjoyed by the Hotel Corsica’s swimming pool. Room service options are also available. The shuttle to the Calvi airport and train station is free and the shuttle to the city centre and the beach is possible provided the purchase of a package for € 20.00 per day and per room.

name: La Solenzara Hôtel
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa, La Solenzara hôtel / Résidence is located in Sari Solenzara by the sea. Free WiFi access is available. The hotel is located on the beachfront, 37.9 km from Porto-Vecchio and 500 meter from the marina. Each room is accessible by stairs only and will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Guests can also stay in a ground floor apartment with a bedroom, equipped kitchenette, bathroom and living room. At La Solenzara hôtel / Résidence you will find a hot tub, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, luggage storage and dry cleaning. The property offers free parking. The property is at the foot of the Bavella mountains, where guests can go hiking or canyoning. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 65 km away. Located 200 meters from the center of Sari Solenzara. Our rooms are comfortable without fridge and balcony. Only the apartments have a small kitchen with fridge and small terrace. Pool towels available at reception free of charge.

name: Résidence Hôtelière Alcyon
description: Just 200 metres from the centre of Porto-Vecchio, Résidence Hôtélière Alcyon offers self-catering apartments with balconies. All of the accommodation is serviced by a lift and free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the property. Each of the air-conditioned apartments includes a fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and ironing facilities. All feature modern décor in neutral tones and a private bathroom with shower. Local cafes and restaurants can be found within can be found within 15 minutes on foot and the Tourist Information office is a 6-minute walk away. Residence BW is a 30-minute drive from Bonifacio. Ferry connections to Marseille and Civitavecchia are possible from Porto-Vecchio, 2 km away. Figari Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Villa Les Orangers
description: Hôtel Villa Les Orangers is a hotel set in the hills in the village of Olmeto, just 4.5 km from Mediterranean beaches and 6 km from Propriano. It offers a swimming pool, and spacious guest rooms with free WiFi access. The air-conditioned accommodations at Hôtel Villa Les Orangers are decorated in neutral earth tones and have views of the mountains and valley. A flat-screen TV and a private bathroom are provided in each room or suite. A continental breakfast is available every day. Guests also have access to a large terrace area facing the valley and a guest laundry. Propriano has ferry connection to Marseille and Porto Torres. Bonifacio and Ajaccio are both 60 km from the villa. Public parking is available 50 metres away.

name: Les Appartements du Port
description: Les Appartements du Port offers ApartHotel accommodation overlooking the harbour in Bonifacio on Corsica’s southern coast. The apartments come with air conditioning and free WiFi is available in public areas. Apartments at Les Appartements du Port are equipped with cable TV, a telephone and private bathroom. The apartments have views of the harbour or the courtyard. Bonifacio's walled city is only 850 metres away. Les Appartements du Port is 18 km from Figari Sud-Corse Airport and 25 km from Porto-Vecchio. Guests have access to free private parking 150 metres from the property.

name: Casa Alta
description: This authentic, stone built B&B is located in Vizzavona is surrounded by a pine forest. It features free Wi-Fi access. Each soundproofed room at the Casa Alta offers forests views and a fireplace. Each is equipped with a private bathroom and wooden floors. Breakfast is served daily in the lounge. Guests can relax in Casa Alta‘s garden or on the terrace. The B&B is 500 metres from the local restaurants. Free private parking is provided. It is 41.2 km from Ajaccio-Napoléon Bonaparte Airport and 45 km from Ajaccio. Activities in the area include hiking, cycling and horse-riding.

name: kyrn flor
address: Lieu Dit U San Gavinu, Rn193, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Situated in Corte, kyrn flor offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as pool with a view and a garden. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Lake Melu is 19 km from kyrn flor, while Goria Lake is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 57 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Restaurant L'Europe
address: Port de Plaisance Place Des Portes, 20217 Saint-Florent, Corsica
description: Offering a sun terrace and views of the sea, Hotel Restaurant L'Europe is located in Saint-Florent Port, at the foot of both the Balagne Region and the Cap of Corsica. Calvi is 68 km from the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, free luggage storage is available. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hotel Restaurant L'Europe features free WiFi. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, that won the Chef's Hat award in the Gault et Millau Restaurant Guide. Public parking is available at an extra cost in front of the hotel. Bastia is 13 km from Hotel Restaurant L'Europe, while Corte is 43 km away. Bastia - Poretta Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: B&B Arghjola
description: No description found

name: L'Orca di San Gavinu
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Housekeeping is provided once per stay, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Business}, Other Amenities Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Figari, L'Orca Di San Gavinu is in the mountains, within a 15-minute drive of Pisciu Cane and Plage de Figari. This bed & breakfast is 15.4 mi (24.8 km) from Santa Giulia Beach and 13.5 mi (21.6 km) from Bonifacio Port. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Table D'Hôtes serving guests of L'Orca Di San Gavinu. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. name: Hotel Revellata
description: Hotel Revellata is located in the Corsican town of Calvi, 450 metres from the harbour and 100 metres from Ronco Beach. It has an outdoor heated pool, a gym, and a spa with a hot tub, sauna and indoor lap pool. Free WiFi is available throughout and free secure private parking is available onsite. Each guest room at the Revellata features air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms have a private balcony. Guests of the Revellata Hotel can relax with a drink in the bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Massages are available upon reservation and for an extra charge. The Hotel Revellata is situated 1 km from Calvi Beach and the Cathedral. The Torra di Calvi are just 500 metres away and guests can enjoy tennis and water sports nearby.

name: Le Roc e Fiori Hotel
description: Located 4km south of Porto-Vecchio in Corsica, the Roc E Fiori Hotel is near the Santa Giulia and Palombaggia beaches. It has a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam and pool-side terrace. Massages can be arranged, at an extra cost. Le Roc E Fiori offers rooms with a private terrace that overlooks the garden and the mountains. They each have a separate seating area with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Fiori’s bar and have lunch at the pool bar. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout and a computer is at guests' disposal at the reception. The hotel also offers a bicycle and scooter rental service, massages and exfoliating treatments upon request.

name: Maison San Giovanni
address: Route d'Aleria - T50 - Chemin Saint Jean, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Located in Corte in the Corsica Region, 15 km from Lake Melo, Maison San Giovanni features a sun terrace and views of the mountain. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Maison San Giovanni features free WiFi. There is a shared lounge at the property. Bastia - Poretta Airport is 39 km away.

name: Macchie e Fiori
description: Offering a children's playground and terrace, Macchie e Fiori is set in Pianottoli-Caldarello in the Corsica Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a private bathroom. There is room service at the property. Free WiFi is available in communal areas of Macchie e Fiori. Porto-Vecchio is 22 km from Macchie e Fiori, while Bonifacio is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, only 4 km from the property.

name: Village Vacances La Vallicella
description: This holiday village is located on the beachfront in the Corsican town of Poggio Mezzana. It offers an outdoor pool and furnished apartments with terraces. Free WiFi access is available. Each apartment at Village Vacances La Vallicella has a kitchenette equipped with a fridge and cooking facilities. Guests also have access to a microwave and BBQ facilities upon request at the reception desk. A hairdryer, baby equipment and ironing facilities are available upon request, free of charge. La Vallicella’s restaurant serves regional cuisine and has a terrace which extends onto the beach. Guests are also invited to enjoy a drink in the bar. There are several activities available on-site including volleyball, pool and French bowls. Boating and fishing can be enjoyed for an extra fee. Village Vacances La Vallicella is just a 25-minute drive from Bastia-Poretta Airport.

name: Domaine de Peretti della Rocca
description: With mountain views, Domaine de Peretti della Rocca is set in Figari and has a restaurant, a concierge service, bar, garden, picnic area and seasonal outdoor pool. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Some units feature a seating area and/or a patio. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. At the aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of an open-air bath. If you would like to discover the area, cycling and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Domaine de Peretti della Rocca can arrange a bicycle rental service. Porto Vecchio Port is 16 km from the accommodation, while Former Chapel of the Trinity is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 6 km from Domaine de Peretti della Rocca.

name: Hôtel Restaurant U Castellu Vizzavona
description: Hôtel Restaurant U Castellu Vizzavona is located in central Corsica, in the mountainside village of Vizzavona. Surrounded by a pine and beech forest, each guest room has a private bathroom, and free Wi-Fi. The hotel overlooks the forest and Monte Vizzavona Oro. Each room also has a satellite TV, soundproofed windows and a walk-in shower. Breakfast is available in the mornings and guests of the Hôtel Restaurant U Castellu Vizzavona can relax on the hotel terrace and in the garden. For lunch and dinner guests can enjoy traditional local cuisine in the hotel restaurant, which is open 7 days per week. Evening entertainment including traditional Corsican music is organised regularly. The hotel also offers Corsican charcuterie and cheese tasting. The Hôtel Restaurant U Castellu Vizzavona is set in a conservation area and guests can enjoy hiking and mountain biking in the rugged countryside around the hotel. Ajaccio and the beaches on the west coast of Corsica are a 50 minute drive from the hotel Hôtel Restaurant U Castellu Vizzavona. Free parking is provided.

name: Hotel Palombaggia
address: Route de la Plage de Palombaggia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool and free WiFi in public areas, Hôtel Palombaggia is located in Porto-Vecchio. The property is a 5-minute walk from Palombaggia Beach. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and safety deposit box. Featuring a bath or shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy pool views and garden views from the rooms. Extras include a seating area and satellite channels. At Hôtel Palombaggia you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Services include luggage storage. Offering free private parking, the hotel is 144 km from Campo Dell Oro Airport. It is 30 km from Figari Sud-Corse Airport.

name: Hotel Arcu Di Sole
description: With a stay at Hôtel Arcu Di Sole in Olmeto, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Les Bains de Baracci and Mare e Monti Sud. This hotel is 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Eglise Notre-Dame de la Misericorde and 1.9 mi (3 km) from Propriano Beach. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. At Hôtel Arcu Di Sole, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Stay in one of 50 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: A Speranza Suites De Charme By A Cheda
address: Route de Porto Vecchio, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located in Bonifacio, 4.6 km from Bonifacio Port, A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. All units at A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda are equipped with a seating area. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 7.7 km from A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda, while Porto Vecchio Port is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Abbartello
description: Set in the south west of Corsica, this seafront hotel provides direct access to Olmeto beach. Guests can have breakfast on their private balconies or on the bar’s panoramic terrace. The bright rooms at the Hôtel Abbartello are air conditioned and equipped with a TV and a minibar. They offer beautiful views of the sea. The private bathrooms feature a shower and a hairdryer. The hotel is surrounded by a garden. The Abbartello’s restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. Meals are served on the panoramic terrace overlooking the Gulf of Valinco. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and free WiFi access is available in the entire Hotel Abbartello. Guests can rent a boat 5 km away, or a bicycle 10 km away. Abbartello hotel is a 10-minute drive from Propriano, 48 km from Ajaccio and 66 km from Figari Sud-Corse Airport. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Le Neptune & Spa
description: Le Neptune & Spa is located in the centre of Propriano in the south of Corsica, in Valinco bay. It offers a hammam, hot tub and fitness room, which are available at certain times and subject to availability. Free private parking is available onsite. Le Neptune & Spa has air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms offer a view of the sea. The spa centre offers a variety of body and beauty treatments (upon reservation and at an extra cost) and guests enjoy a 15% discount for all services. Le Neptune & Spa also features a terrace with a sea view. Discover the Valinco bay, Propriano and the surroundings villages. The area offers many activities such as scuba-diving and horse-riding. Figari Sud-Corse airport is a 60-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Version Maquis Santa Manza
description: Hôtel Version Maquis is located in the Bonifacio country side, overlooking the Santa Manza Bay. The property offers an outdoor pool, a free shuttle to the beach, a garden and free Wi-Fi. All rooms feature contemporary decor, a terrace with sea views, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a mini bar. The private bathrooms are fully equipped and come with free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and the hotel has an onsite bar. Restaurants can be found 6 km away. The property is 7 km from Bonifacio, 20 km from Porto-Vecchio and 20 km from Figari. Free parking is possible on site. The Sperone Golf Course can be found 7 km away.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: Auberge de Cannedda
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and free WiFi, as well as climate control and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include premium bedding, towels, housekeeping, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: La Demeure Coloniale
address: Rue Piétonne Moriani Plage 60 rue Jean Tafani, 20230 Moriani-Plage, Corsica
description: Situated in Moriani Plage, within 400 metres of Moriani Plage and 500 metres of Santa Lucia di Moriani Beach, Hôtel La Demeure Coloniale features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 700 metres from Plage de Poggiole, 35 km from Station de Furiani and 42 km from Bastia Port. Ponte-Novu Train Station is 37 km from the hotel and Ponte-Leccia Train Station is 45 km away. The rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and some units at the hotel have a balcony. At Hôtel La Demeure Coloniale every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 24 km from Hôtel La Demeure Coloniale.

name: Hôtel Le Belvédère
address: Route de Palombaggia - B.P. 56, 20537 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Belvédère sits among pine, eucalyptus and palm trees, just opposite the old town of Porto-Vecchio. It offers 2 outdoor hot tubs and an outdoor infinity pool with sea views, surrounded by a furnished sun deck. All of the rooms feature a private terrace with a garden view and an en suite bathroom with bath, bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. They are also air conditioned, have flat-screen TV and offer free Wi-Fi. A gastronomic restaurant and a grill restaurant, Mari e Tarra, are available on site, as well as a restaurant specialising in seafood. They offer outdoor seating with pleasant views of the surroundings. A bar and a wine cellar are also provided to enhance your gastronomic experience.

name: San Larenzu
address: Rue de la Poste, 20116 Aullene, Corsica
description: Situated in Aullène in the Corsica region, San Larenzu features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with mountain or garden views. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. The restaurant at San Larenzu specialises in French cuisine. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a hot tub, or in the garden. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go cycling and walking tours nearby. Archaeological site of Cucuruzzu and Capula is 31 km from the accommodation, while Propriano Port is 37 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 59 km from San Larenzu.

name: Alivi
description: Located in Bastia, overlooking a charming pebble beach, the Alivi hotel welcomes you to a world of quietness and relaxation. Choose among 37 air-conditioned rooms which all come with a terrace overlooking the sea. The hotel also boasts a swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens in which to enjoy unforgettable moments. Gourmets will gather at the Archipel restaurants serving sunny flavours in a cosy atmosphere. Enjoy lunch or dinner with a breathtaking view of the Tuscan islands.

name: Castellu Rossu
description: This Corsican hotel is located in Lucciana, 2 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport and 15 km south from Bastia. It is set in a large park and features a large outdoor pool, a tennis court and free Wi-Fi. The hotel consists of 2 buildings, the Castellu Rossu and the Castellu. Each guest room is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. The rooms also have private bathrooms. Some have a terrace or a balcony with garden views. The Rossu is a 15-minute drive from the sea and 25 km from Saint-Florent. Guests can go golfing 3 km away. For guests coming by car, free private parking is available.

name: A'mare Corsica - Seaside Resort
address: Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 26 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 spa tubs or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Propriano? This hotel has 700 square feet (65 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Miramar Corsica in Propriano, you'll be on the waterfront, just a 3-minute walk from Southern Corsica Beaches and a 2-minute drive from Les Bains de Baracci. This 5-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Plage de Capu Laurosu and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Portigliolo Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Le Deck Lounge, a poolside bar/lounge which features a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between September 19 and May 25. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.20 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 32 for adults and EUR 25 for children Pet fee: EUR 35 per pet, per day Service animals are exempt from fees Rollaway bed fee: EUR 75.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
