name: Hôtel Restaurant La Caravelle
description: Nestled in the charming little seaside town of Solenzara located on the eastern coast of the island, 100 km south of Bastia and 35 km north of Porto-Vecchio, the hotel La Caravelle is a small charming three-star hotel tastefully decorated, completely renovated, located 600 meters from the beach with direct access on foot. With air conditioning and double glazing, our hotel will guarantee you a peaceful and pleasant stay, with the promise of peaceful nights. Our restaurant offers refined cuisine in a pleasant and warm setting. The Caravelle reinvents itself: You can now relax in the greatest comfort around our new heated swimming pool and its cocktail bar with snacking service and pancake and waffle tasting for the little hungry. All our rooms have been renovated to optimize your comfort, as well as the creation of a prestige room with sea view.

name: Hotel Olmuccio
description: Hotel Olmuccio is located in Olmucciu, 20 km from Porto-Vecchio and 49 km from Bonifacio. The hotel has an outdoor pool, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Each room includes a private bathroom. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 44 km from the property.

name: Résidence U Pirellu
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, a hair dryer, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Résidence Casarina
address: Route De Maora Golfe De Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Hotel de la Plage Santa Vittoria
description: This charming, typically Corsican hotel enjoys a peaceful situation between sea and mountains. The friendly Hotel de la Plage Santa Vittoria offers comfortable rooms with sea or mountain views. Start the day off with a generous breakfast served in the dining room with its panoramic terrace. Enjoy relaxing moments as you sip a drink on the shady terrace. Free private parking is provided at the Hotel de la Plage Santa Vittoria, making it easy to explore Corsica by car.

name: Hôtel Le Roi Théodore & Spa
address: Avenue De Bastia Bp 9, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, an indoor heated pool, a bar and a restaurant, Hôtel Le Roi Théodore is located in Porto Vecchio. Some rooms at the hotel have a lounge-balcony overlooking the swimming pool or park. The spa area features a hamman, a spa bath and offers massages and facials. Ideally located 30 minutes' drive from the nearest airport, the hotel is also less than 5 minutes' drive from the old town centre. Cala Rossa and Saint-Cyprien beaches are 8 km away. Night-clubs, lounge-bars and restaurants are nearby, as are opportunities for enjoying numerous outdoor and water-based recreational activities. Hôtel Le Roi Théodore has its own private car park.

name: Residence Santa Maria
description: Set in LʼÎle-Rousse, 50 metres from Digue Beach, RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Located around 200 metres from Nautique Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 800 metres away from Napoleon Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 70 metres from Lotissement des Iles Beach. All guest rooms come with a fridge, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature sea views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Guests at RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. L'Ile-Rousse Port is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Pietra Lighthouse is a 16-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA.

name: Residence & Hotel Aria Marina
description: No description found

name: Résidence Chiar' DI Luna
description: No description found

name: Bungalows Filippi
description: No description found

name: Hôtel les Arbousiers
address: Route de Pietra Maggiore, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Offering free WiFi in communal areas, Hôtel les Arbousiers is located in Calvi. The property is 290 metres from the beach, 500 metres from the port and 1 km from the Citadel of Calvi. Each room here will provide you with a TV and a balcony. Featuring a bath or shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a fan. At Hôtel les Arbousiers you will find a 24-hour front desk and a shaded terrace overlooking a flowered garden. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served every morning. A restaurant is also available for groups. Additional facilities include a tea room, a reading room and a shared lounge area. Offering free parking, the property is 6 km from Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport and a 2-minute drive from Calvi Train Station.

name: Le Balamina
description: Set in Porto-Vecchio, 1.9 km from Cala Verde Beach, Le Balamina offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are room service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Le Balamina provides some units that feature a balcony, and every room includes a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Le Balamina. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the hotel. Marina di Fiori Beach is 2.9 km from Le Balamina, while Porto Vecchio Port is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: L'Escale
address: 2 Avenue Général de Gaulle, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: L'Escale offers accommodation with free WiFi access in the port of Bonifacio. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. All rooms come with a private bathroom. Selected rooms offer a sea view. L'Escale serves a daily continental breakfast. Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant, which serves French cuisine. Free parking is available 300 metres from the property. The Former Chapel of the Trinity is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 21 km from the property.

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: U Libecciu
address: Route de la Plage, 20248 Macinaggio, Haute-Corse
description: The U Libecciu is a 100 meters away from the beach, and close to the Port de Plaisance and the Marina de Macinaggio, in the north of Cap Corse. The hotel has an outdoor heated swimming pool and offers free internet Wi-Fi connection and a free private secure parking. All the U Libecciu's rooms are functional. They are air conditioned and have a balcony or terrace.

name: Maranatha Porto Vecchio
description: A short distance from motor boating, fishing, and more, this pet-friendly villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 11-minute drive to Santa Giulia Beach or the 10-minute drive to Palombaggia Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the communal pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this 700-sq-ft villa, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom rental features a BBQ grill, air conditioning, concierge services, and local meal delivery service. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And thanks to the washer and dryer, you'll even be able to travel light.VRBO

name: Hotel Bella Vista
address: Route de Calvi - Lieu-dit Budé, 20150 Ota, Corsica
description: Situated midway between Calvi and Ajaccio, this charming hotel is located in Porto, a city classified as a World Heritage site by UNESCO. It features a bar and a garden. Tucked away from the centre of the resort, Hôtel Bella Vista features comfortable guest rooms, all equipped with a television and air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi connection is available. Ideally situated between Scandola Gulf and the Orto Capo 1294 metres high, Porto offers numerous outdoor and water leisure activities. Hôtel Bella Vista is located a one and a half-hour drive from Sainte Catherine Airport.

name: Résidence Cabanaccia
description: Located on the west coast of Corsica, this air-conditioned residence is 1.5 km from Bussaglia Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace in the tree-lined garden. A flat-screen TV is included in each room and studio at Résidence Cabanaccia. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All apartments feature a balcony and a kitchenette with a microwave. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the Cabanaccia Residence. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar while using the free Wi-Fi access. The village of Serreria is just 800 metres from the residence and Porto is 5 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Le Claridge
description: Located in Propriano town centre, Hotel Le Claridge is just a 5-minute walk from the beach on the west coast of Corsica. It offers soundproofed accommodation with private balconies. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms at the Claridge Hotel are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. They each have a private bathroom and parquet floors. A breakfast buffet is available every morning at Le Claridge. Free private parking is available on site at Hotel Claridge. Guests can easily visit the neighbouring villages of Sartene Olmeto and Fozzano, located less than 15 km away. Local leisure activities include canoeing and diving.

name: Le Golfe
description: This 5-star Hotel is situated a short walk from the beach in Porto Pollo, south-west Corsica. All guest rooms have a terrace overlooking the sea and Valinco Bay and there is a heated swimming pool on site. Each of Le Golfe’s rooms also has air-conditioning, TV and free internet access. The Le Golfe's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and offers Mediterranean cuisine made with local ingredients, a fresh fish of the day dish, Corsican specialties and grilled meat. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar during the evenings or enjoy jet ski sessions, available at an additional cost. Le Golfe is located a 1-hour’s drive from Ajaccio and 17 km from Propriano. Guests can enjoy water sports at the nearby beaches and hiking in the surrounding countryside.

name: Prea Gianca
address: Route de Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Set in Bonifacio, 2.3 km from Bonifacio Port, Prea Gianca offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel has a restaurant and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 8.2 km from Former Chapel of the Trinity. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a garden view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Prea Gianca. Porto Vecchio Port is 30 km from the accommodation, while The Lion of Roccapina is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from Prea Gianca.

name: I Casilari
description: Located in Favalella, I Casilari offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers, a garden, terrace and free Wi-Fi access throughout. It is just over 1 km from the sea and 17 km from Propriano harbour. The 1-bedroom apartment has a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen. All rooms feature a wardrobe and heating, while some also have air conditioning and a TV. The en suite bathrooms include free toiletries. Only the comfort room and the apartment offer a private terrace with pool views. A continental breakfast serving pastries, bread, jam and seasonal fruit is provided each morning at I Casilari. Ajaccio is just under an hour’s drive away and its airport is 50 km from the property. Additional features include rooms for guests with reduced mobility and free private parking on site.

name: Le Magnolia
description: This hotel is located in a mansion from the last century, completely restored in the heart of Calvi. It is a 5-minute walk from the beach and the port. You can relax under the century-old magnolia tree on the patio. The air-conditioned rooms are individually decorated in a classic style and offer views of the garden, the city or the sea. Each room also has an LCD satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Some are equipped with a refrigerator and a safe (depending on room category). A continental breakfast is served every morning in the shade of the Magnolia. The on-site restaurant offers local products and regional specialties. The Calvi Train Station is 400 metres from the hotel and the Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport is a 15-minute drive away. The hotel is 550 metres from the Calvi Cathedral.

name: Nature & Design
address: Lieu Dit Cavallo Morto, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and a garden, Nature & Design offers B&B accommodation in a traditional olive grove in Bonifacio. Free Wi-Fi access is available for guests. All rooms feature a private terrace with a view, a desk and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete and comes with free toiletries. Breakfast can be served on the private terrace and includes pastries, fresh fruit, cheese and additional local products. There is a minibar in the room and restaurants can be found within walking distance. Nature & Design is 3 km from Bonifacio city centre and 24 km from Porto-Vecchio. The property offers free parking.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Poisson Rouge
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Ideal
address: Place de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Located in Porto, Hôtel Ideal offers a swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with views of the sea or mountains. Guest rooms at Hôtel ideal are bright and feature a flat-screen TV. Each has an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by an elevator and some have a balcony. Many shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Guests of Hôtel Ideal benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. The hotel is situated opposite The Genoese Tower and 300 metres from Porto Harbour, where boat trips are available to the Les Calanques de Piana. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Hôtel Flor
address: Route De La Cathedrale, 20217 Saint-Florent, Corsica
description: Located in Saint-Florent, 700 metres from Plage de la Roya, Hôtel Flor provides accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Tettola Beach. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, all units at Hôtel Flor have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hôtel Flor. Olzo Beach is 2.8 km from the hotel, while Nonza Tower is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 30 km from Hôtel Flor.

name: Hotel Costa Rossa
address: Route de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Costa Rossa is 700 metres from Porto Beach and 300 metres from Marine de Porto town centre. On a lower terrace, it offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a eucalyptus forest. Rooms at Costa Rossa are contemporary in style and have a private balcony with views of the sea, river or forest. Each is decorated in neutral tones and the studios feature a kitchenette to make small meals. Every morning, guests can enjoy a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace. The terrace also provides a nice spot to relax with a drink and admire the sea view. Additional facilities include 2 lifts and luggage storage in reception. Piana creeks are just 10 km from the residence and 8 private parking spaces are free on site.

name: Résidence Vasca D'oro
description: Résidence Vasca d'Oro offers self-catering accommodations located a 10-minute drive from Porto-Vecchio. Set in a 1-hectare landscaped park, this resort features a bar with a terrace and a tennis court. There is a hot tub, a sauna and 2 swimming pools, one of which is heated. All the villas and apartments at Vasca d’Oro have a furnished terrace with a barbecue. Each accommodation is air-conditioned. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, a stove and an electric kettle. Bread and French pastries can be delivered to your door upon request. Additional facilities at Vasca d’Oro include massage treatments, childcare services and rental bicycles. Santa-Giulia Beach and Palombaggia Beach are both about a 10-minute drive away, and local shops can be found within 2 km. The accommodation is situated 25 km from Figari Airport and a 30-minute drive from the city of Bonifacio.

name: Hotel Palazzu Pigna
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Palazzu Pigna offers 3-star accommodation in Pigna and has a garden, terrace and restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 9.1 km of L'Ile-Rousse Port. The air-conditioned rooms provide a sea view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. At the hotel, each room has a balcony with a mountain view. At Hotel Palazzu Pigna, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. The area is popular for hiking and fishing, and car hire is available at Hotel Palazzu Pigna. Pietra Lighthouse is 9.2 km from the hotel, while Codole Lake is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 20 km from Hotel Palazzu Pigna.

name: Monsieur Miot Concept Hotel - Bastia centre
description: Boasting a bar, Monsieur Miot Concept Hotel - Bastia centre is set in Bastia in the Corsica region, 1.5 km from Saint Joseph Beach and 1.5 km from Minelli Beach. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Bastia Port. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. All rooms include a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms in Monsieur Miot Concept Hotel - Bastia centre are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Station de Furiani is 7.2 km from Monsieur Miot Concept Hotel - Bastia centre, while Nonza Tower is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague
address: Route De Pineto Route De La Canonica Road 107, Lucciana, Corsica
description: Situated in Lucciana, 16 km from Station de Furiani, Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and room service. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature mountain views. All rooms in Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. At Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. Bastia Port is 23 km from the hotel, while Nonza Tower is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 2 km from Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague.

name: Domaine Santa Giulia Palace
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Le San Lorenzo
address: Casetta Bianca Route de Palombaggia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: With a view of Porto Vecchio and the sea, this 4-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a restaurant that proposes Corsican specialties. Palombaggia beach is 4 km away. Provided with free Wi-Fi, each room at Le San Lorenzo has a private balcony opening onto the sea and is equipped with air conditioning, LCD TV and minibar. The bathroom is fitted with free toiletries, slippers, bathrobe and hairdryer. Breakfast and other meals can be requested at the reception. You are invited to have a swim in the pool or simply relax on the terrace. Water sports can be done 5 km away and Lezza Golf Club s 8 km away. Porto Vecchio is 6 km away and Figari Sud Corse Airport is a 30-minute drive from the property.

name: A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto
description: A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Bonifacio, 2.1 km from Bonifacio Port. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. The restaurant at A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can swim in the saltwater pool, go snorkelling or hiking or relax in the garden. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 5.2 km from the accommodation, while Porto Vecchio Port is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 19 km from A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto.

name: U Patriarcu
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and a turndown service, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Restaurant U Patriarcu in Cagnano, you'll be on the beach, just a 3-minute walk from Porticciolo Marina and a 1-minute drive from Osse Tower. This beach hotel is 2.7 mi (4.4 km) from Pietracorbara Beach and 8.4 mi (13.5 km) from Erbalunga Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at Restaurant U Patriarcu serving the guests of Hotel Restaurant U Patriarcu, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: An effective city/local tax rate of 5.50 percent will be charged We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 10 per person Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 20 per day Rollaway bed fee: EUR 30 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Casa Sarrinca
description: Situated in Serra-di-Scopamene, 26 km from Archaeological site of Cucuruzzu and Capula, Casa Sarrinca features views of the garden. Each accommodation at the 3-star guest house has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a terrace. There is a restaurant serving French cuisine, and free private parking is available. At the guest house, rooms come with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Casa Sarrinca also boast free WiFi, while some rooms include a balcony. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Propriano Port is 38 km from Casa Sarrinca. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 62 km from the guest house.

name: Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle
description: Situated in Bonifacio, Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has a year-round outdoor infinity pool, a spa and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room features a private terrace with a view. The rooms are equipped with an extra large double bed, a coffee machine, a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms have a shower, free essential oils toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available every day and features local produce and Corsican recipes. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. The King Aragon Steps down to the beach are 1.6 km from the property while Spérone Golf Course is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 24 km from the property. for any reservation of more than 3 rooms special conditions are applicable

name: Hotel E Tre Stelle
address: Lieu Dit Cavallo Morto, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Hotel E Tre Stelle is located 3 km from Bonifacio and its sandy beaches. It offers spacious rooms, and a heated outdoor swimming pool. All of the rooms are air-conditioned and have LCD TV and en suite bathrooms with walk-in showers. Hotel E Tre Stelle is also just 20 km from Figari Airport and the city of Porto-Vecchio.

name: Hotel de La Paix
description: Dating from the 1930s, Hotel de La Paix is set just a 5-minute walk from Cours Paoli in Corte. It offers a TV room, an on-site restaurant and free garage parking for motorbikes and bicycles. The rooms at Hotel de La Paix feature views of the surrounding mountains and gardens. Decorated in a contemporary style, each one provides an en suite bathroom and some also have a private balcony. A continental breakfast is served every morning, either in the dining room or on the terrace. You can also choose to relax in the bar with a drink before sampling traditional cuisine in the restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Luggage storage and newspapers can be found at reception. The old town and the leaving point for walks in the Tavignano Valley are a 5-minute walk away.

name: Bel Mare
description: Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a sun terrace, Bel Mare offers pet-friendly accommodation in Cargèse. Each room offer sea views and a flat-screen TV. A bar and a tour desk are available at the property. A continental breakfast is available at a surcharge and includes 1 hot beverage, fruit juice, bread, French pastry, jam, butter and honey. You can engage in various activities, such as cycling, fishing and hiking. Ajaccio is 26 km from Bel Mare, while Calvi is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 29 km from the property.

name: Résidence Les Pins
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include laundry facilities, a hair dryer, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel Kilina
address: Route De Cala Rossa, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located 1.5 Kilometers from Cala Rossa beach and 6 kilometers from Porto Vecchio, Hotel Kilina features a restaurant, bar and outdoor swimming-pool. The rooms of the hotel are intended to be comfortably and simply decorated. They all features a TV, terrace, air-conditioning and patio. Breakfast is served daily at Kilina and you can also dine at the restaurant Le K, by the swimming pool. The hotel Kilina organizes seminaries and weddings. A private parking is provided and free Wi-Fi access is available in the rooms and at reception.

name: Stella Marina
description: Stella Marina is located in Macinaggio, northern Corsica, 100 metres from the beach. It has air-conditioned villas and rooms, an outdoor swimming pool and a BBQ area. All rooms and villas at the Stella Marina have a balcony, private bathroom, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The villas have a kitchen and seating area. Guests of the Stella Marina can relax in the hotel garden or sunbathe next to the pool. The hotel is situated 36 km north of Bastia and free private secured parking is available.

name: Hôtel de la Restonica
address: Route de la Restonica Gorge de la Restonica, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the mountain, Hôtel de la Restonica is located in Corte in the Corsica Region, 13 km from Lake Melu. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site. Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom. There is a shared lounge at the property. Hiking trails to Capitellu lake and Melu lake start near the property. The nearest beach is 51 km away. Bastia-Poretta Airport is 55 km away.

name: casa vanella
description: Casa Vanella is set in the Corsican hills, a 45-minute drive from Corte, and offers rooms with views of the surrounding mountains towards Monte Cinto. It features free Wi-Fi access and a 2-hectare garden. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a bathtub and a hairdryer. There is a shared living room with a choice of books, and a terrace for enjoying meals in fair weather. Breakfast is served daily, including cereals, organic jams and organic cakes and biscuits. It is possible to have a savoury breakfast on request with eggs and Corsican meat products. Evening meals and packed lunches prepared by the hosts are also available on request. Your host is a hiking guide and can advise you on local paths. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hôtel Isola
address: 5644 Route Des Marines De Borgo, 20290 Borgo, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Chambre d'Hote Veronique
description: No description found

name: Hotel L'Acquale
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa
description: Located just a 5-minute drive from the centre of Porto-Vecchio, Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa offers B&B accommodation set within a 3-hectare property. You can enjoy the 2 outdoor swimming pools and admire the sea views from the furnished terrace. All of the rooms at Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa are elegantly decorated and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and air conditioning. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Free private parking is possible on site and Palombaggia Beach is a 5-minute drive away. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is a 20-minute drive from the B&B. Laurence and her team are pleased to welcome you from 3 p.m; the reception is closed before this time.

name: Résidence Les Pavillons du Golfe
description: Set in a 6-hectare park, Résidence Les Pavillons du Golfe is located in Favone, 200 metres from Favone Beach, 28 km from Porto-Vecchio and 11 km from Solenzara. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and free WiFi access. Mobile homes and bungalows include air conditioning, a terrace with garden views and a private bathroom with a shower. A kitchenette with a microwave oven, a stovetop and a refrigerator is available in each accommodation type. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Résidence Marina Bianca
description: Residence Marina Bianca, set on the sandy beaches provides furnished air-conditioned apartments with a terrace or a loggia. There is a swimming pool, a fitness room, and a park on site. Free WiFi access is provided in each apartment. Each Marina Bianca studio and apartment has a private bathroom, TV and kitchenette equipped with hot plates, refrigerator and microwave. Guests are invited to explore the Marina Bianca’s tree and flower filled park. The swimming pool has a wading pool area for children. Residence Marina Bianca is conveniently located 20 km from the Bastia Airport and 40 km from the Port of Bastia. The residence is situated at the foot of the Castagniccia, making it easy to explore the traditional villages in the hills. Guests who arrive by car have access to free private parking.

name: Casa Santini x Roc Seven
description: Casa Santini x Roc Seven is peacefully located on the water, next to the citadel of Porto-Vecchio in the south of Corsica. It has a private beach and a sea view-garden with pine trees and palm trees and offers free Wi-Fi. Rooms are quiet and comfortable, and come fully equipped with modern amenities. Many rooms have a terrace and offer views of the bay. Breakfast is served on the terrace or shaded lawn. Local Corsican and tapas specialties are offered with local wines in the hotel restaurant. The hotel has a private port and there are boat rental companies in Porto-Vecchio marina, 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. Guests can then use the private port for an additional charge at the hotel.

name: Hotel Colomba
address: 4 Et 6 Rue Simon Varsi, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located in Bonifacio, less than 1 km from Arinella Beach, Hotel Colomba provides accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a restaurant. Located around 7.5 km from Former Chapel of the Trinity, the hotel with free WiFi is also 29 km away from Porto Vecchio Port. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Bonifacio Port. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak French and Italian. The Lion of Roccapina is 35 km from Hotel Colomba, while King Aragon Steps is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel L'Escale
description: Offering a restaurant, a bar and a direct access to the beach, Hotel L'Escale is located in Serra-di-Ferro. Free WiFi access is available. All the rooms have a wardrobe and outdoor furniture. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and free toiletries. Extras include a desk. Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport is 40 km away. The property offers free parking.

name: Hotel & Restaurant le Saint Jean
description: Located in the centre of Cargèse, 52 km from Ajaccio Airport, Hotel le Saint Jean features a terrace with a panoramic view, a bar and a lounge with a TV, and a restaurant. The rooms at Hotel le Saint Jean feature a flat-screen TV and en suite facilities with shower and toilet. Some rooms have a view of the Maquis and others feature a sea view. A buffet breakfast is available daily and it can also be served in your room. The restaurant offers traditional Corsican cuisine. Hotel le Saint Jean is 30 km from Porto, and Les Calanques de Piana, a Unesco World Heritage Site, is 18 km away. Free private parking is provided on site.

name: Les Hameaux de Bocca del Oro
address: Route de Palombaggia - Bocca Del Oro, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located just a 10-minute drive from Porto-Vecchio, Résidence les Hameaux de Bocca del Oro offers an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and a park. The beach is just 4 km away. All villas feature a balcony or terrace, BBQ facilities, a living area with a flat-screen TV, ironing facilities and a bathroom. The kitchen includes a washing machine, dishwasher and oven. Supermarkets and restaurants can be found within 1 km of the property and Figari Airport is ideally located 25 km away. Additional features include free Wi-Fi in the public areas and free private parking on site.

name: Les Jardins De La Glaciere
address: Gorges De La Restonica, Corte, Corsica
description: This hotel is located in Corte, near the Restonica River, which can be reached directly via the hotel garden. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub with deckchairs. Each air-conditioned guest room at Les Jardins De La Glacière is equipped with satellite TV and has a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a balcony. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast. It consists of sweet and savoury specialties and is served in the dining room or on the terrace overlooking the garden. Additional facilities at the Jardins De La Glacière include a bar, free private parking and free Wi-Fi in the hotel’s public areas.

name: Parfumu DI Celu
description: No description found

name: Hôtel Sampiero
address: Avenue Sampiero Corso - RN 193, 20600 Bastia, Corsica
description: With a 24-hour front desk, Hôtel Sampiero is 4 km from the centre of Bastia. It offers vending machines for snacks and drinks and free Wi-Fi access in public areas. All the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a telephone. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. A continental breakfast with French pastries, jam and hot drinks can be enjoyed every morning at Hôtel Sampiero. Some restaurants can be found next to the property and there are many restaurants in the centre of Bastia. This property is a 9-minute drive from Place du Marché and Bastia Train station is 5 km away. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel is 500 metres from Furiani's Clinic, 3 km from Bastia's hospital and 1 km from a supermarket.

name: Résidence Calarossa Bay Resort
address: Route de Cala Rossa, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 33 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and ovens. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Résidence Calarossa Bay Resort in Lecci, you'll be near the beach, just a 5-minute walk from Petite Plage de Cala Rossa and 5 minutes by foot from Southern Corsica Beaches. This aparthotel is 11.6 mi (18.7 km) from Santa Giulia Beach and 14.7 mi (23.6 km) from Palombaggia Beach. Dining Continental breakfasts are available for a fee. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. Cleaning fee: EUR 95 per accommodation, per stay (varies per unit) We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Résidence Omigna
description: Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool, Résidence Omigna in Cargèse features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Résidence Omigna offers 5-star accommodation with a fitness room. A a baby safety gate is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax in the garden. Pero is less than 1 km from Résidence Omigna, while Port Cove is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 51 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Minera
description: Featuring free WiFi and a spa & wellness centre, Hotel Minera offers accommodation in L’Île-Rousse. With a garden, the property also has a terrace, as well as a bar. The property provides sea views and an outdoor pool. At the hotel, rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, and some rooms include a terrace. At Hotel Minera, every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Some rooms have a private pool. The spa includes a hammam and massages are available at an extra cost. The property is 2.8 km from L'Ile-Rousse Port and 3.3 km from Pietra Lighthouse. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant Marina Di Lava - Grand Ajaccio
description: Marina Di Lava is a hotel located on the beach in Appietto. The property features a restaurant and bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The accommodation provide free WiFi access in all rooms, in addition to free public parking. Renovated in 2019, all air-conditioned rooms have a private terrace and a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The restaurant serves Mediterranean specialities including sea food, pizzas, meat dishes and salad. Guests can try out many water sports on the beach, including wind surfing, canoeing and jet skiing. Ajaccio is 22 km from Marina Di Lava, while Porto Ota is 75 km away. The nearest airport is Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 23 km from the property.

name: Résidence Hotelière Capu Seninu
address: La Marina de Porto, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and towels.Expedia

name: Les Bergeries De Palombaggia
description: Situated on Corsica’s southern coast in Porto-Vecchio, The Bergeries de Palombaggia offers both idyllic beaches and spectacular mountain scenery. It features stylish accommodation and a heated swimming pool. All the suites at Les Bergeries have private patios. Free Wi-Fi and room service is also available. The Bergeries de Palombaggia restaurant serves regional cuisine on the terrace, overlooking the Cerbicales islands. Guests can relax in the outdoor pool or enjoy private access to the Palombaggia beach, located just 700m away. A shuttle service is also available and towels are provided. The hotel is ideally located for exploring the region. Guided tours of Porto-Vecchio, L’Ospedale forest and the Solenzara river can be organized from the hotel. Free parking is available on-site.

name: Hotel Le Ruesco
address: Capicciollo, Route De Porto Pollo, 20113 Olmeto, Corsica
description: Le Ruesco is situated on the northern side of the Valinco Gulf. It is located in a wooded and floral park, just 50 metres from the beach. The hotel’s outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace make it an excellent base for a relaxing break. A lounge area is available beside the pool. The hotel is composed of 25 spacious and comfortable rooms with a terrace and a clear view of the sea. All rooms have direct-dial telephone, flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and a bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. A bar service is available from 11:00 to 17:00. As a vehicle is necessary to access the residence, a private car park is available on site. The hotel also offers direct access to the beach.

name: Residenza l 'Alivetu
description: Located on the hillside between Cargèse and the beach, this residence features an outdoor swimming pool with sea views. Residenza l’Alivetu is just a 25-minute drive from the Piana Calanches hills. All apartments offer views of the sea or garden, some include a private balcony, while others include a garden. They are complete with private bathroom and shower and a fully equipped kitchenette. Outside seating is provided in all apartments allowing opportunity for al fresco dining. There is also a shared BBQ at the residence and apartments for disabled guests are available. Residenza l’Alivetu has a partner restaurant located in the centre of the village 3 km away, where guests benefit from discounted prices for half-board and full-board rates. The residence is situated just 400 metres from Alivetu of Menasina beach. Cargèse centre is a 5-minute drive away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Pozzo di Mastri
address: Lieu dit Pozzo di Mastri, 20114 Figari, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a large garden and a restaurant, Domaine Pozzo di Mastri is located in Figari. The property is within a 15-minute drive from the coastline. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Each non-smoking room here will provide you with air conditioning and a TV. The private bathrooms have a shower and come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Domaine Pozzo di Mastri you will find a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a children's playground. The property offers free parking. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana
description: Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana has pool views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 19 km from Porto Vecchio Port. Offering a terrace, every unit is air conditioned and offers a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana offers a picnic area. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, go walking tours or relax in the garden. Bonifacio Port is 44 km from the accommodation, while Former Chapel of the Trinity is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 38 km from Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana.

name: Résidence Aigue Marine
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Auberge Coralli
address: Roccapina Route De Bonifacio, 20100 Sartène, Corsica
description: Set in Sartène, 2.8 km from Roccapina Beach, Auberge Coralli offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 2.6 km of The Lion of Roccapina. The air-conditioned rooms provide a garden view and come with a desk and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Auberge Coralli also have a sea view. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Auberge Coralli can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Sartène, like hiking and snorkelling. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 27 km from Auberge Coralli, while Bonifacio Port is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Roc E Mare
address: 23 Route de la Corniche, 00000 Propriano, Corsica
description: Roc e Mare is located on the beach, outside the Corsican town of Propriano. It offers panoramic sea views and each guestroom has a balcony, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Guests of the Hotel Roc E Mare can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the dining room. There is also a large lounge area where guests can relax. Regional and traditional meals can be enjoyed from May to September in the on-site restaurant, La Paillotte. There are numerous water sports nearby, including water skiing, jet skiing and wind surfing, and guests can take boat trips to scenic parts of the coast.

name: Les Suites d'Agosta
address: Lotissement de la Pinède, 20166 Porticcio, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a refrigerator and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and rollaway beds.Expedia

name: Hacienda La Demeure
address: Vitricione Plaine D Oletta, Oletta, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hacienda LA Demeure is a guest house located in Saint-Florent. The property is within 5 km from the city centre and the beach. Free WiFi access is available. The suites will provide you with a bedroom, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The kitchen area is equipped with a microwave, stovetop, oven, refrigerator and dining table. A breakfast is served every morning by the hosts. Featuring a spa bath, the private bathroom also comes with a shower and bathrobe. You can enjoy mountain and garden views from the rooms. At Hacienda LA Demeure you will find a garden and BBQ facilities. Extras include a washing machine, a minibar and an iPod dock. The property offers free parking. This holiday home is 25 km from Bastia - Poretta Airport.

name: A Piattatella
description: Set in gardens overlooking the Reginu Valley, l'Hôtel A Piattatella offers luxury accommodation with a spa. This Corsican hotel features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, a gym and a massage centre. All the guest rooms at A Piattatella feature a private terrace with views over the valley, lake and mountains. They are decorated in a contemporary style. The hotel offers a range of treatments including Swedish massages, Thai reflexology and beauty care. You can also relax in the sauna or massaging chair, and the lounge area provides books on the region and board games. The hotel has its own restaurant dedicated to the hotel's guests. It offers cuisine prepared with produce from the vegetable garden. Ideally located, L'hôtel A Piattatella is just a 10-minute drive from the beaches of Balagne and a short walk from Monticello village square. Calvi airport is only 25 minutes away by car.

name: Domaine De Croccano
address: Route de Granace Km 3, 20100 Sartène, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia
address: Route De Palombaggia - Bp 114, Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool and outdoor hot tub, Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia is situated in Porto-Vecchio. Palombaggia Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and Wifi. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave. All units have a private furnished terrace with a plancha grill. Free private parking is also available on site. Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia also includes a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Massages using local products are available on site upon request and for an extra charge. Free use of bicycles is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Sampiero Corso
address: 5 Avenue Du Président Pierucci, 20250 Corte, Corsica
description: Offering free WiFi, Hôtel Sampiero Corso is located in Corte’s city centre. The property is 400 metres from both The Tavignau and The Restonica Valleys, where multiple hiking paths and lakes are accessible. Each room here will provide you with a TV. Featuring a bath, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and a bidet. You can enjoy mountain and city views from the rooms. Extras include satellite channels. At Hôtel Sampiero Corso you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and a games room. Offering free parking for motorbikes and bicycles, this hotel is 1 km from Corte Train Station and 50 km from Bastia Poretta Airport.

name: Hotel Calavita Rooftop & Spa
description: Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa is located a few steps from the coast, in northern Corsica. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, with a private bathroom, TV and free WiFi internet. The restaurant serves refined regional cuisine, seafood specialties and a wide selection of wines, in the hotel’s elegant dining room. Breakfast is available in the mornings. Central Bastia and the Marina is situated a 5-minute drive from Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa and the airport is just 20 minutes away.

name: Suite Home Porticcio
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a fenced pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Auberge U n'Antru Versu
address: Village de San Gavino di Carbini D268, 20170 Zonza, Corsica
description: Auberge U n'Antru Versu B&B is located in the village of San-Gavino-di-Carbini in Southern Corsica, in the Barocagio-Marghese Mountain Chain. The property offers an onsite restaurants and garden with terrace. The rooms offer modern décor and provide a flat-screen TV and bathroom with walk-in shower. Certain rooms offer Wi-Fi, air-conditioning or a garden view. A continental breakfast can be served on the terrace. It provides fresh products, such as fresh orange juice. The onsite restaurants serves Corsican cuisine. Supermarkets can also be found a 5-minute walk away. The area is suitable for hiking and a tennis court can be found 5 minutes away. The coastal towns of Propriano and Porto Vecchio are both approximately 40 km away. The Ospédale Lake and the Bavella Needles, sharp mountain peaks, are beautiful landscape features, both a twenty-minute drive away. A garage for bikes and motorbikes is available on site free of charge.

name: Aleria Hôtel l'Atrachjata
description: Hotel Atrachjata Aleria provides a comfortable setting while in Aleria. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 3-star rooms and a bar. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at Hotel Atrachjata Aleria, including free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. The hotel offers 29 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and plenty of workspace. Hotel Atrachjata Aleria's in-house restaurant, Atrachjata's Restaurant, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. A variety of dining options are also available in close proximity to the property. The hotel is a convenient place to discover nearby Torra di Bravone, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Ghisonaccia and Santa-Lucia-di-Moriani are located a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Hotel Le Lido
address: Route De La Marana, 20290 Borgo, Corsica
description: Hotel Le Lido is located on the Lido de la Marana, 200 metres from the beach and 20 km from Bastia. It offers a large outdoor seasonal swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in the rooms. The guestrooms at the Hotel Le Lido are air-conditioned and have en suites and TVs. Guests can relax on the large terrace or with a drink in the bar. Le Lido also has a pizzeria and grill, which serves seasonal cuisine. The hotel is 5 km from the Bastia-Poretta airport and free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Corsica - Porto Corse
address: Route de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Just 500 metres from the beach in Porto, Hotel Corsica offers an outdoor swimming pool with views of Porto Tower. The rooms at this 2-star hotel all have a private balcony or terrace. The rooms at Hotel Corsica are decorated in a simple style and also feature an LCD TV. While each one is complete with air conditioning, some include views of the swimming pool or garden. A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the hotel’s dining room. You can also relax with a drink on the terrace before discovering the local restaurants, which can be found a 10-minute walk away. Free parking and storage for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is provided at this hotel. The Calanques de Piana is 4 km away, and the boat that goes to the Scandola Natural Reserve is a 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Hotel Shegara
description: Located on the southern coast of Corsica, Hotel Shegara is located on the road leading to Porte de Plaisance and a 5-minute walk from Porto-Vecchio town centre. It features a heated infinity swimming pool with sundecks and panoramic views of the bay. The Shegara Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony that overlooks the floral garden or the Porto-Vecchio Bay. Each room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. A breakfast buffet consisting of pastries, cheese, eggs, fruit salad, fresh fruit, local cold meats, hot drinks, apple juice and orange juice is served daily on the Shegara’s terrace, which offers sea views. Guests can also relax with a drink in the bar. Hotel Shegara provides free private parking and a 24-hour reception. It is just a 20-minute drive from the San Benedettu Tower and the beaches of Bonifacio. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is 25 km away.

name: Chambre Élégante Lisa
address: 792 Route Inférieure de Cardo, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, sea view and a terrace, Chambre Élégante Lisa is set in Bastia. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. With free WiFi, this bed and breakfast offers a satellite flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. Guests can also relax in the garden. Saint Joseph Beach is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Bastia Port is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 21 km from Chambre Élégante Lisa.

name: Domaine de l'Oriu
description: This hotel is located in the village of Serriera and offers a swimming pool, just a 5-minute drive from Bussaglia beach. Rooms at Domaine de l'Oriu are air-conditioned. Free WiFi access is available at the reception only. Each modern room features a flat-screen TV and a telephone. All rooms have a balcony and a view of the surrounding mountains. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Domaine de l'Oriu in the communal lounge. There is a bar that is open all day where guests can relax by the pool or on the terrace with a drink. The outdoor swimming pool and hot tub are surrounded by palm trees. Guests of Domaine de l'Oriu benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. The hotel is located a 15-minute drive from the town of Porto and the UNESCO World Heritage Site of the Gulf of Porto.

name: Sole E Monti
description: Completely renovated in 2014, Sole E Monti is a hotel located in the heart of the Bavella Mountains in southern Corsica. It provides peaceful accommodation with free WiFi internet access and free parking. The guest rooms are equipped with private bathrooms, heating and satellite TV. Some rooms have a balcony offering views of the mountains. A daily breakfast is available and traditional cuisine is served in the restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel garden. Sole e Monti is 15 minutes’ drive from the Plateau du Coscione and Aiguilles de Bavella. The town of Porto-Vecchio is 46 km away.

name: Domaine de Casanghjulina
description: Set in Porto-Vecchio, within 11 km of Porto Vecchio Port and 36 km of Bonifacio Port, Domaine de Casanghjulina offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Built in 2010, the property includes hot tub and fitness centre. Every room has a terrace with views of the garden. All guest rooms at the guest house come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. Domaine de Casanghjulina features some units with mountain views, and the rooms have a coffee machine. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. Domaine de Casanghjulina offers a barbecue. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 39 km from the guest house, while King Aragon Steps is 38 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 30 km from Domaine de Casanghjulina.

name: Casa Paradisu
description: Situated in LʼÎle-Rousse, 1.1 km from Caruchettu Beach, Casa Paradisu features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Casa Paradisu provides some rooms with sea views, and rooms include a kettle. The rooms have a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Napoleon Beach is 1.7 km from Casa Paradisu, while Nautique Beach is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel U Catagnu
description: Situated in San-Nicolao, 700 metres from Plage de Poggiole, Hotel U Catagnu features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 700 metres from Moriani Plage and around 1 km from Santa Lucia di Moriani Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Station de Furiani is 35 km away. At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel U Catagnu rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, French and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Bastia Port is 43 km from Hotel U Catagnu, while Ponte-Novu Train Station is 38 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Bagheera Village Naturiste
description: BAGHEERA Village Naturiste in Linguizzetta is a naturist family resort which features a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. All rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. All units will provide guests with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available daily at BAGHEERA Village Naturiste. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. Guests can take part in various activities in the surroundings, including windsurfing and fishing. Corte is 33 km from BAGHEERA Village Naturiste, while Borgo is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 37 km from the resort.

name: U Passa Tempu
description: Centrally located in Corte, Hôtel U Passa Tempu is just 7 km away from the Restonica Valley and its Tavignano gorges, its lakes, its natural swimming-pools and hiking trails. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. A kitchenette with a Nespresso coffee machine is available in each room. Guest have access to free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy a breakfast of local produce, served in their rooms or on the terrace With its central location, Hôtel U Passa Tempu is close to the museum of Corsica and citadel. For guests arriving by car, free private parking is possible onsite. Corte train station is 1.4 km away.

name: B&B Auberge Belle Terre
address: Rond-point de Lecci - Lieu dit La Croix, 20137 Sainte-Lucie-de-Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located in Lecci, a typical Corsican village, this bed and breakfast features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and a shaded garden with tables and chairs. Beaches are a 10-minute drive away. With a simple but modern décor, each room at Belle Terre is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries. Linen, towels and daily housekeeping are provided for free. Homemade biscuits are served in the buffet breakfast, which can be also enjoyed on the terrace. Traditional dishes are proposed at the restaurant and fresh bread is taken every day from the bakery located next to the property. Casteddu d’Araghju is 5 km away and Cavu natural pools are 6 km away. Porto-Vecchio is a 15-minute drive away and Figari Sud-Corse Airport is 35 km away. The owner strongly recommends a car and free private parking is possible on site.

name: Brise de Mer
description: Brise de Mer is located in the Porto Marina district in Porto-Ota. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. The property is a 3-minute walk from the port. Guests can choose to stay in rooms with sea or village views. All rooms have a balcony and are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, a safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served every morning on the hotel's terrace. The hotel is a 10-minute walk to Porto beach. Village shopping is 1.5 km away. The Genoese Tower and activities including boat rental and scuba diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings. Porto-Ota is 80 km from Ajaccio, Calvi and Corte.

name: L'Alivi
address: Serriera Entrée du Village, 20147 Serriera, Corsica
description: Located in the village of Serriera in the Porto Gulf, L'Alivi is a former olive oil mill offering B&B accommodation, 2.7 km from the beach. The on site restaurant features a large terrace with mountain views. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Some rooms have mountain views. The l'Usteria restaurant serves Corsican specialities with local produce for lunch and dinner. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the restaurant. There is a shared lounge at the property with orignal features from the mill. Guests also have access to a terrace. The nearest beach is 3 km from L'Alivi and hiking trails start from the village. The UNESCO-awarded Scandola nature reserve is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 63 km from L'Alivi.

name: Auberge Sant'Antone
address: Place de l'Eglise - Route de Monticello, 20220 Santa-Reparata-di-Balagna, Corsica
description: L'Auberge Sant'Antone is located in Santa-Reparata-di-Balagna, just 6 km from l’Île-Rousse. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, sea views and an on-site restaurant. The rooms at L'Auberge Sant'Antone feature views of the sea or mountains and a flat-screen TV. Each one is also complete with an en suite bathroom, while some also include free Wi-Fi access. A continental breakfast, regional-style meals and Corsican cuisine is available in the restaurant. Where possible, meals are made using homegrown produce or local ingredients. The property also has a bar. Free public parking is available on site and local beaches are just a 5-minute drive away. Other local attractions include the town of Calvi, which is 25 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant Mariosa
description: Mariosa is located on the sea front 6 km from the centre of Porto-Vecchio. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a heated outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with sunbeds. Free WiFi is provided. Renovated in November 2017, all the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and free toiletries. Some rooms offer a terrace and mountain or sea views. A buffet breakfast with hot and cold drinks and sweet and savoury options is served every morning at Mariosa and can also be served in the comfort of your room upon advanced reservation. Light salad meals made of local produce are served for lunch and dinner options include meat and fish cooked on the grill and other seasonal dishes. Some rooms at Mariosa are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. Babysitting services can be arranged at an extra cost and free private parking is available. Bonifacio is 20 km away.

name: Résidence Ochji di Mare
description: Facing the marina and 800 metres from Propriano beach, this residence has air-conditioned, self-catering apartments for 4 people, overlooking the Golfe du Valinco. It offers a garden to relax in and free parking. Each apartment includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. You can prepare meals in the fully-equipped kitchen and enjoy them on your balcony featuring sea views. Bed linen, towels and cleaning are included. The restaurant at Résidence Ochi di Mare serves sea food and local dishes on its shaded terrace. The local area surrounding the residence offers activities including tennis, hiking and fishing. The residence is 10 minutes by car from the town centre, where you will find shops and restaurants. It is 5 minutes’ drive from the ferry harbour and 7 minutes’ drive from Propriano Airport. Please note that we have a charging station for electric vehicles.

name: Hotel Uricordu And Spa
address: D80, Cap Corse, Macinaggio, 20248 Macinaggio, Haute-Corse
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 54 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Rogliano, Hotel URICORDU and SPA is within a 15-minute drive of Porticciolo Marina and Osse Tower. This 4-star hotel is 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Tamarone Beach and 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Tower of Saint Mary Chjapella. Dining Stop by the hotel's restaurant for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between November 1 and March 04. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property.
