name: Hôtel Les Terrasses D'Eze
address: 1138 Route De La Turbie, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering a panoramic sea view and a seasonal infinity swimming pool, Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa is set in the hills of Èze, 14 km from Nice and 9 km from Monaco. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden and a terrace. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Offering a terrace, all air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. The on-site paid spa offers treatments including massages, wraps and a floating room (reservation is needed). A fitness centre and a pétanque court are available at an extra cost. Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk. Some family rooms are accessible to people with reduced mobility (only on request and subject to availability) The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 20 km from Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Mercure Villeneuve Loubet Plage
description: The Mercure Villeneuve Loubet Plage offers you a unique location in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It has 45 rooms and is located in the prestigious Marina Baie des Anges district between Nice, Antibes and Cannes. Be elevated on our terrace, around the pool, to admire the panoramic sea view. Land directly with your feet in the water in a Californian atmosphere under the palm trees.accorhotels.com

name: Excelsior
description: The Excelsior is located opposite the beach in Saint Raphael town centre, within a 3-minute walk of the casino and Saint-Raphaël Valescure Train Station. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi internet access. Rooms at the Excelsior Hotel are serviced by a lift and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy traditional and regional cuisine at the Excelsior’s restaurant. There is also a brasserie and a pub with a large terrace that overlooks the sea. Hotel Excelsior has a 24-hour reception and offers a dry cleaning service.

name: Hotel De Provence
description: Hôtel de Provence is located in central Cannes and has a pretty garden and patio. It offers air-conditioned en suite guest rooms, each with satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. With traditional French decor, the Provence is set in a quiet area, a 5-minute walk from La Croisette, Cannes Beach and 10 minutes from the Palais des Festivals and Cannes Marina. The Hôtel de Provence bar serves regional wines and a variety of refreshing beverages. Guests can enjoy drinks and the hotel’s French breakfast in the garden or on the terrace and patio. There are numerous restaurants and boutique shops in the nearby side streets.

name: Confidentiel hôtel
address: 1090 Avenue du Colonel Brooke, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Located between Cannes and Saint-Tropez, Le Confidentiel Hotel is located in the Valescure district of Saint Raphaël and just a 10-minute drive from the beach. The establishment was completely renovated in 2021, the rooms of the Confidentiel Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with a SmartTV as well as free Wi-Fi, a courtesy tray with coffee, tea, chocolate, safe and mini bar. Each room has a bathroom with a shower and some also have a bathtub. Private and free parking is available in the property. From September 2021, the private SPA of the Confidential Hotel will be open, by reservation and at additional cost. It will have a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna. The restaurant is currently closed due to the sanitary situation, but a catering service is available upon reservation, 24 hours in advance. Guests are invited to enjoy a cocktail at the bar or on the terrace. The outdoor swimming pool open in season. The hotel is also close to the Estérel forest and a golf course.

name: Garrigae Domaine de l'Esterel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 95 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Saint-Raphael? This hotel has 1098 square feet (102 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Garrigae Domaine de l'Esterel in Saint-Raphael (Valescure), you'll be a 1-minute drive from Valescure Golf Club and 6 minutes from Plage du Veillat. This 4-star hotel is 3.3 mi (5.3 km) from Fréjus Beach and 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Grotte de Miro. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Cote Pinede, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property will be renovating from October 6 2022 to May 31 2024 (completion date subject to change). The following areas are affected: Sauna Spa Spa tub During renovations, the hotel will make every effort to minimize noise and disturbance. name: Holiday Inn Cannes
address: 65 Avenue Docteur Raymond Picaud, 06150 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Renovated in 2022, this hotel faces the sea and is located 50 metres from the South Beach in Cannes. It offers free access to the outdoor swimming pool and tennis court, and guest rooms have a panoramic sea view. Each room at Luxotel Cannes is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Some rooms also have a private terrace or balcony. Guests can enjoy innovative, Mediterranean cuisine at La Palma restaurant. It has an outdoor terrace that overlooks the shaded garden and the Mediterranean Sea. Sunbeds around the pool are available free of charge, and free pool towels are also available from reception. The Palais des Festivals and the Boulevard de la Croisette are just a 5-minute bus ride from the hotel. Cannes Mandelieu Airport is 3.5 km away.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Le Touring
description: Facing the beachfront, Hôtel le Touring offers 4-star accommodation in Saint-Raphaël and features a terrace, restaurant and bar. The property is located 1.2 km from Capitole Beach, 200 metres from Saint-Raphaël Valescure Train Station and 36 km from Chateau de Grimaud. The hotel has a hammam and room service. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Every room is equipped with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms include a balcony and some have city views. All units in Hôtel le Touring are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English, Spanish and French at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Frejus Beach, Veillat Beach and Beau Rivage Beach. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 64 km from Hôtel le Touring.

name: Idéal Séjour - Hôtel de Charme et Atypique
address: 6 Allee DU Parc Des Vallergues, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Idéal Séjour - Hôtel de charme et atypique is set in a residential area of Cannes, only a 13-minute walk from the Boulevard de la Croisette and the Palais des Festivals et des Congrès. The property is 1 km from the centre of Cannes. It offers rooms with free WiFi and views of the flower-filled garden. Each guest room at Idéal Séjour features a unique décor, individual air conditioning, satellite TV with English, Italian, German and Spanish channels. There is a private bathroom. High-quality mattresses are provided. The daily breakfast is made with home-made products. Weather permitting, breakfast is served in the garden which is planted with orange and lemon trees. The Idéal Séjour has a lounge and a large library with more than 3000 books, and a free private car park. Guests also have access to the workstation in the reception area, which includes a computer, printer and internet access. The hotel offers a meeting room for group events. Cannes Train Station is located a 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur, located 26 km from the property.

name: Chateau De La Chevre D Or
description: Set in the heart of Eze, this luxury hotel offers spectacular views of Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat. The five-star facilities include private gardens, outdoor heated pool, wellness centre and air-conditioned accommodation with spa bath. All of the soundproofed rooms and suites are decorated with elegant furniture. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can choose from four different restaurants, each with a panoramic sea view, serving different types of cuisine. Mediterranean specialities are served in 1 restaurant, while the Café du Jardin offers light lunches. The Bar du Chateau, has a castle-style decor with marble columns and a large fireplace. It features all kinds of spirits, vintage brandies and champagne. Guests have access to Eze tennis club and the wellness centre. It includes a fitness room, overlooking the sea. Massages are also possible on request. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the entire hotel, and the 24-hour reception can organise the valet service.

name: Hôtel Eze Hermitage entre Nice et Monaco
address: 1951 Avenue Des Diables Bleus, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Set between the mountains and the sea, located near the medieval village of Eze, this charming hotel provides comfortable accommodation. Hotel Hermitage has been completely renovated to offer you pleasant living areas during for your visit to the region. All guest rooms are equipped with modern en suite facilities and offer panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. Please note that the credit card used to book must be at guest's name. Ideally located 12 km from Nice and 10 km from Monaco, Hotel Hermitage is a great base from which to discover the Alpes-Maritimes region. It also offers an outdoor playground for children. The property does not have a restaurant.

name: ibis Styles Fréjus Saint-Raphaël
description: Set in a prime location of Frejus, ibis Styles Frejus Sain-Raphael puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at ibis Styles Frejus Sain-Raphael.Agoda

name: Hotel du Vieux Port
description: Situated facing the old port in Saint-Raphaël, Hotel du Vieux Port features an on-site restaurant with a terrace. It is a 2-minute walk from the beach. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Rooms at Hotel du Vieux Port are air-conditioned and furnished with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and desk. Each room has a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and toilet. Some rooms have views of the port. Breakfast including fresh pastries, fruit, yogurt, jams and beverages is served each morning for a supplement. Guests can enjoy dinner on the terrace of the restaurant which serves traditional Mediterranean and Italian dishes. The casino is 100 metres away and Saint-Raphaël Train Station is a 5-minute walk from Hotel du Vieux Port. Nice Airport is a 50-minute drive from the property.

name: Villa Velvet
description: Villa Velvet is a residence of self-catering apartments and studios located in Villeneuve-Loubet, just 500 metres from the beach and 7 km from Antibes. The accommodations feature a balcony or terrace, a kitchen, dining area, bathroom, flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioning. Those on the ground floor offer garden access. Self-catering, the accommodations include an oven, stove, microwave and fridge. Many restaurants can be found in Villeneuve-Loubet and Cagnes-sur-Mer. The property is located conveniently 1 km from the train station. The city centre of Nice is just 15 km away and Côte d’Azur Airport 11 km away.

name: Novotel Monte-Carlo
description: Our Novotel Monte-Carlo terraces, gardens and Riviera-inspired decor will immerse you in a relaxed atmosphere as soon as you arrive in Monaco. We have everything you need for a rejuvenating stay. Order detox juices by day and cocktails by night at our Azzurra Kitchen restaurant offering dishes full of Mediterranean flavor. Need to work? Use one of our 12 meeting rooms or our Wojo coworking space.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Cannes Mandelieu
description: Mercure Cannes Mandelieu is at the crossroads of Var and Alpes-Maritimes, a perfect starting point for exploring the region. Ideal location 300 m from the sandy beaches, 7 km from the center of Cannes and close to historical and cultural attractions. Whether you are with family or on business, you will enjoy staying with us in the sunny atmosphere of the French Riviera.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Font Mourier
description: Set in a pine forest overlooking the gulf of Saint-Tropez, Hôtel Font Mourier offers free WiFi access, a tennis court and a heated outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has modern décor and a private terrace or garden with a view of the pine forest or the plains of Grimaud. They have a private bathroom with a bath. The restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and a buffet breakfast daily. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or in the garden. Hôtel Font Mourier offers many activities, ranging from water sports, hiking and wine tours. Hôtel Font Mourier is situated only 2 km from the beach at Port Grimaud, 4 km from Saint-Tropez and 6 km from the Pampelonne beaches.

name: Hotel Metropole, Monte Carlo
description: The Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo offers a guest experience marked by luxury, serenity and gastronomy. This magnificent five-star hotel perfectly embodies the glamour of yesteryear and the modern elegance of Monte-Carlo; as well as being located in a unique location in the Carré d’Or, just a few steps from the Casino. Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo features 4 restaurants. Les Ambassadeurs by Christophe Cussac offers a gourmet contemporary Mediterranean cuisine. Yoshi, the only Japanese restaurant on the Côte d'Azur to be awarded a Michelin star since 2010, showcases typically Japanese cuisine. The Odyssey restaurant where you can enjoy lunch by the pool, was designed by Karl Lagerfeld and the Lobby Bar with its terrace, trendy and elegant, proposes delightful gourmet moments all day long… Covered throughout the winter and al fresco during the rest of the year, the Odyssey pool is an oasis of relaxation and well-being nestled in the heart of Monte-Carlo. The Spa Metropole by Givenchy, designed by architect Didier Gomez, reflects the refinement and modernity of the House, to the finest detail. Beauty, well-being, relaxation: each treatment ritual is a ‘haute couture’ experience. With private parking on site, the hotel is 2 km from the Monte-Carlo Golf Club and Nice Côte-d’Azur Airport is 30 km away.

name: Best Western Premier Montfleuri
description: The Best Western Premier Montfleuri is situated just a stone’s throw away from the town center of Sainte-Maxime and close to the beaches, art galleries and Parc des Myrtes. The Best Western Premier Montfleuri is surrounded by numerous golf courses and has centuries of old villages. With its discrete charm and modern construction, you can relax and take advantage of a garden and a nice swimming pool. The bar, the living rooms and the dining room will welcome you with a decor of warm, inviting shades. The bedrooms are decorated in a provincial style. Most of them offer a balcony looking at the Gulf of Saint-Tropez. Our restaurant and its large terrace will propose to you a fresh cuisine based on regional flavors. For an enjoyable stay in Sainte-Maxime France, go online and book a room today. For any prepayment required, the hotel will send you by email a 3D Secure link.bestwestern.com

name: Le Méridien Beach Plaza
description: Expect the unexpected in Monaco at Le Méridien Beach Plaza. Here, find yourself among like-minds on our family friendly hotel's exclusive, private beach on the Mediterranean Sea and just moments from iconic Monte Carlo shopping, dining and nightlife. Take time in the Riviera for jet-skiing or parasailing. Next, connect over cocktails by one of our 4 star hotel's two custom-designed pools. This is your place in Monte Carlo to keep your mind culturally occupied at a master cooking class and rejuvenate your body in our outdoor or indoor pools. Your hotel room or suite is a certain luxury-experience, merging a breezy Mediterranean ambiance with bold accents and exceptional personal amenities. Select hotel accommodations offer a spacious terrace all your own, letting in views of the ocean, beach or city – precisely the Monte Carlo you've come to encounter.Marriott

name: Hotel Olympia
address: 17 Bis Boulevard du General Leclerc, 06240 Beausoleil, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Situated on the border of Monaco, Hotel Olympia is just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Monte-Carlo. It offers a private bar and air-conditioned rooms, most with balconies. The guest rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. Each is soundproofed and comes with a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. The Olympia serves a traditional French breakfast every morning, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the privacy of the guest rooms. With 24-hour reception, the hotel is just 600 metres from the Monte Carlo Casino. The Larvotto beaches are just a 13-minute walk away.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Ambassadeur Antibes- Juan les Pins
address: 50/52 Avenue Des Sables Antibes, 06160 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: AC Hotel Ambassadeur Antibes Juan les Pins welcomes you with effortless sophistication and award winning service. Designed in a thrilling avant garde style our hotel is nestled within Frances famed French Riviera. Rooms and suites blend classic modern European design with home like comforts and each offers a balcony with views over the hotel pool and the shimmering sea or the Juan les Pins cityscape. Take a dip in the lagoon style pool in the summer or enjoy a swim in the indoor pool year round. We also offer a gym open 24 hours a day. Fuel up for a busy morning at ACoustic Room and sample global dishes at Au Comptoir des Sables in the afternoon and evening. Seasonal poolside and beach dining is available as well. If you are planning an event in Juan les Pins you will be thrilled with our versatile and uplifting spaces which include an atrium filled with natural light. The myriad attractions of the South of France are at your doorstep should you wish to explore.Marriott

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: JW Marriott Cannes
address: 50 Boulevard de la Croisette, BP 224, 06414 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Pamper yourself with a sophisticated retreat on France's famed Cote d'Azur. Stylishly appointed and ideally situated, the JW Marriott Cannes provides a 5-star hotel experience with a perfect location on La Croisette, the legendary oceanfront avenue with luxury shopping and delightful restaurants. Our luxury beachfront hotel also boasts a short distance to the Palais des Festivals, Nice airport and Cannes' most popular local attractions. Relax in spacious hotel accommodations with plush bedding, sleek bathrooms, Wi-Fi access and floor-to-ceiling windows. Or, enjoy working out in our fully-equipped fitness center or swimming in our outdoor pool. Make sure to relax with a cocktail in our rooftop bar or plan an unforgettable evening of fine dining in our Italian restaurant Scalini. If visiting for business, take advantage of our hotel's 18 modern event venues for inspiring meetings and large-scale conferences. The JW Marriott Cannes wants to make your next vacation on the French Riviera flawless.Marriott

name: Le Mas de la Verrerie
address: 326 chemin de la Verrerie, 83600 Fréjus, Var
description: Le Mas de la Verrerie Guest House, located in Les Adrets de l'Estérel, is surrounded by woodland and hills, with panoramic views of the Estérel mountain range. The closest beach is a 15-minute drive away. The guest house features a large garden, a tennis table, a boules pitch, a library, family games, a children’s playground and a fitness room. The town centre is just 400 metres from the property, offering restaurants, bakeries, a post office, a bank, a cinema, grocery shops and more. The property is ideally situated between the sea and mountains, in a natural and calm setting. You may wish to visit the beaches of Cannes or Saint-Raphael, both approximately 30 minutes away by car.

name: Columbus Hotel Monte-Carlo, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Located in the heart of Fontvieille, across from the Princess Grace Rose Garden, with views out to the Mediterranean Sea the hotel is both central and secluded. The Prince’s Palace of Monaco and the Louis II Stadium are within one kilometer. The Oceanographic Museum of Monaco is 10 minutes away. Our savvy guests can enjoy a meal in our Mediterranean restaurant Tavolo or relax in our informal and sophisticated bar. We also have a 24-hour fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool.Hilton

name: Kyriad Frejus Centre - Saint Raphael
description: Kyriad Frejus - Centre Hotel welcomes you all year round. Guests can enjoy a friendly welcome, an on-site restaurant a la carte and daily specials, and a buffet breakfast. There are 68 guest rooms, each with free WiFi, a welcome tray with tea and coffee, and an LCD TV. Breakfast is served every morning, between 06:30 and 10:00. The hotel is ideally situated for exploring the French Riviera, from Saint-Tropez to Nice. The Hotel is located 1.5 km from the historic centre of Fréjus and 2.5 km from the beach and Saint-Raphaël Train Station. A regular bus passes in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Amiraute
description: Hôtel Amirauté is situated in the centre of Toulon, near Place de la Liberté and the harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned accommodation equipped with a satellite TV. Guest rooms at the Amiraute have a work desk and a fixed phone line with free calls to 18 destinations, including the USA, the United Kingdom, China and Canada. A full breakfast buffet is served each morning at the Hôtel Amiraute. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

name: La Villa Cannes Croisette
description: Hôtel La Villa Cannes Croisette is located just 50 metres from the Boulevard de la Croisette beaches in Cannes. It provides a heated outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Each air-conditioned room is stylishly decorated in tones of black and gold. Some rooms have a private terrace that overlook the pool. An LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and a minibar are provided in each room. La Villa Cannes also features a relaxing lounge bar where guests can sample champagne from the hotel’s vineyards. A buffet breakfast is served daily by the pool. Room service is available 24 hours. A 24-hour front desk is available at the Hôtel La Villa Cannes Croisette. Beauty services including massages and manicures can be arranged through the hotel. Palm Beach Casino is 500 metres from the hotel, and the Palais des Festivals is a 20-minute walk along the beach. Bicycles can also be hired from the hotel. Cannes Train Station is a 5-minute drive away. Free public parking is possible in front of the hotel and nearby. At an extra cost and subject to availability, guests can access a closed parking.

name: Grand Hôtel Dauphiné, Boutique Hôtel & Suites
description: Grand Hotel Dauphiné is located in Toulon town centre, 500 metres from Toulon Train Station and 700 metres from Mayol Stadium. It offers contemporary-style rooms equipped with soundproofing, air conditioning and free WiFi. Additional facilities in the rooms at this hotel include a flat-screen TV with Canal+ satellite channels. For an extra charge, a buffet breakfast featuring organic local produce is available. Guests can enjoy a swim in the rooftop swimming pool, which was added to the property in 2019. Poolside sun loungers are also provided. The Dauphine provides a 24-hour reception. Grand Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Toulon's port, where boats depart for Corsica and the Balearic islands. Secure parking is also available at an extra cost, 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hotel L'arena
address: 145 Rue du Général de Gaulle, 83600 Fréjus, Var
description: Well situated in the centre of Fréjus, Hôtel l'Arena offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Private parking is available on site. With a private bathroom, certain units at the hotel also have a balcony. Guests at Hôtel l'Arena can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. You can play billiards at this 3-star hotel. Speaking German, English, French and Dutch at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Port-Fréjus Beach is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Base Nature Beach is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 61 km from Hôtel l'Arena.

name: Hotel Montaigne & Spa
description: Hotel Montaigne & Spa is located in the centre of Cannes, just a 5-minute walk from La Croisette. Guests have paid access to the 250 m² Spa, which offers indoor swimming pool, hot tub and beauty treatments. The hotel is non-smoking throughout. spa is available for adults only The contemporary guest rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen HD TV with satellite channels and free Wi-Fi. Each evening guests can also enjoy an aperitif on the hotel’s decked terrace. In addition to a 24-hour front desk, Hôtel Montaigne & Spa also provides a dry cleaning service. Hôtel Montaigne & Spa is only a 3-minute walk from Cannes Train Station and just 500 metres from the Palais Des Festivals. Private on-site parking in garages is possible, subject to availability.

name: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa
description: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa offers free access to Phytomer Spa, open year-round and featuring a steam bath, fitness centre and sauna and 1 restaurants with views of l’Ilette Bay. It is located on the pedestrian promenade, which in 3 minutes, leads to the old town, castle and Provençal market. This property is composed of apartments and other rooms with a city view. An LCD TV and a minibar feature in every type of accommodation at Royal Antibes. All accommodation is contemporary in style and some apartments have magnificent sea views. During the high season, Royal Beach features a terrace with sea views and offers Mediterranean cuisine. During the summer, a private beach is available for guests' use with an extra cost. The 24-hour front desk can advise guests on Cannes, just a 20-minute drive down the coast. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout.

name: Chateau Eza
address: 6360 Rue De La Pise Eze, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: This hotel is a converted chateau in the medieval and pedestrian village of Eze. It offers rooms with a view of the Mediterranean Sea and a gastronomic restaurant. Rooms and suites at Chateau Eza are air-conditioned and uniquely decorated in a Louis XIII style. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and private bathroom. Many of the rooms offer stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and free Wi-Fi is available. Chateau Eza’s restaurant serves traditional French and Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can dine in the dining room overlooking the Cote d'Azur and enjoy an aperitif on the terrace. Eza Chateau is 20 km from the Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and 8 km from Monte Carlo.

name: Holiday Inn Express Toulon - Est, An IHG Hotel
description: Welcoming Toulon hotel with included breakfast and convenient location. Holiday Inn Express® Toulon – Est hotel is just off the A57 motorway and a 15-minute drive from Toulon Cote d'Azur ferry terminal, where you can embark to Corsica, Sardinia, Sicily or Majorca. A convenient bus route (no. 9) serves the city centre, including Toulon railway and bus station, 6 km away. It is less than 25 minutes by car or taxi to Toulon-Hyeres Airport (TLN). The Grand Var and Avenue 83 shopping malls are 3 km away, and sports fans can watch rugby games at Stade Mayol, 6km away. You can either ride a cable car to the top of beautiful Mont-Faron and take in the panoramic views, or try your hand at sailing, diving or rowing on the nearby sandy beaches. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi Fi throughout the hotel - An Express Start buffet breakfast included in the room rate - A Business Centre - Parking for 8 euros - Comfortable, air-conditioned rooms featuring tea and coffee facilities and a pillow menu to ensure a restful night's sleep. At the end of the day, meet friends and colleagues in the airy lobby bar, or enjoy some refreshment on the terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Fairmont Monte-Carlo
description: Set in the heart of the Principality of Monaco, overlooking the Mediterranean and with splendid views of the Riviera, the Fairmont Monte Carlo invites you to enjoy a unique stay in one of the world's most glamorous destinations. Located close to the legendary Monte Carlo Casino and the elegant Carré d'Or shopping district, the hotel provides unparalleled experiences, including a prime view of the most famous bend in the F1 circuit, the Fairmont Hairpin. A kids club is available in July and August.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Beau Site - Cap d'Antibes
address: 141 Boulevard John Fitzgerald Kennedy, Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Beau Site is located in a residential area, 3 km from central Antibes and a 5-minute walk from La Garoupe beach. It offers free WiFi access and a pool. Hotel Beau Site’s soundproofed guest rooms are individually decorated and have air conditioning as well as a partial sea view and views of the mountains or the garden. The Beau Site hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. This can be taken in the dining room, on the outdoor terrace, or in the guest room. Guests have exclusive access to the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Beau Site offers bike hire. Paid private parking is available for guests exploring the Cote d’Azur region by car. Cannes is 15 km from the hotel and Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is 14 km away. Juan-les-Pins is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Croisette Beach Cannes - MGallery
description: Relish our chic, Bohemian-style rooms at the Croisette Beach Cannes MGallery hotel. A unique haven with every amenity: heated outdoor pool and garden, private beach, bar, room service, meeting room, and fitness center. An ideal place for your stay in the heart of Cannes nearby the Croisette and Palais des Festivals. Reserve your sun lounger on our private beach, subject to availability (extra charge).accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Villa d'Elsa
description: Hotel Villa d'Elsa is located in Juan-les-Pins on the Cote D’Azur. It provides apartment-style accommodation with free Wi-Fi just 50 metres from the beach. Each of the uniquely decorated apartments includes air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a fully-equipped kitchen. Some have a private terrace. Hotel Villa d'Elsa is within easy access of the town’s many shops and restaurants. It is 400 metres from the Juan-Les-Pins Train Station and Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is 16 km away.

name: Sowell Family Riviera
address: 3235 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Offering an outdoor pool, SOWELL Family Riviera is located just outside the village of Saint-Raphaël, 200 metres from the beach. Nice is 48 km from the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. A Breackfast/Lunch box is available every day from 07:30 to 13:00 and includes pastries, hot drinks and charcuterie. Guests are welcome to prepare snacks from the buffet to enjoy later. During the school holidays, activities are available for children aged 4-8 years. Cannes is 22 km from SOWELL Family Riviera, while Saint-Tropez is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 62 km from the property. The residence has a children's club for 4/8 year olds, open during the French and Belgian summer school holidays, from Sunday to Friday, (6 x ½ days (morning 9am/12pm or afternoon 2pm/5pm).

name: Hôtel des Orangers
description: The Hotel des Orangers Cannes opens the doors of its charming 3-star establishment located at the foot of the picturesque Suquet district. This old country house of character hides a real green setting with its private garden composed of olive, palm and laurel trees. Relax on a deckchair by the year-round outdoor pool. Located in the heart of Cannes, the Hotel des Orangers is the ideal location for easy access on foot to the city's tourist attractions. Close to the Croisette and the Palais des Festivals in Cannes and 350 meters from the beaches, take advantage of its privileged location throughout your stay. The entire team at the Hotel des Orangers Cannes offers you a warm and personalized welcome 24/7. Our receptionists will answer your questions and provide you with precious advice to make your stay in Cannes unforgettable. Whether on vacation or on business, the Hotel des Orangers is the perfect place to relax and enjoy all that the city of Cannes has to offer. Stay in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms, some of which have a sea and pool view and/or the mountains of the Esterel mountains. Each morning, enjoy your breakfast in the bright sun-drenched room or on the terrace by the pool. Choose from our selection of sweet and savory products to start the day off right. The Hotel des Orangers Cannes has a large relaxation lounge on the ground floor. On the one hand a lounge bar area where you can order a hot or cold drink to be selected from our drinks menu and on the other hand a business corner with 3 self-service computers and an unlimited free Wi-Fi connection.Official Hotel Information

name: Hôtel Les Voiles
description: Hôtel Les Voiles is located in Toulon, a 5-minute walk from the Mourillon beaches and 3.4 km from Mont Faron Gondola. The hotel was renovated in May 2014 and free WiFi access is available. Each room, named after a winning boat from the Giraglia Cup, will provide you with a flat-screen TV, desk, safety deposit box and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel also provides luggage storage and ironing services. During your stay, you can take advantage of the rooftop terrace with a view of the Mediterranean Sea. Guests also have access to the facilities of the La Corniche Hotel, 1 km away. The hotel Les Voiles*** is a small atypical hotel where each rooms are slightly different from each other. We do not have private parking but it is very easy to park in the surrounding streets. Zénith Oméga Toulon and Toulon Train Station can be found within 3 km. Provence Airport is 70 km away.

name: Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa
address: 770 Chemin des Moyennes Breguieres, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa is a 12-minute drive from the center of Antibes, in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It offers views of the Baie des Anges and the Southern Alps. Decorated in a modern style, all air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TVs and telephones. Private bathrooms feature bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel's restaurant, L'Angelus, serves traditional cuisine and buffet breakfast at an additional cost. Breakfast is free for children under 12. Guests can enjoy the indoor spa, which includes a heated seawater pool, whirlpool, sauna, hammam, fitness room, relaxation area and outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated at certain times of the year. The hotel specializes in Thalassotherapy, offering seawater treatments and massages. The property features a 24-hour reception and private parking. A shuttle service to and from Antibes train station, 3.8 km from the property, is also available at an additional cost and upon reservation. The Picasso Museum is a 15-minute drive away. The Biot golf course is a 7-minute drive away. Nice Côte d'Azur airport is 14 km from Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa.

name: B&B Villa Du Roc Fleuri
description: Town house located in the heart of Cannes in a very quiet dead end. The stamp and the proximity; less than 10 minutes walk from the center, convention center, old port and 8 minutes from the train station. We offer 5 rooms, different styles each equipped with a bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. And two rooms with air conditioning and shared bathroom. Beautiful exterrieurs are at your disposal as well as a superb veranda. Fully equipped kitchen and large living room.VRBO

name: Hôtel Le Dauphin
address: 28 Avenue General De Gaulle, 06500 Menton, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Hôtel Le Dauphin is located on the beachfront in Menton, just 300 metres from the town centre. It offers free WiFi throughout and air conditioning in each room. Guest rooms at Hôtel Le Dauphin are equipped with a TV and an en-suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with a sea view. Buffet breakfast is served each morning on the flowered terrace or in the Dauphin’s breakfast room. A continental breakfast can also be served to the guest rooms. A restaurant is available on site. Hôtel Le Dauphin is a 15-minute drive from Monaco. Nice Cote d’Azur Airport is a 30-minute drive from the Dauphin and the Italian border is 2 km away. An airport shuttle service is available at an extra cost and upon prior reservation.

name: Hotel El Paradiso
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 39 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include blackout drapes/curtains, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as karaoke or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hôtel El Paradiso in Menton, you'll be on the waterfront, within a 15-minute walk of Fontana Rosa and La Dolce Vita. This hotel is 8.4 mi (13.5 km) from Monte Carlo Formula 1 Track and 8.2 mi (13.2 km) from Casino Monte Carlo. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at El Paradiso serving guests of Hôtel El Paradiso. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.01 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 8:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. name: Zenitude Hôtel - Résidences La Tour de Mare
description: No description found

name: Hotel Cezanne
description: Located in Cannes, the Cézanne is 550 metres from the beach and Boulevard de la Croisette. It offers a spa area with a Hammam, hot tub, and massage and beauty treatments. Free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Cezanne Hotel Spa. Breakfast is served each morning in the garden and terrace or in the guest rooms. Refreshments are provided from 15:00 to 18:00. This 4-star boutique hotel provides WiFi access is available at the reception. The Cezanne Hotel Spa is a 5-minute walk from Cannes Train Station and 1 km from the Palais des Festivals et des Congres.

name: Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez
address: RD 98 Route de Saint Tropez, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: Offering direct access to the beach, this 3-star hotel is located in Gassin. Guests can relax on the furnished terrace, by the outdoor swimming pool, just 1.5 km from Saint-Tropez. All the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez are soundproofed and feature a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room also includes a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries. At Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez, a buffet breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge. Free private parking is possible on site and Port-Grimaud is 7 km from the hotel.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Le Catalogne
description: Hotel Le Catalogne is ideally situated between Cannes and St Tropez in the seaside of St Aygulf and surrounded by a park of 4000 mÂ² at 100 metres from the sea and rocky creeks. The rooms are comfortable and air-conditioned with bathroom, toilet, telephone, satellite television and safety box. Tea and coffee making facilities are available. For your comfort, the Hotel Le Catalogne provides a heated swimming pool with deckchairs and parasols, a overshadowed terrace, a private car park and a Wifi internet access.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Saint Aygulf
description: This seafront hotel is ideally situated midway between Cannes and Saint-Tropez. It offers a warm welcome, comfortable accommodation, and a spectacular view of the bay of Saint-Raphaël and Esterel Massif. The Van der Valk Hotel Saint-Aygulf features 85 rooms and suites. They are all en suite, and present cosy and elegant spaces. Most have a terrace featuring a view of the Mediterranean Sea or the lake, home to flamingos and swans. There are also 2 villas that boast a private pool. The restaurant serves traditional French cuisine for lunch and dinner in a modern and stylish setting. It offers a spectacular view of the Mediterranean Sea. The bar boasts a cosy setting where you can enjoy a relaxing drink, or mingle and socialise. It features a pool table, table football, a TV, a piano and Wi-Fi access.

name: Hotel Port Palace
description: Port Palace is a 4-star boutique hotel in Monaco overlooking Port Hercule. This property is located in the centre of Monaco's legendary Grand Prix circuit and the Monaco Yacht Show. All of the air-conditioned guest rooms at Port Palace offer a satellite TV and a minibar. Each has a private dressing closet and en suite bathroom complete with bathrobes and slippers. Guests can shop in Monaco’s large range of luxury stores nearby and the famous Monte Carlo casino is just a 6-minute walk away. Access to Monaco Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the property. Private parking is possible on site and Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: La Bastide de Saint Tropez
description: La Bastide De Saint Tropez is a 10-minute walk from Saint Tropez town centre and the beach. It has an outdoor pool with sun loungers and offers free access to the OCCITANE Spa. Each of the air-conditioned rooms and suites has a classic décor. They are equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and a private garden or terrace. Guests can enjoy refined Italian cuisine at L'Isoletta restaurant, open every day. Guests can enjoy traditional Mediterranean recipes for lunch at the BBQ de la Bastide. From May to September, lunch is served in the exotic garden or on the terrace by the pool.

name: Ath Hôtel Athénée
description: Hotel Athénée provides 3-star accommodation in the centre of Cannes. It is a 5-minute walk from the Croisette Beach and a 10-minute walk from Palais des Festivals. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Athénée's rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Each room is equipped with a minibar, satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with bath or shower. There are a variety of restaurants and bars within walking distance of the Athénée. Hotel Athénée is located just 600 metres from the Cannes Train Station.

name: Casino Hotel des Palmiers
description: Hotel Casino des Palmiers offers cosy accommodation in Hyeres and is within walking distance of Hyeres Railway Station. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel offers a range of amenities, such as meeting rooms, a safe and conference rooms. There is also a modern casino on-site. The rooms at Casino feature a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. They offer a telephone, heating and a desk. Providing an extensive selection of drinks, the on-site cocktail bar is an ideal spot to enjoy a hand-made cocktail before heading out to explore bars and clubs in the local area. The hotel enjoys a prime location, allowing guests easy access to a range of popular attractions and restaurants. Guests can also discover University of the South Toulon-Var.Revato

name: Hotel & Studios Astor
description: Hôtel Astor is a family hotel, located in a quiet setting just a few minutes from the centre of Juan les Pins and the beach. It offers free WiFi and serves a continental breakfast. The guest rooms and studios include TV and air conditioning. The studios offer a fully-equipped kitchen, bed linen and towels. Hôtel Astor is close to shops, restaurants and the casino, as well as bus and rail transport links. The property offers a parking subject to availability. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is approximately 25 km from the property.

name: Best Western PLUS La Corniche
description: The hotel has received the European Eco-label certification. The label distinguishes services and products that meet high standards of both performance and environmental quality. Bathed in sunlight and opening out onto the azure sky, the Best Western Plus Hotel La Corniche overlooks the Toulon Bay, a few steps away from the most beautiful beaches of the coast and very close to the mythical village of St Tropez. Opposite the building, the small St Louis fishing port is alive with the work of the fishermen. An invitation to the Mediterranean Douceur de Vivre. The double bedrooms, twin rooms or junior suites, are decorated in the warm hues of Provencal style and are equipped with a 4 star hotel comfort. The wide view of the St. Mandrier Peninsula and Porquerolles Island offers an enthralling sight. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hôtel Le Sud
description: Set in the heart of Juan-les-Pins, Hôtel Le Sud is a 3-minute walk from the beach and 1 km from the centre of Antibes. It features brightly coloured rooms with air-conditioning, and a garden with a terrace. Each guest room has a private bathroom and is equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Some rooms look out onto the private garden. A continental breakfast is served in the hotel garden during summer. Hôtel Le Sud is situated 50 metres away from Juan-les-Pins Train Station and only 200 metres from the sea. The hotel is located 19 km from Nice Airport. Cannes Convention Centre is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Le Canberra
description: Le Canberra is located on Rue d’Antibes in central Cannes, a 5-minute walk from the beach. It has a heated outdoor pool surrounded by a sunbathing terrace and a Mediterranean garden. Each of the Canberra’s guest rooms and suites has air-conditioning, soundproofed windows and LCD satellite TV. They all also have a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi access. Guests of the Hôtel Le Canberra have access to a fitness room with a sauna. Reception is open 24 hours for guests’ convenience. The Palais des Festivals and La Croisette are within easy walking distance of the Hôtel Le Canberra. Guests can also visit the many boutique shops surrounding the hotel.

name: Hotel Molière
description: This hotel is in the centre of Cannes, a 2-minute walk from the Promenade de la Croisette and the beaches. It offers a flower-filled garden and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Molière has Wi-Fi internet access and most also have a private balcony overlooking the garden. The Molière serves a daily continental breakfast in the garden. Additional facilities at the Molière hotel include a lift and a 24-hour reception. The hotel is just 100 metres from Rue d’Antibes and a 10-minute walk from the Palais des Festivals et des Congrès (where the Cannes Film Festival takes place).

name: Villa Claudia Hotel Cannes
description: Villa Claudia Hotel Cannes Centre - Parking is a 19th-century villa with a private garden 200 metres from Rue d’Antibes. It offers air-conditioned accommodation and a terrace in the centre of Cannes. Rooms at Villa Claudia Hotel Cannes Centre - Parking have free WiFi access, a telephone, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a view of the hotel’s private garden. Villa Claudia Hotel Cannes Centre - Parking serves breakfast every day that guests can have in the dining room. Breakfast includes bread, pastries, yoghurts, fruit and eggs and there is a self-service machine for hot drinks. Guests are invited to relax on the terrace in the garden. Villa Claudia Hotel Cannes Centre - Parking is a 5-minute walk from the Promenade de la Croisette, the Palais des Festivals et des Congrès and the beach. The Cannes Train Station is 500 metres away. On-site parking is available with prior reservation and for a supplement.

name: Hotel Les Jardins De Sainte Maxime
description: Hôtel Les Jardins De Sainte-Maxime is located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, in the Gulf of Saint-Tropez. It offers a heated indoor pool, an outdoor pool and a fitness and wellbeing centre with hammam. All air-conditioned rooms are decorated in the scandinavian style. Most of the rooms have a balcony or terrace and provide an exceptional view of the surrounding area. The restaurant at Jardins de Sainte-Maxime serves a buffet breakfast and a range of cuisines from Mediterranean to a large choice of regional specialities. Dinner can be served in the dining room or on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace of the hotel’s bar. There is a games area with billiards, mini football and table tennis and free Wi-Fi is available on site. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the city centre of Sainte-Maxime, and just 300 metres from the beach.

name: Nehô Suites Cannes Croisette
address: 12 bis rue latour maubourg, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located in Cannes, 1.6 km from Palm Beach and 1.2 km from Palais des Festivals de Cannes, Nehô Suites Cannes Croisette provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Private parking is available on site. All room have a private bathroom. Some rooms have a terrace and a kitchenette. The apartment offers a buffet or American breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a hammam, and a sauna, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Casino Barrière Les Princes, La Malmaison Art Center and Cannes Town Hall. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 27 km from Nehô Suites Cannes Croisette.

name: Le Clos Des Vignes
address: B B Le Clos Des Vignes Villa 8, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: No description found

name: Welcome Hotel
address: 3 Quai De L'Amiral Courbet, 06230 Villefranche-sur-Mer, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Welcome Hotel is situated in Villefranche-sur-Mer between Nice and Monte-Carlo. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony overlooking Cap Ferrat Bay. Le Wine Pier, the Welcome’s wine bar, has a terrace with panoramic sea views and an extensive selection of local wines and cocktails. Additional services include a 24-hour reception and free daily international newspapers. The Welcome Hotel is 400 metres from the beaches, and there is a diving club in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Juana
description: Listed as a historic monument, this 5-star hotel is located in Juan-les-Pins, 260 metres from Belles Rives Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool with solarium, a fitness centre and a sauna. A flat-screen TV, minibar and free WiFi access are just some of the facilities in the air-conditioned rooms. The marble bathrooms include a bathtub and Asprey's toiletries. The balconies offer views of the Mediterranean and the pine grove, and some rooms have views of Juan les Pins. Traditional French cuisine is served at the Bistrot Terrasse restaurant, which is decorated with chandeliers and features local products. Meals can be served on the terrace, under the pine trees, or in the indoor dining area. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the bar at Hôtel Juana. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Juana Hotel is a 20-minute drive down the coast to Cannes - Mandelieu Airport and an airport shuttle is available upon request and at an additional cost. Private parking and a 24-hour valet service are available on site. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Best Western Hôtel Méditerranée Menton
address: 5 Rue De La République, 06500 Menton, Alpes-Maritimes
description: A charming hotel with 89 rooms, the Best Western Hotel Menton Mediterranee welcomes you in a warm, modern environment in the heart of the lovely town of Menton. Private underground car park with 34 places. The 5 restaurant, is open every day of the year, and an ideal location in the centre of Menton, just 50 meters from the beach, you can enjoy your holiday in Menton in complete serenity. On the hotel's panoramic Roof Top on the seventh floor, you can savor a delicious cocktail and make the most of the French Riviera sunshine with the sea in the background.bestwestern.com

name: Cannes Villa St Barth
description: Located a 5-minute drive from the centre of Cannes in 2000m² of tropical gardens, this guest accommodation features an infinity pool, a hammam and a hot tub. It offers rooms with a teak deck patio and free Wi-Fi. There is a spa and wellness centre. Guest rooms at the Villa St Barth are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Each private bathroom has locally made bathrobes. Breakfast is served throughout the day and tapas is also prepared upon request. Additionally Asian and Mediterranean dishes are available at the restaurant. Cannes Villa St Barth is less than a 5-minute drive from the Boulevard de la Croisette. A bus stop can be found opposite the property. Private parking is available on site, and guests can enjoy views of the Lérins Islands from the property's wooden terraces.

name: Hotel Mademoiselle
address: 12 Av. Du Docteur Dautheville, 06160 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: This design hotel is set in the Mediterranean city of Juan-les-Pins, 150 metres from the beach and the casino. It features a modern décor, and guests are invited to relax on the shaded garden terrace or on the patio. Free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels feature in all of the air-conditioned, individually decorated rooms. Each room includes an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning at Hotel Mademoiselle. It can be enjoyed al fresco on the terrace. Savoury items and gluten-free breakfast can be provided upon request and for an extra fee. Antibes is located a 5-minute drive from the hotel and the Juan-les-Pins train station is 400 metres away.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Monaco Monte-Cristo
address: 2A Rue Des Martyrs de la Résistance, 06240 Beausoleil, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Adagio Monaco Monte Cristo, thanks to its central location right on the doorstep of Monaco, boasts easy access to all parts of the Principality. With 78 very comfortable airconditioned new apartments, ranging from 2 or 3 person studios to 2 bedroom a partments for 5 or 6 people, this hotel is an ideal place to stay whether on a business trip or an escapade through the French Riviera.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Belle Plage & Villa Spa
address: 2, Rue Brougham - Square Mistral, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: No description found

name: Unique Hotel & Residence
address: 155, Rue De La Garonne, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Unique Hôtel & Spa is situated in Saint-Raphaël, 25 km from Cannes and 4.5 km from Aqualand Waterpark. Guests can enjoy the on-site lounge bar. There is free WiFi throughout the property. Every room at this hotel offers air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with Canal and beIN sports channels. You will find a kettle in the room. The rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The lounge bar is open every day and guests can eat breakfast either at the bar or in the comfort of their own room. Snacks and drinks are available throughout the day. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including golfing and cycling. Saint-Tropez is 20 km from Unique Hôtel & Spa, while Antibes is 34 km from the property. Côte d'Azur Airport is 45 km away.

name: Residhotel Les Coralynes
address: 3 Traverse de la Colline, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: This Residhotel is a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Festivals and La Croisette Beach. It offers soundproofed apartments with a private balcony and air conditioning. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. The units have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, hot plates and a fridge. Each accommodation has a private bathroom with a bath and shower. Some studios were renovated in 2020. The property provides an underground car park (small narrow parking lot accessible to small vehicles) 3 parking spaces are available upon request and are subject to availability and all apartments are serviced by a lift. Cannes SNCF Train Station is just 500 metres away and guests can easily explore the French Riviera.

name: Odalys City Beausoleil les Hauts de la Principauté
address: 31 Boulevard Du General Leclerc, 06240 Beausoleil, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Odalys City Beausoleil les Hauts de la Principauté is located in Beausoleil, at the foot of Mont des Mules. It is 13 minutes from Larvotto Beach and the Mediterranean Sea. It offers free Wi-Fi access. Each air-conditioned apartment and studio at the Les Hauts de la Principauté features a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining area and a balcony. Some balconies have views of the Mediterranean Sea. Odalys City Beausoleil les Hauts de la Principauté offers a sun terrace roof, so guests can relax. A breakfast is served daily. It also has an under covered car park and laundry service. Les Hauts de la Principauté is a 10-minute walk from Monte Carlo Casino and from Grimaldi Forum. Monaco Train Station is 1 km away and Nice Airport is 28 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Gray d'Albion
description: Providing a private beach, Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is situated in Cannes and is a short walk from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. This trendy hotel is set in the heart of the city. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion offers complimentary wireless internet and public parking on site. It provides family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as supervised child care/activities and a kids club. The air conditioned rooms at the hotel are well-appointed. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room closet and a mini bar. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is close to Cannes's famous attractions, with Intercontinental Carlton Beach just a 10-minute walk away. Guests can tour the area using the hotel's rental bicycles.Revato

name: Hôtel La Tartane Saint -Tropez
description: Located in Saint-Tropez, Hôtel La Tartane Saint-Tropez is between the beaches and the town center. It offers rooms and suites with private terraces, flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. There's also an outdoor pool surrounded by sun beds and a bar. Le Saint Amour restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine for lunch, while Le Saint Amour by Maitre Koï prepares Asian dishes for dinner. Both have elegant dining rooms where you can enjoy your meals. Hôtel La Tartane Saint-Tropez also offers a free shuttle service to Saint-Tropez and its beaches. Free private parking is also available on site

name: Mondrian Cannes
address: 45 Boulevard De La Croisette, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: In an exceptional setting, the Mondrian Cannes is the only hotel on the iconic La Croisette with its own garden and direct access to the Antibes shopping street. An ideal location that fully embodies the lifestyle concept. Boasting large open spaces with natural light and simple wood and marble decor. There are 75 rooms and suites, including a floor of suites and deluxe rooms with a sea view and terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Kube Saint-Tropez
description: Kube Hotel St Tropez is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Saint-Tropez. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kube Hotel St Tropez. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kube Hotel St Tropez.Agoda

name: The 1932 Hotel & Spa Cap d'Antibes - MGallery.
description: Built in 1932, the legendary French Riviera Hotel and Spa in Cap d'Antibes is reconnecting with its history after a complete renovation combining Art Deco and modern elegance. This pairing creates a unique identity in our spacious rooms, inviting you on a journey back in time. Our rooftop has a pool, restaurant + bar to enjoy all day. Panoramic view of the Med.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel La Potiniere
address: 29, Avenue de la Méditerranée, 83400 Hyères, Var
description: Boasting a private beach, Hotel La Potiniere is situated in Hyeres and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests can also make use of free wireless internet. The hotel has 28 rooms and has been recently refurbished. There is free public parking nearby for guests with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms available for families. Hotel La Potiniere Hyeres serves breakfast each morning, and has a bar where guests can unwind with a drink. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. Hotel La Potiniere is a 10-minute drive from Toulon-Hyeres Airport, and sightseers can easily reach University of the South Toulon-Var by car.Revato

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Hotel Residence Les Medes
address: 2 Rue de la Douane, 83400 Hyères, Var
description: Located in Porquerolles, 400 metres from Courtade Beach, Hotel Residence Les Medes is a residence with a garden and a sun terrace. There are a gourmet-style restaurant and a bar on site. Hotel Residence Les Medes offers self-catering, air-conditioned accommodations with a satellite, cable TV. The bathroom in each of them includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. The kitchen provides a dishwasher, a coffee machine and a refrigerator. An all you can eat, buffet breakfast is available every morning and can be taken on the veranda. Other facilities are included such as a safety deposit box, a tennis table and luggage storage. Guests can request a shuttle-boat service and use free Wi-Fi access in the public areas. Activities on site include hiking, swimming and cycling. The property is located 400 metres from the harbour where the shuttle-boats from the mainland arrive.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Strélitzias, Antibes Juan-Les-Pins
description: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Strélitzias, Antibes Ouest is located in Juan-les-Pins, just 300 metres from the beach and a 5-minute walk from the town centre. It offers free WiFi and soundproofed accommodation. All air-conditioned rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Strélitzias are serviced by a lift and feature a contemporary décor. Some accommodation types include lounge areas and private terraces. Breakfast is served daily and the Strelitzias’s restaurant serves regional and traditional cuisine. There is also a 24-hour reception and a bar. Guests are invited to read in the library or work out in the gym. The hotel also has facilities for boules and billiards.

name: La Bastide du Port
address: Port du Pilon,73 av General Leclerc, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Overlooking the St-Tropez bay, La Bastide Du Port is located 300 metres from the town centre. It offers guests a garden shaded by palm trees and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Provencal-style air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar. All rooms have sea or garden views and the en suite bathrooms offer bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning, including pastries, bread, juice, hot drinks, jams, cheeses and yogurt. In the evening, guests can relax in the Bastide’s bar. Shops and restaurants can be found within 100 metres of the property. For those more adventurous, car, bicycle and boat rental are available on site. Port Grimaud is 7.6 km from La Bastide Du Port, while Saint-Raphael is 39 km away. Free secure parking is available on site.

name: Villa Garbo
description: Villa Garbo is a 5-minute walk from the beach and the Promenade de la Croisette. It offers suites, a lounge bar and spa near Rue d’Antibes. Free WiFi is available. Villa Garbo’s spacious suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some have a BOSE home cinema and an IPOD docking station. Each suite has a kitchen with Sarreguemines china and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms feature grey granite details. Every evening, Villa Garbo’s Lounge Bar invites guests to enjoy complimentary drinks by the fireplace during winter or on the terrace during summer. Guests can have breakfast in the privacy of their suite or in the lounge. Garbo’s spa includes a fitness room with high-tech equipment and a hammam. The spa provides massages, on appointment. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Hotel Capitole
address: 19 Boulevard Du General Leclerc, Beausoleil, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Set 1 km from Larvotto Beach and 300 metres from Monte-Carlo Casino, this 3-star hotel is ideally located in Beausoleil. Its rooms have a balcony overlooking Monaco and a garden. All of the soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Capitole are air conditioned and equipped with flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout. In the morning, breakfast is served in the elegant dining room with large windows. The Hotel Capitole’s reception is open 24 hours. Three public parking sites are located nearby. Nice Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property, while Monaco Train Station is just 1 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Hyeres Cote D'azur
description: Located in the heart of the French Riviera, Cote d'Azur, Southern France, our hotel offers 56 fully-equipped air conditioned rooms, a restaurant and its terrace, an outdoor pool in a lovely Mediterranean garden. The hotel also provides seminars services including a 80 people capacity room. The seashore and beaches are a 10minute drive away by car or bike. The famous Golden Islands (Porquerolles, Port Cros, Le Levant) are accessible by sea from Hyères Harbour by boat shuttle. The Old Town offers a lively nightlife, pedestrian areas as well as pubs and bars. Come discover the dramatic seascapes and the rich variety of wildlife as well as the hectic cultural activity of the city of Hyères-les-Palmiers. The hotel is equipped for people with reduced mobility.bestwestern.com

name: Eden Hotel & Spa
description: Eden Hotel & Spa is located in the heart of Cannes on rue d'Antibes, the main shopping street and is only 150 metres from the famous La Croisette beaches. It offers access to the spa including an indoor heated pool, Turkish bath, sauna, ice crushed fountain and fitness area. This modern hotel features bright guest rooms with a unique design, air conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi access. The Afro-modern restaurant, Akwaba, serves a range of contemporary and healthy dishes. A daily buffet breakfast is served in the dining room. The fireside bar is open every night and has a range of cocktails. From May to October, guests at the Eden Hotel & Spa also have access to an outdoor swimming pool, and the panoramic rooftop sun terrace at the hotel for an additional charge. The Cannes Festival venues and Congress Centre is only 1 km from the hotel.

name: La Bastide de l'Oliveraie
description: This charming hotel in Cannes provides free wireless internet, as well as a rooftop terrace and a Turkish steam bath. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. All the rooms at La Bastide De L'Oliveraie feature a refrigerator, a coffee maker and a kitchenette. They each offer an in-room safe, a telephone and a flat-screen TV. La Bastide De L'Oliveraie is close to shops and restaurants, and is a brief car ride from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. It is within a 20-minute walk of Cannes Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Cannes.Revato

name: Le Relais d'Agay
address: 100 Boulevard De La Plage, 83530 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Le Relais d'Agay faces the beautiful sandy beach at Agay and is surrounded by shops and restaurants. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout the property. Some of the guest rooms offer a private balcony and sea views. You can start your day with a generous buffet breakfast in the Relais d'Agay’s bright breakfast room. As well as spending the day on the beach, there are many footpaths and nature trails in the Estérel Hills where you can go to admire wonderful panoramic views. Le Relais d'Agay makes a great base for exploring the glamorous towns of the French Riviera, such as Saint Tropez and Cannes.

name: Residence Emeraude
description: No description found

name: Althoff Hotel Villa Belrose
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms featuring minibars. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service. Property Location When you stay at Althoff Hotel Villa Belrose in Gassin, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute drive of Saint-Tropez Gulf and Domaine de la Baratonne. This 5-star hotel is 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Pampelonne Beach and 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Port of Saint Tropez. Dining Enjoy Asian cuisine at club l'indochine, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between October 9 and April 28.
