name: Hotel Club Le Capet
description: Situated 600 metres from the beach and 800 metres from the city centre, Hotel Club Le Capet offers a large, outdoor swimming pool, a library and you can play table tennis on site. There is a French restaurant and a bar as well. Composed of 2 main buildings, one with a lift, the heated rooms at Hotel Club Le Capet have a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom with shower. Free Wi-Fi access is provided. A full board option with a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner with wine is provided. After breakfast, guests can play volley ball or enjoy the pétanque facilities, here at their disposal. During summer only, evening entertainment is available and there is also a children's club. The property is situated 25 km from Saint-Raphaël Train Station and 80 km from Nice Airport. The local casino is 700 metres away

name: Residéal
address: 100 Rue Line Renaud Loulou Gasté, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Aparthotel Adagio Monaco Palais Joséphine
address: Avenue Du General De Gaulle 2a, 06240 Beausoleil, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located right on the border of the Principality of Monaco, the Adagio Monaco Palais Joséphine is just a few minutes from the Monaco convention center and the casino. 99 spacious and air-conditioned apartments, ranging from studios for 2/3 people to 3 roo ms accommodating 5/6 people. The Aparthotel is in the heart of the vibrant Belle Epoque district of Beausoleil, with its palm tree-lined pedestrianized street and many shops. A rooftop pool and indoor car park are provided for your convenience.accorhotels.com

name: B&B Villa Blanche
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Amenities Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include luggage storage and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at B&B Villa Blanche, you'll be centrally located in Cannes, within a 5-minute drive of Promenade de la Croisette and Carnot Boulevard. This bed & breakfast is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Palace of Festivals and Conferences and 1 mi (1.5 km) from Cannes Harbour. Dining A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 10 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 5.36 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: La Place
description: Located in the heart of Antibes, Hotel La Place Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Port Vauban and the sandy beaches. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. We serve a delicious buffet breakfast daily from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. on our terrace. Hotel La Place Boutique Hotel is just 10 km from Cannes and a 15-minute drive from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. Antibes Train Station is 1 km away. Please note that there is no elevator! On request and according to availability we reserve with pleasure a room on the first floor.

name: Hôtel La Villa
address: 122 Av Du Croiseur Leger Le Malin, 83120 Sainte-Maxime, Var
description: Hôtel & Spa La Villa is located on the beachfront across the road from Garonnette Beach, an 8-minute drive from the centre of Sainte-Maxime and 150 metres from Issambres Port, where guests can take the ferry to Saint-Tropez in summer. At an extra cost and upon reservation, guests have access to a private use spa with a hot tub. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guestrooms and suites with free WiFi. The rooms are decorated in a Provençal style and are equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The soundproofed apartments have a living room and some offer a view of the Mediterranean sea. For stays of 3 nights or more and upon reservation, guests have access to a private kitchenette equipped with a fridge, dishwasher and microwave for an extra fee. A sweet breakfast can be served on the terrace under the olive trees in the summer months. A savory breakfast is available at an extra cost. The on-site bar is open all day and serves a variety of drinks and ice creams. Guests can also order a light meal of local tapas-style ingredients onsite, or can eat at the onsite restaurant upon reservation. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as windsurfing, scuba diving, fishing and balneotherapy. The hotel also offers free private parking.

name: Lagrange Apart'hotel Les Jardins D'olympie
description: Situated in Antibes, Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a rooftop pool and an open-air bath. Private parking is available on site. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie offers 4-star accommodation with a solarium. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Palais des Festivals de Cannes is 13 km from the accommodation, while Musee International de la Parfumerie is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 18 km from Lagrange Apart'Hôtel Antibes Olympie.

name: Boutique Hotel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 22 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with premium bedding, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. If you're ready for some gaming fun, you can hop on the casino shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available 24 hours) and a ferry terminal shuttle. Property Location Located in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Boutique Hôtel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat is near the bay, a 4-minute walk from Cros Dei Pin Beach and 7 minutes by foot from Passable Beach. This hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Villa Ephrussi. Dining Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.01 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: Grand-Hôtel Du Cap-Ferrat, A Four Seasons Hotel
address: 71 Boulevard Du Général De Gaulle, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a lifeguard on site and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Golden Tulip Cannes Hotel de Paris
description: Located in the heart of Cannes, GOLDEN TULIP CANNES HOTEL de PARIS is 500 metres from La Croisette, and guests of the property benefit from reduced rates to select private beaches. The swimming pool is set in a garden planted with olive and cypress trees. A former 19th-century mansion, Golden Tulip Cannes offers rooms and suites decorated in baroque and contemporary design. They are equipped with air conditioning, WiFi access and some have a terrace or balcony with views of the garden or pool. Guests can also stay in one of the hotel's apartments, located on the street behind the GOLDEN TULIP CANNES HOTEL de PARIS. Each apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, dishwasher and coffee machine, in addition to a living and dining area. Guests staying in the apartments benefit from access to all the hotel facilities. The breakfast room was renovated in winter 2017 and is decorated in an elegant baroque style, with purple and silver velvet fabrics. A full breakfast buffet is served daily. In the summer there is a snack bar by the pool, and guests can relax on the terrace. Meeting rooms are available onsite and are equipped with video projectors and a dedicated WiFi connection. Microphones can also be provided upon request. The rooms are lit by natural daylight and can be modified to suit your requirements. The GOLDEN TULIP CANNES HOTEL de PARIS is just a 3-minute walk from the famous shopping street, Rue d’Antibes and a 11-minute walk from the Palais des Festivals. Cannes Train Station is just 500 metres away, while Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 24.5 km away.

name: Hotel le Mandala
address: 63 Avenue Du Marechal Foch, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Located in the centre of Saint-Tropez, an 8-minute walk from Place des Lices, Hotel le Mandala features a contemporary décor. It offers free WiFi access and private parking, paid for 25 eur per day per car. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and pool access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV, views of the sea or garden and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property during high season. You can engage in various activities, such as windsurfing and diving. Saint-Raphaël is 20 km from Hotel le Mandala, while Porquerolles is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 45 km from Hotel le Mandala.

name: Villa Cosy, hotel & spa
address: Chemin De La Belle Isnarde, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Tropez centre and Place des Lices is Villa Cosy. It offers contemporary rooms in a villa-style setting and a heated outdoor swimming pool. An LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access feature in all of the rooms and suites at Cosy. Each is decorated in cream and chocolate tones and some have a private patio leading directly onto the poolside terrace. Guests can order breakfast to their room and dine on the private balconies or on the hotel’s terrace. There is also an onsite bar, which serves a range of aperitifs and cocktails. The airport shuttle service and car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Villa Cosy also provides free private parking and Les Salins Beach is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Des Congrès et Festivals
description: Hôtel Des Congrès Et Festivals is located 50 metres from Rue d’Antibes in Central Cannes and 5 minutes' walk from Carré d'Or and Cannes Train Station. It offers free WiFi and air-conditioned guest rooms, each with a flat-screen TV and a mini-fridge. All of the hotel’s rooms have soundproofed windows and lift access. Some rooms feature a balcony. Guests can find numerous bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. The Hôtel Des Congrès Et Festivals serves a continental breakfast each morning. The Congrès Et Festivals is situated a 5-minute walk from Cannes Beach, and 10-minute walk to the Palais des Festivals et des Congrès and Cannes Harbour.

name: Best Western Hotel Journel Antibes
description: From the rooftop of the hotel, a panoramic view of the Mediterranean can be enjoyed. Designed by the architect Renaud D’Hauteserre, the Best Western Hotel Journel Antibes-Juan-les-Pins is distinguished by its beautiful style of art deco inspiration and its privileged location, just 600 meters from the sea. Its superb rooftop, where a bar and deck chairs are at your disposal, offers besides a clear view on the Bay of Antibes, its luxurious yachts which sparkle under the setting sun and its spectacular Vauban’s Strong Carre. This beautiful establishment on the Cote d’Azur, which will open its doors in April 2018, is ideally located near the old Antibes, its museums where you can find a lot of culture and its covered market where we make the full of flavors. This hotel is a quiet and comfortable address close to the historic center of Antibes. Our 3 Star hotel is a peaceful pied-a-terre, well served by public transport links and within walking distance of the city’s shops and numerous restaurants. Back from a walk, you will enjoy the comfort of its 56 rooms and one Junior Suite perfectly equipped, some of which have a terrace and/or a sea view. In solo or with your family, you will also appreciate the various services offered. At your disposal is a reception desk with concierge service, rooftop bar, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, parking with direct access to the hotel, also a dedicated wellness area and a flexible meeting room with 50 seats.bestwestern.com

name: ibis Hyères Centre
description: The ibis Hyères hotel is only 10 min walking from the city center. It is ideally located to discover the medieval city, the Victorian neighborhoods and the Iles d'Hyères. The hotel offers 46 rooms with A/C and WIFI and 2 of the rooms are designed for redu ced mobility guests. Two meeting rooms, a bar lounge, 24/7 snacks, terrace, pool and paid closed garage with video monitoring. The airport is 3.1 mi (5 km), the SNCF train station 0.6 mi (1 km)accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel les Capucines
address: Allee du Domaine de Treizain, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: Offering a heated swimming pool, a snack bar and a hot tub, Les Capucines Saint Tropez is located in Gassin. Set in a tree-filled park, the hotel is just an 8-minute drive from Saint-Tropez. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and a minibar. Most of the rooms offer garden and pool views, and feature a private terrace. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Les Capucines Saint Tropez you will find a 5000-m² garden, a terrace where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast, a massage area and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include an ironing service and laundry facilities. The property offers free parking. Fréjus Train Station is 34 km away.

name: Le Yaca Saint-Tropez
description: Located at the foot of the Citadelle and featuring the interior courtyard with the garden, Le Yaca Saint-Tropez offers hotel accommodation in Saint-Tropez. Guests can enjoy the open air swimming pool, set in a flowery garden. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a DVD player. Selected units have a seating area. Rooms feature views of the sea, garden, village or pool. Each room has a private bathroom and minibar. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. Guests can enjoy the Italian gastronomic restaurant and on-site bar. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. The property is a 3-minute walk from the Place des Lices and the St Tropez port. Pampalonne beaches are a 10-minute drive. Cannes is 44 km from Le Yaca Saint-Tropez, while Saint-Raphaël is 20 km from the property. Nice Cote d'Azur airport is 100 km away.

name: Le Mas de la Dame
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and an espresso maker. Other amenities include rollaway beds, a crib, an ironing board, and a sitting area.Expedia

name: Juliana Hotel Cannes
description: Renovated in 2020, Juliana Hotel Cannes is located in central Cannes, only 400 metres from the beach and La Croisette. It has a sunbathing terrace and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. Each of the Juliana Hotel Cannes’s guest rooms are air-conditioned and has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and LCD satellite TV. Some offer a balcony. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s Bar, which offers wines, beers and soft drinks. Breakfast can be delivered to your room. The Palais des Festivals and the ferry to Île Sainte-Marguerite are located 1.5km from the Juliana Hotel Cannes. Cannes Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Nouvel Hotel
description: Located in the seaside resort of Saint-Raphael, this hotel is 50 metres from the sandy beach. It offers guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access and some rooms feature a balcony. All guest rooms are non-smoking and each room is equipped with a TV. Each room is decorated with bright colours and some have wood-panelled ceilings. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower. Traditional cuisine is served in the restaurant at the Nouvel Hotel. A continental breakfast is also served every morning. Guests can reserve activities at the hotel reception including sailing and windsurfing. Saint-Raphael Train Station is 100 metres from Nouvel Hotel and public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Les Citronniers
address: 1134 Boulevard Front de Mer, 83400 Hyères, Var
description: Set just 50 metres from the beach, Hôtel de la Mer is located 5 km away from Hyères city centre and offers sea views. Guests can relax on the terrace in the garden of their bedrooms. The rooms at Hôtel de la Mer are individually decorated and offer parquet floors, free Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. Each room is has an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower, and some rooms are accessible for guests with reduced mobility. Every morning a continental breakfast is served featuring homemade jams. Guests can enjoy home cooking at the hotel from April to October, with the exception of Thursdays. Breakfast is served at the restaurant or in the terrace. The restaurant is open from Tuesday noon to Sunday noon. The Toulon Train Station is 30 minutes away and the Toulon-Hyères Airport is 2 km away. Guests can take the 20-minute ferry to the Porquerolles Islands from Toulon and have free private parking at the hotel.

name: Domaine de l'Aufrene
address: 83, Vieux chemin de Toulon, 83400 Hyères, Var
description: No description found

name: Hôtel le Florian
address: 8 Rue du Commandant Andre, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located in Cannes's city centre, this hotel provides comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is set amongst a variety of dining options and is within a 10-minute walk of Cannes Railway Station. There are a range of facilities available to those staying at Hotel Le Florian Cannes, such as a safe, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. After a day of discovering the area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all have a private bathroom where a hair dryer and a bath menu can be found. To start the day, guests can wake up to breakfast served by Hotel Le Florian before venturing out to see what the local region has to offer. Cannes's attractions, including Intercontinental Carlton Beach and Palais des Festivals et des Congres, are within a 10-minute walk of Le Florian. The local neighbourhood is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Hotel Victoria
address: 6400 Rond Point Duboys D`Angers Cannes, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Hotel Victoria offers air-conditioned accommodation just 50 metres from Rue d’Antibes and 300 metres from Promenade de la Croisette. Fully renovated in February 2016, it has a lounge bar, swimming pool and a 24-hour reception. Free WiFi access is available in this hotel. Located on the first or second floor, the contemporary rooms at Hotel Victoria are soundproofed and some have a balcony. Each room is accessible by lift and equipped with a telephone, cable TV and private bathroom. Victoria Hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast in the lounge or next to the pool. Guests can also have breakfast in their room. Victoria’s bar provides a variety of cocktails that guests can enjoy by the outdoor pool. Palais des Festivals et des Congrès and Cannes’s train station are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Victoria.

name: Best Western Astoria
address: 15 Avenue Du Marechal Joffre, 06160 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: In a quiet area, near the crazy nights of Juan-les-Pins. The Best Western Astoria is 100 meters from beaches, restaurants and stores. In the heart of Cote D'Azur, you can discover the area and important events without the traffic jam. The Best Western Astoria is near the railway station. Our 49 rooms are all soundproofed, air conditioned, equipped with satellite TV, tea/coffee maker and Wi-Fi. All rooms have a balcony, some of them with a little sea view. Come and enjoy a wonderful and quiet stay at the Best Western Astoria. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Atoll Hotel
address: 923 Boulevard De La Mer, 83600 Fréjus, Var
description: Atoll Hotel restaurant is just 100 metres from the beach and marina in the heart of Fréjus. Free on-site parking is provided, and the town’s attractions are easily accessible on foot. Guest rooms have air conditioning, a private bathroom, a TV and hairdryer. There is free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. A buffet breakfast is served every day and can be enjoyed before work or sightseeing. The hotel's restaurant "La Bella Trattoria" also offers the option of half board. Nearby there are Roman ruins, the Verdon canyon and the Esterel hills.

name: Hôtel Mercure Hyères Centre
description: Inspired by Villa Noailles, the renovated Mercure Hyères Centre features a very modern design. With four meeting rooms and free parking for business and seminars, our Hyères hotel also gives pride of place to relaxation. You can sunbathe on the terrace by the pool, work out in the fitness room, and sample regional dishes and wines from Provence in our bar and restaurant, "Victor".accorhotels.com

name: Hotel & Restaurant Perla Riviera
address: 369 Avenue De La Colle, 06270 Villeneuve-Loubet, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Perla Riviera is an air-conditioned hotel 3 km from Cagnes-Sur-Mer and a 15-minute drive from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport on the A8 motorway. It has a meeting room, an outdoor swimming pool and a poolside bar. Perla Riviera offers rooms with private bathrooms, and free high-speed WiFi. They are all serviced by a lift. Guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar. The restaurant at Perla-Riviera serves traditional French and Mediterranean cuisine. Polygone Riviera shopping centre and Casino Tranchant are less than 200 m away. The hotel is just 1.5 km from the Labyrinthe de l'Aventure amusement park, 7.6 km from Marineland Aquarium and a 10-minute drive from the nearest beach. Private parking is available.

name: Citadines Croisette Cannes
description: This Citadines Apart’hotel is located in central Cannes, a 10-minute walk from the Palais des Festivals and La Croisette beaches. It has a rooftop terrace with a sundeck. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned studios and apartments include free wired internet access and satellite TV. They feature a living area and a kitchenette equipped with an oven, hotplates and refrigerator. The residence also provides a launderette and dry cleaning services. The property is a 5-minute walk from Cannes Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the old harbour. Provided with on-site parking, the Citadines is located on Boulevard Carnot, which gives direct access to the E80/A8 motorway.

name: Le Domaine de la Mer
description: No description found

name: Hotel Villa Maya
description: Just 200 metres from the beaches, Villa Maya is located in Gassin, only 2 km from St Tropez. Port Cogolin is a 5-minute drive away. All rooms have a terrace or balcony, and some offer views of the heated pool or St Tropez Gulf. Tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom are provided in each room or studio. Meals can be enjoyed in the dining room upon advance request and family-style dishes are available. Guests can dine out at the Terrasses de Saint Tropez restaurant or on site. Breakfast is prepared every morning using fresh, local produce. There is also a half-board rate available, which includes breakfast and dinner. Saint-Raphael Train Station is 35 km from Villa Maya. Shuttles to the airport and local towns can be arranged.

name: Hotel Cap Estel
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: ibis Hyères Plage Thalassa
address: Allee De La Mer, La Capte, 83400 Hyères, Var
description: The ibis Hyères Plage Thalassa hotel boasts an outstanding seafront setting on the Giens Peninsula, and is perfect for couples or families, with 95 rooms, a restaurant with terrace, and direct access onto Capte beach. Relax on the solarium loungers and make the most of our thalasso center, with indoor pool and hammam and offering beauty care, massages, and sports and wellness exercises.accorhotels.com

name: La Fabrique à Poupées - Chambres de charme au coeur de Menton
description: La Fabrique à Poupées - Chambres de charme au coeur de Menton is a bed and breakfast accommodation set in Menton, 800 metres from Jean-Cocteau Museum. Free private parking is available on site. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the mountain, garden or city are featured in certain rooms. The rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. La Fabrique à Poupées - Chambres de charme au coeur de Menton features free WiFi. IUT Technology University Menton is 300 metres from La Fabrique à Poupées - Chambres de charme au coeur de Menton, while The Middle Eastern and Mediterranean Undergraduate College of Menton is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Côte d'Azur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: La Bastide d'Antoine
address: Domaine Du Treizain - Route De Saint-Tropez D98, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: This Provençal-style house offers panoramic views of Saint-Tropez bay. It is located just 2 km from the city centre and offers an outdoor heated swimming pool. The modern rooms at La Bastide d’Antoine are all air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV and garden or sea views. All have a private bathroom and some have a terrace. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace or in the rooms. The pool bar provides a perfect spot to relax with a drink and use the free Wi-Fi access while admiring the open fireplace. La Bastide can be found 50-minutes from Hyères Airport. A laundry service is provided and free parking is available for all guests.

name: Hotel Les Palmiers
description: Hotel Les Palmiers is just 50 metres from ferry connections to St Tropez. It is located in the old quarter of Sainte Maxime, and features a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the marina. Built in 1888, Hotel Les Palmiers offers rooms with air-conditioning and a private bathroom with bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Les Palmiers hotel offers many sport and leisure opportunities nearby. The Massif des Maures and the Massif de l’Estérel provide many hiking, cycling and horse-riding tracks.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany
address: 19 Avenue De L'Amiral Ganteaume, 13260 Cassis, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: With views of the highest cliff in Europe and over the Mediterranean Sea, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is set on the beachfront in Cassis. located 30 metres away. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany are equipped a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private terrace with a sea view. During the high season, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany has a restaurant open in summer time for dinner only and serving tapas and traditional meals. There is a lounge bar and a sun deck facing the sea. A continental breakfast is available for an extra charge and includes pastries, fruit, meat, cheese. Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is just a 5-minute walk from the Port of Cassis and Marseille is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 54.5 km away. Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away and Train station Gare St Charles is 32 km from the hotel. A private car park is available at a surcharge and upon availability.

name: Adagio Access Tours
description: The residence City Résidence Tours is in the business centre of Tours, between the TGV station and Palais des Congrès. The residence offers 99 spacious apartments, modern and fully equipped and can accommodate up to 4 guests. Each apartment provides you with a comfortable and practical living space. Just a few minutes by foot from shops and the city centre, this location is ideal for your business trips and your family visit to the Loire Valley.

name: ibis Styles Parc des Expositions de Villepinte
description: With its unusual design and air-conditioned rooms, ibis Styles Parc des Expositions de Villepinte Hotel offers professional travelers and families ideal service. Close to all transport, our hotel offers you a haven of peace, inspired by nature. Many services will enhance your visit: a Courtepaille restaurant is in the hotel, a terrace and a bar are at your disposal, as well as a meeting room!accorhotels.com

name: Ibis Styles Toulouse Capitole
description: A 17th-century building on the Place du Capitole, transformed into a mansion two centuries later, our hotel combines exceptional heritage and design via its renovations. Our modern, comfortable, air-conditioned bedrooms with built-in Chromecast, are music-themed, just like the rest of the hotel, from the reception with its musical chandelier to its coworking space and exceptional wine bar.accorhotels.com

name: La Grange des Pères
description: Set 29 km from Rochexpo, La Grange des Pères offers accommodation with a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and walk-in shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured in the kitchen, as well as a coffee machine. The aparthotel features a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. Stade de Genève is 35 km from La Grange des Pères, while Jet d'Eau is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Geneva International Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Armony, Dijon Sud
description: See hotel page For Audrey, The Originals City, Hotel Armony is a place like no other. Her involvement and the dedication of her entire team will certainly make your stay enjoyable. Close to the vineyards and centre of Dijon, this 3-star hotel satisfies both business travellers and holidaymakers alike. It provides high-quality rooms, a bar, a dining room, a meeting room and parking for guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Campanile Metz Est - Technopole
address: 2 Boulevard De La Solidarite, 57000 Metz, Moselle
description: This 3-star hotel is situated 4 km from the city centre of Metz in the Metz-Technopole complex. Free Wi-Fi and a welcome tray with tea and coffee are offered in its en suite rooms. Campanile Metz Est Technopole - Restaurant is easily accessible from the A4 motorway and N431 national road and sits on the banks of Lac Symphonie. The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast every morning. Traditional French cuisine is available for lunch and dinner. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges Du Rhone
description: Campanile Lyon Centre - Berges du Rhône offers free WiFi access. It is just a 2-minute walk from the Guillotière Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the Part-Dieu Train Station. Set over 8 floors, rooms at Campanile are decorated in a simple style and feature air conditioning. Please note that only the TV in the bar broadcasts satellite channels and Canal+. The private bathrooms are complete with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Four of the guest rooms are adapted for wheelchair access. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and an express check-in service. Free newspapers are available. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour and Rue de la République, Lyon’s main shopping street. The A6 and A7 are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Residhome Metz Lorraine
description: The Metz-Lorraine residence is located in the heart of the city, in the new amphitheater quarter, 1 km from Parc de la Seille and 400 metres from Metz Train Station. Free WiFi is available at the reception while the accommodation are equipped with wired internet connection. The warm decor of the bright apartments will make your stay even more pleasant, with a fully-equipped kitchen, flat-screen TV, office area and free internet access. The Metz-Lorraine Residhome is located 8 km from Metz Convention Centre and offers a number of services such as parking, a meeting room and laundry facilities.
